\"PlotBuff_Intro_FullEnergy\".m_mContent: "Characters placed in this zone during deployment will gain max Energy at the start of the battle."

\"Dialogue_B_10001_Clip01_01\".m_mContent: "What exactly is this "Bloodsoul" power you just mentioned...?"

\"Dialogue_B_10001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "You think the 'Black Blood' is some sort of disease, right?"

\"Dialogue_B_10001_Clip01_03\".m_mContent: "It's been corroding my sanity. I could turn into a monster at any moment..."

\"Dialogue_B_10001_Clip01_04\".m_mContent: "But what if I told you... that the Black Blood can grant you power beyond human limits?"

\"Dialogue_B_10001_Clip01_06\".m_mContent: "The Black Blood aims to seize full control over you, turning you into its vessel. Its Bloodsoul slowly corrupts your mind while continuously strengthening your body."

\"Dialogue_B_10001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "For those who can't harness Black Blood, it's a curse; but for us, it's a source of power."

\"Dialogue_B_10001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "So you're saying... succumbing to its Bloodsoul will turn you into a mindless zombie, but achieving symbiosis will allow you to wield its power instead."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_001\".m_mContent: "History is but the culmination of countless coincidences interwoven."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_002\".m_mContent: "Prophecies are not tales of what's to come,"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_003\".m_mContent: "But echoes of what has already transpired."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_008\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) My apologies. Did I wake you?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_011\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) (Mouthing silently) No matter what, you will live on."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_013\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) Indeed, why did it come to this..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_015\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) I can only say, I'm sorry, truly..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_016\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles)—to see things end this way."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_017\".m_mContent: "The Year 1353. Seven days before the Black Blood outbreak."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_021\".m_mContent: "Promise me, Noah. You must live on."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip00_022\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) No matter how long it takes, I will wait for you... to welcome you home."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_001\".m_mContent: "If a beast takes on the memories of a human, is it still just a beast, or is it now human?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_001a_01\".m_mContent: "I see, so you're more focused on the extrinsic side?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_001a_02\".m_mContent: "Oh, so you lean toward the intrinsic side?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_001a_03\".m_mContent: "Don't feel like answering? Or perhaps, you believe it's neither?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_003\".m_mContent: "Don't feel like answering? Or perhaps, you believe it's neither?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_004\".m_mContent: "Then tell me, when do you think a person truly dies?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_004a\".m_mContent: "I suppose when the heart stops beating."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_004c\".m_mContent: "Perhaps when they are forgotten by the world."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_004a_01\".m_mContent: "I wasn't expecting such a dull answer."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_004c_01\".m_mContent: "Oh? Then are you the type to define a person by their existence?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_007\".m_mContent: "Did you really drag me here just to ask these questions?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_008\".m_mContent: "Now, now, <style=Highlight>Noah Nevernight</style>, the silver-haired one, I'm just doing my job. The Church expects me to interrogate an extreme heretic like you very thoroughly."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_009\".m_mContent: "So let's cut the formalities. What I really want to know is—"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_010\".m_mContent: "Why would you desecrate the natural order of life and death?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_011\".m_mContent: "What are you saying? Look, I'm sick. I have the <style=Highlight>Black Blood disease</style>. I just want to live. Is that a sin?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_012\".m_mContent: "Life is a sea of uncertainty, but there is one absolute: death will inevitably claim us all."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_013\".m_mContent: "So because death is eventual, I should just accept it now? Is that what you're telling me?!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_014\".m_mContent: "There was one who dared to defy the natural order and, through a certain method, he did actually achieve 'immortality'—"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_015\".m_mContent: "<style=Highlight>Dracula</style>, the first <style=Highlight>Bloodborn</style>. I'm sure you've heard this name before."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_016\".m_mContent: "I didn't expect an Inquisitor from the Church to believe in the tall tales of the <style=Highlight>Bloodborn</style>. But what does any of this have to do with me?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_017\".m_mContent: "The connection lies in <style=Highlight>the method I just mentioned</style>. The flesh cannot resist the erosion of time, hence his method of achieving immortality was—"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_020\".m_mContent: "You just told me you're sick, and you only wish to live."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_021\".m_mContent: "Black Blood is an incurable plague, so you're not after <style=Highlight>a cure</style>, are you? You're looking for <style=Highlight>another way</style>, such as..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip01_022\".m_mContent: "<style=Highlight>Transferring your memories to a new body...</style>"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02_002\".m_mContent: "Thank goodness this carriage held together, even after falling from such a height."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02_003\".m_mContent: "But where did that man with the sinister eyebrows go? Did he fall to his death?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02_004\".m_mContent: "Luckily the rain stopped. Now is my chance to escape while the path is visible."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02_005\".m_mContent: "Argh! Damn, why is it acting up now..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02_006\".m_mContent: "I... can't die in a place like this. I made... a promise..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02_007\".m_mContent: "I made a promise to <style=Highlight>Ressa</style>... I will return, no matter what..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02_007b\".m_mContent: "I'm not that good with a sword, but it's better than nothing."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02_008\".m_mContent: "The shining knights of the Church, now just food for the rats in this forsaken valley... how ironic."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02a_001\".m_mContent: "As expected... It seems the lingering memories are controlling the bodies."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02a_002\".m_mContent: "As the body decays, they seek to fuse with other flesh. This symptom is undeniably..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02a_004\".m_mContent: "They can still move? I need to get out of here..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02a_005\".m_mContent: "Not again... Damn it! Am I going to share the same fate as them?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02b_001\".m_mContent: "The bottom of the valley reeks of decay. Is this really where that heretic is hiding?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02b_002\".m_mContent: "Well, it's a fitting place for him... Damnit! That disgusting thing bit me!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02b_004\".m_mContent: "The pursuers caught up already? That's... like they knew I'd come here."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02b_005\".m_mContent: "The soldiers are blocking the way, but I can't go back... Have to find someplace to hide!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02b_006\".m_mContent: "The stars are our birthplace; and thus we were exiled—"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_001\".m_mContent: "<style=Highlight>The moon is but a dream of the sun</style>, and thus we were forgotten by the light—"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_002a\".m_mContent: "This valley is extremely dangerous at night. No one should be wandering around alone."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_003\".m_mContent: "But for us Moonblessed, daylight is the real danger."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_003a\".m_mContent: "Are you saying... You fear the sunlight? Are you also suffering from a disease?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_003b\".m_mContent: "Of course not, it's because we are the children of the moon."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_004\".m_mContent: "When the sun wakes up, the dream of the moon will disappear, and our existence will be forgotten along with it."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_005\".m_mContent: "But I don't think to disappear means to be forgotten."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_006\".m_mContent: "Just like I don't believe death will erase one's existence. Someone will always remember them... Like your singing, I will definitely remember it."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_007\".m_mContent: "If I disappeared, you would remember me?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_009\".m_mContent: "Let's set that question aside for now and... Huh? Where did she go?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_010\".m_mContent: "Black uniform, silver hair... it's him! The heretic that escaped, Noah Nevernight!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_011\".m_mContent: "Ha! Look at the pathetic state the <style=Highlight>Black Blood</style> has left him in. After we capture him, maybe they'll make us Bell Ringers!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_012\".m_mContent: "I heard the <style=Highlight>blacker the blood and the whiter the hair</style>, the more far gone they are. How revolting."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_013\".m_mContent: "Really? I think the color suits him."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_014\".m_mContent: "That bat turned into a woman! Another heretic?!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_015\".m_mContent: "The report said the carriage was attacked before it veered off the cliff. Was it this bat demon?!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_016\".m_mContent: "Watch your tongue! You are in the graces of Empousa."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip02c_017\".m_mContent: "Well it doesn't matter how many there are, just kill them all!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_01\".m_mContent: "Vile silver-haired demon! The great Aeon will curse your fate..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_02\".m_mContent: "Curse us? Sounds like your so-called god is the real demon."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_03\".m_mContent: "You have a history with the Church?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_04\".m_mContent: "Quiet. I'm risking a lot to save you, so just come with me."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_05\".m_mContent: "Actually, I don't think sending someone off a cliff counts as 'saving' them..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_08\".m_mContent: "You're okay, aren't you? You won't die that easily, because you're like me."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_09\".m_mContent: "One of the <style=Highlight>Moonblessed</style>! That silver hair is proof enough."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_11\".m_mContent: "I'm not sure what you're talking about, my disease made my hair..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_12\".m_mContent: "Those were lies to lure you in!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_13\".m_mContent: "Another admirer? My, you sure are popular."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_16\".m_mContent: "Did you think disguising as an ordinary flower girl could fool the eyes of Nefertari Setti?!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_17\".m_mContent: "Your foul black wings and unholy fangs have already exposed you... vampire filth!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_19\".m_mContent: "<style=Highlight>Bloodborn</style>? You mean like vampires from those tall tales?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_18\".m_mContent: "Why would I need to hide from the likes of you? And the name is Empousa!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_18a\".m_mContent: "The stories say the Bloodborn are beautiful and elegant creatures, with silver hair, crimson eyes, and the ability to transform into animals. But they can't bear the sunlight..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_18b\".m_mContent: "I don't know about elegant, but the rest does seem to fit..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_23\".m_mContent: "Confess to your sins, Nevernight. Only Aeon's Holy Flame can cleanse your sins and grant salvation to your damned soul!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_24\".m_mContent: "...That's her angle? Well, what's your choice? Holy Flame, or coming with me?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_25\".m_mContent: "While I appreciate your concern for my soul, I think the latter might yield a higher chance of survival."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_27\".m_mContent: "C-Captain Setti, please don't run ahead on your own, we can't keep up..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03_28\".m_mContent: "You're just in time. Before I purge this heretic, let us ask the great Aeon to forgive us for the bloodshed that's about to come."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_002\".m_mContent: "What are you waiting for? I've hunted your kind, so kill me and get it over with."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_003\".m_mContent: "We don't need to kill her, do we? She's just following orders, and her sense of justice."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_004\".m_mContent: "What about the Bloodborn? We only seek blood in order to survive. Are we not justified?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_005\".m_mContent: "Did I strike a nerve? Hey, what's wrong with you?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_006\".m_mContent: "How can this guy still retain himself at this stage of the disease... Maybe the prophecy was..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_007\".m_mContent: "How naive! Not finishing your enemy, and even letting your guard down!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_009\".m_mContent: "But... these were the other group of soldiers sent to search the valley. How did they end up like this?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_010\".m_mContent: "When did the Church start employing undead soldiers?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_011\".m_mContent: "That's not funny! Aeon would never tolerate such sacrilege!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_013\".m_mContent: "Nonsense! The 'Black Blood' is Aeon's divine punishment for heretics, members of the Church can't be..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_014\".m_mContent: "The Black Blood was never some divine punishment, it's a <style=Highlight>disease</style> that infects all living things."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_015\".m_mContent: "Devotion can't save you from it. Your ignorance of the truth will only allow it to spread into an uncontrollable epidemic."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_016\".m_mContent: "Liar! You're distorting the truth to absolve yourself of guilt!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_018\".m_mContent: "No... this isn't a disease, it's divine punishment. You're not sick, you're a heretic who defied the gods! Yes, that has to be."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_022\".m_mContent: "We need to get out of here! Conventional weapons are useless against those <style=Highlight>who have been turned by Black Blood</style>. It will only hasten their transformation."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03a_023\".m_mContent: "Oh great Aeon, is this a test? Why did you subject us to such a cruel ordeal?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_001\".m_mContent: "Are you sure this is the right direction? The path just ends in a cliff."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_002\".m_mContent: "We entered the valley from this road, but there was definitely a stone bridge here at that time..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_003\".m_mContent: "There are traces of a landslide here. It's likely the heavy rain washed away the bridge."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_004\".m_mContent: "Hmph, don't you know how to transform? We could easily fly to the other side."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_005\".m_mContent: "If we survive all of this, I'll be more than happy to learn how to control the Black Blood from you."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_008\".m_mContent: "Why don't you join them? One little bite and you'll be comrades again."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_009\".m_mContent: "Don't tease her. We need to all work together to get out of this alive."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_010\".m_mContent: "If only she had the same grit to survive as you."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_021\".m_mContent: "We're running out of supplies. If this continues, sooner or later we'll..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_022\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) Turn against the flow of time, and return what once was!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_025\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) Let's cross the bridge first, then worry about the rest."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03b_026\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) This time, you owe me one."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_001\".m_mContent: "Thank you. You're very skilled at treating wounds."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_002\".m_mContent: "I learned all this from <style=Highlight>Ressa</style>... She's the best healer back home."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_003\".m_mContent: "So, what crime did you commit? You don't seem like a bad person, and you look rather weak..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_004\".m_mContent: "Uh... I'll take that as a compliment..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_005\".m_mContent: "There was an outbreak of Black Blood in my town. Most of the people became infected, including me. They all suffered the same fate as those soldiers."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_007\".m_mContent: "Ressa did everything she could for me to prevent the disease from spreading. But I eventually became like this, while still clinging to the promise I made her, until..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_008\".m_mContent: "That sinister-looking man suddenly appeared with an army. He burned down our home and took me prisoner."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_009\".m_mContent: "You mean the Bishop <style=Highlight>Agares Brennholt</style>? For him to personally make an appearance to arrest a heretic without a public decree... that's quite strange."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_011\".m_mContent: "Don't be fooled by his laid-back attitude. I'll have you know he's one of the twelve <style=Highlight>Bell Ringers</style>, the... the highest-ranking members of the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_013\".m_mContent: "He was the reason I joined the Church... I've... I've worked so hard for all these years to become his second-in-command!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_014\".m_mContent: "Are you two done? Can we get out of this disgusting valley now?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_018\".m_mContent: "Go with them. My intuition tells me there's more to you than just being a heretic."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_019\".m_mContent: "I will meet Bishop Brennholt and report the truth of everything that happened today. Maybe it can help you in some way."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_020\".m_mContent: "Either way, you've saved my life, and I'll repay that debt for sure."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip03c_021\".m_mContent: "I hope the next time we cross paths, it won't be as enemies."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_001\".m_mContent: "She temporarily reversed the flow of time back there, didn't she? Do all members of your family possess such incredible power?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_002\".m_mContent: "Aiona arrived only a few years ago, and she also holds a special place within our family."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_003\".m_mContent: "I see. I guess some only have mundane powers like turning into a bat."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_004\".m_mContent: "I'm really tempted to sink my 'mundane' fangs into your neck right now!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_005\".m_mContent: "I'm indebted to the Bathory family for accepting me when I had nowhere to go. I'm still learning the full extent of my powers."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_009\".m_mContent: "Speaking of which, has Starfall Valley always been covered by this bloodlike mist?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_010\".m_mContent: "Well, long ago, a massive meteorite fell from the sky and created this scarred ravine."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_011\".m_mContent: "So that's why it's called Starfall Valley... But, this mist... It's almost like the land itself is bleeding."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_012\".m_mContent: "The Church once dispatched scores of laborers here to mine the meteorite. These days, the valley is filled with this bloody mist, like a wound that can't heal."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_013\".m_mContent: "We're hated due to our nature, but aren't humans the real parasites on the land?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_014\".m_mContent: "So these people were all laborers who died in the past? But..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_016\".m_mContent: "This was a dangerous land, naturally they came wearing armor."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_017\".m_mContent: "No, I mean, why is it only the armor that's left? Where is the, um, rest?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_018\".m_mContent: "Look, it's raining again... It's all because of your dilly-dallying."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_019\".m_mContent: "There was no sign of rain a minute ago..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_021\".m_mContent: "The 'rest' you mentioned before... did you mean..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_022\".m_mContent: "Yeah, there are no bones or anything. It's like their remains just vanished."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04_023\".m_mContent: "Well, it seems like the answer is falling out of the sky."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04b_001\".m_mContent: "My chest... it burns... I can hear mournful cries from the blood of this Blood Beast... calling to me..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04b_002\".m_mContent: "Forgive me. I failed to return you to the time before you were infected with the Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04b_003\".m_mContent: "I could not pinpoint the moment, it might be even earlier than I thought. If only my powers were more developed..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04b_006\".m_mContent: "Black Blood spreads from the dead. In this valley of corpses, these scavengers serve as the perfect conduit to spread the disease!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04b_007\".m_mContent: "This bastard! It's... It's trying to consume me as well?!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip04b_008\".m_mContent: "Ressa is still waiting for me... I cannot... I will not die here!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_001\".m_mContent: "Just now... I heard cries of sorrow... but also something calling to me..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_002\".m_mContent: "You heard it too? Like a myriad of echoing thoughts... that's the Black Blood yearning for all life to be one..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_003\".m_mContent: "Both of you are exceptional Moonblessed with unique Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_004\".m_mContent: "If the Blood Beast devours you, it could lead to a cataclysmic evolution. You two must be careful!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_006\".m_mContent: "Is it trying to talk to us?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_009\".m_mContent: "I see. No one can hurt me, and I won't be forgotten there..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_011\".m_mContent: "My memories seem to be... slipping away from my mind..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_013\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry I can't keep my promise, Ressa..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_014\".m_mContent: "Oh that won't do. A man must keep his promises."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_015\".m_mContent: "Well, well, well, what do we have here? I came for the heretic, but found a little bonus—"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_016\".m_mContent: "I hereby sentence you to death for the sin of gluttony. Execution by fire..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_018\".m_mContent: "What happened, my silver-haired friend? I leave you for one moment and look at the mess you got yourself into."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_019\".m_mContent: "I heard you promised that nun that you'll live on and return to your homeland, no matter what."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_020\".m_mContent: "How someone treats their promises determines the color of their soul. If you don't honor them, your execution will produce a very unpleasant fire to look at."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_021\".m_mContent: "That's rich coming from the person trying to kill me."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_022\".m_mContent: "Well, I also made a promise to <style=Highlight>a certain someone</style> that I would burn you alive with my own hands. You should curse fate for pitting us in this tragic play."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_024\".m_mContent: "A <style=Highlight>Bell Ringer</style> of the Church—The Poet of Flame, Agares Brennholt."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_025\".m_mContent: "He was being escorted by a Bell Ringer!? Why wasn't this in Cain's intel!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_026\".m_mContent: "Now this is unexpected, meeting the ladies of the long-lost Bathory family in such a place. I'm honored."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_027\".m_mContent: "Since you know we're from the Bathory family, then stay out of our way! We're leaving!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_028\".m_mContent: "The Bathorys were once one of the High Priest's staunchest allies. I should escort you home safely myself."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_029\".m_mContent: "That won't be necessary. Noah, let's go!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_030\".m_mContent: "How frustrating. No one seems to take my words seriously. I will allow you to leave out of respect, but I am bound by duty and promise, to carry out Noah Nevernight's execution."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_031\".m_mContent: "If you're prepared to challenge my resolve, I won't hesitate to forsake courtesy..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_035\".m_mContent: "Within my 'execution grounds,' I command the 'ignition point' of all things... Ah, I almost forgot..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip05_036\".m_mContent: "You people of this era wouldn't know what an 'ignition point' is, would you? Well, just know this..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_002\".m_mContent: "Can a human really wield this kind of power? It's like trying to fight fire itself."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_003\".m_mContent: "This is the power of a Bell Ringer, the Church's strongest..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_004\".m_mContent: "It's such a shame, my silver-haired friend. Even if you are a special type with a unique heart..."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_005\".m_mContent: "I admire your willpower, but you cannot resist the Black Blood much longer. Let me help you."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_006\".m_mContent: "All your suffering will be cleansed in fire. As for breaking that promise, I will go atone on your behalf."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_007\".m_mContent: "What about Setti? What was her crime? She was your subordinate! She looked up to you!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_008\".m_mContent: "Yes, she's always been following in my shadow. What would she see if she was to stand beside me?"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_009\".m_mContent: "...I'll go with you, but let them live."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_011\".m_mContent: "Are you really giving up? Come on, Aiona, think of something!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_012\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry. There's nothing more we can do. I can't see any possibility of us defeating that man."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_013\".m_mContent: "Then... why did we go through all this?! What was the point of it all?!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_014\".m_mContent: "Remember what I said when we first met? Even if I die, at least I've lived. You really did save me."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_015\".m_mContent: "As long as we remember each other, that is proof of our existence."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_016\".m_mContent: "How are you going to remember me when you're dead?!"

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_017\".m_mContent: "Don't forget, I carry the Black Blood—the memories I hold will not be lost with my body's demise."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip06_018\".m_mContent: "I won't let you die, and I won't allow you to turn into one of those monsters."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip07_001\".m_mContent: "No matter what... you will live on."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip07_005\".m_mContent: "May you find peace adrift in the river of time, and find solace in God's embrace."

\"Dialogue_B_20001_Clip07_006\".m_mContent: "The great heretic, Noah Nevernight, The Silver Demon, defied destiny and desecrated the world's natural order. He was burned at the stake in the autumn of 1353."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_001\".m_mContent: "Where do you think the 'Other Side' at the end of the world lies?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_002\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) Across the sea, of course."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_003\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) When I grow up, I'm gonna leave 'Paradise' and conquer whatever's out there."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_004\".m_mContent: "Well I think the Other Side is up there, beyond the pale moon, where the stars were born."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_005\".m_mContent: "You're such a kid. The stars were created to illuminate our Paradise. We are the center of it all. There's nothing out there."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_006\".m_mContent: "What about you, Abel? Who do you think is right?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_009\".m_mContent: "As far as I can touch... that is the end of the world—the Other Side."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_010\".m_mContent: "Looks like you had a long dream."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_011\".m_mContent: "Is that all the blood Lady Empousa managed to bring back?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_012\".m_mContent: "It was a life-or-death situation! Can he still be resurrected?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_013\".m_mContent: "The memories are incomplete. It might be difficult to create the body, unless..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00_014\".m_mContent: "It's because of his obsession with 'living,' that he could walk out of that abyss on his own."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00a_001\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) Looks like you are ready."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00a_002\".m_mContent: "Hold that 'Blood Soul' with care, it's the crystallization of their memories before death."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip00a_003\".m_mContent: "It is the foundation of her resurrection, and the covenant that binds her to our cause."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01_001\".m_mContent: "We've prepared some new clothes for you. I hope they will fit."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01_003\".m_mContent: "This is a secluded castle that belongs to the Bathory family, and the home of Lady Empousa and myself."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01_008\".m_mContent: "And then we recreated you through alchemy. Although it seems incomplete, I should congratulate you on your rebirth, so... 'Happy Birthday.'"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01a_001\".m_mContent: "I never thought you would defy the family's tenets."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01a_004\".m_mContent: "As the first heir, you should know better than anyone the consequences of your actions."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01b_002\".m_mContent: "I can feel... her pain... and despair?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01b_003\".m_mContent: "It was Lady Empousa who revived you with her blood, so you now share a special connection."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_001\".m_mContent: "To bring you back, she exposed herself and the family to our most dangerous adversary..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_002\".m_mContent: "For her actions, she will be condemned by the four highest-ranking elders of the family and suffer a most cruel punishment..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_003\".m_mContent: "We hope that you, as one of the prophesied Moonblessed, will come with us to clear her name."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_004\".m_mContent: "But we will most likely have to get her out by force, which is why we need to expand our Power by using the <style=Highlight>Embrace</style>. Then Mr. Moonblessed can help us save our lady."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_005\".m_mContent: "Sorry to interrupt, but all this talk of 'Moonblessed,' 'Embrace,' and whatnot... I don't understand a word of it!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_006\".m_mContent: "But what I did get is that Empousa saved me, and now she's in danger, so we're going to save her!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_008\".m_mContent: "The 'Great Heretic'... No, I mean Noah. I'm sorry I couldn't change your fate. At the time, I did find Bishop Brennholt, but..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_009\".m_mContent: "Why can't I remember anything after that, no matter how hard I try..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_010\".m_mContent: "It doesn't matter. If you can't remember, then it wasn't important! At least we're all alive."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_011\".m_mContent: "Yes, and as promised, we're not enemies this time."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_012\".m_mContent: "What's the hold-up? Let's go save Empousa already. I'll have you know I'm the fastest Vice-Commander in the Church, the Galewind Hunter!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_013\".m_mContent: "The Church's 'Galewind Hunter'? She does live up to her name. I can see why you wanted to resurrect her."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_014\".m_mContent: "Yeah, she's already remembered who she is... But what about me? Who am I? Am I still the same person?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_015\".m_mContent: "Am I an empty shell of the man once known as Noah Nevernight? A curse left on this world by the Black Blood?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_017\".m_mContent: "You keep calling me a Moonblessed, and while I don't quite understand what that means, is that why Empousa saved me?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_018\".m_mContent: "That's why our lady went to Starfall Valley to find you, but ended up risking her life to save you..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_019\".m_mContent: "But if she's the lady of this family, why would she be punished to this extent for a mistake?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_020\".m_mContent: "It seems the family is fighting over the succession, and the Four Elders are the ones who really hold the power."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_021\".m_mContent: "A puppet? No wonder Empousa would say something like that..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01f_022\".m_mContent: "Let's go. She's in danger because of me, so I have to do something. Besides, she and Setti are both my saviors."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01c_016\".m_mContent: "And of course to Miss Alita as well."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01d_001\".m_mContent: "This bridge leads to the main tower of the castle. It's usually pretty safe..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01d_002\".m_mContent: "Shhh—I just heard something... the wind is telling me there's someone waiting to ambush us."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01d_004\".m_mContent: "Those are the scarlet bats raised by our lady! Why would they attack us?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01e_001\".m_mContent: "Were you the one who sent the bats to attack those people?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01e_002\".m_mContent: "Hmph! Why are they always with that fool Empousa? The silver-hair was supposed to be mine to toy with!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01e_003\".m_mContent: "That pettiness is probably why you always lose to your sister."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01e_004\".m_mContent: "Shut up! That idiot is not my sister!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01e_005\".m_mContent: "And you, a mere proxy elder, have no right to lecture me!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip01e_006\".m_mContent: "Is she going through a rebellious phase? I hope her recklessness doesn't affect our plans."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02_003\".m_mContent: "The special type... 'silver-haired'... I'll give you a chance to return to my side."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02_005\".m_mContent: "You really did lose your memory. Do you not even remember your master, Empousa?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02_006\".m_mContent: "What?! You're the flower girl from Starfall Valley? Why are you dressed so shamelessly!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02_007\".m_mContent: "Have you looked in a mirror lately?!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02_008\".m_mContent: "No, you're not Empousa. I spot plenty of differences."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02_009\".m_mContent: "Hmph, now that you've seen through me, there's no point hiding it. Naturally, my beauty far eclipses that hideous creature."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02_010\".m_mContent: "She is Lady Lamia... you can think of her as Empousa's sister."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02_011\".m_mContent: "You wretched witch, you're the one who took Empousa on this 'Moonblessed' charade. I know you're up to something!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02_012\".m_mContent: "Out of this vile lot, you're the first I want to tear apart!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_002\".m_mContent: "Losing your decorum after a little setback, that is why you'll never match up to the Lady Empousa."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_003\".m_mContent: "Hmph! Dote over Empousa all you want, she's still going to die today. There's no way you can save her!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_004\".m_mContent: "Lady Empousa may have broken the tenets, but it was to save a Moonblessed. If we explain that to the elders..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_005\".m_mContent: "Ahahaha! You know nothing, you pretentious woman! There are those among the elders who have long wanted Empousa gone. They won't let this chance slip away."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_006\".m_mContent: "What are you saying? How could any of the elders have such a notion?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_007\".m_mContent: "After losing the matriarch, Lady Empousa is the first heir in line, the one who the family should pledge allegiance to... Are you implying...?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_008\".m_mContent: "So that's it... One of the elders is trying to seize control of the Bathory family."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_009\".m_mContent: "Then why is Lamia so happy about it? If that traitorous elder wants to claim the inheritance, they'll come for her too."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_010\".m_mContent: "...That's why I said you outsiders know nothing."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_011\".m_mContent: "Let's go. We have to rescue Empousa."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_012\".m_mContent: "Huh? Don't you get it? No matter how special you are, or whose blood you have, a newly turned Bloodborn stands no chance against an elder."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_013\".m_mContent: "You're right, I don't know how any of this works."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_014\".m_mContent: "So I understand even less about how great these tenets you speak of are, or how formidable these so-called elders can be."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_015\".m_mContent: "But even when I was human, I knew to repay kindness."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02a_016\".m_mContent: "You are right about one thing: you made a big mistake when you past on the oppotunity to help Empousa save Noah Nevernight."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02c_001\".m_mContent: "The Hall of the Elders is not far ahead. From here on out, we must proceed with the utmost caution."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02c_002\".m_mContent: "Utmost caution... So we should watch out for things left along the road?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02c_004\".m_mContent: "Ah! Could it be a treasure map for this strange castle!?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02c_005\".m_mContent: "Unfortunately, this appears to be merely a journal left behind by one of the elders."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip02c_006\".m_mContent: "Still, it's good to stay alert—there are mysteries lurking in every corner of this abandoned castle, waiting to be discovered. Who knows? Next time you might find something truly valuable."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_001\".m_mContent: "How long has it been since the Hall of the Elders last saw such excitement, with two trials on the same day? A hundred years?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_003\".m_mContent: "I just got here... I don't know the past of this family."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_005\".m_mContent: "The Four Elders seem quite different from what I imagined... more like a gathering of weirdos."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_006\".m_mContent: "Don't be rude. The one in charge here is Elder Baphomet. He values tradition and standing above all else."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_007\".m_mContent: "Elders, please hear me out. Yes, lady Empousa's violated the tenets, but it was to rescue a special type. It was an emergency..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_009\".m_mContent: "What gave you the right to speak during this council?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_010\".m_mContent: "The old-timer must be getting senile. She's the maid who plays the Moonblessed game with Empousa."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_011\".m_mContent: "I recall... her name is something like Aiona, isn't it?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_012\".m_mContent: "He's got silver hair like you, Gilrain. He must be the other Moonblessed foretold in the prophecy."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_013\".m_mContent: "It seems so. I think his name was Noah or something? But I heard he was executed by a 'Bell Ringer.' Did Cain revive him?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_014\".m_mContent: "I also wish to plead for the young lady, bringing back the Moonblessed from the prophecy is for the dream of reviving our family, she shouldn't..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_015\".m_mContent: "Silence! You have long lost the trust of the Council of Elders, Cain Lamboza."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_016\".m_mContent: "Revive the family? By your words, are you implying the Bathory family has fallen?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_017\".m_mContent: "That's not what I meant. But all Bloodborn must have heard of the legend: the Moonblessed will lead us back to our <style=Highlight>promised home</style>."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_018\".m_mContent: "And what of it? Legends, prophecies... What do they matter to us? Cain, you're a clever one, you should understand..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_019\".m_mContent: "As long as I remain, this family will be the greatest among the Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_020\".m_mContent: "However, the fact remains that our sworn enemies—the Church's Bell Ringers—are closing in, an imminent threat we must prepare for."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_021\".m_mContent: "Then all the more reason to punish Empousa!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_022\".m_mContent: "Not only has she violated the Third Tenet by using her blood to create another Bloodborn, she has also broken the First Tenet of Secrecy!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_023\".m_mContent: "Exposing herself and the family to the Bell Ringers! This sin can only be atoned by death!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_024\".m_mContent: "Though I'm no genius, that armored man so eager to kill Empousa must be the traitor Cain mentioned."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_025a\".m_mContent: "Perhaps the old-timer just wants to possess Empousa?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_026\".m_mContent: "Her body...? What do you intend for the young lady?!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_028\".m_mContent: "How dare a mere servant of that insolent Empousa raise her voice against me!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_029\".m_mContent: "From the very beginning, they never intended to engage with us as equals. Is this hubris also one of your tenets?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_030\".m_mContent: "Ah, the lovely Jacintha caught a whiff of danger and ran off first—"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_032\".m_mContent: "How dare you speak of Jacintha like that!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_032a\".m_mContent: "She's the most beautiful cat in the world!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_033\".m_mContent: "You can't even tell Empousa and Lamia apart, yet you're judging a cat's beauty?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_034\".m_mContent: "Enough! Are you two waiting for me to do everything myself?!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_035\".m_mContent: "Eh? But this new 'silver-haired' lad looks like he could become a lucrative customer. I'd hate to kill a potential client."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_036\".m_mContent: "*Sigh* As the newest elder... I suppose I should deal with it."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_037\".m_mContent: "I don't know how strong they are... but we're all seasoned warriors too!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_038\".m_mContent: "Be very careful, though the Soulless is their leader, the most dangerous one is actually that white-haired...."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_039\".m_mContent: "Are you referring to me? Coming from you, it's an honor."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03_042\".m_mContent: "Don't get distracted! Find a chance to escape, as long as you take his blood, there's a chance to revive him!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03a_001\".m_mContent: "Let's finish this before old man Baphomet has to get his hands dirty."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03a_003\".m_mContent: "I don't believe in this Moonblessed legend, let alone any of this nonsense about a promised home."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03a_004\".m_mContent: "But looking at his battle with Cidhall, that body seems to have potential."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03a_005\".m_mContent: "Huh? Is the old-timer thinking of using the silver-haired one as a new test subject?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03a_006\".m_mContent: "An almost eternal lifespan of memories, yet confined to a rusting metal vessel. I can understand his obsession with flesh."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03a_007\".m_mContent: "I've always procured the latest and finest armor for that old-timer's body."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip03a_009\".m_mContent: "Take this so-called Moonblessed and the others to the dungeon."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_001\".m_mContent: "The Black Blood, the carriage accident, the execution, the resurrection, the Embrace, the Bathory elders..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_002\".m_mContent: "We've been rushing through so much until now. Only after calming down do I realize just how many things have happened these past few days."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_003\".m_mContent: "My thoughts are so muddled, my memories before the carriage crash...very hazy."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_004\".m_mContent: "Oh... and her, what is this Moonblessed thing anyway? At first, I thought it was what the Bloodborn called themselves..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_006\".m_mContent: "The Bloodborn have long held a legend that we were born on the moon."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_009\".m_mContent: "No, I was just struck by the coincidence. Just as I had doubts, someone appeared to answer them..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_010\".m_mContent: "Hmph, I bet you see the legend of the promised home as a joke too, just like all the other Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_011\".m_mContent: "What is this 'promised home' you speak of?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_012\".m_mContent: "Legend has it that when all the Moonblessed are gathered, we will finally be able to 'Ascend' to our promised home, the moon."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_015\".m_mContent: "No, I just realized you were looking for me to help you find that promised home. It sounds far-fetched, yet strangely romantic."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_017\".m_mContent: "I said you guys were quite romantic..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_018\".m_mContent: "Wait, did you just mean you're also one of the Moonblessed?!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_019\".m_mContent: "Aiona and the others did seem to say so."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_020\".m_mContent: "You know Aiona, that Aiona Alita!? She's..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_021\".m_mContent: "But that elder in black armor dismissed it as mere nonsense and imprisoned me here."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_022\".m_mContent: "Black armor... You mean that demon, Baphomet?!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_023\".m_mContent: "Did you have a grudge against him too?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_026\".m_mContent: "Jestel Aegis, a warrior aspiring to follow the Moonblessed and ascend to the promised home."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_027\".m_mContent: "I am also the last surviving member of the Aegis family, who were tortured and killed in Baphomet's experiments."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_028\".m_mContent: "I heard another elder say that Baphomet experimented on living flesh, could it be that..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_029\".m_mContent: "Baphomet lost his physical body after being defeated by an ancient Bloodborn, and has since relied on anchoring his soul to various armor."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_030\".m_mContent: "That demon has hated flesh ever since. Unfortunately my clansmen were natural-born warriors with strong builds..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_031\".m_mContent: "I swear, if I ever make it out alive, I will have my revenge!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_035\".m_mContent: "You're... the fabled shepherd of the Moonblessed, Aiona Alita!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_036\".m_mContent: "This warrior with the booming voice is..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_037\".m_mContent: "I am a faithful follower of the Moonblessed! Please take me with you! I will surely be of help!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_038\".m_mContent: "Shh! Keep your voice down, or we'll attract the guards!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_040\".m_mContent: "Take her with us, she may know Baphomet's weakness."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_002a\".m_mContent: "It's all because of you, loudmouth! Now the guards are after us!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip04_003a\".m_mContent: "Stop being dramatic. These soulless pawns of Baphomet will never break through my shield!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_001\".m_mContent: "It feels like we've been going in circles..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_002\".m_mContent: "I heard this tower existed even before the Bathory family took refuge here, it was only converted into a prison in the last decade."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_003\".m_mContent: "Then there may be many ancient treasures hidden inside this tower that no one knows about!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_004\".m_mContent: "We must be close to those treasures, that's why we're caught in these disorienting traps..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_005\".m_mContent: "That's not it, we've just been taking the wrong turns."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_006\".m_mContent: "Wait... do you know your way around here?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_007\".m_mContent: "Sometimes, Baphomet would escort members of our family to the experiment site. I... remember the way."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_008\".m_mContent: "If you knew the way, why didn't you say so earlier?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_009\".m_mContent: "You didn't ask me. Besides, I wanted Aiona to ask, not you."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_010\".m_mContent: "To get out, we go towards the east elevator."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_011\".m_mContent: "But before that, we have to go rescue Empousa first."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_012\".m_mContent: "Empousa?! You mean... the lady of the Bathory family?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_013\".m_mContent: "Why didn't you say so earlier! You know she's the original Moonblessed!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_015\".m_mContent: "From just now, my chest has been feeling hotter and hotter... This might be proof that we're getting closer to her."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_016\".m_mContent: "Y-You... Why do you share a blood resonance with Lady Empousa?!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_017\".m_mContent: "Because Noah has already become Lady Empousa's first blood vassal."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_018\".m_mContent: "You little runt! How dare you become Lady Empousa's..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_019\".m_mContent: "But you say you're also a Moonblessed... Miss Empousa must have had no choice but to do it for the prophecy..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip05_020\".m_mContent: "Anyway, with my connection to Empousa and your familiarity with the route, we should be able to easily find the cell where she's kept."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_002\".m_mContent: "Even the moonlight, which should feel like a mother's embrace, has turned cold..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_003\".m_mContent: "When the sun rises, and its rays shine in, I will... disappear, won't I?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_005\".m_mContent: "I feel like... this is the first time I truly understand the meaning of that word."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_006\".m_mContent: "Do you know what Death means? Do you fear disappearing as well?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_008\".m_mContent: "The stars are our birthplace; and thus we were exiled—"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_009\".m_mContent: "<style=Highlight>The moon is but a dream of the sun</style>, and thus we were forgotten by the light—"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_011\".m_mContent: "More gentle than the last time I heard it."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_016\".m_mContent: "Come to think of it, this is the second time you've called me an idiot, so it must really be you."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_017\".m_mContent: "...You fool! Why did you come to rescue me?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_018\".m_mContent: "I risked my life to bring you back, and Aiona and the others managed to revive... But you put yourself on a silver platter for the elders."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_019\".m_mContent: "If something happened to you, I, I..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_020\".m_mContent: "Would have wasted all that effort, you big idiot!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_021\".m_mContent: "You don't get it at all! In this family, anyone could be my replacement..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_022\".m_mContent: "But our connection... There's no way I could let you face it all alone."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_023\".m_mContent: "C-Connection? What connection are you talking about?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_024\".m_mContent: "Lady Empousa! I am Jestel from the Aegis family. It is my great honor to serve the Moonblessed!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_025\".m_mContent: "Following the Moonblessed to find the promised home has been my childhood dream!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_026\".m_mContent: "This noisy redhead really can't read the atmosphere..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06_028\".m_mContent: "But it was a good time for Jestel to interrupt, there are more important things to do..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06a_001\".m_mContent: "You seem to have quite an injury, are you alright?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06a_002\".m_mContent: "The moonlight has been pouring down from the heavens all night. That gentle power was a lot like Aiona's, it healed many of my wounds."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06a_003\".m_mContent: "Of course! For you are the noble vanguard of the Moonblessed, the moonlight will naturally protect you!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06a_004\".m_mContent: "Oh, you just said we two are in some kind of relationship now?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06a_006\".m_mContent: "I remember now! They said we are linked by blood."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06a_008\".m_mContent: "Aiona and the others said that if we don't rescue you, I may never be able to truly learn how to suppress the Black Blood on my own. And also..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06a_010\".m_mContent: "We've become connected through blood ties. When you suffer from the torment, I cannot remain unaffected."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06a_012\".m_mContent: "Come to think of it, I haven't felt the agonizing intrusion of the Black Blood for quite some time now. They might just be deceiving me into rescuing you..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06b_001\".m_mContent: "...I don't understand what you two are thinking! Are you helping them rescue that Empousa?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06b_002\".m_mContent: "I was merely acting according to my duty."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06b_003\".m_mContent: "So this was all his scheme? Why go to such lengths? Who was he trying to fool? I was scared to death!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06b_004\".m_mContent: "This is perhaps what they often say—to deceive the enemy, one must first deceive their own."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06b_006\".m_mContent: "He's a cunning man who's always a step ahead of us. Let's wait and see how things unfold."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06b_007\".m_mContent: "Don't talk in riddles! I've known him just as long as you have!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06b_008\".m_mContent: "Then you should know better what kind of person he is? He detests anything that isn't according to his design."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06b_009\".m_mContent: "He would eliminate any potential threat without hesitation—including you."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip06b_010\".m_mContent: "After all, like your sister, there are plenty to replace you..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_001\".m_mContent: "When you two were alone earlier, did you discuss anything?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_002\".m_mContent: "Why has Lady Empousa been silent since leaving the cell?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_003\".m_mContent: "You... if you did anything to upset Lady Empousa, I'll kill you where you stand."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_004\".m_mContent: "Oh, and where's Cain? Is he slacking off somewhere again?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_008\".m_mContent: "Or rather, he was struck down by that new elder, Gilrain, and then we were imprisoned in this tower..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_009\".m_mContent: "I see... But I still feel that if it's him, he wouldn't die just like that."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_010\".m_mContent: "I have the same feeling... By the way, we encountered your 'sister' while coming to rescue you..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_012\".m_mContent: "Yes, that's what her name seemed to be."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_015\".m_mContent: "What's wrong with you? Are you here to help me too?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_016\".m_mContent: "People who look just like Lady Empousa... there are several of them?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_017\".m_mContent: "What the hell is going on here?!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_020\".m_mContent: "How could this be... they are not 'complete' yet, why, who let them out?!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07_022\".m_mContent: "Lady Empousa, be careful! They are not Lady Lamia!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_002\".m_mContent: "You must have guessed it, Lamia is my sister, and they are all my 'sisters' too."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_003\".m_mContent: "Even if I really die, there will still be... these 'sisters' to replace me... Now you understand why I said that..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_004\".m_mContent: "This is the secret that the young lady works so hard to keep."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_005\".m_mContent: "Damn it! It must have been Baphomet's doing! Only he, only he would do such a thing, he treated us the same way back then—"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_006\".m_mContent: "The gift I sent you, do you like it?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_008\".m_mContent: "Good, I can feel it, your anger—that's the best seasoning for your beautiful body..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_009\".m_mContent: "Is it really you? Baphomet! Did you turn Lamia, did you turn them—"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_010\".m_mContent: "I see, so you call them all Lamia? You still want to play your 'sister game'? Do you think they are all real lives?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_011\".m_mContent: "...Well, if you don't think that way, it's like you're denying that you're a real 'life' yourself, isn't it?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_013\".m_mContent: "I am the oldest elder of the Bathory family. I'm well aware of your origins, the first puppet..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_014\".m_mContent: "Shut up, you're too loud. If you want to keep babbling, let that rusty heap of armor you call a body come out itself."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_015\".m_mContent: "Didn't expect... you'd be the calmest one, despite only becoming one of us Bloodborn today."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_016\".m_mContent: "I don't recall being from the same clan as scum like you."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_017\".m_mContent: "Excellent. Decisive and composed. I expected nothing less of you. This is your reward."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_018\".m_mContent: "Just light the other brazier mechanism, and you can activate the central elevator of this prison tower."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_019\".m_mContent: "I shall await you at the top floor."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip07a_021\".m_mContent: "Jestel, you know where the other brazier is, lead the way!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_001\".m_mContent: "This must be the brazier. Once we light it, we should be able to activate the elevator."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_003\".m_mContent: "Every day—every night in that cell, I could hear someone whispering to me."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_004\".m_mContent: "It was the memories of my dead family... my father, brothers, and even my mother who protected me regardless of her own peril..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_005\".m_mContent: "...because they were modified by Baphomet's Black Blood process, the Black Blood left in the cell would..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_006\".m_mContent: "Baphomet has always been toying with flesh and blood, only to retaliate against his own terrible curse that can never be undone."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_007\".m_mContent: "—I'm willing to become such a relentless curse, as long as I can kill him with my own hands!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_009\".m_mContent: "Not to mention, now I have one more reason to settle the score with that demon—for Lady Empousa and her sisters!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_010\".m_mContent: "Let's go back to the central elevator at the tower's core and make Baphomet pay for this!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_011\".m_mContent: "Why does it feel like the floor is still shaking?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_014\".m_mContent: "Jestel, it really is you! I'm so glad you're okay and have grown so much."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_016\".m_mContent: "You don't need to be afraid anymore, because mommy has changed and can protect you and your brother now."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08_017\".m_mContent: "What's wrong, Jestel? Won't you come give mommy a hug?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_005\".m_mContent: "To be honest, at first I was just a Black Blood patient trying to escape and survive."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_006\".m_mContent: "Because I was deemed one of the Moonblessed from the prophecy, I was resurrected as a Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_007\".m_mContent: "Then I met you all, and we journeyed together."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_008\".m_mContent: "Though it all occurred in a single day, to me it felt like a lifetime..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_009\".m_mContent: "No... If I'm merely an empty shell inheriting Noah Nevernight's memories, then I've only existed for a day."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_010\".m_mContent: "This single day I've spent with you all... It is my entire life thus far."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_012\".m_mContent: "Lend me your strength, I want to thoroughly defeat the 'Soulless' Baphomet of the Bathory clan."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_013\".m_mContent: "Was this all part of your grand scheme?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_014\".m_mContent: "He's the first one I've encountered whose actions completely exceed my expectations."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_015\".m_mContent: "Does that count as an instability factor? Shall I eliminate him?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip08a_016\".m_mContent: "Heh, you're the first to joke with me like that."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09_002\".m_mContent: "Next, we have to face the oldest elder of the Bathory family, the arrogant and cruel Bloodborn—Baphomet 'The Soulless.'"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09_003\".m_mContent: "He is powerful and cunning, and understands the battleground better than any of us. This is bound to be a fierce battle."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09_004\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, I'm trembling. I can't help but doubt my feeble self, can we really defeat him?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09_004a\".m_mContent: "He's on a completely different level from the enemies I've fought before, and we‘ve just suffered a crushing defeat..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09_005\".m_mContent: "I don't think you're weak. Don't forget we've crossed swords before, even though you lost that time, too."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09_005a\".m_mContent: "Can we just leave out that last part?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09_005b\".m_mContent: "Besides, I don't know how badly you lost before, but I don't recall ever losing to him."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09_007\".m_mContent: "How reliable... Well then, let's go. We've got a score to settle with him."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09a_002\".m_mContent: "Baphomet... is he right up there? How dare you treat them like that, you'll pay for this—"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09a_003\".m_mContent: "I don't see any lift devices, what's generating that much upward force?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09a_004\".m_mContent: "Jestel, do you know about Baphomet's abilities? Jestel...?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09a_005\".m_mContent: "What... what did you say...? This is... too... too... too high, let me... calm down first."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09a_006\".m_mContent: "No way, Loudmouth, you look fearless but you're actually afraid of heights!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09a_007\".m_mContent: "I remember your dream was to reach the 'promised home' with the Moonblessed. It seems you still have a long way to go..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09a_008\".m_mContent: "As much as I'd like Jestel to rest, the situation doesn't allow it."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_002\".m_mContent: "H-how much longer will it take? I'm too scared to look down... or up!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_003\".m_mContent: "This is my first time here too, I didn't expect this tower to be so tall..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_004\".m_mContent: "Before Baphomet occupied it, what was its original purpose?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_005\".m_mContent: "I can hear the sound of the wind breathing, it must be coming from outside. We must be getting close to the exit!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_006\".m_mContent: "I... I can also smell that nauseating stench of rotting metal, it's him..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_008\".m_mContent: "You actually made it all the way here. I'm almost tempted to believe in the prophecy of the Moonblessed."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_009\".m_mContent: "Our goal of defeating you has nothing to do with that prophecy. We will end your evil deeds here."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_010\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! You, the greatest of sinners in the eyes of those mortals, dare speak so arrogantly of my sins?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_011\".m_mContent: "Tell me, what sins have I committed? Who has the authority to judge me?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_012\".m_mContent: "You have trampled upon so many lives! Aeon will never let a heretic like you go!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_013\".m_mContent: "Oh? So desperate that you're recruiting the church's lapdogs as vassals..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_015\".m_mContent: "As a Bloodborn, my actions are no different than humans slaughtering their cattle. The strong culling the weak. Is that a sin?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_016\".m_mContent: "As someone who has ascended my existence as a 'Soul', I am merely liberating lesser beings from their mortal coils. So you see, I have been misunderstood."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_018\".m_mContent: "My only 'sin' is being stronger, wiser, and able to see beyond your naivety..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_019\".m_mContent: "Your flock live in a bubble created by the laws of your church. You brand anything you don't understand as heresy."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_021\".m_mContent: "The strong culling the weak, right and wrong being decided by the victors—I can understand your point of view."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_022\".m_mContent: "So let us decide right now, who is right and who is wrong!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_023\".m_mContent: "Your composure makes it hard for me to believe you were just a lowly lifeform yesterday..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09b_024\".m_mContent: "Allow me to verify for myself whether the legend of the Moonblessed is mere talk!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_001\".m_mContent: "To become this strong in just a night... to be able to stand against even me..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_002\".m_mContent: "I was not mistaken. You are the one... the one I have waited all these centuries for!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_003\".m_mContent: "What is this old coot going on about!?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_004\".m_mContent: "Centuries ago, I indiscriminately hunted humans and Bloodborn alike, believing myself to be the one above all."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_005\".m_mContent: "That is, until I lost to another Bloodborn. For the first time, I felt like a frog in a well."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_006\".m_mContent: "He was so frail, yet that cold silver hair and those inscrutable crimson eyes..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_008\".m_mContent: "What are you saying? You met me centuries ago? I was still human just yesterday..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_009\".m_mContent: "And what of your human life? Are you really sure of who you are?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_010\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! After all these years, I can finally reclaim all that you took from me! My flesh, my pride!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_011\".m_mContent: "The moment you entered the Hall of the Elders, I began preparing..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_012\".m_mContent: "To devour you at the heart of this tower that has existed before even the Bathory family!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09c_013\".m_mContent: "He cut off the power to the elevator!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_001\".m_mContent: "How hideous we look now, vampires with silver hair and crimson eyes."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_002\".m_mContent: "I've long lost my body, and you've lost that frightening aura you once had. Time has robbed us of so much..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_003\".m_mContent: "I told you, I'm not that Bloodborn you're obsessed over."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_004\".m_mContent: "Our sworn enemies—the Church, their faith is rooted in 'time', while we Bloodborn believe in..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_005\".m_mContent: "Memory—It is the key to finding your true self."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_006\".m_mContent: "You... Have you also questioned your existence? And whether it holds any meaning."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_007\".m_mContent: "My memories were unwillingly bound to this vessel, so I can understand what you're feeling."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_008\".m_mContent: "By human standards, we died long ago. Now we're just memories trapped in this world."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_009\".m_mContent: "Who am I? Where did I come from? Where will I go? After all this time, I've yet to find any answers."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_010\".m_mContent: "As you said, my soul is nearing its end, which is why I crave the physical and envy it."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_011\".m_mContent: "This... this bastard... Is he using that drivel to make excuses even now?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_012\".m_mContent: "Moonblessed, since I cannot obtain your flesh, it is you who must devour my memories instead."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_014\".m_mContent: "I see... Your answer is the same as that night, but you must know..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_015\".m_mContent: "The existence of the Bloodborn is, in essence, to be the 'memory.' The strong preying on the weak—that's an inevitable process for the evolution of our species."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_016\".m_mContent: "The origin of life was a mistake, thus memories are destined to fade into nothingness. My life was short, yet long, filled with mistakes but not regrets..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_017\".m_mContent: "There's no way I will let you just..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_018\".m_mContent: "Damn you! How dare a bastard like that find peace!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_019\".m_mContent: "We have bigger problems! If we keep falling, we'll be joining him!"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_021a\".m_mContent: "The cost of activating the backup furnace is quite steep, I'll have you know."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_021b\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, I'll pay what we agreed upon."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_021c\".m_mContent: "But because of them, my oldest customer died.. I'm really heartbroken."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_022\".m_mContent: "I won't let you die at someone else's hand, Empousa... my dear sister."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_023\".m_mContent: "Baphomet has accepted his fate, and Empousa has returned, but..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_025\".m_mContent: "Yes, I still don't know who I am. Or where I should go."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_025a\".m_mContent: "If I'm Noah Nevernight... I should return to the home where Ressa is waiting... but..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_026\".m_mContent: "But you can't remember where that home is. Did it truly exist? Or perhaps..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_027\".m_mContent: "Do you really remember who you were before the fall?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_030\".m_mContent: "Who are you? Where did you come from? Where will you go?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_031\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) Only one person can answer those questions."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_032\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) And is that person you, Cain?"

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_033\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) No, the only one with those answers, is Noah Nevernight, of course."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_035\".m_mContent: "To be precise, it's Noah Nevernight's complete memories. All the answers you seek are there."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_036\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) My memories? But where must I go..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_037\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) There are still four more Moonblessed mentioned in the Prophecy of the Apocalypse. Go and seek them out..."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_038\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) Go and piece together the moon."

\"Dialogue_B_30001_Clip09d_039\".m_mContent: "(Cinematic Subtitles) The thread of fate has been set in motion once more."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip00_03\".m_mContent: "Hah! Still think you can underestimate me?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip00_05\".m_mContent: "When did you manage to sneak into my armor? You've got quiet the talent..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_16\".m_mContent: "Every path in Lupine Forest looks the same. Can we really find the Ganelon residence without getting lost?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_17\".m_mContent: "We entered enemy territory the moment we set foot in this forest."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_18\".m_mContent: "Enemy? Is there something between your two families?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_19\".m_mContent: "Hmph! The north of Lupine Forest is overrun by a bunch of savage, smelly werewolves! How could we possibly have good relations with them?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_20\".m_mContent: "The Ganelon and Bathory families have been at odds for generations, likely due to the ongoing territorial disputes on the Howling Peninsula."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_24\".m_mContent: "Help! Is there any kind and gentle soul out there?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_26\".m_mContent: "What is this? A pack of wolves attacking... a guy dressed like a garlic?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_27\".m_mContent: "Please, leave me be! I cannot bring myself to harm you!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_28\".m_mContent: "What the... This guy looks so weak."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_28a\".m_mContent: "Don't let your guard down. These are no ordinary beasts... and they just set their sights on us."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_29\".m_mContent: "Oh, Brave travelers! I shall remember this charitable deed in my heart..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_30\".m_mContent: "Don't think some nice words will make up for the trouble you put us through!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_31\".m_mContent: "Haha! I was stuck in a bad predicament and had no other choice. My sincerest apologies!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_32\".m_mContent: "Bad predicament? You called for help because you were about to be eaten."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_33\".m_mContent: "Well you see, young lady, I am a pacifist. I simply can't bring myself to harm these innocent pups."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_34\".m_mContent: "We should've minded our business and let these 'innocent pups' eat you, you garlic head!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_35\".m_mContent: "My, what a sharp tongue! But I'm no garlic head, I'm Sir Gadric!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_35a\".m_mContent: "You look like a garlic to me."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_35b\".m_mContent: "Sir Gadric, what brings you to a place like this? You don't seem to be related to the Ganelons."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_36\".m_mContent: "I'm looking for someone. I can't waste time here, I must find Hati!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_37\".m_mContent: "Thank you again for your help. I must take my leave now—"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_38\".m_mContent: "Huh? Why are you back? Weren't you in a hurry to find someone?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_39\".m_mContent: "Hmm... fangs, long ears, and pale skin..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_40\".m_mContent: "Why are you staring at me... And did that thing on your head just stick up?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_41\".m_mContent: "I'm afraid I can't let you leave."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip01_42\".m_mContent: "This is where your journey ends, kind travelers. No... perhaps I should call you vampires."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_01\".m_mContent: "Hati will have to wait. I cannot allow heretics like you to roam free."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_02\".m_mContent: "Huh? Is this how you treat those who saved your life? What kind of knight are you?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_03\".m_mContent: "I know you helped me, but as a heretic hunter for the Church, I must uphold my duties."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_03a\".m_mContent: "The Church...! No wonder I didn't like this guy."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_04\".m_mContent: "How about this... You all wait here, and once my business is done, I'll come back to take you to the Church..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_05\".m_mContent: "Is there nothing under that helmet of yours? Why the hell would we do that?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_12\".m_mContent: "...I guess that won't work, huh? And here I thought we could resolve this without fighting..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_13\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, but we have our own urgent matters to attend to."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_14\".m_mContent: "From what you said, you should have more pressing matters yourself. Surely that's more urgent than fighting some strangers."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_15\".m_mContent: "Well, that's true... Wait, how do you know so much?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_16\".m_mContent: "We don't need to explain anything to you. I'll ask one time: Are you going to get out of the way or not?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_17\".m_mContent: "Hmm... You did help me earlier, and I'd like to just let it go, but I can't abandon my duty..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_19\".m_mContent: "If you can block my attack, I'll leave you be. What do you say?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_19a\".m_mContent: "Are all people from the Church such self-absorbed idiots?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_19b\".m_mContent: "Miss Setti seemed quite normal. Maybe he's an exception."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_20\".m_mContent: "How can we be certain you'll keep your word?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_21\".m_mContent: "A knight never goes back on their word!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_22\".m_mContent: "Come, my worthy adversary! Our fated duel begins!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_41\".m_mContent: "Ugh... This guy's not as simple as he looks..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_43\".m_mContent: "Are you alright?! Are you hurt anywhere?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_44\".m_mContent: "You're a worthy opponent, my silver-haired friend."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_45\".m_mContent: "This garlic head... He's actually strong. Was he just playing us before?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_51\".m_mContent: "'If you can block my attack, I'll leave you be' is what he said."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_53\".m_mContent: "From the start, he wasn't taking this seriously."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_54\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! You're giving me too much credit. I gave it everything I had!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_55\".m_mContent: "This guy... Is he toying with us?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_55a\".m_mContent: "Toying with you? I might even say I'm the one being toyed with."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_56a\".m_mContent: "I see, young Nevernight. I can sense your confusion, or should I say, your fear..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_56c\".m_mContent: "Where do you get off talking like that?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_57\".m_mContent: "You seem to fear your true self. Are you afraid to confront your real power?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_57a\".m_mContent: "I don't even know who my 'true self' is right now."
