\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_58\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! Good point. Perhaps no one really knows their 'true self.'"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_58a\".m_mContent: "Are you done rambling? Didn't you say you'd leave if we won? Or are you planning to go back on your word?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_59\".m_mContent: "This young lady speaks quite rudely! I am not one to break my promises!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_60\".m_mContent: "I think Sir Gadric has someone more important to find. He shouldn't trouble us any further."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_62\".m_mContent: "...Ah yes, I must find Hati right away!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_63\".m_mContent: "Let's part ways here. I must hurry to town to fulfill another promise."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_64\".m_mContent: "Please keep what just happened a secret."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_64a\".m_mContent: "If the commander finds out I let vampires go, I'll be punished. You have my gratitude!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_65\".m_mContent: "Until we meet again! Wait for me, Hati!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_65a\".m_mContent: "Sir Gadric said he was heading to the town, but..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_65b\".m_mContent: "He clearly went the wrong way. That's the direction we came from."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_66\".m_mContent: "...And who's that commander he spoke of? I hope we don't run into any more weirdos."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_67\".m_mContent: "Gadric, Noah... This is your choice? Can't say I'm surprised."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_68\".m_mContent: "No one can change their predetermined fate, nor escape the cycle of time."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip02_69\".m_mContent: "Very well, I'll wait here and see if you can forge a different path."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_01\".m_mContent: "Aww... should we really be taking it this easy?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_02\".m_mContent: "You're the most relaxed one here... And I'm surprised you eat normal food."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_03\".m_mContent: "We've been on the move since entering the forest. It's time we rest and organize the limited clues we have."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_04\".m_mContent: "It's all Cain's fault, always being so cryptic. What does he mean by 'the moon hidden by evil wolves'?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_05\".m_mContent: "—The moon guides our beliefs, grants us power, and at the same time..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_08\".m_mContent: "For as long as I can remember, we have never been accepted by mortals. We cannot walk under the sunlight. We are born as fugitives, constantly hunted."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_09\".m_mContent: "I want to change that. I want to fight back. I want to know 'why.'"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_10\".m_mContent: "Why was I born into this world as something unwanted? I want to uncover the 'truth.'"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_11\".m_mContent: "Until we discovered the reason we were rejected by this world was because we never belonged here."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_12\".m_mContent: "Our home lies beyond the sea of stars, on the other side of that distant moon."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_13\".m_mContent: "So you want to reach the moon because it's home."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_18\".m_mContent: "But the moon is far beyond our reach. Even birds can't fly there. How could we possibly...?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_20\".m_mContent: "According to an ancient Bloodborn prophecy, when all of the Moonblessed of the apocalypse are gathered, the moon will open a passage to welcome her children home."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_21\".m_mContent: "Home? Of the Moonblessed? And you're saying I'm also a Moonblessed...?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_22\".m_mContent: "Cain said there were four Moonblessed left. Have all the clues really converged here?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_23\".m_mContent: "Cain? You saw him? I knew he wasn't dead! What did he tell you?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_24\".m_mContent: "He told me... where the next Moonblessed might be."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_26\".m_mContent: "'Hidden in the moon by the wicked wolf.'"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_27\".m_mContent: "What does that mean? Are we supposed to go find it on the moon?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_28\".m_mContent: "Cain always has something concealed, but he never lies."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_29\".m_mContent: "The 'moon' is likely just a symbol. Before we set out, he mentioned that Mouret harbors a set of 'forbidden grounds.'"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_30\".m_mContent: "Forbidden grounds... Sounds like it's full of secrets. The moon we're looking for might very well be hidden there."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_31\".m_mContent: "Geez, why does everyone talk in riddles..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_31a\".m_mContent: "Should've brought Jestel and Setti along. At least they talk like normal people."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_31b\".m_mContent: "It can't be helped. We just lost an elder, so they have their hands full..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_31c\".m_mContent: "What, am I the only one with free time? Just to be clear, I didn't come along because I was worried about this guy... Huh?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_33\".m_mContent: "Hang in there, everyone! Once we're out of the forest, we'll find somewhere safe."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_34\".m_mContent: "You don't have to worry about us. Hati. We're just slowing you down..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_35\".m_mContent: "Don't say that! You're our friends! I won't let those knights from the Church hurt you!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_36\".m_mContent: "Huh? Where'd he go? Wasn't he right beside me just now?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_37\".m_mContent: "Yes, your brother was just here. Where did that boy suddenly run off to..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_38\".m_mContent: "Are you alright? Are you hurt anywhere?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_40\".m_mContent: "Damn it... What the hell is the Church doing?! Attacking our town out of nowhere!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_41\".m_mContent: "I know, the Church has always supported our poor town. Why would they suddenly..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_42\".m_mContent: "You look like you've seen a ghost."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_43\".m_mContent: "There... They look like people from the Bathorys!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_44\".m_mContent: "Huh?! Fangs, long ears, and pale skin... It's those damn vampires from the south!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_45\".m_mContent: "Are they talking about me? This is the second time I've been insulted today!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_46\".m_mContent: "Did they just call her Hati? Could she be the one Gadric is looking for?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_47\".m_mContent: "You Bathory scum! Are you here to take advantage of our misfortune?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_48\".m_mContent: "Huh? Listen here, you unruly brat! You better explain yourself. I won't stand for baseless insults!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_49\".m_mContent: "We can't let these stinking bats push us around! Let's teach them a lesson!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_50\".m_mContent: "Why am I running into all these weirdos today?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_51\".m_mContent: "D-Damn it... All the fighting today must have drained my strength..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_52\".m_mContent: "Get out of here, now! I'll hold them off!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_53\".m_mContent: "Hey! You're the ones who attacked us, you know! Don't act like you're the hero and I'm the villain here!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_54\".m_mContent: "Hmph, drop the act already. In Ganelon territory, even children know that the Bathorys are nothing but butchers!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_55\".m_mContent: "This child... truly a member of the Ganelon family..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_56\".m_mContent: "Listen, you! Do you just believe everything you hear? Can't you use that tiny brain of yours to think for yourself?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_57a\".m_mContent: "Do you really think I, the noble Lady Bathory, would be interested in some poor, backwater region up north?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_58\".m_mContent: "And here I thought you were going to say something decent... How dare you insult my family, you stinking bat!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_59\".m_mContent: "Didn't you call me a butcher? You're just a mangy wolf who believes everything you hear!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_60\".m_mContent: "You're both bickering like children. Don't add fuel to the fire."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_61\".m_mContent: "Miss Hati, there's no need to be on edge."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_62\".m_mContent: "We are indeed members of the Bathory family, but we only came to Lupine Forest to find someone."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_64\".m_mContent: "We heard you talking to the villagers."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_65\".m_mContent: "While there has been a long-standing feud between the Bathorys and Ganelons, perhaps it's time we reassess our relationship."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_66\".m_mContent: "You said the Church attacked your town, which means we're both being targeted by them."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_67\".m_mContent: "It's possible that the conflict between our families has been a misunderstanding from the start."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_68\".m_mContent: "Damn it, I don't get it! What's the Church up to? They're the ones who told us the Bathory family was the enemy!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_70\".m_mContent: "Are you feeling unwell again? Hang on a bit longer. These three don't seem to be bad people, even if one of them is super annoying."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_72\".m_mContent: "Wait a second, I know that look... Quick, get away!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_74\".m_mContent: "W-What are you doing? Wake up! We're family!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip03_75\".m_mContent: "I'm afraid they're... no longer the people you once knew."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_02\".m_mContent: "How could this happen? We just escaped from the Church's soldiers together! What's happening?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_04\".m_mContent: "They've been infected by the Black Blood. They're rapidly losing themselves, driven only by the urge to assimilate all flesh before them..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_05\".m_mContent: "Black Blood... the Black Blood Disease?! How is that possible? I thought the Church had eradicated it!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_06\".m_mContent: "Stupid wolves will be stupid wolves. Believing everything the Church says, refusing to face reality even now."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_07\".m_mContent: "It seems every time you opposed us Bathory, you were being used by the Church without even realizing it!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_07a\".m_mContent: "But why is the Black Blood Disease in town? Is this why the Church attacked?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_08\".m_mContent: "The Church has abandoned you now. I'd say it's karma for you 'evil wolves'!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_09\".m_mContent: "Calm down, Lady Empousa. We can't just leave her behind now."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_09a\".m_mContent: "According to Cain's clues, the Moonblessed are likely connected to the forbidden grounds in Mouret up ahead."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_10\".m_mContent: "We know nothing about Mouret's current situation, let alone the location of the forbidden grounds."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_10a\".m_mContent: "We only know the town's in big trouble. Having a local with us could be beneficial."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_11\".m_mContent: "Alright, alright! Stop ganging up on me! I get it, we have to help her to move forward!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_12\".m_mContent: "Hey, stupid wolf! If you can't bring yourself to fight people you know, step aside. Leave the Black Blood enemies to us!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_14\".m_mContent: "Huh? Can't you set your feelings aside for once? They're not the people you used to know anymore..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_15\".m_mContent: "They're friends I've known since childhood, and the people who watched me grow up. They will always be that to me."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_16\".m_mContent: "But you're in pain, aren't you? Your body no longer belongs to you, and worse, you can't remember the people you cherish..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_16a\".m_mContent: "Unable to recall important people, or even who they are... The pain of 'nothingness' will torment them forever."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_17\".m_mContent: "So, I won't let outsiders hurt you... It must be me. I, Hati Ganelon, will set you free with my own hands!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_17b\".m_mContent: "Surprised, aren't you? She's not as weak as we thought."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_18\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry... If only I had noticed sooner... I hope you'll no longer be tormented by nothingness."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_19\".m_mContent: "Hmph, so the Ganelon family does have someone worth a second look after all."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_20\".m_mContent: "I can sense it. The prejudice and hostility between your two families runs deep."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_21\".m_mContent: "Ironic, isn't it? The Bathory clan is down to just a few of us, while the Ganelons... Well, you've seen it. They're barely surviving in the shadows of the forest."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_22\".m_mContent: "In conflict, there are no true winners. Only varying degrees of harm suffered."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_23\".m_mContent: "Perhaps it's time for our generation to put an end to this hatred... Hm?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_24\".m_mContent: "Wait, you dumb wolf! It's not over yet!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_26\".m_mContent: "Seriously, don't you know that those infected with Black Blood are hard to kill? You need to stay on your toes!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_28\".m_mContent: "I-I'm fine. But her... how can that bat woman actually turn into a bat? And change back on her own!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_29\".m_mContent: "So it's all true? Your betrayal of The Church, and the rumors about embracing the power of Black Blood?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_30\".m_mContent: "What's the big deal? I heard the Ganelon clan also has people who can suppress the Black Blood and control their 'beast form.'"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_30a\".m_mContent: "That's impossible! I've never heard of such a thing!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_30b\".m_mContent: "I guess no one told you. How else do you think the legends of vampire bats and werewolves came about?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_31\".m_mContent: "Come to think of it, I just realized you're quite different from the Ganelon clan members I've known before..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_32\".m_mContent: "Your skin tone is different from theirs, and so is your build. I remember the Ganelon people being naturally tall and robust."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_33\".m_mContent: "Who are you calling short?! My father said I'm just a late bloomer. I'll definitely grow taller and stronger!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_34\".m_mContent: "So that's what you're most concerned about!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_35\".m_mContent: "Leaving aside the two points Empousa mentioned, what puzzles me most is... why haven't you been infected by the Black Blood?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_35a\".m_mContent: "Since I was little, my father has been very protective of me, saying I must never get injured or bleed. So I've always been careful not to get infected with the Black Blood..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_35b\".m_mContent: "...Hati, it seems your father truly loves you very much."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_35c\".m_mContent: "Oh... yeah, I guess. But you've never met."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_37\".m_mContent: "I was planning to escort the townspeople to safety, then return with Clive to help our father hold the rear... Oh!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_38\".m_mContent: "Did you see a boy on your way here? About my height, with brown skin and messy hair."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_39\".m_mContent: "Sorry, we haven't seen anyone else besides you and a knight with a garlic-shaped head."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_41\".m_mContent: "So you do know him. He was looking for you."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_42\".m_mContent: "He... he's an old friend of my father's. But for some reason, today he kept trying to stop us from going back to help Father. He even tried to stop me by force..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_43\".m_mContent: "If it weren't for some wolves suddenly appearing, we couldn't have shaken him off... Oh no, could he have taken my little brother, Clive?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_43a\".m_mContent: "I doubt it. He was heading in the wrong direction."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_44\".m_mContent: "Wrong direction... Of course! If you didn't see Clive on your way here, he must have turned back towards town!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_44a\".m_mContent: "He must have snuck back because he was too worried about Father and didn't want to leave him alone... I have to get back to Mouret right away to help them!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_45\".m_mContent: "If you're heading back to Mouret, perhaps you could take us with you?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip04_45a\".m_mContent: "I was just about to ask... What exactly are you here for?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_01\".m_mContent: "What are you looking for in Mouret?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_02\".m_mContent: "Why should we tell you? It's none of your business."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_03\".m_mContent: "Then why should I take you? Mouret is my home, so it's none of your business either."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_04\".m_mContent: "Lady Empousa, this is no time for squabbling. We should be working together to reach Mouret as quickly as possible."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_07\".m_mContent: "We're looking for the Ganelon family's forbidden grounds. According to our information, it's likely in Mouret."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_07a\".m_mContent: "Are you kidding me? If it's forbidden grounds, how could I possibly take outsiders there?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_07b\".m_mContent: "Besides, the 'forbidden grounds' are just a legend. In the whole town, perhaps only my father knows if such a place really exists."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_07c\".m_mContent: "That's perfect then. We can go to town together to help your father and ask him about it."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_08\".m_mContent: "I'm not taking you with me. I'm going back to find them on my own..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_09\".m_mContent: "But if you insist on following me, that's your choice..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_10\".m_mContent: "It seems we have another girl who's not honest with herself."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_10b\".m_mContent: "That stupid wolf, that wild girl, she's running so fast! She's doing it on purpose, isn't she?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_13\".m_mContent: "I smell the rusty scent of Church Knights... They're still in town, and... they're coming closer."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_14\".m_mContent: "Scent! Are you some kind of beast?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_16\".m_mContent: "It's that wretched girl who just fled with a group of people!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_18\".m_mContent: "And three others who don't look local. Reinforcements she called in?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_19\".m_mContent: "Leave them out of this. I'm the one you're after!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_20\".m_mContent: "Hah, stop playing the hero, brat. This purge of Mouret is led by the legendary Bell Ringer herself. None of you are getting away."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_20b\".m_mContent: "Another monster like that eyebrow-less arsonist? You've got to be kidding me. Why do we keep running into these freaks..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_21\".m_mContent: "Dying by our hands might be less painful than facing the Bell Ringer, you know."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_21a\".m_mContent: "Just surrender quietly, brat. Don't become a traitor like your father, Clive Ganelon."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_22\".m_mContent: "Don't you dare talk about my father like that!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_23\".m_mContent: "The Church gave him the 'Moonlight Sword' to fight the Black Blood, but instead he spread the Black Blood disease in town. It's the worst betrayal!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_24\".m_mContent: "My father never spread the Black Blood!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_25\".m_mContent: "Just as stubborn as your ungrateful brother—"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_26\".m_mContent: "Clive? What... what have you done to him?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_30\".m_mContent: "Let's get one thing straight, you dumb wolf. I'm not helping you. I just hate these Church bastards, as always!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_34\".m_mContent: "Where... am I? Am I still alive?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_35\".m_mContent: "Don't be silly! You're only 15, you've got your whole life ahead of you! Here, let me help you up."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_36\".m_mContent: "Sis, who are these people? Are they your friends?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_37\".m_mContent: "They're, uh... well... What are your names again?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_38\".m_mContent: "You've been calling me a smelly bat all this time, and now you're finally asking for my name?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_38a\".m_mContent: "I-I know your name is Empousa! I heard them call you that, but I still don't know their names..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_38b\".m_mContent: "You can call me Aiona. This is Noah Nevernight."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_38c\".m_mContent: "Sister Aiona. And Noah... can I call you big brother?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_39\".m_mContent: "What's with this kid? Why's he so attached to you?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_40\".m_mContent: "It seems he... admires you, Noah. Apart from his father, I've never seen him like this before..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_41\".m_mContent: "At least he's safe now. That's what matters."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_42\".m_mContent: "You helped me and Clive. I'm truly grateful. We're going to go find Father now. This is where we part ways."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_43\".m_mContent: "Hold on! You think a simple 'thank you' is enough? Don't you owe us something? Tell us where the forbidden grounds are."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_44\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, but as I said before, apart from my father, I doubt anyone in town knows if the forbidden grounds actually exist..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_45\".m_mContent: "And with Father missing, bringing you here is all I can do."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_47\".m_mContent: "It's alright, Clive. Father is strong. He's just covering our retreat. We'll see him soon."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_48\".m_mContent: "What a pain... So either we search on our own, or we help them find their father first?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_49\".m_mContent: "Um... What I meant to say was..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_49a\".m_mContent: "Are we here to find someone, or to help someone else find someone?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip05_51\".m_mContent: "Well... I think I might know where the forbidden grounds are..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_02\".m_mContent: "I've always wanted to be a strong Gravekeeper like Father, so I've pestered him with questions about many things, including the possibility of forbidden grounds existing."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_04\".m_mContent: "Literally speaking, that seems to be correct."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_06\".m_mContent: "One day, a man named Noah will come to Mouret. Bringing him to the Ashen Garden is our family's destiny."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_06b\".m_mContent: "Though not explicitly stated, it seems the location of the forbidden grounds is likely related to this place called the Ashen Garden."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_07\".m_mContent: "Wait, how did Father... I've never heard of this before, and he knows Noah?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_08\".m_mContent: "Have you been to Mouret before? Do you know their father?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_09\".m_mContent: "No, at least not the current me. But my past self... I'm not sure."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_10\".m_mContent: "So you really intend to take him to the Ashen Garden? That's where generations of Ganelon family's Gravekeepers are laid to rest."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_11\".m_mContent: "I... I believe in Father's words. Besides, Noah did save me. He's incredible!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_12\".m_mContent: "He might be able to... No, he definitely can help us solve the current crisis in town!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_13\".m_mContent: "But our most urgent task now isn't going to the Ashen Garden, it's finding Father! He stayed behind alone... He needs us!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_14\".m_mContent: "I know... Father is incredibly strong, but he's not invincible. That's why I worry, why I came back on my own..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_15\".m_mContent: "But now that I've actually met you, Noah, I remember Father's prophecy. I feel like this is what I'm meant to do!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_16\".m_mContent: "Perhaps those two things aren't mutually exclusive."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_18\".m_mContent: "Do you know where your father might be now?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_19\".m_mContent: "When we separated, he went north alone to draw away the Church. That direction is... Ah!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_21\".m_mContent: "How did you know that, Noah? Have you been to Mouret before?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_22\".m_mContent: "No, I'm just trying to understand his words—'Bringing him to the Ashen Garden is our family's destiny.'"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_24\".m_mContent: "Huh? What? Am I the only one who didn't get that?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_25\".m_mContent: "He said 'bring'... Perhaps it means he will be there waiting for me, for a man named Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_26\".m_mContent: "So... Father is probably at these forbidden grounds, or rather—"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_29\".m_mContent: "As I thought, it's not so easy to shake off these persistent bastards..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_30\".m_mContent: "It's those soldiers who attacked our town earlier!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_31\".m_mContent: "No, they look different. I'm afraid they might be even tougher than our previous enemies..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_32\".m_mContent: "These soldiers have also been infected with the Black Blood disease."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_35\".m_mContent: "It's a white flower that grows around Mouret. They say it can suppress Black Blood. Church doctors have come to gather it before..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_36\".m_mContent: "Hmph, if that stuff really worked, the Black Blood disease would've been wiped out by now."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_37\".m_mContent: "So... The Church didn't just deceive us, but their own people too?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_38\".m_mContent: "Wolfsbane is actually its real name. Thibault, the Church's chief doctor, does indeed give it to soldiers infected with Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_39\".m_mContent: "Aiona, I didn't know you were versed in medicine."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_40\".m_mContent: "I've just heard about it. Unfortunately... Wolfsbane's main effect is to suppress the mutation, but it's not a cure."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_41\".m_mContent: "Moreover, because it forcibly suppresses the mutation symptoms, it's likely to accelerate the patient's death."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_42\".m_mContent: "So it can't save their lives, but will allow them to die with more dignity—is that what you mean?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_43\".m_mContent: "Wolfsbane, deadly to those who are have become beasts... A fitting name."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_44\".m_mContent: "But... I don't hate Wolfsbane. It's Hati and father's favorite flower."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_45\".m_mContent: "They're beautiful and strong. No matter how windy or rainy, they always bloom toward the moon."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_46\".m_mContent: "Father often said he hoped I could live like Wolfsbane..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_47\".m_mContent: "And the place where these flowers bloom the most is the Ashen Garden... Ah!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_48\".m_mContent: "Let's hurry to the Ashen Garden, Noah! It's this way!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip06_49\".m_mContent: "That person over there just now, could it be..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_01\".m_mContent: "How much longer until we reach this Ashen Garden? Have some consideration for those of us who've been traveling all day."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_02\".m_mContent: "You've been flying the whole time. Have you really got the nerve to complain about being tired?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_03\".m_mContent: "What's the matter, dumb wolf? If you're jealous, why don't you fly too!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_04\".m_mContent: "The Ashen Garden is further north of town. You should be able to reach it after crossing a few more bridges."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_05\".m_mContent: "By the way, did your father ever mention how he and I met?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_07\".m_mContent: "Father never left the Lupine Forest. He shouldn't know about the outside world... Could Gadric have told him?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_08\".m_mContent: "I was there the few times Uncle Gadric came to see Father. They never talked about this stuff."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_11\".m_mContent: "We ran into him in the Lupine Forest. But he was in a hurry to find someone, so he left quickly."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_12\".m_mContent: "Find someone... Ah! He's Father's best friend. He must be coming to help Father!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_13\".m_mContent: "Uncle Gadric is super strong! With him and Noah teaming up, we don't have to fear anyone from The Church!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_14\".m_mContent: "Then he should have come to help us by now. That weirdo must have some other plan..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_15\".m_mContent: "No... I think he just got lost. It's that simple."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_16\".m_mContent: "Forget about Gadric... Why does Father keep so many secrets from me?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_17\".m_mContent: "It must be because Father doesn't want you in danger, sis. He's always loved you more..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_18\".m_mContent: "What are you talking about, Clive? Father has always seen you as his heir."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_19\".m_mContent: "He doesn't want you to be the Gravekeeper, so I have to inherit the role..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_20\".m_mContent: "Father never looks at me unless we're talking about the Gravekeeper stuff... Am I really his son?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_21\".m_mContent: "That's not true! Clive, you look exactly like Father. I'm the one people say was adopted..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_22\".m_mContent: "But it's okay. Even if Father only cares for sister, that's fine, because for me..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_23\".m_mContent: "Protecting you, sis, is the most important thing!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_24\".m_mContent: "I apologize for interrupting this touching sibling moment, but who is this Gravekeeper you mentioned?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_25\".m_mContent: "They guard the deceased in their graves, preventing lost souls from disturbing their eternal rest..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_26\".m_mContent: "The Church appoints a Gravekeeper for each of the twelve families, chosen from the most formidable members of each bloodline."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_27\".m_mContent: "Each of the twelve families has one... Does that mean the Bathory family too?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_28\".m_mContent: "Don't look at me. The Bathory family cut ties with The Church long before I can remember. I know nothing about any Gravekeeper."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_29\".m_mContent: "The Church already has monsters like the Bell Ringers. Why do they need each family's Gravekeeper to guard anything?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_30\".m_mContent: "Father never told me about this, but whatever he's willing to spend his life protecting must be an incredibly important secret."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_31\".m_mContent: "I don't know what The Church wants him to protect, but I do know he's our family's guardian deity, our pride and joy."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_32\".m_mContent: "Oh, and the Ganelon Gravekeeper gets their own Moonlight Sword too! It's really cool!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_34\".m_mContent: "Not yet. But Father says I'll have my own Moonlight Sword sooner or later..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_36\".m_mContent: "Huh? Big bro Noah, are you... are you giving me your sword?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_37\".m_mContent: "Stay alert. Someone else is coming this way."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_39\".m_mContent: "No way! I don't smell any hostility at all!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_42\".m_mContent: "That outfit... So you are from the Church!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_43\".m_mContent: "I couldn't sense any hostility from him at all. This seems complicated!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_49\".m_mContent: "But don't be afraid, Hati. I'll protect you, just like when we were kids!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_50\".m_mContent: "What the... I don't remember being protected by anyone. But you don't seem like an enemy, so just don't get in my way!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_51\".m_mContent: "*panting* That was close... We're... we're saved... I can't believe we actually won."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_56\".m_mContent: "So you didn't recognize me at first? Is it because of this robe?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_57\".m_mContent: "That weak aura, that timid voice... It really is you, Skoll!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_58\".m_mContent: "That was harsh, Hati. We grew up together..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_59\".m_mContent: "But now's not the time for reminiscing."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_60\".m_mContent: "Hati, Clive, you must leave Lupine Forest with me while there's still time!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_61\".m_mContent: "Why? We were just about to go look for Father..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_62\".m_mContent: "Lord Ganelon is here too? With him by your side, perhaps it'll be fine..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_63\".m_mContent: "No, no, it can't be fine. Before setting out, our troops thought this was just a routine Black Blood cleansing mission, but..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_64\".m_mContent: "I didn't expect a Bell Ringer and her Vice-Commander to show up as well. You understand what this means, right? When the Church deploys a Bell Ringer..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_65\".m_mContent: "It's a mission where the Church will not tolerate any mistakes."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip07_66\".m_mContent: "Yes! We're all in grave danger if we stay here!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_02\".m_mContent: "That's not important right now. If we don't leave, it'll be too late!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_03\".m_mContent: "No, it is important. Are you speaking as my childhood friend or a member of the Church?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_06a\".m_mContent: "How can I trust someone who'd side with the Church in slaughtering their own hometown?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_07\".m_mContent: "Trust me, Hati. I'm just a lowly monk. I had no idea the Church was going after Mouret."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_08\".m_mContent: "After I arrived, I snuck away from the squad and came to look for you two."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_09\".m_mContent: "Why is the Church targeting Mouret? Just because the Black Blood has spread here?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_10\".m_mContent: "The Church has always emphasized that the Black Blood disease was God's punishment upon the heretics."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_11\".m_mContent: "So we're heretics because of the Black Blood outbreak? They're going to slaughter us as an example?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_12\".m_mContent: "Hati, now's not the time to argue about right and wrong!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_13\".m_mContent: "The Black Blood has already broken out in Mouret. No one can stop the purge now."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_14\".m_mContent: "If you want to run, go ahead. I'm not leaving without Father."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_15\".m_mContent: "You know I can't just leave you to die!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_16\".m_mContent: "We grew up together, and I'll never be able to face Mr. Clive if anything happens to you."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_17\".m_mContent: "I can't betray his trust in me. Even if it means turning against the Church, I'll get you out of here!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_18\".m_mContent: "Skoll... you've always looked up to Father, haven't you?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_19\".m_mContent: "He's what I've been chasing my whole life, and the one who led me out of my despair."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_20\".m_mContent: "But from where I stand, you're just running away. If you truly admire their father so much, why not help them?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_25\".m_mContent: "Just some... travelers who happen to be passing through."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_26\".m_mContent: "And I've heard enough. If you're scared, you're free to leave. We need to find Father and rescue the townspeople."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_27\".m_mContent: "Hati, you don't understand how terrifying a Bell Ringer can be, or how dangerous Mouret is right now!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_28\".m_mContent: "It's precisely because it's dangerous that I need to find them!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_29\".m_mContent: "I... I can't bear to lose anyone else!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_30\".m_mContent: "But... what if they're no longer... human?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_32\".m_mContent: "Are you all alright? Have you seen my father?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_35\".m_mContent: "I told you... Something terrible is happening in Mouret..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_37\".m_mContent: "Almost everyone in town has been infected. This place is... beyond saving."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_38\".m_mContent: "Then, those wolves we encountered earlier were probably the infected townspeople."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_39\".m_mContent: "That's a horrific thought you just blurted out!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_41\".m_mContent: "They... those beasts we fought were people we knew? How did this happen?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_42\".m_mContent: "From what I've heard... Mr. Clive betrayed the Church and released the Black Blood demon sealed in the forbidden grounds. That's why this place..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_43\".m_mContent: "Skoll! You know Father would never do such a thing!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_44\".m_mContent: "It's precisely because I know his character that I'm urging you to leave."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_45\".m_mContent: "Right now, only you can clear his name. If something happened to you, Mr. Clive will be branded a traitor for life."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_46\".m_mContent: "Damn... How did things end up like this? Father, please be safe..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_47\".m_mContent: "But there must be people in town who aren't infected yet. What about them?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_48\".m_mContent: "Leave that to my superior. He'll surely step in to help."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_50\".m_mContent: "Sir Gadric, Vice-Commander to the Bell Ringer Dr. Thibault."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip08_52\".m_mContent: "Sorry to keep you waiting, my old friend."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_01\".m_mContent: "Silently guarding a vow made twenty years ago, all alone... You're quite the stubborn yet gentle man, aren't you, Clive?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_03\".m_mContent: "Don't misunderstand, old friend. I'm not here to fight you this time."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_04\".m_mContent: "I just thought you might feel lonely when the day you've waited so long for finally arrives. So I came to keep you company..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_05\".m_mContent: "I've always known that the Black Blood wasn't a new threat to Mouret. It actually broke out twenty years ago..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_07\".m_mContent: "You've been guarding the entrance to these forbidden grounds for twenty years, preventing any source of infection from reaching Mouret."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_08\".m_mContent: "But what about you? You seem to possess some power to suppress the Black Blood, but even that has its limits..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_09\".m_mContent: "Now you're at your wit's end, having turned into this state yourself. My old friend... do you have any regrets?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_11\".m_mContent: "After all, your life stopped that day—twenty years ago when the Black Blood contaminated the entire forbidden grounds."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_12\".m_mContent: "Since then, your life has been sustained by your oath. You've persevered all this time to protect Hati."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_13\".m_mContent: "I know you have no regrets, but you must be exhausted..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_14\".m_mContent: "Old friend, the moment you can forgive yourself is almost here. Until then, rest well."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_16\".m_mContent: "Allowing those whose minds have been completely consumed by the Black Blood to return to eternal sleep shouldn't go against my pacifist principles, right?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_17\".m_mContent: "After all, nothingness is far more desperate and painful than death... especially eternal nothingness."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_18\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, my former colleagues, but I must bear witness to this man's oath until the very end."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_21\".m_mContent: "I didn't notice at first, but there are so many... Did you plant these?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_22\".m_mContent: "I remember you loved these flowers, even though they're poisonous to you..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_23\".m_mContent: "But as long as that child—Hati—likes them, you'd plant a whole garden for her, wouldn't you?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_25\".m_mContent: "'Wolfsbane blooms in the moonlight, our promised home awaits in the sky.'"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_26\".m_mContent: "When Hati was little, you always sang her this nursery rhyme. Even I know it now, though I'm a bit off-key."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip09_27\".m_mContent: "A graveyard filled with Wolfsbane... Who prepared this stage for you? Was it fate? Or was it you..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_01\".m_mContent: "You're saying Gadric is... is the Vice-Commander?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_03\".m_mContent: "No wonder he tried to stop me from returning to town. Did he know the Church was going to purge Mouret?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_04\".m_mContent: "What's wrong? Hati, do you know Sir Gadric too?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_08\".m_mContent: "Father being framed as a traitor, everyone in town becoming infected with Black Blood, and the Church's purge... He must've known about all of it."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_09\".m_mContent: "Why didn't he stop it? He's no friend of Father's, and he's no Uncle Gadric to us!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_10\".m_mContent: "Calm down, Hati. Sir Gadric must have his reasons... Anyway, let's get out of here first, then we can talk."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_12\".m_mContent: "You're just trying to trick us into going with you. Gadric, your superior... he's not going to save Mouret at all, is he?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_13\".m_mContent: "This is where I grew up! I won't let the Church have their way! I won't abandon my people who might not even be infected!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_14\".m_mContent: "Hati, I believe... Uncle Gadric isn't that kind of person."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_15\".m_mContent: "He betrayed Father's trust, and you're still defending him?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_16\".m_mContent: "As much as I dislike that garlic head, he really doesn't seem like the type to abandon someone in need."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_17\".m_mContent: "You just met him today! What do you know about any of this?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_18\".m_mContent: "I've crossed swords with Gadric. I could sense his respect for life."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_20\".m_mContent: "He's your father's friend and a Knight of the Church. His oath constrains his position. He must be troubled by this too."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_23\".m_mContent: "Since I didn't interrupt your little childhood reunion, in return, shouldn't you take us to the Ashen Garden now?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_24\".m_mContent: "...I'm not so dumb that I need a smelly bat to remind me. We don't have time to fret over this. Let's go find Father!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_25\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, Skoll. I still can't entrust Father's and everyone's safety to others. I won't run."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_26\".m_mContent: "Hati... I joined the Church to catch up to you. But now, it seems like you've left me even further behind..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_26a\".m_mContent: "I won't wait for anyone. If you want to keep up, catch up on your own!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_27\".m_mContent: "All these years, I've been waiting for you to say something like that. I'm so glad..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_30\".m_mContent: "His blood is black... Have you been in contact with the infected?!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_31\".m_mContent: "*cough* I... I took care of some knights who looked sick... gave them water... *cough*"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_32\".m_mContent: "You idiot! Don't you know how fast the Black Blood spreads? Why did you..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_33\".m_mContent: "...Dr. Thibault once told us that a knight's duty is to fight, while our duty..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_33a\".m_mContent: "—is to heal and save lives. To do this, we... we need no reason..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_35\".m_mContent: "Were they drawn here by our arguing?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_37\".m_mContent: "You dumb wolf! Take care of that equally dumb monk and your brother. Leave this to us!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_38\".m_mContent: "Skoll! You have to hang in there!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_40\".m_mContent: "I never thought the Black Blood... would take effect so quickly..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_42\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, Clive. I said I was going to get you out of here, but now... *cough*"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_43\".m_mContent: "Save your strength. There must be a way... I got it!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_44\".m_mContent: "You said you met Gadric, right? Do you know where he is now?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_45\".m_mContent: "He's the Bell Ringer's Vice-Commander. He might know a way to control the Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_46\".m_mContent: "That's impossible. Even Dr. Thibault, the Bell Ringer herself, is still searching for a cure for the Black Blood disease..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_47\".m_mContent: "Is this why the Church is so afraid of the Black Blood? They fear what they don't understand..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_48\".m_mContent: "But Skoll is so devout, so kind... Why would the Black Blood disease infect him?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_49\".m_mContent: "The Church's claim that 'Black Blood disease is God's punishment upon Heretics' is nothing but a lie they've been feeding you."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_50\".m_mContent: "The 'Black Blood' is a carrier of chaotic merged memories. The invasion and overwriting of memories don't discriminate when choosing a host."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_51\".m_mContent: "Once his body begins to break down, there's no turning back, unless..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_54\".m_mContent: "There must be a way to save him! I can't... I don't want to see anyone else die in front of me..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_55\".m_mContent: "These guys are such a pain... Hey, you stupid wolf!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip10_56\".m_mContent: "It's your call! Go find your father or stay here with that idiot who's just as dumb as you!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_02\".m_mContent: "Forget about me, Hati... Leave with them..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_03\".m_mContent: "No way! I can't just abandon you!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_11\".m_mContent: "I was born here, I've returned here, and I'll stay here forever. This is... what I want..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_12\".m_mContent: "Stop it... You need to rest. I'll find a way to save you!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_13\".m_mContent: "Yes... I need to stop here... and rest... But you have a long journey ahead,"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_14\".m_mContent: "Please, stop. Don't say things like that."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_15\".m_mContent: "Go, Hati... Your path leads to distant horizons..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_16\".m_mContent: "Stupid wolf! Face it, that idiot doctor is beyond saving!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_18\".m_mContent: "Even if it doesn't concern me, what about your brother? Your father? They're still waiting for you!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_20\".m_mContent: "She keeps calling us stupid, and you're taking her side?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_21\".m_mContent: "Heh... I don't mind... her saying that. This way... I've caught up to you a bit, haven't I?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_22\".m_mContent: "You're happy being lumped together with me as 'stupid'? You really are... an idiot."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_23\".m_mContent: "Noah, if she can't accept reality, we'll be stuck here too."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_24\".m_mContent: "No, she'll take us to the Ashen Garden. She just needs some time to say goodbye..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_27\".m_mContent: "When you were helping Noah and the others just now, big brother Skoll..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_28\".m_mContent: "He chose to end his own life before fully transforming into a beast."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_30\".m_mContent: "Hey, you stupid wolf! Don't get so close! Aren't you afraid of getting infected?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_32\".m_mContent: "That coward was always afraid of pain, so why did he have to act so tough until the very end..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_34\".m_mContent: "Why is there Wolfsbane here... Ah, could it be that Skoll brought it..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_35\".m_mContent: "They're part of the troops under Dr. Thibault. They should all be carrying Wolfsbane to prevent their own transformation."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_36\".m_mContent: "Is that the flower you take after being infected to die with some dignity?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_37\".m_mContent: "He had it with him, so why didn't he take it?! He'd rather become... this..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_39\".m_mContent: "Skoll used to always go with you to pick Wolfsbane, Hati."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_40\".m_mContent: "He probably wanted to give Hati his last bunch of Wolfsbane... Clive, keep it for her for now."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_43\".m_mContent: "More than losing his form and dignity, he feared losing the memories you shared."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_44\".m_mContent: "I know... I know all of that."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_45\".m_mContent: "Skoll... you must be in so much pain. You've always been the one who hated pain the most..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_46\".m_mContent: "When you broke your arm as a child, I was the one who set it for you. You always said I was too rough—"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_48\".m_mContent: "I have to go, Skoll. Father and everyone in town... they're all waiting for me!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_49\".m_mContent: "Gadric once said that worse than death... is emptiness."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_50\".m_mContent: "But you returned to your homeland, and you were with us until the very end. Your life was anything but empty."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_51\".m_mContent: "Huh? That garlic head can actually say something so profound?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_52\".m_mContent: "The wind in the forest sings a sad song, oh fallen leaf, who has forgotten you—"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_53\".m_mContent: "And he can even sing... Huh? Is someone really singing?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_54\".m_mContent: "This is... the ancient ballad of our Ganelon family!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_55\".m_mContent: "Wolfsbane blooms beneath the moon's soft grace; The promised home waits beyond the sky's embrace—"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_56\".m_mContent: "That voice... It's Uncle Gadric! Uncle Gadric is singing!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_57\".m_mContent: "Hati, the singing is coming from not far to the north. If I'm not mistaken, that should be..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip11_58\".m_mContent: "The Ashen Garden. Gadric and Father should both be there!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_01\".m_mContent: "Well, well, you've finally arrived. Hati, Clive, and... the rest of you."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_02\".m_mContent: "We meet again, Sir Gadric. Somehow you've managed to get ahead of us once more."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_03\".m_mContent: "Ha ha ha, indeed. Sometimes the long way around can be the shortcut, you know."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_05\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, he's inside. In the cemetery, by the unnamed hero's gravestone..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_07\".m_mContent: "Relax. He's the Gravekeeper of Ganelon. Ordinary Church Knights are no threat to him. Besides..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_08\".m_mContent: "A man like him... He won't fall until he fulfills his vow."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_09\".m_mContent: "Easy for you to say! I'm going to help him!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_12\".m_mContent: "Why? Why won't you let me see Father? You said he'd be fine... right?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_13\".m_mContent: "You'll understand when you're older. That is... if you're willing to trust me now."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_15\".m_mContent: "...Why do I feel like I can understand that sound? Is it calling us over?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_16\".m_mContent: "Let's go in too! Hati and Clive might need us."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_18\".m_mContent: "We've already introduced ourselves during our previous encounter."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_19\".m_mContent: "I'm ashamed to admit, I didn't realize you were the man Clive had been waiting for."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_20\".m_mContent: "Clive mentioned it, but I still don't fully understand..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_21\".m_mContent: "You're wondering why he's been waiting for you, aren't you? It's perplexing—you didn't know him before today, yet he's known about you for twenty years."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_21a\".m_mContent: "Take a moment to prepare yourself before going in. It's not a bad idea to let a man who's waited twenty years for you spend a little more time alone with his daughter."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_23\".m_mContent: "Since entering this misty forest, I've been enveloped in mysteries about myself. I'm uncertain if my past self had any connection to Mouret."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_24\".m_mContent: "But I'm certain that the answers I seek are just beyond this door!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_26\".m_mContent: "Clive, why don't you stay here and keep Uncle Gadric company?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_27\".m_mContent: "But I'm really worried about my big brother, sister, and father..."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_28\".m_mContent: "Don't worry. They're... prepared to face their fate."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_29\".m_mContent: "Is... is that guy also one of the infected townsfolk? He looks way more intimidating than the others."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_32\".m_mContent: "Father, you once told me... you worried that after you were gone, I wouldn't be able to face the thorns of the outside world."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_33\".m_mContent: "Despite that, you still hoped for me to leave Mouret and see the world for myself."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_35\".m_mContent: "Father, I will leave this place. Ahead of me is a new path filled with thorns."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_36\".m_mContent: "But I won't stop here. I'll bloom as you wished, like the Wolfsbane growing towards the moonlight."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_38\".m_mContent: "You're late, Gadric. Did you get lost again?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_39\".m_mContent: "Indeed. I wanted to have one last stroll with a friend, so I took a slight detour."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_40\".m_mContent: "That's just like you... Well, let's head back to the Church and make our report."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_41\".m_mContent: "Huh? Are we just going back like this?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_42\".m_mContent: "While you were slacking off, I've already taken care of everything in Mouret."

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_43\".m_mContent: "Everything... So you mean you're willing to spare those two children?! Thank you so much!"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_44\".m_mContent: "Two children? Ah... You mean the Gravekeeper's two children?"

\"Dialogue_B_40001_Clip12_45\".m_mContent: "It wasn't me who decided to spare those two... it was fate."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip00_01\".m_mContent: "I've looked through many lives and observed countless choices. Yet the results are surprisingly consistent—nothingness."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip00_02\".m_mContent: "Humans run frantically to escape the boundaries of life and death, only to find their own feet have led them back to the starting point—completing the circle."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip00_03\".m_mContent: "All things live and die, beginning from emptiness and returning to dust. Keep running, fleeing from those observers who toy with you..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip00_04\".m_mContent: "Even if it becomes the law of the world, don't waver. Repetition never equals eternity."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip00_05\".m_mContent: "Even if it transforms into a divine prophecy, don't believe it. Compose your own poem."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_01\".m_mContent: "Noah, do you think father truly found peace in the end?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "Perhaps he never really cared. He was more focused on seeing your future."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_03\".m_mContent: "That's easy for an outsider to say. But after all that's happened, I can't just walk away..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_04\".m_mContent: "That's alright. We don't need to move on, we just need to keep moving forward."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_05\".m_mContent: "Keep moving forward... Father always told me to find my home. But I always thought this place was my home..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_06\".m_mContent: "Where can I go? Where should I go?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "Hati, have you ever considered that your real home wasn't in Mouret?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "Yes. When I was younger, I always wanted to ask father what he meant by 'home.'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_10\".m_mContent: "Even if I have a 'home' out there somewhere, I don't care anymore."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_11\".m_mContent: "Your father wouldn't want to see you giving up on yourself."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_13\".m_mContent: "Perhaps your father hasn't truly left you."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_14\".m_mContent: "Father is gone and I'm no longer a child, Noah. Pretty words cannot comfort me anymore."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_15\".m_mContent: "I've always believed that while the body may perish, one's existence lives on—through the memories of those who remember them."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_16\".m_mContent: "But why my father? Why the people of Mouret? Why am I the one left behind? Which rotten god have I angered to deserve this?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_17\".m_mContent: "Hati... It's not the gods who determine our fate, but ourselves."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_18\".m_mContent: "...Just leave after you've given the flowers to my father. Whatever you came here to do, I won't interfere."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_20\".m_mContent: "A secret passage appeared behind the tombstone when you placed the Wolfsbane..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_23\".m_mContent: "You can't be thinking of... That would disturb Father's rest! I can't do something so disrespectful!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_24\".m_mContent: "As I just said, Hati. Nothing is a coincidence."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_26\".m_mContent: "Perhaps your father is guiding our way."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_27\".m_mContent: "Even if what you're saying is true, what could be Father's reason?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_28\".m_mContent:
"Perhaps it's to answer that question—
'Where is your true home?'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_30\".m_mContent: "Why... Why didn't you stop my sister? Why did father have to..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_31\".m_mContent: "I don't understand... Father and Noah... Why... Why did it turn out like this?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_32\".m_mContent: "What are sister and the others doing to father's grave?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_33\".m_mContent: "They went inside... Is that a secret passage?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_36\".m_mContent: "Even though you're already deeply mired in this cursed fate, even though you're already covered in wounds from the family bonds that have shackled you your whole life..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_37\".m_mContent: "You still wish to lead the way for them and raise the curtain to your own tragedy?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_38\".m_mContent: "I think I understand now what Gadric saw in you. Don't worry, you can entrust the future of the Ganelon family to me."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_38a\".m_mContent: "As for you, I'll be waiting for you. When you finally emerge from this fog and see the truth, I'll be there, Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_39\".m_mContent: "I never imagined we would end up in a place like this..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_40\".m_mContent: "But something strange is blocking the way."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_41\".m_mContent: "We can't stop here. We have to keep moving."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_43\".m_mContent: "Our family motto has always been: 'If something gets in your way, just kick it aside!'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_44\".m_mContent: "That's not the version I heard before..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_45\".m_mContent: "It's giving ground. Now's our chance to slip in and find some answers."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_46\".m_mContent: "I was about to ask why you're so eager to help me, but naturally you have your own motives."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_47\".m_mContent: "Just what are you trying to find in the forbidden grounds?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_48\".m_mContent: "I'm looking for something that might be hidden here—the 'Moon.'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_50\".m_mContent: "What fairy tale did you hear that from? The moon is in the sky."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_51\".m_mContent: "To be precise, I'm looking for the 'Moonblessed.'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_52\".m_mContent: "You mean... a special person or something? That's slightly less absurd, but I still don't get what you're after."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_53\".m_mContent: "I have no memories of my past. I don't even know who I am."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_54\".m_mContent: "So what? Maybe they were all painful memories. It's better to forget."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_55\".m_mContent: "I recall bits and pieces... I made a promise to someone important to return to my homeland—I just want to keep that promise."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_56\".m_mContent: "This homeland thing again? I'm surprised you care this much about a promise."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_57\".m_mContent: "As for my previous identity, the only clue I have is finding the four legendary Moonblessed."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_58\".m_mContent: "The first of which is most likely in the forbidden grounds that your family has guarded for generations."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_59\".m_mContent: "Even though Father never spoke about the forbidden grounds, I grew up in Mouret and have never heard anything about any Moonblessed."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_60\".m_mContent: "How do you know what you're after is even in there? Maybe that place is forbidden because it's full of danger."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_61\".m_mContent: "We were led all the way here by your father."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_62\".m_mContent: "I ended up here while following clues to find my homeland, and your father also hoped that you would find your homeland."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_63\".m_mContent: "I don't think this is just a coincidence."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_64\".m_mContent: "...Are you saying you want to risk your life on a hunch?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_65\".m_mContent: "Rather than a hunch, perhaps it's more like being led by fate."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_66\".m_mContent: "Didn't you say that it's not the gods who decide our fates, but ourselves?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_67\".m_mContent: "That's why I'm going in myself, no matter the danger."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_68\".m_mContent: "Eh... if something bad happens, don't say I didn't warn you!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_69\".m_mContent: "Geez... Just what was Father trying to tell me?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_70\".m_mContent: "Why did they enter that strange hole? I couldn't hear what they were saying. I have to catch up to them!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_71\".m_mContent: "What is this place? How can there be such a huge space here? Where does it go?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_72\".m_mContent: "And all these strange mushrooms... they seem to be flickering... like they're giving off some kind of signal..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_73\".m_mContent: "Well, I don't think Father had anything to do with them. He hates vegetables."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_74\".m_mContent: "These aren't vegetables, they're fungi. They look like they've been here for a long time. They definitely weren't put here recently."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_75\".m_mContent: "Wh-what the...! These mushrooms seem to be... singing? Ugh, gross..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_77\".m_mContent: "Wh-what's wrong with you all of a sudden?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip01_78\".m_mContent: "The Black Blood is acting up... Why at a time like this? Is it because of something here..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_01\".m_mContent: "What the hell's taking them so long?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_02\".m_mContent: "...Crows? Ugh, I have a bad feeling about this..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_04\".m_mContent: "Hey, why did you come back alone? Where's Noah?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_05\".m_mContent: "She doesn't look good. Something must have happened."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_06\".m_mContent: "What... What do I do? Clive... My little brother is missing..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_07\".m_mContent: "Clive? He was with you? But where's Noah? Why isn't he with you?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_09\".m_mContent: "Snap out of it and make some sense!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_10\".m_mContent: "You... you stinking bat! How dare you hit me!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_11\".m_mContent: "I had to knock some sense into you! Now tell me what happened to Noah!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_12\".m_mContent: "Noah... and Clive, they... they suddenly vanished right before my eyes!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_13\".m_mContent: "What!? What nonsense are you spouting? Looks like you need another smack..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_14\".m_mContent: "Something strange must have taken place at the cemetery. We can discuss the details after dealing with the problem at hand."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_16\".m_mContent: "Tch, just as I thought. Seeing crows is always an ill omen!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_17\".m_mContent: "Strange, didn't that garlic head say he would take care of everything? Why is the Church still on our tail?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_18\".m_mContent: "Miss Hati, please take us to the cemetery. I'm certain Noah and Clive will need our help with what's to come."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_19\".m_mContent: "How do you seem to know so much... Whatever, follow me!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_20\".m_mContent: "May the road ahead be blessed and uneventful."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_21\".m_mContent: "The stage and actors of the Ashen Garden are set. Will you drift with the tide or turn against the current..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip02_22\".m_mContent: "You might think the choice is yours, but that is merely what the god you rejected wants you to believe."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_03\".m_mContent: "Clive... Why are you here? Where's Hati?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_04\".m_mContent: "We got separated. When I woke up, she was gone. I don't know if she's okay..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_05\".m_mContent: "Hati should be fine, but what happened to me just now..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_06\".m_mContent: "Are you okay now? Do you want some water?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_07\".m_mContent: "Water? Where did you get water from?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_08\".m_mContent: "From the pool nearby. I was thirsty and took a sip first."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_09\".m_mContent: "You drank the water from this cave?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_10\".m_mContent: "Well, it tasted a little sour and bitter... What's wrong, Noah?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_11\".m_mContent: "So much tragedy in this world are the result of small acts of ignorance and carelessness."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_12\".m_mContent: "What's even more tragic is that this poor soul has no idea of the consequences he will face."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_13\".m_mContent: "There's no need to be so harsh. He's still just a child..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_14\".m_mContent: "Why are you dressed like that, Aio..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_17\".m_mContent: "This should be our first meeting, I believe."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_18\".m_mContent: "Sorry, I must have mistaken your voice for someone else."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_19\".m_mContent: "How unfortunate, to say your last goodbye right after meeting."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_20\".m_mContent: "You're from the Church, right? Why are you trying to kill us?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_21\".m_mContent: "The condemned need not know such things."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_23\".m_mContent: "What now? Killing those tainted by Black Blood is simply granting them mercy."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_24\".m_mContent: "Disregarding the boy who just drank from the contaminated water, this one with silver hair seems to have long been infected with Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_25\".m_mContent: "Impossible. How could he still be human after so long? Wait... Could that rumor be true?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_26\".m_mContent: "According to the Church's records, there have indeed been cases of people retaining their humanity after being infected with Black Blood, but that information was never made public."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_27\".m_mContent: "What did they say? The water was contaminated... with Black Blood? But... but..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_28\".m_mContent: "Noah, they're just trying to scare me, right? I won't... I won't turn into one of those monsters, will I?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_29\".m_mContent: "I... I'm not going to die, right?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_30\".m_mContent: "Everything's going to be alright. There are ways to suppress the Black Blood. I'm still me, aren't I?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_31\".m_mContent: "I see... So you're one of those Special Types capable of suppressing the Black Blood in your body?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_32\".m_mContent: "Friedrich, Gilrain, since this person hasn't shown any symptoms of mutation, perhaps we should..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_33\".m_mContent: "We'll take him back with us. I'm sure the Church's researchers would be very interested in a special type!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_34\".m_mContent: "Not only can he suppress the Black Blood within, he can even use it to manifest new abilities..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_35\".m_mContent: "The power of the Black Blood... I never imagined someone could actually control this power akin to 'Immortality.'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_36\".m_mContent: "This special type could very well become a threat in the future. Rather than taking him alive, we must execute him immediately."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_39\".m_mContent: "You would go against me... against the Light, for the sake of a stranger you just met?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_40\".m_mContent: "I just think we're being too hasty. This is our first encounter with a special type. The Church would surely be interested in this specimen. And the other one is only a child..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_41\".m_mContent: "Letting emotions cloud your judgment has always been your weakness, Aiona. It's the reason the Alita family has yet to appoint you as its head."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_43\".m_mContent: "That's Aiona? She seems so different from before..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_44\".m_mContent: "But if it's really her... she'll definitely help us, right?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_45\".m_mContent: "So you were hiding something from us after all? I thought this mission would be a good opportunity to clear up our misunderstandings."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_46\".m_mContent: "No, this is indeed my first time meeting them. Please believe me, it's just..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_47\".m_mContent: "It matters not to me. Why don't you explain it to Gilrain, who proposed we work together in the first place..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_48\".m_mContent: "I see... the Bloodborn's 'Immortality'... so it really exists."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_50\".m_mContent: "Hmph, I was just wondering why a little brat about to be corrupted by the Black Blood hasn't been dealt with yet!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_55\".m_mContent: "I suddenly felt a sharp pain in my chest."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip03_57\".m_mContent: "I'm fine. It's just… we've already entered the forbidden grounds. Let's go find the other two."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_01\".m_mContent: "It hurts... it hurts so much... Noah..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_03\".m_mContent: "Hmm? Why do you know my abilities?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_06\".m_mContent: "A child managed to survive my attack? Is this the resilience of the Black Blood?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_07\".m_mContent: "Gilrain, why did you attack?! He's only a child!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_08\".m_mContent: "Tch, once infected with Black Blood, they all turn into disgusting, mindless beasts sooner or later. Humans cannot resist it."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_11\".m_mContent: "I'm mending the wound, but Gilrain's blade went very deep. For a child like him, the process will likely be excruciating."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_12\".m_mContent: "N-Noah, am I going to die? Will I... like Father..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_13\".m_mContent: "No, I absolutely won't let that happen. I won't let Hati lose you both in one day."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_14\".m_mContent: "Ah... my... my blood... Wh-why is it black?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_15\".m_mContent: "Am I... am I sick? Because I drank the water?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_16\".m_mContent: "Save your strength. Aiona will heal the wound. As for the Black Blood, I'll teach you how to control it."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_17\".m_mContent: "You say you know how to control the Black Blood?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_18\".m_mContent: "Ridiculous. I've witnessed countless humans suffer a fate worse than death from it!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_21\".m_mContent: "Only a lingering thought remains, their bodies have completely turned into filthy beasts..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_22\".m_mContent: "Not able to live, not able to die. This is the inevitable tragedy once infected with Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_23\".m_mContent: "You want a fight to the death?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_24\".m_mContent: "Perhaps it's the fate of humans to fight one another. And the courage born beneath it is often nothing more than 'resistance, putting oneself upon the pyre.'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_25\".m_mContent: "...N-Noah, don't hurt them. I know them... from Mouret."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_26\".m_mContent: "They're... the people who lived in Mouret?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_28\".m_mContent: "I... I don't know why... but I can hear their voices in my head."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_33\".m_mContent: "I hear them... farmers, woodcutters, hunters, fishermen... different voices, but all sharing the same love for each other and this town..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_35\".m_mContent: "His wound should be healed, but something's not right..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_36\".m_mContent: "What nonsense is this kid suddenly spouting? They're nothing but Blood Beasts now!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_37\".m_mContent: "No, that's not true! They're not Blood Beasts, they're people! They're all people of Mouret, my companions!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_38\".m_mContent: "For most, the moment they're infected with Black Blood, it's no different from death. Only the light of Tempus can purify them."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_39\".m_mContent: "You're wrong! You can't mock our efforts. Mouret won't be destroyed just like this..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_40\".m_mContent: "It's up to the people living here to decide where to draw the line. The Church that abandoned us has no right—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_44\".m_mContent: "You just called me... You know my name?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_45\".m_mContent: "I heard it from the kid. Hurry, make him eat it."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_48\".m_mContent: "You shouldn't invest too much in strangers that have nothing to do with you, Aiona."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_49\".m_mContent: "Moreover, you gave the precious spores we just collected to a runt beyond saving. Did you forget our mission?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_50\".m_mContent: "Aiona won't turn a blind eye to the suffering of others. She treats this world with her kindness. She's nothing like you!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_51\".m_mContent: "And that is precisely why we were chosen to lead our families, while she has yet to be selected to this day."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_52\".m_mContent: "For whose sake did we come here to collect these disgusting mushrooms?! And now you turn your back on the mission over some self-righteous fit?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_55\".m_mContent: "He's finally awake! It's all thanks to you, Aiona."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_56\".m_mContent: "Actually, I was worried that you might refuse to give him the spores. I'm with the people who tried to kill you, after all. What if it was poison?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_57\".m_mContent: "The Aiona I know would never do such a thing."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_58\".m_mContent: "Then... you believe I am the Aiona you know?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_59\".m_mContent: "Even if you're not that Aiona, deep down I know you're a trustworthy companion."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_61\".m_mContent: "Hey... you two haven't forgotten about us, have you?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_62\".m_mContent: "Perhaps you misunderstood her kindness, but it is we who are her companions."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_67\".m_mContent: "I don't know. I don't understand. All these voices... telling me things I can't comprehend."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_68\".m_mContent: "It's too dangerous, you can't go any deeper."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_70\".m_mContent: "The Church abandoned us, deceived everyone. Those three belong to the Church... I refuse to trust them."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_71\".m_mContent: "And Noah... I'm sorry. It's not that I don't trust you. I just..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_72\".m_mContent: "I just want to find my sister. I just want answers—who are we really? I must know."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_73\".m_mContent: "...What are you saying? You're Clive Ganelon's son! The hero who just sacrificed himself to protect your home!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_74\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, Noah... Please don't follow me any further."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_77\".m_mContent: "And where are you going? We never said you could leave."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_78\".m_mContent: "Then why didn't you stop Clive! You're the Church's elites, yet you let him walk away."
