\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_79\".m_mContent: "He's already infected with Black Blood and shares the same bloodline as those filthy werewolves. We merely allowed him to return to where he belongs."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_80\".m_mContent: "As I said before, those with Black Blood are beyond saving. I've no interest in him, but..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_81\".m_mContent: "You, on the other hand, are different. A special type who can control the Black Blood within."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_82\".m_mContent: "I don't have time to waste here with you. I must find Clive. If he leaves this cave with those werewolves..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_84\".m_mContent: "Neither that child, nor the werewolves can ever leave this place."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip04_85\".m_mContent: "For this cave itself is a 'Divine Body,' created to seal the source of the Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_01\".m_mContent: "Divine Body...? I've never heard of such a thing."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_02\".m_mContent: "Good because it's none of your concern. What you need to do is come back to the Church with us."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_03\".m_mContent: "Are you really taking him back for the Church's sake, Gilrain?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_04\".m_mContent: "This is a special type that I've only read about in Dr. Thibault's old books. Bringing him back to the Church will surely gain us much favor."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_05\".m_mContent: "Our mission was just to escort Aiona to pick mushrooms, but we unexpectedly picked up a special type as well..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_07\".m_mContent: "It seems that even though the Black Blood has not affected you, you can still be suppressed by the Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_08\".m_mContent: "What the hell is this Divine Body?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_09\".m_mContent: "We have no reason to tell an outsider like you..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_10\".m_mContent: "It is the cage that seals the sources of the Black Blood—the Seeds of Calamity."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_12\".m_mContent: "I think he should at least know the reason for his suffering here."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_13\".m_mContent: "You mean... there's a source of the Black Blood in this cave?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_14\".m_mContent: "To be precise, it's one of the sources. According to The Church's records, there are twelve known sources of Black Blood on the continent, each sealed by a Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_15\".m_mContent: "And these twelve Divine Bodies are guarded by twelve powerful families loyal to the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_16\".m_mContent: "You two are disclosing too much information!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_17\".m_mContent: "Therefore, the Divine Body can be said to be the most powerful counteractant to the Black Blood. Because of your..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_18\".m_mContent: "...unique condition, the Divine Body is reacting to you by sending out different resonance frequencies."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_19\".m_mContent: "The spores I gave you were collected from within the Divine Body. They can suppress the onset of Black Blood to a degree."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_20\".m_mContent: "Consuming it may make you feel better, just like the child earlier..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_21\".m_mContent: "I'm fine. If your mission was to retrieve those spores, don't waste them on me."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_22\".m_mContent: "Even this guy is more focused on the mission than you, Aiona."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_23\".m_mContent: "So the forbidden grounds of the Ganelon family are actually where this so-called source of Black Blood is sealed..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_24\".m_mContent: "So Clive is the Church's Gravekeeper, tasked with guarding this Divine Body?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_25\".m_mContent: "The Ganelon family is indeed responsible for guarding this Ashen Garden—the cave believed to be the womb of the Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_26\".m_mContent: "But the Gravekeeper shouldn't be named Clive. I've never heard that name before. Did they recently appoint a new one?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_28\".m_mContent: "I finally understand why Clive and those werewolves feel deceived and betrayed by the Church..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_29\".m_mContent: "Their honor and duty were fabricated by the Church from the very beginning. They were destined to be your sacrifices all along!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_30\".m_mContent: "Our sacrifices? If you haven't realized, we only carry out missions for the Church, we are not part of it."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_32\".m_mContent: "Not only are we not part of the Church, we're also heirs of the twelve families in charge of protecting the Divine Body, like the Ganelons that you claim were being deceived by the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_33\".m_mContent: "I, Friedrich Roland, am the heir to the family that guards the Four Limbs of the Divine Body, and the most loyal ally of the High Priest."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_35\".m_mContent: "That's right, Noah. We didn't lie to you... Gilrain here is the heir to the Cidhall family, the keepers of the Horn of the Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_36\".m_mContent: "And why are you introducing me? Leave me out of this."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_37\".m_mContent: "Cidhall... I feel like I've heard that name before..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_38\".m_mContent: "No, there's no time, we have to find Clive. If what you say is true..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_39\".m_mContent: "He'll be sealed by the Divine Body and trapped in this cave. If this cave contains one of the sources of Black Blood..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_41\".m_mContent: "He's in danger? The reason why the Black Blood needs to be sealed with Divine Bodies is because..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_42\".m_mContent: "If just one of the sources were to get out, it would become a world-ending calamity. That's why they're called the Seeds of Calamity."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_43\".m_mContent: "Then I definitely can't let Clive reach this Calamity."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_44\".m_mContent: "It was his choice to pursue the truth, so naturally, he should bear the consequences. His fate is already sealed."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_45\".m_mContent: "Don't forget, if we don't bring the spores back, then you, the one who proposed this mission, will be the one held responsible."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_46\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, when the time comes, I'll be sure to drag you down with me."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_47\".m_mContent: "You're very worried about that child, aren't you?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_48\".m_mContent: "I'm the reason he's in this forsaken place. He's probably feeling angry and helpless."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_49\".m_mContent: "I don't know what this Calamity is capable of, but Clive is only a child—a child who just lost his father."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_50\".m_mContent: "The spores I gave you... you still have some, right?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_52\".m_mContent: "Hold your breath and throw them at Gilrain and Friedrich's feet."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_56\".m_mContent: "Hey, what are you trying to do—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_59\".m_mContent: "Over some random kid, she's siding with a special type that she just met?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_60\".m_mContent: "Her actions are driven by emotion, overwhelmed by sentimentality. Perhaps this is why the Alita family has been reluctant to let her take over."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_62\".m_mContent: "The Church tasked us to work together to strengthen the bonds between our families. Any internal discord is a desecration of our duty."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_63\".m_mContent: "However... it is also my duty to teach Aiona that she must answer for her selfish actions—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_64\".m_mContent: "You're just upset that Aiona trusted someone she just met over you, right?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_66\".m_mContent: "Knowing them, they'll catch up soon. Those two are... quite exceptional."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_67\".m_mContent: "Despite their young age, they've become the leaders of their families and gained the Church's favor. Now they are competing for the Bell Ringer position left by Lord Roland, the 'King of Light'..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_69\".m_mContent: "Not yet... But the Church elders and the lords of the kingdom firmly believe that one of them will become the youngest Bell Ringer in history."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_70\".m_mContent: "Especially Friedrich... He's already mastered 'Covenant'. I feel like I'm falling further and further behind them."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_71\".m_mContent: "Covenant? He shouted something like that when we fought. What exactly is..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_72\".m_mContent: "I only know it's a power equal to the Calamities; something that only those strong enough to become a Bell Ringer can master."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_73\".m_mContent: "Then... why did you choose to help me? Aren't you allies?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_74\".m_mContent: "It's hard to explain, but I have a feeling that I should know you, Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_75\".m_mContent: "Actually, I didn't get a chance to introduce myself earlier. My family... the Alita family, are the keepers of the Eye of the Divine Body..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_77\".m_mContent: "It seems someone triggered those mushrooms. Could it be..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_80\".m_mContent: "Those werewolves... why are they talking like Clive?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_81\".m_mContent: "It's using Hive Mind! The Black Blood gradually links the minds of infected hosts with similar thoughts and bloodlines."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_82\".m_mContent: "When this happens, it means the Black Blood has eroded his will, and then..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_83\".m_mContent: "He will quickly lose his cognition and memories... and become one of 'them.' In other words..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_86\".m_mContent: "I've experienced it, or rather I'm constantly fighting against it."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_87\".m_mContent: "That's why I understand Clive's pain better than anyone. I have to bring him back... back to Hati's side!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_89\".m_mContent: "These werewolves have lived in the cave for a long time. They're more familiar with these mushrooms than we are."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_90\".m_mContent: "Are these the mushrooms you and your companions came to retrieve?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_91\".m_mContent: "We only need the spores from them. The Church wants to research their natural suppressive properties against the Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_92\".m_mContent: "However, these spores can't be used directly. Once they mature into fully-grown mushrooms, they become highly explosive."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_93\".m_mContent: "So back there... you used your time manipulation to accelerate the growth of the spores in that bag, turning them into explosive mushrooms to hold off those two."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_94\".m_mContent: "As expected of you, Noah. You made the connection right away."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_95\".m_mContent: "But wait... didn't you just have Clive eat those spores?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_96\".m_mContent: "We needed to do something and I couldn't think of anything else at the time."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_97\".m_mContent: "They are not poisonous, but they would explode…"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_98\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry. Perhaps it's my impulsive thinking that makes me seem naive... Maybe that's why I was never able to comprehend the Oracle that Aeon bestowed upon my family..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_99\".m_mContent: "Aiona, what kind of person do you want to become?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_100\".m_mContent: "I feel just like these spores. Used my others because of my special abilities, always going along with what's arranged for me."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_101\".m_mContent: "But maybe... when I grow into something different like these spores, I'll be able to become the person I want to be."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_103\".m_mContent: "When I first arrived at this Ashen Garden, I lamented: I expected a dark and decaying land of sin, but what I saw was the beauty of the cycle of life..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_106\".m_mContent: "And? Why are you so surprised about seeing a newborn lamb?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_107\".m_mContent: "In this den of corruption where the Black Blood is sealed, life still found a way to carry on."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_108\".m_mContent: "Now that you mention it, a newborn lamb couldn't have gotten in from outside. Was it born here?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip05_109\".m_mContent: "This is what I have always wanted to believe... the miracle of life overcoming fate!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_02\".m_mContent: "Nah, it can't be. It's too lame!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_03\".m_mContent: "Why am I the only one dealing with this?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_04\".m_mContent: "You must keep at it, Miss Hati. There are many more of these explosive mushrooms ahead."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_05\".m_mContent: "How come you're so familiar with this place? This is our family's secret!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_06\".m_mContent: "Can't you run any faster? I thought wolves were really fast. Are you sure you're not just some stray your family picked up?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_07\".m_mContent: "Easy for you to say, you can fly! Just you wait, you stinking bat!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_08\".m_mContent: "*Heavy breathing* ...We finally made through that blasted minefield... right?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_09\".m_mContent: "We mustn't let our guard down. Those special mushrooms also grow here."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_11\".m_mContent: "I can simply fly over them. Oh, right, some of us aren't so capable."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_12\".m_mContent: "I'll tear your wings to shreds and drag you with me!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_13\".m_mContent: "Ah, Lady Empousa reminded me. Perhaps we can use the terrain here to our advantage against the enemy."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_14\".m_mContent: "That's right, they can't fly either! Hmph, finally we won't have to be constantly chased by those knights!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_15\".m_mContent: "Those damn explosive mushrooms did a number on us, but we've finally caught up to them!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_16\".m_mContent: "We've finally shaken off those annoying knights."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_17\".m_mContent: "Aiona... How did you know about the terrain here?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_18\".m_mContent: "Coincidence, perhaps. I came here on a mission twenty years ago. Fortunately, the environment hasn't changed much since then."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_19\".m_mContent: "You came to the lands of the werewolves? And even entered their forbidden grounds? Then you..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_20\".m_mContent: "Just how old are you?! I couldn't tell from your appearance at all!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_21\".m_mContent: "We're Bloodborn. Our bodies don't age like you, idiot."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_22\".m_mContent: "How was I supposed to know that! She looks no older than me..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_23\".m_mContent: "Hmph, that's why you dumb wolves are always trying to invade our lands... for the secret to immortality!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_24\".m_mContent: "Hey! Why do you keep calling me a dumb wolf?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_25\".m_mContent: "You're just now catching on? You really are a dumb wolf."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_27\".m_mContent: "But isn't your Ganelon family crest a dumb wolf's head?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_28\".m_mContent: "Hey, wolves are cool... But don't add dumb to it!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_29\".m_mContent: "Family crest... hearing that here... I can't help but be reminded of that time..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip06_30\".m_mContent: "Twenty years ago... When I, still a proud member of the Alita family and our Sheep Crest, first met him—Noah..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_01\".m_mContent: "This little thing was so scared a moment ago, but now it has completely let its guard down. You really are something."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_02\".m_mContent: "It just came into this world. It's curious about everything around it, but also afraid..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_03\".m_mContent: "I suppose we're all the same. Intrigued by the unknown, yet also fear it."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_05\".m_mContent: "Its parents, or perhaps its ancestors from long ago, may have survived here. There are plenty of plants and a water source."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_06\".m_mContent: "If the water in this cave hadn't been contaminated by the Black Blood, we could live a peaceful life here."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_07\".m_mContent: "Is that the type of life you're after? A quiet paradise..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_08\".m_mContent: "Hold on, if the water is contaminated, how is this lamb still okay?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_09\".m_mContent: "Oh, Noah, didn't you know? The Black Blood only infects humans. Animals can be carriers of the disease, but it won't have any adverse effects on them."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_10\".m_mContent: "What!? I always thought the Black Blood turned all living things into mindless beasts..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_11\".m_mContent: "For humans, the final stage of the Black Blood disease is transforming into a beast-like state. But for animals, they are already beasts, aren't they?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_13\".m_mContent: "However, I'm concerned that one day, the Black Blood here will flow out into the world..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_14\".m_mContent: "I can't imagine the horrors that will befall the Lupine Forest... And it could very well spread to the entire continent."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_15\".m_mContent: "But... hasn't the Black Blood disease already broken out?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_16\".m_mContent: "Oh, the current situation is not as dire as you think."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_17\".m_mContent: "For now, the sources of the Black Blood is still sealed by the Divine Bodies. The number of infected is still manageable. Not to mention, we still have Doctor Thibault."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_18\".m_mContent: "She will surely lead the Church's finest doctors to find a way to contain the spread of the disease."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_20\".m_mContent: "What's wrong? You look as if you know of something terrible will happen. Don't tell me you can also foresee the future? Or could it be that..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_21\".m_mContent: "...you're from the future? You might think I'm a strange person to even come to that conclusion, but actually..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_22\".m_mContent: "Aiona... You asked earlier why a lamb was born here, right?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_24\".m_mContent: "No, we may have overlooked a possibility..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_25\".m_mContent: "They may be being raised as food."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_28\".m_mContent: "It seems they've come to take back what's theirs!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_30\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry. I thought you were happy, but now I know you were brought into this world to 'die.'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_31\".m_mContent: "Perhaps this lamb is just like the lambs out there."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_32\".m_mContent: "But it was raised by the werewolves here to be food..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_33\".m_mContent: "Humans raise livestock for food as well."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_35\".m_mContent: "Whether they're food for humans or werewolves, what difference does it make to them? It's just as sad."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_36\".m_mContent: "Besides, the concept of being born only to die applies not just to them, but to us as well, doesn't it?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_37\".m_mContent: "Have you also pondered that question? 'If humans are destined to die, why are they born in the first place?'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_38\".m_mContent: "Perhaps if it was the old me..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_40\".m_mContent: "Something caused me to lose most of my memories. It has been a painful experience."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_41\".m_mContent: "But someone made me realize that I shouldn't be fixated on the past, or fear that inevitable end called the future."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_42\".m_mContent: "We are born into this world to seize the present."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_43\".m_mContent: "And the person who made you realize this is..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip07_44\".m_mContent: "Perhaps you've already felt it. That person is—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_01\".m_mContent: "What's going on? We finally made our way through those explosive mushrooms, but it's like we've been going around in circles."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_02\".m_mContent: "How can you get lost in your family's own property?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_03\".m_mContent: "It's called the forbidden grounds for a reason! It's my first time here too! If Noah hadn't accidentally opened the way..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_04\".m_mContent: "So that Noah guy, is he really still in this hole? We've been wandering around for a while now..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_05\".m_mContent: "...and haven't even seen a trace of him."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_06\".m_mContent: "Yeah, other than the spot where they disappeared, I haven't caught my brother's scent at all."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_07\".m_mContent: "Scent? I guess you really are a wolf, even though you don't look like the others at all."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_08\".m_mContent: "My sense of smell wasn't always this good, but Father trained me to enhance my senses."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_10\".m_mContent: "No, it's just... if your sense of smell is infallible, doesn't it mean they are no longer here?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_11\".m_mContent: "But they couldn't have just vanished! There must be another explanation!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_12\".m_mContent: "Why are you yelling at me? Weren't you the one who said they weren't here? Plus, you said there's no trace of them in the cave now."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_13\".m_mContent: "W-Well, it's also possible they've already escaped this cave!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_14\".m_mContent: "No, they are still in this cave, but..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_16\".m_mContent: "You have any clue what she's talking about?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_17\".m_mContent: "I get it... sort of. If they're here but not in the 'present' here, then are they here or not..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_18\".m_mContent: "Ah! I get it now. If they're not in the present, then they must be in the past or future here! Wait, what?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_19\".m_mContent: "And I thought you were about to say something profound, but what came out was more nonsense."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_20\".m_mContent: "How can someone possibly go to the past or future? Right, Aiona?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_21\".m_mContent: "I wouldn't have believed it before I set foot in this place. After all, it's been twenty years."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_22\".m_mContent: "What's with that sad look? It is because you came here twenty years ago?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_23\".m_mContent: "Yes, now I can say with certainty, I was here. Twenty years ago, in this very Ashen Garden, I met Noah for the first time. And that time, it was..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_25\".m_mContent: "Wait, are you saying Noah traveled in time back twenty years? And encountered the past you in this cave?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_26\".m_mContent: "Th-that's impossible! Then what about Clive? My little brother?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_27\".m_mContent: "Yes, he was there too. Twenty years ago, Noah and I fought side by side to save him from succumbing to the Black Blood disease."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_28\".m_mContent: "You... You're saying he was infected by the Black Blood? How could this be? Then doesn't that mean he's... No, impossible..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_29\".m_mContent: "This is ridiculous! This is no time to tell lies!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_30\".m_mContent: "Going back in time... how could such a thing be possible?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_31\".m_mContent: "Actually, the Alita family has the power to manipulate time as both our faith and weapon."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_32\".m_mContent: "But my brother isn't one of your people! He's a child of the Lupine Forest, a brave Ganelon warrior like my father!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_33\".m_mContent: "That's something I couldn't make sense of until now. I believe this Ashen Garden is hiding a secret..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_34\".m_mContent: "A reaction mechanism of sorts, as the Womb of the Divine Body—where fate is born and reincarnated..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_35\".m_mContent: "Aah!—Where did all these bugs come from?! Ewww, get away!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_36\".m_mContent: "They are seeds of 'Plague'... As I thought, even after twenty years, it's still seeping into the Lupine Forest."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_37\".m_mContent: "You said these disgusting things were the seeds of Plague?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_38\".m_mContent: "Just as the rats served as the carriers of Black Blood in Starfall Valley, here in Lupine Forest, these are the carriers."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_39\".m_mContent: "The sheer number of insects tells me we're not far from the core of the Ashen Garden."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_40\".m_mContent: "Wait, Aiona, you still haven't explained what you said about Noah and Clive going back in time."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_41\".m_mContent: "Yeah! Tell me how to bring them back!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_42\".m_mContent: "Then follow me. We need to get to the deepest part. You'll understand once there..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_43\".m_mContent: "You can't talk out of this one! Just tell me how to bring them back!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_44\".m_mContent: "Listen, Hati. The Alita family has our own motto:"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_45\".m_mContent: "'Everything that will happen must happen, because it already happened.'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_46\".m_mContent: "What does that even mean? No wonder you're always speaking in riddles, it runs in the family!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_47\".m_mContent: "I've heard her say that before. I think it means don't try to change fate, or you'll just be dragged along with it. But I don't really get it either."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_48\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, Hati. I can't explain, but we must hurry to the deepest part of this cave immediately."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_49\".m_mContent: "Fine. I trust you, Aiona. Lead the way."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_50\".m_mContent: "Do you promise to save my brother?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_51\".m_mContent: "I can only guarantee that you will witness the fate of each and every one of them with your own eyes: Noah, Clive, and our true enemy..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_52\".m_mContent: "The Calamity in Lupine Forest—Sheila, the Seed of Plague. Its fate is also sealed there."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_53\".m_mContent: "Calamity? Plague? What does this calamity have to do with us?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_54\".m_mContent: "Because it was our target from the very beginning."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_55\".m_mContent: "Huh? What are you talking about? I don't remember anything like that."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip08_56\".m_mContent: "There is more than one Seed of Calamity. Before the Church named them the Calamities and sealed them away, they called themselves..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_02\".m_mContent: "You entered such a dangerous place and you don't even know who you're looking for?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_03\".m_mContent: "Know that even the Church's elite must obtain approval and form a team of at least three to enter the sealed area around a Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_04\".m_mContent: "How should I put this... Although I want to reprimand you, I can't help but think, 'this is just how Noah is.'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_05\".m_mContent: "I suppose so. Aside from a promise to return home, this is the only clue I have to recovering my memories."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_06\".m_mContent: "But what does the moon hidden by the wicked wolf mean? The wolf must be referring to the Ganelon family."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_07\".m_mContent: "...The hidden moon, could it be referring to something they've concealed in this forbidden land?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_08\".m_mContent: "Come to think of it, you and those two men mentioned earlier that at the depths of this cave, a Calamity is sealed."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_09\".m_mContent: "The Seed of Calamity? I heard they were a group of alchemists who used the power of Black Blood to rebel against the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_10\".m_mContent: "After they were defeated, each of them was sealed within a Divine Body guarded by different families across the continent."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_11\".m_mContent: "So there's a possibility that the Moonblessed I'm searching for is this Calamity sealed by The Church."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_12\".m_mContent: "Are you saying that because we're originally from different eras, the terms used are also different?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_13\".m_mContent: "It's possible. It seems the pieces of the puzzle are coming together..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_14\".m_mContent: "It's time to move on. Clive and those werewolves went deeper into the cave as well. Perhaps all the answers will converge there."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_16\".m_mContent: "I dare not ask what the world will be like in twenty years, nor what I will be doing then. But I can't help wondering..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_17\".m_mContent: "The 'me' you know—the me from twenty years later. Am I any different from the weak and insecure person I am now?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_18\".m_mContent: "As time passes, individual memories and relationships between people continuously accumulate. We all change, but..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_19\".m_mContent: "As long as the person before my eyes is still that kind 'Aiona,' you are you, the one I trust most."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_20\".m_mContent: "...I understand. Let's go save Clive before anything bad happens."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_21\".m_mContent: "But that child... what is he to you, Noah?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_22\".m_mContent: "To be honest, I just met him today. Why do you ask?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_23\".m_mContent: "You seem to care a great deal for him. I thought you might be related or something."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_24\".m_mContent: "Even though we've only spent a day together, after all that has happened, I'm sure it felt like the longest day of his life."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_25\".m_mContent: "As for me, today is just the second day after my rebirth, so you could say I've known him for half of my life..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_26\".m_mContent: "More importantly, I promised someone that I would look after Clive."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_27\".m_mContent: "I see. You really are the type of person who takes promises very seriously..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_28\".m_mContent: "I feel like I also made a promise to someone, but I can't remember..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_31\".m_mContent: "Something seems off. They were moving silently before, but now they're deliberately howling to reveal their location..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_32\".m_mContent: "...Is it a trap? But right now, we have no other choice!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_34\".m_mContent: "So they were waiting for us after all..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_35\".m_mContent: "It's easy to understand why they want Clive, but why are they suddenly interested in us too?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_36\".m_mContent: "Ah, I got it! The Hive Mind connects the minds of all Black Blood carriers who share the same bloodline."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_37\".m_mContent: "That's why Clive could see their memories just now. And these carriers... can also glimpse into Clive's memories!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_38\".m_mContent: "In other words, they found out that I can suppress the Black Blood on my own—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_41\".m_mContent: "This is bad... He's showing signs of turning!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_42\".m_mContent: "...There's no time. Aiona, help me. We must save Clive at all costs!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_44\".m_mContent: "Hang in there, Clive! We're here with you, and Hati is still waiting to see you!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_45\".m_mContent: "Ah... N-Noah... I... I'm in so much pain. There are so many... voices!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_46\".m_mContent: "Noah, he's already turned. There's nothing we can do..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_47\".m_mContent: "No, he hasn't given up fighting the Black Blood yet."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_49\".m_mContent: "If this continues... you'll all die here!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_50\".m_mContent: "Thank you, Aiona. You've reminded me—their target is me, and the reason..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_51\".m_mContent: "Is that my blood can resist the transformation!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_52\".m_mContent: "Noah, don't tell me you're planning to..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_53\".m_mContent: "Leave everything to me. Take this chance to escape."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_55\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, Aiona. I promised your future self that I would seize the present..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_56\".m_mContent: "But right now, I must protect their past and your future!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_57\".m_mContent: "N-Noah... D-Don't come any closer...! G-Go away...!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_58\".m_mContent: "Gadric entrusted you to me, and Hati is still waiting. I can't go back on my word.."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip09_59\".m_mContent: "Clive, this is the only way... you must drink my blood."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_03\".m_mContent: "Only echoes answer my calls. I bet even the soldiers chasing us have all fled by now."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_04\".m_mContent: "At this point in time, there should only be three of us alive in the Ashen Garden."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_05\".m_mContent: "If that foolish wolf doesn't keep up, soon it'll just be the two of us."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_07\".m_mContent: "Look at this... something's written on the stone..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_08\".m_mContent: "Is it written in blood? I can't make out what it says. It looks like the scribbles of a madman."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_09\".m_mContent: "'This is our... curse, and also our...'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_11\".m_mContent: "Huh? You two can read this kind of writing?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_12\".m_mContent: "Though the handwriting is very sloppy, like by a madman as you said, it's undoubtedly an ancient chant."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_13\".m_mContent: "These bloodstains have dried and blackened. It seems they were written a long time ago. Could it be..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_14\".m_mContent: "These were written by people living here?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_15\".m_mContent: "How could it be? Were there really people living in this dangerous place before?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_17\".m_mContent: "When I first arrived here twenty years ago, the Ashen Garden was still inhabited by many werewolves who retained some form of collective consciousness."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_18\".m_mContent: "...It was also them who put Noah and I in grave danger at that time."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_19\".m_mContent: "But that's impossible! Why would our people come to live in a place like this? It's forbidden, and the Black Blood!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_20\".m_mContent: "Then you should ask your wicked family. Ask them about imprisoning criminals here to die, or the living sacrifices..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_21\".m_mContent: "Don't you dare insult the honor of our family!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_22\".m_mContent: "Although father rarely speaks of his own matters... I know very well that the duty of a Gravekeeper is to prevent the bad things within from escaping!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_23\".m_mContent: "And to absolutely forbid outsiders from entering! No matter the reason... father would never... any Gravekeeper would never break that oath!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_24\".m_mContent: "If others are not allowed to enter, what if it's one of their own...?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_26\".m_mContent: "I just remembered something. Twenty years ago, when I entered the Ashen Garden under the Church's orders, the Gravekeeper wasn't Clive..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_27\".m_mContent: "That's because Father is only thirty-five. Twenty years ago, he would have just been a fifteen-year-old boy like Clive. How could he have been the Gravekeeper?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_28\".m_mContent: "That's not the only issue. From what I know, the Ganelon family's Gravekeepers change very frequently..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_29\".m_mContent: "And all the previous Gravekeepers have vanished without a trace."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_31\".m_mContent: "...that those werewolves... are the past Gravekeepers?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_32\".m_mContent: "How could that be! Why would they do this? They're the family's heroes! Why treat them like this?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_33\".m_mContent: "Perhaps it's because the Calamity sealed by the Ganelon family is the Plague. The Black Blood here is extremely infectious..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_34\".m_mContent: "So... all of the Gravekeepers eventually become infected?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_35\".m_mContent: "Their duty could not allow the Black Blood to spread to the town, so they chose to lock themselves in the forbidden grounds."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_36\".m_mContent: "So that's why Father was so determined to go to the forbidden grounds at that time..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_37\".m_mContent: "It's a curse, but also a noble deed... He wanted to seal the Black Blood and secrets in the forbidden grounds, as did the previous Gravekeepers..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_38\".m_mContent: "...Hati, your father was indeed a hero, and protected Mouret to the end."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_39\".m_mContent: "Stinky bat, don't think I didn't hear that..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_41\".m_mContent: "Th-they're back again? Is there no end to them?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_42\".m_mContent: "This m-many is just too much. And I can't stand bugs. Doesn't this creep you out?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_43\".m_mContent: "I am the daughter of Clive Ganelon. It'll take more than this to scare me!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_44\".m_mContent: "The further we go, the more bugs we run into..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_45\".m_mContent: "Aiona, were there this many bugs here twenty years ago?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_46\".m_mContent: "Back then, we saw many transformed Gravekeepers in the Ashen Garden. They locked themselves in the caves to exterminate the insect eggs."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_47\".m_mContent: "Even in that state, they still fought for their home and people... That's just like Father, the hero my brother has always looked up to."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_48\".m_mContent: "So over these twenty years, as the former Gravekeepers gradually died out, these bugs began to multiply and thrive."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_49\".m_mContent: "But there's one thing that I find strange..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_50\".m_mContent: "These insects survive by parasitizing the blood of the Seed of Calamity, 'Plague,' also known as Sheila. But why are they still multiplying and growing?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip10_51\".m_mContent: "Sheila was slain by us twenty years ago. By the five of us."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_01\".m_mContent: "My attacks... can't hurt them at all..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_02\".m_mContent: "What should I do? Should I try to escape? Like all those other times..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_03\".m_mContent: "Is what Noah said true? Would my future self really say such words to him?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_04\".m_mContent: "But the present me can't even protect myself... I even felt a hint of relief that I wasn't the one taken away."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_05\".m_mContent: "I don't know what type of person I will be twenty years from now, but I know I don't want to be alone anymore!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_07\".m_mContent: "Why... Why can't I use Covenant when I have inherited the Eye of the Divine Body?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_08\".m_mContent: "First, as I said early, it was a mistake for you to focus on learning healing abilities because you didn't want to hurt anyone."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_09\".m_mContent: "Second, even if you had chosen to learn your family's other abilities, you're still too inexperienced to use Covenant."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_10\".m_mContent: "And we're both still angry with you for betraying the mission to help a stranger."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_11\".m_mContent: "Lastly, I forbid you from saying such a discouraging thing again, because you have never been alone."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_13\".m_mContent: "What are you standing there for? Don't tell me you're crying over a few werewolves? Get behind us."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_14\".m_mContent: "I'll leave the support and healing to you, as always."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_16\".m_mContent: "So... where's the man you abandoned us for?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_17\".m_mContent: "He... Noah was taken away by the werewolves while trying to protect me and the boy."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_18\".m_mContent: "Taken away? What do the werewolves want with him?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_19\".m_mContent: "Tsk, don't tell me those werewolves are after his special blood to offer to the Seed of Calamity?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_20\".m_mContent: "Then Noah is in great danger! We have to save him."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_21\".m_mContent: "Don't forget, there are three of us, so we'll decide with majority rule. At least two must agree."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_22\".m_mContent: "It's hard to imagine how dangerous the Seed of Calamity will become if it encountered a special Black Blood..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_23\".m_mContent: "Friedrich, you value chivalry the most. You'll help me save him, won't you?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_26\".m_mContent: "We only obtained the Church's permission to enter the forbidden grounds to collect those spores. Our mission is complete."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_27\".m_mContent: "Besides, I believe directly confronting the Calamity is too dangerous for us at present. We should return and make a report."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_28\".m_mContent: "But if Noah somehow awakens the power of the Calamity and the Divine Body's seal is broken, the world will..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_29\".m_mContent: "That's why I said we must return. We must inform the Church of the situation immediately and leave the rest to the Bell Ringers."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_30\".m_mContent: "I get it. You always make the most logical decisions. Then I'll go save Noah myself..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip11_33\".m_mContent: "I agree with her. We should go rescue that special type."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_01\".m_mContent: "With so many of these things... I'm too creeped out to fight!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_02\".m_mContent: "Just how strong and resilient were the previous Gravekeepers to be able to suppress this?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_03\".m_mContent: "What's going on... the Calamity should be just beyond this part..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_04\".m_mContent: "It seems Cain's predictions have been flawless thus far..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_05\".m_mContent: "Without that Noah guy, you won't be able to handle the enemies in this ruined garden."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_07\".m_mContent: "Why is he here?! Is this another one of Cain's arrangements?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_08\".m_mContent: "Who the hell is he?! And how did he get this far in the forbidden grounds?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_09\".m_mContent: "To the shadow, doors and walls might as well not exist."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_10\".m_mContent: "What are you standing there for? Take care of the rear."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_11\".m_mContent: "Gilrain... Does this place seem familiar to you?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_12\".m_mContent: "Not in particular. As long as there's no sunlight here, it's all the same to me."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_13\".m_mContent: "Come, let's not waste any more time. Our target is just ahead, right?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_14\".m_mContent: "Aiona, what did you just ask him? How do you know him?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip12_16\".m_mContent: "Gilrain, do you really not remember anything from when you were human? What happened to you..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_01\".m_mContent: "...The insect eggs scattered along the path gave off a strong stench of rotten Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_02\".m_mContent: "They're probably parasites that feed off the Blood of Calamity... Fortunately, they haven't hatched yet."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_03\".m_mContent: "Don't speak so soon, it looks like the largest one is about to hatch..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_05\".m_mContent: "Over there, it's Noah! Are they performing some kind of ritual on him?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_06\".m_mContent: "And Clive! He's turned back into a human, even though he had fully transformed earlier..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_07\".m_mContent: "I'm not sure how, but my guess is the special type must have done something to him."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_08\".m_mContent: "Gilrain, I've been meaning to say this for a while now. You seem far too interested in the power of the special type and the Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_09\".m_mContent: "Are you questioning my motives? Don't always look down on others with that condescending attitude, Friedrich Roland."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_10\".m_mContent: "Just because the world praises you as 'The Light,' you think you're the sun?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_11\".m_mContent: "Now's not the time to let emotions get the better of us. We should focus on dealing with the enemy at hand."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_12\".m_mContent: "Why... Why are they so obsessed with Noah's blood? What exactly are they trying to do?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_13\".m_mContent: "They must be trying to awaken their master—the sealed source of the Black Blood, a being that rivals the power of a Bell Ringer."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_14\".m_mContent: "Sheila, the Seed of Calamity that symbolizes the Plague. I never expected to encounter such a legendary being so soon."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_16\".m_mContent: "They are not trying to unseal the Calamity... They are the Gravekeepers who once fought against the Black Blood with their lives!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_17\".m_mContent: "They... They want to use Noah's blood to suppress the creature's awakening!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_18\".m_mContent: "If that's the case, we should let them be."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_20\".m_mContent: "If sacrificing one person could prevent the awakening of a Calamity, he would do the same. Let's let him be the hero."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_21\".m_mContent: "But he... believed in me. I, whose life had always been predetermined, can still become the person I want to be..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_22\".m_mContent: "I won't hesitate anymore. I'll go save him by myself!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_25\".m_mContent: "What's going on? We stopped the ritual, so why isn't Noah reacting at all..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_28\".m_mContent: "I don't quite understand either... But after I was infected by the Black Blood, they took me to the same place. It was quiet... warm... and we were all together..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_29\".m_mContent: "A 'Hive Mind'? The Black Blood has linked everyone's memories..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_30\".m_mContent: "Yes, that must be it! During the ritual, Noah's blood was connected to that massive egg..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_31\".m_mContent: "He must have been taken to 'that place' as well!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_32\".m_mContent: "Are you saying that Noah's consciousness and memories are being invaded by Sheila?! Then wouldn't that mean..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_33\".m_mContent: "I got a plan. I'll go there and bring Noah back!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_34\".m_mContent: "What are Aiona and that boy doing?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_35\".m_mContent: "Never mind that. Have you noticed the Calamity seems a bit off?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip13_36\".m_mContent: "It appears that before the true dawn breaks, the 'moon' is reluctant to return the night."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_01\".m_mContent: "Why is this place filled with Wolfsbane?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_02\".m_mContent: "Who knew in the depths of this forsaken place, the heart of the plague, there would be such a beautiful sight..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_03\".m_mContent: "Father's favorite flower... Why is it blooming here? Who planted them?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_04\".m_mContent: "So where is this Moonblessed we're looking for? Or should I say this Calamity?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_05\".m_mContent: "Isn't it right in front of you?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_07\".m_mContent: "Sheila, this Moonblessed, represents one of the divine punishments bestowed upon nonbelievers... Plague."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_08\".m_mContent: "To think there would be such a monster buried beneath Lupine Forest."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_10\".m_mContent: "Wh-What are you talking about? I'm not..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_11\".m_mContent: "I don't know why, but standing here, I can't help but... Even though..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_12\".m_mContent: "Even though I didn't cry when father died, or when Clive disappeared, I'm crying here of all places..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_13\".m_mContent: "It... It must be because the smell here is too pungent! You just can't smell it!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_14\".m_mContent: "Alright, alright... But going back on topic, is he really the Moonblessed we're looking for? He seems to have been dead for a long time."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_15\".m_mContent: "He is indeed Sheila一the Plague. There's no mistake."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_16\".m_mContent: "How can you be so certain? Have you seen him before?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_18\".m_mContent: "Yes, he's dead. Slain by us twenty years ago..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_19\".m_mContent: "If this Plague died so long ago, where did the plague in Lupine Forest come from?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_20\".m_mContent: "It seems the answer has eagerly revealed itself."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_21\".m_mContent: "Ugh... No matter how many times I see it, it still disgusts me..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_22\".m_mContent: "They're using the Calamity's corpse as their nest!? That's how the Black Blood..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_23\".m_mContent: "The Moonblessed's remains... Even though it has long withered, the primal urge to survive still exists."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_24\".m_mContent: "You unsightly creature, your existence no longer has meaning."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_25\".m_mContent: "I can't help but feel that if you were still alive, you might have made a worthy adversary."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_26\".m_mContent: "Gilrain, tell me the truth. Did Cain send you?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_27\".m_mContent: "Don't make it sound like I follow his orders. I came here of my own volition—to find something I lost."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_28\".m_mContent: "Like how you came to find the Moonblessed, and how that Noah came to find his memories."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_29\".m_mContent: "Did you feel like you also lost important memories here?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_30\".m_mContent: "No, I feel like what I lost here was..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_33\".m_mContent: "Don't look at me, I don't understand him either."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_34\".m_mContent: "Oh, so you're a dumb bat too!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_35\".m_mContent: "However, Cain did ask me to pass on a message to you."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_37\".m_mContent: "'After your encounter with the first Moonblessed, travel south and look for the El Dorado'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_38\".m_mContent: "'The next Moonblessed and the silver hair's hometown both lie in the direction of the setting sun.'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_39\".m_mContent: "What the hell? More riddles? That damned Cain!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_40\".m_mContent: "Now that I've delivered the message, I'll be making my leave."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_41\".m_mContent: "When that Noah guy gets back, give him this invitation—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_42\".m_mContent: "Hey! You're really not going to explain anything to us?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_45\".m_mContent: "It's a ticket. 'Across the Sea of Medimar, chasing the legend of the setting sun. Welcome aboard the El Dorado!'"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_46\".m_mContent: "He just took off... What do we do now?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_47\".m_mContent: "He said something about meeting with the Moonblessed, and Noah returning..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_48\".m_mContent: "But the Moonblessed is already dead, and Noah is still missing. He said the answers we need would be here..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_49\".m_mContent: "But there's nothing here besides these gross bugs."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_50\".m_mContent: "I had always thought... that I was the one who sent Noah back in time, but that was that just wishful thinking on my part..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_51\".m_mContent: "What?! You're the one who said we would find Clive here. That's the only reason we went through all this trouble, but now there's absolutely nothing..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_55\".m_mContent: "What's wrong with you? Don't be rash, we can still think of a way..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip14_58\".m_mContent: "I think... I heard Noah and Clive's voices."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_05\".m_mContent: "I made it thanks to you, Noah, and now I understand my duty."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_06\".m_mContent: "What are you talking about? Where are we?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_08\".m_mContent: "This is no illusion, no dream... The soil beneath our feet is real."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_09\".m_mContent: "Is it actually real? If not a dream... Could it be the afterlife?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_10\".m_mContent: "Noah, you gave me your blood before, right? And just now, I shared my blood with you."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_11\".m_mContent: "I see... this must be the Hive Mind created by the Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_12\".m_mContent: "So this is the world from the memories of those werewolves... No, from the Gravekeepers."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_13\".m_mContent: "As expected of you, Noah. You figured it out already. I was lost here for so long that I even mistook it for the real world."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_14\".m_mContent: "It's peaceful and serene here. But without Father, Sister, or you, I started to feel scared..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_15\".m_mContent: "I began searching everywhere for you all... Until your blood found me and awakened me on the other side."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_16\".m_mContent: "You've already left this place once? Why did you come back?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_17\".m_mContent: "To get you, Noah. You have many people waiting for you out there, but me..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_18\".m_mContent: "Don't say that. You can't stay here either. You have the 'future' that your father and Hati wanted for you."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_19\".m_mContent: "This world on the 'Other Side' is strange, Noah. What felt like a brief moment outside seemed to last for days here."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_20\".m_mContent: "During my time here, I met all the past Gravekeepers. They were all very kind to me and told me many things."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_21\".m_mContent: "I now know that you and I ended up in the forbidden grounds twenty years in the past."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_22\".m_mContent: "I learned that this place is called the Other Side."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_23\".m_mContent: "But when I tried to find the last Gravekeeper—my father... I couldn't find him anywhere."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_24\".m_mContent: "Could it be that he's not here because he never entered the forbidden grounds?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_25\".m_mContent: "This can't be a coincidence. I know I'll never be able to see the sister I once knew..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_26\".m_mContent: "You said my sister looked forward to my future, but all I want is to protect her past."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_27\".m_mContent: "Clive, what exactly did you see? I'll help you, just tell me—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_29\".m_mContent: "I don't really get it, but we've really gone back twenty years."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_30\".m_mContent: "I shouldn't even have been born yet..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_31\".m_mContent: "But somehow... I recognize this is Mouret twenty years in the past."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_33\".m_mContent: "A river will flow through this barren spot and become a rich water source."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_34\".m_mContent: "And here, fertile farmland will soon be cultivated... And over there..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_35\".m_mContent: "That's where our favorite place in town will be built—a bustling market."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_36\".m_mContent: "The people will work together to transform this barren land into a thriving town."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_38\".m_mContent: "I never understood why Father never looked me in the eyes, even though we look so alike..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_39\".m_mContent: "I also couldn't fathom why Father was so cruel to abandon us to keep a solitary vigil at the forbidden grounds, waiting for someone he refused to speak of..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_40\".m_mContent: "Now I know, the person Father... no, the person I was waiting for was you, Noah. I was waiting for you to lead me into this cycle."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_41\".m_mContent: "What in the world are you talking about?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_42\".m_mContent: "The Black Blood connection is becoming unstable?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_43\".m_mContent: "It seems the one hiding in the shell is about to awaken!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_45\".m_mContent: "Yes, after all, we still have one last thing we must do."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_46\".m_mContent: "Finally decided to wake up? We released this huge pain in the ass just to save you."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_47\".m_mContent: "After we're done, we'll take that special type back for a thorough examination."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_51\".m_mContent: "What's going on!? Didn't we take him down?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_52\".m_mContent: "It's the Divine Body... Sensing the sealed one is missing, it has gone berserk."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_53\".m_mContent: "H-How? Shouldn't the Divine Body be on our side?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_55\".m_mContent: "All things require balance, like light and shadow. Once that balance is lost, either side can turn into a Calamity."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_56\".m_mContent: "Th-Then... does that mean we may have chosen the wrong side? That big bug... maybe it just wanted to leave this place?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_57\".m_mContent: "The world isn't black and white, but there's no doubt he was the source of the Black Blood seeping into Lupine Forest."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_58\".m_mContent: "This is bad! At this rate, the entire cave will be submerged..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_59\".m_mContent: "Tch, we're at the deepest point, too far from the entrance. If I use my forbidden technique, I could escape, but the others..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_62\".m_mContent: "My Covenant can activate a state approaching the speed of light. I can get everyone out."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_63\".m_mContent: "So you're going to best me in speed too?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_64\".m_mContent: "Well, that was the only thing you ever beat me at in our competitions since we were kids."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_65\".m_mContent: "Is that why you chose 'light'? You really are a damn prodigy. Just how far ahead of me do you want to get before you're satisfied?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_66\".m_mContent: "Gilrain, now's not the time to sulk. Come on!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_67\".m_mContent: "Don't look down on me, I can get out on my own!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_68\".m_mContent: "Gilrain! You... That technique is forbidden by the Church..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_69\".m_mContent: "...Aiona? What are you doing? Why aren't you listening to me?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_70\".m_mContent: "This time, I must succeed. I must... send Noah back to his own time!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_71\".m_mContent: "Clive, grab on to me. We're leaving."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_72\".m_mContent: "No, Noah. What you must escape from is not this place, but this time."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_73\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry for pulling you into this place again, but it's the only way I can have time to talk to you."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_74\".m_mContent: "This should be the last time that we will speak like this, as I am now, Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_75\".m_mContent: "What do you mean? Don't you want to go back to our own time?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_77\".m_mContent: "A baby crying? But the Calamity... could it be twins?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_78\".m_mContent: "Yes, Noah. The hands of time have begun to turn forward once more."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_79\".m_mContent: "My choice to stay here does not mean my life has ended. On the contrary, it has begun anew."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_82\".m_mContent: "There's no point hiding it any longer. Yes, Hati was born on this day. The one you know is twenty today..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_83\".m_mContent: "Are you saying you were always destined to end up in this time?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_84\".m_mContent: "I will stay to fulfill my dream of becoming a Gravekeeper of the Ganelon family, to fulfill..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_87\".m_mContent: "Please don't tell Hati the truth. Tell her I died. Even though she will be very sad..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_88\".m_mContent: "...Have you never thought of defying this fate? Are you content with being trapped in this never-ending curse?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_89\".m_mContent: "Even if one day I'll watch everyone's departing silhouettes, as if witnessing the final chapter."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_90\".m_mContent: "For these fleeting twenty years, I'm sure I can give Hati a happy childhood."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_91\".m_mContent: "Is that so? You've become strong and reliable, Clive... No, Lord Ganelon."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_92\".m_mContent: "Clive, I promise you—if our timelines converge once more, if our paths are destined to meet again..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_93\".m_mContent: "I will come to this place in twenty years, and take Hati away."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_94\".m_mContent: "Is this the promise between men you mentioned to Uncle Gadric?"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_95\".m_mContent: "Hehe, well, don't forget, you still have a promise with someone else too..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_96\".m_mContent: "Reverse the stars and the current of time, reveal your future form."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_98\".m_mContent: "What are you doing, Aiona? Stop! I still have something to say—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_105\".m_mContent: "Now I understand why you were so friendly to Clive the first time you met..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_106\".m_mContent: "Where is he? Where's Clive? Noah, there's no way you would leave him behind, right?!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_108\".m_mContent: "He's okay, right? Don't lie to me. I can sense his presence. He can't be dead!"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_110\".m_mContent: "He has always been by your side, ever since the day you were born..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_111\".m_mContent: "Why do you keep crying? What should I do..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_112\".m_mContent: "Ah, that's right, I brought a Wolfsbane."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_113\".m_mContent: "It's my favorite flower. You too, huh..."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_114\".m_mContent: "The flowers, sister, Mouret, and Noah—I love them all so much."

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_115\".m_mContent: "Grow up quickly, my little Hati. And take good care of yourself over there, sis—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_116\".m_mContent: "I will protect your past here, and be here to bless you on your next journey—"

\"Dialogue_B_50001_Clip15_117\".m_mContent: "As long as you're with Noah, I'm sure you'll find it—a 'future' that truly belongs to you."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_01\".m_mContent: "Treasure, power, paradise—every secret we seek lies beyond the sea."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "It is my greatest honor to have you all aboard on this grand voyage of discovery."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_04\".m_mContent: "Ugh, what is this? That gilded peacock went completely overboard with the decorations."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_05\".m_mContent: "A statue of himself for the figurehead? A golden helm that practically screams for attention?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_06\".m_mContent: "Seriously. Of all the ships crossing these waters, why did we end up on the most ridiculous one?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "Because Noah's 'homeland' seems to lie on a legendary island..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "They say only a ship swift enough to chase down the sun before it sinks below the horizon can reach that place of hidden truths—Sunset Isle."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_09\".m_mContent: "That's if Cain's intel is even accurate to begin with."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_10\".m_mContent: "This ship, the El Dorado, was commissioned at great cost by Goldland—a merchant who fancies himself an explorer—in his search for lost isles."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_11\".m_mContent: "Assuming, of course, that our peacock Captain isn't just puffing his feathers."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_12\".m_mContent: "Call it whatever you want. In this cursed weather, it's not catching any sunsets. We can't even see the sun!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_14\".m_mContent: "Still, no sunlight means we're free to enjoy the breeze on deck without passing out in the oven below. Right, dumb wolf...?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_16\".m_mContent: "H-Hey, what are you doing?! Don't you dare throw up on me!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_17\".m_mContent: "Are you still thinking about that day... when we first met in the forbidden grounds, twenty years ago?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_18\".m_mContent: "You knew we would meet Hati and Clive in the Lupine Forest. You knew I would step into those forbidden grounds—because you'd lived it already."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_19\".m_mContent: "From your perspective, Starfall Valley wasn't even our first encounter. Why didn't you tell me anything?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_20\".m_mContent: "Every 'present' we live through is a miracle wrought from countless past 'choices.'"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_21\".m_mContent: "The 'outcome' of the future must not be allowed to shape the past—this is 'the decree of the past,' and it must not be defied. It must never be..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_22\".m_mContent: "You speak as if you know what will happen. But I suppose... even if I asked, you wouldn't say."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_23\".m_mContent: "The past... Aiona, your words echo the Tempus Church's doctrine of fate."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_24\".m_mContent: "But I see 'choice' differently. I don't believe in 'the decree of the past.'"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_25\".m_mContent: "Yet you did return—just as I remembered. And Clive Jr. remained there... just as history had written it."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_26\".m_mContent: "He did. Even knowing what was to come, he chose to stay that day, because..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_28\".m_mContent: "But he was only a child... swept into the vortex of history, with no way out."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_29\".m_mContent: "A child, yes—but also a man. A Gravekeeper. A father who will never regret the choice he made."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_30\".m_mContent: "What mattered to him wasn't whether he could escape the vortex of history—but whether Hati could leave it behind... and keep walking her own path."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_31\".m_mContent: "To you, Clive isn't a prisoner bound by time, but a martyr who placed his faith in the future."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_32\".m_mContent: "Even if that future is one Hati may not have the strength to bear once she learns the truth."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_33\".m_mContent: "He believes in Hati, who's stronger than most would ever understand. And he believes in us—the ones who once fought at his side."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_34\".m_mContent: "Even I... If only I had said a proper farewell. Come to think of it..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_35\".m_mContent: "Noah, I remember. There was something else you wanted to tell me that day. What..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_36\".m_mContent: "Ah... What I wanted to say back then..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_37\".m_mContent: "Well now… I didn't expect anyone else to be admiring this storm-kissed seascape—dangerous, but quite captivating."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_38\".m_mContent: "Hm? Oh dear, am I intruding on something?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_39\".m_mContent: "My apologies. I did advise Miss Dalcarlo not to interrupt your... private moment."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_40\".m_mContent: "Still, if this is the sort of relationship you'd rather keep unseen, the guest cabins offer far better privacy."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_42\".m_mContent: "Heh, little Ami loves to tease. Do try not to take her too seriously."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_43\".m_mContent: "Pity. I was hoping to have something new to whisper about on the ship."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_44\".m_mContent: "You're the girl who guided us before we boarded. So... your name is Ami."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_45\".m_mContent: "That's right. I'm Ami, Captain of the El Dorado. It's an honor to meet you all."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_46\".m_mContent: "Captain? I thought Mr. Goldland was the Captain. He did give the welcome speech..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_47\".m_mContent: "Ah, little Ami and her 'ambitions,' already laid bare before strangers. But perhaps it’s that candor that makes her so... endearing."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_48\".m_mContent: "Unlike you, Miss Dalcarlo—I've never liked how you speak in circles."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_49\".m_mContent: "As she said, you may call me Dalcarlo. I was invited aboard by Goldland himself—the true Captain of this ship. You could say I dabble in the art of divination."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_50\".m_mContent: "Then it seems this voyage promises enough turmoil to warrant a fortune teller aboard."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_51\".m_mContent: "Naturally. After all, this 'Chariot' rides toward the legendary 'Sun'... And even I, the 'Magician,' cannot steer the 'Wheel of Fortune.'"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_52\".m_mContent: "See? Told you—no one understands a word she says."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_53\".m_mContent: "Would you mind, dear? May I offer you a reading? I sense a rather curious 'Devil' slumbering within your 'World'..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_54\".m_mContent: "Forgive me. But I'd rather keep the 'Wheel of Fortune' in my own hands."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_55\".m_mContent: "Look at that—someone who can match her, word for word."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_56\".m_mContent: "But it seems this card has been waiting just for you..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_59\".m_mContent: "It's the lowest-numbered among the twenty-two Major Arcana, yet also the most distinct."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_60\".m_mContent: "I see 'The High Priestess' is well-versed in tarot. 'The Fool' often knows nothing, yet holds limitless potential..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_61\".m_mContent: "Tread carefully, little 'Fool.' To place the 'Wheel of Fortune' solely in your own hands is to believe in no one but yourself."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_62\".m_mContent: "In such a 'World,' you may one day find yourself utterly alone."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_63\".m_mContent: "As for you, little Ami—no need to show me the way. I'll find Goldland on my own."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_64\".m_mContent: "I never offered to guide you. Please don't shift the conversation just to avoid an awkward silence."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_65\".m_mContent: "Miss Dalcarlo may seem unreliable, but her divinations are often uncannily accurate. Don't worry about them."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_66\".m_mContent: "Are you truly telling me... not to worry?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_67\".m_mContent: "There are some sweets in the kitchen. Would you two like some? That way, no one will notice I've been sneaking a few for myself."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_68\".m_mContent: "Thank you, but… I don't really need to eat."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_69\".m_mContent: "That explains your pale face and thin frame. Better be careful not to get blown away once the storm hits."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_70\".m_mContent: "Speaking of which, I should deliver dinner to the captain before it arrives. I won't be showing you two to your cabins."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_71\".m_mContent: "Today's guests are rather peculiar... That one with the lifeless eyes also refused to eat anything served on the ship."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_72\".m_mContent: "That child... there's something about her that draws my attention."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_74\".m_mContent: "No, No... I-I meant the tear-like markings on her face."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_75\".m_mContent: "If I recall correctly, those are unique to a particular noble bloodline. Why would a child like that be working aboard as crew?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_76\".m_mContent: "We've lingered long enough. Let's rejoin Empousa and Hati in the guest quarters."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_79\".m_mContent: "Invitation? Do you mean the letter the white-haired Elder mentioned they'd be sending me?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_80\".m_mContent: "Yes, I've been holding onto it. Though… we've been traveling nonstop—I haven't had a chance to open it."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_81\".m_mContent: "Hmm… It does bear the El Dorado seal. Let me check the invitation..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_82\".m_mContent: "Let's see... Old man Baphomet's ring-patterned armor, 120,000 Soli… Cain's Carrelle Estate red wine, 500,000 Soli…"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_84\".m_mContent: "For a vintage from the Carrelle Estate, 500,000 Soli is hardly unreasonable."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_85\".m_mContent: "That's not the point! I don't care if this is a shopping list or a ledger—it's not a boarding invitation!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_86\".m_mContent: "What's going on here? Why all the shouting?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_87\".m_mContent: "Third Mate William! These two may be stowaways—boarded without invitations. How should we handle them?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_88\".m_mContent: "Ugh... The deck's Aaron's responsibility! What's he doing as Second Mate if not this?!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_89\".m_mContent: "Take them below deck and lock them up. I'll handle this myself."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_91\".m_mContent: "Please wait. There may be some misunderstanding regarding the invitations."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_92\".m_mContent: "Tch... These two aren't your everyday stowaways. We can't handle them alone... Where's Bob? Get him here now!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_93\".m_mContent: "We've informed First Mate Bob, but he's dealing with another pair of stowaways he found elsewhere!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_94\".m_mContent: "You've got to be kidding me. What sort of people are sneaking aboard today?!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_95\".m_mContent: "Sir, what are your orders? A storm's closing in, and Captain Goldland needs you on the sails immediately!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_96\".m_mContent: "Don't you think I know that?! Where's Kris—where's Captain Goldland? Where did he go at a time like this?!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_96a\".m_mContent: "Take them to the Captain's quarters. Captain Goldland will question them personally."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_97\".m_mContent: "May the 'Chariot's' voyage reach its destination without fail, Captain Kristoph Goldland."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_98\".m_mContent: "Spare me the pleasantries. Just make sure your services are worth the price I paid, Lady Dalcarlo of Bathory."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_99\".m_mContent: "Heh. Don't address me by my family name. I'm just a humble fortune teller now—free to live as I please."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_100\".m_mContent: "A humble fortune teller… interested in charts detailing the locations of Future Artifacts? Even the Tempus Church has its eyes on those."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_101\".m_mContent: "So long as I don't tug on the whiskers of the Bell Ringers, those silver kittens aren't so frightening—including the one aboard your ship as we speak."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_102\".m_mContent: "No wonder the Puppet Association recommended you—you've got guts. Fine. I'll hand over the chart to the Future Artifacts."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_103\".m_mContent: "But I expect Lady Dalcaro to honor her end of the bargain once the chart's authenticity is confirmed."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip01_104\".m_mContent: "Of course, Captain. I'll be right back."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_01\".m_mContent: "What is wrong with you, you dumb wolf?! Don't tell me you're going to throw up on me again!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_02\".m_mContent: "No… I'm fine… Just a little dizzy. There's this heat building up in my throat..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_03\".m_mContent: "You are about to be sick! Unbelievable... That's it—whether you like it or not, I'm taking you back to the guest cabin!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_05\".m_mContent: "Excuse me?! I'm going out of my way to help you, and this is the thanks I get?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_07\".m_mContent: "Are you delirious? It's just the two of us here. Who else could you be talking to?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_08\".m_mContent: "No… There really are voices... They're trying to tell me something..."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_09\".m_mContent: "I can't make out the words, but ever since we boarded… they've been whispering, over and over… Ugh—"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_10\".m_mContent: "Hey! Stay with me! What do I do…"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_11\".m_mContent: "Have her close her eyes and sit quietly where she is."

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_12\".m_mContent: "Who are you? And why should I listen to you?"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_14\".m_mContent: "Hey! Why are you taking his side?! Look at those lifeless eyes—he's definitely not someone we can trust!"

\"Dialogue_B_60001_Clip02_15\".m_mContent: "This young lady possesses keen senses. Her body isn't adjusting well to the ship's motion—her senses and balance are at odds, causing her seasickness."
