\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_031\".m_mContent: "Meow—It seems The High Priestess is more familiar with this form of mine."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_032\".m_mContent: "What's that surprise for? I can turn into a bat too. Controlling one's beast form is the basic for all Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_033\".m_mContent: "Though to be fair, Jacintha's the only one in the family who actually enjoys showing up in her beast form."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_034\".m_mContent: "Now I'm curious... What kind of beast forms do the other Elders and Noah have?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_035\".m_mContent: "Enough distractions. Jacintha! What are you really here for?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_036\".m_mContent: "This is the ship's alchemy lab, isn't it? Naturally, I came to see if there was any useful research worth stealing, meow."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_038\".m_mContent: "That's not what I meant. Why are you on this ship?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_039\".m_mContent: "Don't tell me Cain sent you because he doesn't trust us to find the Moonblessed."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_040\".m_mContent: "As if the free-spirited Magician would ever take orders from anyone, meow. Besides... that detestable man..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_040a\".m_mContent: "Wasn't he already dead? Cut down by the long-haired Gilrain right there in the Hall of the Elders."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_040b\".m_mContent: "What? Why is he dead again? He literally just handed us clues—and ship tickets!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_040c\".m_mContent: "None of us ever saw him again. Everything we heard came only through Noah and Gilrain."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_040d\".m_mContent: "So the Fool and Death met with someone who should already be dead...? How curious, meow."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_041\".m_mContent: "Can you please stop calling people by those Tarot card names?! I can't even tell who you're talking about!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_041a\".m_mContent: "And drop that fake meow already! ...And stop changing the subject—what are you really here for?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_042\".m_mContent: "I made a deal with the real Captain, meow. I've already received payment. Now I must keep my end of the bargain."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_043\".m_mContent: "Deliver his necklace to the Hermit—that girl called Ami, meow."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip02_044\".m_mContent: "Ami? She was just next to us... Eh?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_002\".m_mContent: "Huh...? When did it get so dark? Did someone blow out the candles?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_003\".m_mContent: "Where did that thing that tried to devour me go? Could it be waiting to ambush me from the shadows..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_006\".m_mContent: "Sis... We're just sparring. You didn't have to go all out..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_008\".m_mContent: "That kick really hurt! Can you help me up?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_010\".m_mContent: "Wait a second. This is... Mouret? I was on a ship... How did I end up back here? And..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_011\".m_mContent: "A ship? Ugh, you went to the ocean without me again, didn't you?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_012\".m_mContent: "I did not! I promised I'd take you next time, didn't I?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_016\".m_mContent: "Shut up! This has nothing to do with you—and my name's not Sheila!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_017\".m_mContent: "Who are you talking to, sis? Why are you just standing there?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_019\".m_mContent: "Aw... A dream forever out of reach—this illusion of human kinship is merely a snare devised by that sanctimonious Aeon."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_020\".m_mContent: "Remember your name, Sheila—and speak mine: Ranna."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_021\".m_mContent: "We are kindred, Moonblessed—branded with the stigmata of Famine and Pestilence, cast out from our true homeland."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_022\".m_mContent: "Return to me, Sheila. Rejoin me, and find the rest of our kin and reclaim the world that was always ours."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_026\".m_mContent: "The Ganelon family sealed you away, did they? I see... they've tamed you like a lapdog."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_027\".m_mContent: "You leave me no choice. I'll have to devour you to complete our union—"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_028\".m_mContent: "I told you—you messed with the wrong person!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_030\".m_mContent: "You seriously thought you could take me? Not in this lifetime!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_031\".m_mContent: "How could this be... Am I still too weak? I need to eat..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip03_033\".m_mContent: "Wait—there's another one?! Who are you supposed to be?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_001\".m_mContent: "She's got the brains of a jellyfish—doesn't even realize how dangerous it is to wander off alone right now!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_002\".m_mContent: "Hey, Jacintha, aren't you supposed to be a fortune-teller? Hurry up and tell us where she went!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_003\".m_mContent: "Empress, you seem to misunderstand what I do meow. I see the future, not the present."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_004\".m_mContent: "If you want to track someone, go ask the compass, meow."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_005\".m_mContent: "Erm... Miss Dalcarlo, that's not what the compass is for either."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_006\".m_mContent: "Why prattle on about the future? We'll be fish food before it ever comes. Especially you—you'd make a rather lovely bite."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_007\".m_mContent: "I will not allow anyone to mock the future! ...But you did remind me of something."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_008\".m_mContent: "Never forget, the future is always a step ahead of the present."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_009\".m_mContent: "I may not know where she is now, but I know exactly where she'll end up."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_010\".m_mContent: "What's with the sudden shift in tone? You're not even saying "meow"..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_012\".m_mContent: "Are you sure she went this way? There's no sign of her at all."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_013\".m_mContent: "To the future, the path does not matter—only the outcome, meow."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_014\".m_mContent: "Miss Hati is also in the lounge ahead. We can pick her up along the way."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_015\".m_mContent: "So you're looking for more than one person, meow. Naturally, I foresaw this in the future."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_016\".m_mContent: "Oh? And these strays were in your so-called future too?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_018\".m_mContent: "What a mess this place has become… Even a cat can't help but sigh, meow…"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_019\".m_mContent: "A fine Captain entrusted his dream of adventure to this vessel. In the end, because of one spoiled little brother, he lost all his Strength."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_020\".m_mContent: "The Empress really should try getting along with her sisters, meow."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_021\".m_mContent: "Stay out of it! Every family's like this when it comes to siblings!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_022\".m_mContent: "Not always. Lady Hati and her brother are quite close... Oh, why didn't she come with you?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_023\".m_mContent: "Who knows? Maybe she ran off to find her precious little brother again."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_025\".m_mContent: "Seriously, where did everyone run off to!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_026\".m_mContent: "Ah... could it be those whispers again?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_027\".m_mContent: "That Black Blood resonance you mentioned? Same as the jellyfish?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_028\".m_mContent: "Yes. And knowing Hati's temperament, she must have gone straight for the source."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_029\".m_mContent: "Speaking of resonance... What were you about to say about that silly wolf's identity? Why would she have the Black Blood disease?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip04_030\".m_mContent: "Because Miss Hati... might be one of the Moonblessed we've been searching for."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_003\".m_mContent: "That voice... It's coming from the provisions room?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_005\".m_mContent: "Aiona, keep an eye on that jellyfish. Leave these pests to me!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_006\".m_mContent: "You bear my blood... You are my kin..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_008\".m_mContent: "I have to go... I can't let her revive again..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_009\".m_mContent: "...Am I still too weak? I need to eat..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_011\".m_mContent: "Wait—there's another one?! Who are you supposed to be?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_012\".m_mContent: "Why are there strangers showing up in my head?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_013\".m_mContent: "That's my question! Why are you—who clearly aren't food—inside my head?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_015\".m_mContent: "Enough. This is the mindscape born of Black Blood resonance..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_016\".m_mContent: "It seems I must guide you from the beginning—help you remember who you truly are."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_019\".m_mContent: "Octo is the octopus I ate today."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_021\".m_mContent: "Octo was food. After I ate it, I just happened to inherit its memories too."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_022\".m_mContent: "You truly are my child... Able to turn food into strength..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_024\".m_mContent: "Wait... I get it now! It transforms into what it eats! That's why it took on my form earlier!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_025\".m_mContent: "If I'm its child... Does that mean I'll learn to do that too?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_026\".m_mContent: "Why do you sound so excited to become... whatever that is?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_027\".m_mContent: "Now it all makes sense. My love of food... it's part of my growth!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_028\".m_mContent: "Compared to your growth, this one's 'growth' seems far more troubling..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_029\".m_mContent: "It's getting bigger the more it eats! We have to stop it!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_030\".m_mContent: "Exactly! Stop right now! Those are my rations—you can't eat them all!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_031\".m_mContent: "Ah... so that's what this is really about..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_032\".m_mContent: "No one will keep me from eating..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_033\".m_mContent: "So you've gorged yourself and grown this massive... and that's all you've got?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_034\".m_mContent: "Yeah. And it ate all my rations, too. Truly heartbreaking."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_035\".m_mContent: "So that's why you hit so hard... Didn't expect you to be such a good fighter."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_036\".m_mContent: "Such pitiful creatures... no wonder you cannot endure my power."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_038\".m_mContent: "My faithful exist for one purpose only: to feed me."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_039\".m_mContent: "Why's it smashing the floor now? What, is there food down there too?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_040\".m_mContent: "As you wish... Become my sustenance, alchemist..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_041\".m_mContent: "Wait... is that the Captain? No, it looks like William, disguised as the Captain..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_042\".m_mContent: "Ah... This type of 'food' is the finest—so easy to control."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_042d\".m_mContent: "Why is this body wearing such a hard, smelly stone? I almost swallowed it..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_044\".m_mContent: "Oh—so he was the one who stocked this ship with delicacies just for me."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_045\".m_mContent: "What's this? You want to fight me again using that body?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_046\".m_mContent: "You've got spirit, Sheila. In my weakened state, I cannot best you..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_047\".m_mContent: "But in time, every one of you will become my sustenance."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_048\".m_mContent: "Huh? Such big talk and you flee?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_049\".m_mContent: "Wait—it said something about more food... Is there something upstairs?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_051\".m_mContent: "Ah—this is bad. We've got to stop it, now!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_053\".m_mContent: "The Ganelon family motto: 'If you run with everything you've got—there's nowhere you can't reach!'"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_054\".m_mContent: "Eh? Do I have to go too?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_055\".m_mContent: "We promised to fight it together, as partners!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip05_056\".m_mContent: "We never made that promise. But... if I don't have to run myself, then fine."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_001\".m_mContent: "They dare reject fusion with the ancestral Black Blood? They'll regret it soon enough."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_003\".m_mContent: "I need more sustenance to restore my strength!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_005\".m_mContent: "It's fine. I recognize that uniform. He's not with the crew."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_008\".m_mContent: "Eh?! Well that's worse! What do we do now?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_014\".m_mContent: "This body... has no memory of you. What exactly are you?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_016\".m_mContent: "This Captain's already dead. The Black Blood's controlling him?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_019\".m_mContent: "They're heading up... Huh? Now there's two of them?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_021\".m_mContent: "They look like normal passengers. Pretty sure I saw them near the bow earlier..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_022\".m_mContent: "Yes, yes! That's right! We're just... lost passengers who wandered in by mistake!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_025\".m_mContent: "Then allow me to escort you both back to your cabin."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_026\".m_mContent: "Now's really not the time for this..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_027\".m_mContent: "Um... I see you two are busy! I'll just take Mother back now!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_028\".m_mContent: "You think they're suspicious too, don't you?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_029\".m_mContent: "The cabins are on this floor... but they went down."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_030\".m_mContent: "No! I looked away for one second and that thing made it to the deck!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip06_032\".m_mContent: "I see... Oh—right. I don't even know your name yet."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_001\".m_mContent: "Why's it so quiet... Is there nothing on the deck? Ami...?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_003\".m_mContent: "Now, Sheila... this is the perfect time to join me."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_004\".m_mContent: "What happened to you? You look hideous!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_005\".m_mContent: "Fool! Black Blood is our true form—this shape is proof that I've reclaimed my power."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_006\".m_mContent: "You dragged me into that mindscape thing again, didn't you?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_007\".m_mContent: "Have you ever considered... that this might be the real world?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_008\".m_mContent: "I'm not falling for that trick again! This isn't Mouret!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_009\".m_mContent: "And why are you so certain this world isn't real? Aren't your thoughts, your memories... all right here?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_011\".m_mContent: "No! This is not real! You're not the real Clive!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_012\".m_mContent: "Why do you believe that world of life and death—defined by a false god—is real?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_013\".m_mContent: "And why do you call this world of your own making, where all your desires are fulfilled, false?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_014\".m_mContent: "Aeon deceived his faithful, branding Black Blood as a disease that devours the will."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_015\".m_mContent: "But is he not the same—splitting our once-unified consciousness into a thousand curses of flesh and blood?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_017\".m_mContent: "Just know that where your loved ones dwell, where your thoughts return... that is where you truly belong."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_018\".m_mContent: "Come back, Sheila. Return to your true homeland."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_020\".m_mContent: "Yes, Clive... I should make your dinner now..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_022\".m_mContent: "Don't hesitate. Everything you've ever loved and longed for... is right here, with me."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_023\".m_mContent: "...You know, lately everyone's been calling me a dumb wolf. At first, I didn't want to admit it..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_024\".m_mContent: "But now... maybe being dumb isn't a bad thing."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_025\".m_mContent: "Honestly? I didn't understand a single word you said. But I know one thing for sure. My family's not with you."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_026\".m_mContent: "That side of Mouret is long gone. You have no home left to return to."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_027\".m_mContent: "If they're not here with me—then where could they be?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_028\".m_mContent: "You're right. They're not in Mouret. They're not even in this world. But I can still sense them."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_030\".m_mContent: "You've fallen too far... trapped in the crude instincts of a lesser creature."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_031\".m_mContent: "You leave me with no choice but to devour you all. One by one. Then I'll seek out the rest of our kindred."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_035\".m_mContent: "All that arrogant nonsense—yet one hit was all it took."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_037\".m_mContent: "You did defeat me—in that world. But do not forget... You chose to..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_039\".m_mContent: "A world where only the strong endure."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_043\".m_mContent: "I must thank you, Sheila. You kept such lovely company while I dined."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_044\".m_mContent: "I won't... let you... get away with this..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip07_046\".m_mContent: "Hold still. I'll finish off the last of the Landis bloodline first—then take my time with you."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_001\".m_mContent: "I always knew—Ganelon was never truly my name."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_002\".m_mContent: "And I knew Mouret was never truly my home."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_003\".m_mContent: "Deep down, I've always known... I'm different. From my brother, from my father... from everyone in Ganelon."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_004\".m_mContent: "Father always told me, "One day, you must take that step... face your true self... and find...""

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_005\".m_mContent: ""Your true homeland." Back then, I never knew what he meant."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_006\".m_mContent: "Thank you... Your name's Ranna? Your words helped me understand my father for the first time."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_007\".m_mContent: "A true homeland... is just as you said—where the ones I love and hold dear reside."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_008\".m_mContent: "So I don't need to go anywhere. Because I never left my homeland."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_010\".m_mContent: "Thank you, Clive... Father... For always accepting me, even when I could not face who I truly am."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_011\".m_mContent: ""Sheila" is not my name alone. It is ours."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_012\".m_mContent: "Sorry to keep you waiting—my other self."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_013\".m_mContent: "I've returned. To our homeland, and to the memories we shared."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_014\".m_mContent: "I'm proof that you once lived... so lend me your strength!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_016\".m_mContent: "The flea brain is fighting some monster... Wait, is she about to 'mutate'!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_017\".m_mContent: "Could Aiona be right... Is she going to transform into one of those furry giant wolves?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_021\".m_mContent: "I can feel it... Their longing, their protection."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_022\".m_mContent: "And the one they love... Is the truest version of me."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_024\".m_mContent: "Impossible! How could someone as incomplete as you achieve transcendence on your own!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_025\".m_mContent: "I never understood a word you said. But there's one thing I've always known:"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_027\".m_mContent: "How can this be...? How is your power greater than mine!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_030\".m_mContent: "There it is... Of course someone as broken as you could never wield power from the 'other side.'"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_031\".m_mContent: "What a pity, you almost completely 'devoured' me instead."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_032\".m_mContent: "Damn it... I have to keep fighting... I can't let anyone else fall..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_033\".m_mContent: "I shall be reborn as the Calamity, 'Famine'—feared by all of mankind."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_036\".m_mContent: "I wouldn't be so sure about that."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_038\".m_mContent: "There's nowhere left to run, little Devil."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_039\".m_mContent: "You... We share the same blood—why do you all stand in my way!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_042\".m_mContent: "Is that the nameless sailor? When did you get here?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_043\".m_mContent: "You've just come out of a brutal fight. Let me take care of Ami!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_045\".m_mContent: "Ugh... Not again!? What kind of sailor skill is this supposed to be!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip08_046\".m_mContent: "I let my guard down. He's taken Ami..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_001\".m_mContent: "March – The sea, ever an unpredictable maiden, grew more temperamental this time of year."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_002\".m_mContent: "Our mission to recover the lost artifacts of the legendary Landis family had come to a complete halt."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_003\".m_mContent: "Until that day, when Bob—newly promoted to Second Mate—came to me, cradling a child in his arms."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_004\".m_mContent: "He said they had pulled her from the sea. Could that be true? How could a girl, barely a year old, survive the ocean's depths?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_005\".m_mContent: "Yet something about her brought the Landis family to mind—the very family we had been searching for, the ones who vanished with their island into the waves."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_006\".m_mContent: "If they hadn't perished, but instead founded a kingdom beneath the sea... then this child might be the key to unlocking that mystery, to realizing our dream."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_007\".m_mContent: ""We should give her a name," Bob said."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_009\".m_mContent: "Ami—Ami Landis. She would be our helm, the one to steer us toward the truth behind the legend."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_010\".m_mContent: "Who's at the helm?! The ship's gone completely off course—at this rate we'll be swallowed by the whirlpool!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_011\".m_mContent: "I won't let the El Dorado become just another legend lost beneath the waves like Landis!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_014\".m_mContent: "What in—?! A Blood Beast?! That sailor at the helm—is he the one steering the ship?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_015\".m_mContent: "...Is that the sailor young Van Helsing mentioned?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_016\".m_mContent: "No time to think—rescue first, helm second!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_018\".m_mContent: "That won't be necessary, First Mate Bob."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_019\".m_mContent: "The greatest help you could offer me... is to die."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_021\".m_mContent: "Have you forgotten me? You've all forgotten I existed."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_022\".m_mContent: "But that's just as it should be. We, the faithful of Famine Ranna, have no need for names."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_023\".m_mContent: "Then you... You were never part of this crew to begin with! When did you..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_024\".m_mContent: "When your body is devoured by the great Ranna, you will be reborn. You'll finally see the truth of this world."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_025\".m_mContent: "Now, raise your voice with mine and invoke the sacred name of the Moonblessed!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip09_026\".m_mContent: "Famine Ranna shall once more reign over the sea that rightfully belongs to her!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_001\".m_mContent: "December – The crew could no longer endure the bitter cold, and we were forced to suspend the salvage operation."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_002\".m_mContent: "We sailed south, toward warmer harbors, to escape the winter chill. It was an opportunity to grant leave to the crew who had followed me tirelessly for the past year."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_003\".m_mContent: "But William never left the ship. He shut himself away in the alchemy lab, day after day."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_004\".m_mContent: "The more we uncovered about the Landis family, the more reclusive he became."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_005\".m_mContent: "Everyone on board tried to lift his spirits, but to no avail."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_006\".m_mContent: "I worried for him, but every time I tried to speak from concern, it came out sounding like reproach."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_007\".m_mContent: "When the time comes, I must find a way to understand what’s weighing on him. After all, no matter what happens—he is my only brother."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_008\".m_mContent: "Goldland truly was an exceptional Captain. A devoted brother—and an adventurer worthy of every accolade."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_009\".m_mContent: "His research into the Landis family artifacts far surpassed even the Church’s own records."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_010\".m_mContent: "And because it's so thorough, there are dozens of volumes. Are you sure you want to read through all of them here?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_011\".m_mContent: "If we keep reading at this pace, we may not even get a chance to appear in our own story."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_012\".m_mContent: "Let's head to the upper level and rejoin the others."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_014\".m_mContent: ""The island home of the Landis family was known as the 'Pillars of Hercules.'""

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_015\".m_mContent: ""But rather than an island, it more closely resembled an enormous ship...""

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_016\".m_mContent: "Before their disappearance, the Landis family was one of the twelve families under the Church protection."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_017\".m_mContent: "Even with branch families and all the residents of their territory, no ship could possibly carry so many people..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_018\".m_mContent: "Maybe it wasn't meant literally. It could be describing an island capable of movement."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_019\".m_mContent: "A moving island...? Or perhaps the island itself... is alive?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_020\".m_mContent: "Or... under the supernatural influence of a Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_021\".m_mContent: "It's true that each of the twelve families guards a Divine Body within their territory."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_022\".m_mContent: "But their supernatural nature is not something outsiders like you should be privy to..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_024\".m_mContent: "And what if I told you I didn't just hear about it—I experienced it myself?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_025\".m_mContent: "Then I might need a moment to consider..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_026\".m_mContent: "Whether to force the truth out of you, or keep searching Goldland's journals for the answer."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_028\".m_mContent: "The noise—it's coming from the storage room."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_029\".m_mContent: "They're here too. And they've brought some new friends."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_030\".m_mContent: "Where did these Blood Beasts come from? They're nothing like the ones we faced before."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_031\".m_mContent: "Perhaps we'll find out once we reach the source of that sound."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_033\".m_mContent: "It seems we've reached our first disagreement."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_034\".m_mContent: "If all goes well... I'll see you on the deck."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_035\".m_mContent: "Before I leave, I need to hurry and—"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip10_036\".m_mContent: "Goldland might have truly discovered the secret behind the Landis family's disappearance, something even the Church doesn't know..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_001\".m_mContent: "April – Following an encounter with pirates, we carried out repairs on the El Dorado."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_002\".m_mContent: "On the eve of our departure, I found myself reflecting on the life I led before ever setting foot aboard this ship."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_003\".m_mContent: "Back then, William and I were dockworkers—living from meal to meal, never daring to speak of our dreams of the sea."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_005\".m_mContent: "On a storm-ravaged night, I recovered an ocean-blue sapphire from the body of a nobleman lost to the waves."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_006\".m_mContent: "I had meant to sell it, to change our lives. But that night, I dreamed. In the dream, the sapphire came from a hidden underwater kingdom."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_007\".m_mContent: "I was no longer myself, but a spirit gliding freely through the sea—untethered and unburdened."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_008\".m_mContent: "The fish whispered to me that this was the Pillars of Hercules—a wondrous island beneath the Sea of Medimar, home of the Landis family for generations."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_009\".m_mContent: "If the Landis family had not been devoured by sea monsters, as the rumors claimed, but instead migrated into the depths..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_010\".m_mContent: "Then my dream—no, humanity's dream—of voyaging into the deep is no longer a fantasy."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_011\".m_mContent: "I learned much from the Landis people—of the ocean, of navigation."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_012\".m_mContent: "Aboard their great vessel, I discovered by embedding two jewels on opposite ends of the helm, they could sail to any destination within the span of a single storm."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_013\".m_mContent: "One jewel was blue, mournful—like the one in my possession. The other was crimson—deep and unfathomable."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_014\".m_mContent: "If I can find the second gem, I too shall command this miraculous gift. And I shall become the greatest adventurer the sea has ever known."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_015\".m_mContent: "I must tell William! We who carry this jewel are chosen by the sea. We were meant to embark upon a legendary odyssey."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_016\".m_mContent: "In the years that followed, I slowly gathered a fleet, piecing together every rumor tied to the lost Landis ship."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_017\".m_mContent: "In Sapphire Isle, my perseverance bore fruit: I acquired the wreckage of a ship built by the Landis people."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_018\".m_mContent: "I spent the last of my fortune to restore it, and gave it a name worthy of its fate—The El Dorado."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_019\".m_mContent: "This day forward, it shall carry our dreams, set sail, and never sink..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_021\".m_mContent: "When I came down here with Ami, this floor was in far better shape. The Blood Beasts must have torn through after we left."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_022\".m_mContent: "The stairs have collapsed, and the fire's spreading fast... Van Helsing was right—we should have taken the other route."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_023\".m_mContent: "Still... I can't get that tentacle out of my head. The one that dragged William's body—it must've reached down from this storage room."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_024\".m_mContent: "Let's search quickly for any clues, then regroup with the others."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_025\".m_mContent: "Of course it wouldn't be that simple, would it?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_026\".m_mContent: "Then I'll let my blade do the talking."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_027\".m_mContent: "They're closing in from every direction... Why are they avoiding that spot?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_028\".m_mContent: "Was that my imagination... Did that fish barrel just move? The fish must be fresh, but more importantly..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_029\".m_mContent: "A blue jewel? It feels like I've seen it somewhere before..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_030\".m_mContent: "Right, that's Goldland's earring. Did it fall here when the tentacle dragged him away?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_032\".m_mContent: "What is this feeling...? Like being dragged into the sea..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_034\".m_mContent: "That was close... Are you sure hiding in a barrel is really going to work?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_036\".m_mContent: "Only because he was sent flying! There's a massive hole in the ship now!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_038\".m_mContent: "Then why do I feel so hot?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_041\".m_mContent: "Just endure it. Once you're well-done, the heat won't bother you anymore."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_042\".m_mContent: "You think this is a grill!? I need water!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip11_043\".m_mContent: "Fish... always in such a rush. Unlike us, right?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_001\".m_mContent: "March – It has been twelve years since we found Ami. In all that time, we've uncovered no meaningful leads regarding the Landis family."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_002\".m_mContent: "We discovered Ami in these waters, which is why I remain convinced their ruins must lie somewhere nearby."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_003\".m_mContent: "For nine long years, our salvage operations made no breakthrough. Meanwhile, our maritime trade flourished, drawing the attention of the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_004\".m_mContent: "On the advice of Bob—once a Church officer, now my First Mate—I did not resist their inspection. In fact, I accepted their terms."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_005\".m_mContent: "They required my ship's aid in retrieving what they call 'Future Artifacts,' and in return, they agreed to share historical records on the Landis family and the Divine Body they have guarded for generations."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_006\".m_mContent: "Yet in the end, beyond confirming that the jewel in my earring may be linked to that Divine Body, we uncovered nothing of substance."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_007\".m_mContent: "It seems the path before us remains shrouded in darkness..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_008\".m_mContent: "Why is it pitch black on the way to the Captain's quarters?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_009\".m_mContent: "It must be Famine's followers. After their resurrection, they went rampaging through the ship—even the sconces weren't spared."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_010\".m_mContent: "Followers? They aren't just regular Blood Beasts?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_011\".m_mContent: "With half its power restored, Famine can already draw every Blood Beast aboard into its will resonance."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_012\".m_mContent: "If it becomes whole... the consequences will be devastating."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_013\".m_mContent: "So what would make it whole? Devouring that jellyfish? What makes her so special?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_014\".m_mContent: "Perhaps it has something to do with Miss Ami's unknown origins?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_015\".m_mContent: "Whatever the reason, we absolutely cannot allow her to be devoured... meow."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_016\".m_mContent: "You've shifted back to your beast form!! Don't go creeping around in the dark like that!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_017\".m_mContent: "Blending into the environment to protect myself is instinct."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_018\".m_mContent: "My apologies, I forgot the Empress fears the dark."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_019\".m_mContent: "Wait... your card can be used for fire!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_020\".m_mContent: "Just like the fate that awaits this Chariot, 'burning' is its final mission."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_023\".m_mContent: "I feel... weak. Lightheaded... like when I first boarded..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_024\".m_mContent: "Are we even going the right way? You're sure you saw that weird sailor lead people into the captain's quarters?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_025\".m_mContent: "I'm certain. That's why they're stationed here—to guard this place."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_026\".m_mContent: "Whoa... That walking suit of armor has joined the followers?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_027\".m_mContent: "Calamity-level Black Blood leaves mortals no choice. You'd better be careful, meow."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_029\".m_mContent: "I promised we wouldn't let Famine devour that girl. That was my agreement with the Captain, meow."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_032\".m_mContent: "She told me she received a strange birthday gift—a jewel, deep red and luminous..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_033\".m_mContent: "There's no doubt in my mind. No matter how many years pass, I'll never forget it. This is the other jewel I saw in my dream."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_034\".m_mContent: "Could our long-held dream finally be realized? I wanted to tell William the moment I saw it, to share in the joy. But..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_035\".m_mContent: "He barely acknowledged the news. Day after day, he continued meeting in secret with Inspector Jones."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_036\".m_mContent: "I'd heard his research had made a breakthrough, but in my obsession with the Landis jewel..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_037\".m_mContent: "I failed to see how much he'd changed. How much I had missed. I regret not asking sooner about his research, and why he kept it so carefully hidden from me, his Captain, his brother."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_038\".m_mContent: "When I followed him to the long-sealed lower deck... I understood at last."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_041\".m_mContent: "Now I understand why Jones so readily accepted when I volunteered to take over security for this voyage."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_042\".m_mContent: "A pity. He was a fine Captain. But in the end, his need to play the 'good brother' doomed him."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_043\".m_mContent: "It seems even my reading speed has become a liability."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_044\".m_mContent: "Blood Beasts have gathered in both the upper and lower corridors. Which way should I go...?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip12_045\".m_mContent: "I suppose I'll have to experience what it's like to be a murderer."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_001\".m_mContent: "October – For half a year now, I've lived with the knowledge that the demon could awaken any moment, and it was my own brother who stirred it from its sleep."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_002\".m_mContent: "Of course, I never intended to sit back and await my death. While I continued to search for traces of the Landis ruins in the open, in secret, I began searching for a man."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_003\".m_mContent: "Cain Lamboza. In the underground world, they whisper that his mastery of alchemy rivals that of Albrecht, the Bell Ringer. But more importantly..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_004\".m_mContent: "He's also an expert on Black Blood. Far beyond William in both knowledge and danger. He became my only hope against the nightmare that stalked my thoughts."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_005\".m_mContent: "I was prepared to offer both of the Divine Body jewels in exchange for a way to seal the demon."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_006\".m_mContent: "But unexpectedly, he showed greater interest in Ami."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_007\".m_mContent: "After I told him what little I knew about her, he gave me vital information without asking for another thing in return:"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_008\".m_mContent: "The demon I saw was likely Famine. One of the most terrifying Calamities ever classified by the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_009\".m_mContent: "And only the Divine Bodies, protected across the continent by the twelve families, can hold their ground against such apocalyptic threats."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_010\".m_mContent: "There was hope. The two gems Ami and I possessed are fruits of the Right Hand of the Divine Body once guarded by the Landis family."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_011\".m_mContent: "But the true Right Hand was the golden tree that upheld their island—the very pillar that gave name to the Pillars of Hercules."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_012\".m_mContent: "That tree has long since sunk beneath the sea. And two fruits alone are not enough to seal Famine."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_013\".m_mContent: "As despair took hold, I remembered the dream I had all those years ago..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_014\".m_mContent: "By embedding the two jewels into either side of the helm, one could sail anywhere—so long as they passed through the storm that churned like a vortex of time itself."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_015\".m_mContent: "To prevent William from growing suspicious—and awakening Famine before I was ready—I used exploration as a pretense to visit each family guarding a Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_016\".m_mContent: "I never told the crew the truth behind how we traveled through the storm. They simply believed that El Dorado was the fastest ship in the world."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_017\".m_mContent: "Only Ami, who lent me the jewel before each departure... I could never tell whether she was naive, for not once did she ask a question."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_018\".m_mContent: "I was prepared that each voyage might be both the dearest and the last of my life."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_019\".m_mContent: "The Eyes of the Divine Body once held by the Alita family vanished with their host, but I endured the vast frozen plains and wind that cut through bone."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_020\".m_mContent: "The Heart once kept by the Carrelle family was destroyed in a great fire, yet I stood among blooming fields in eternal spring."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_021\".m_mContent: "Next, we set course for the Howling Peninsula, where the Womb is guarded by the Ganelon family, and the Wings by the Bathorys."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_022\".m_mContent: "Strangely, as time passed, I found myself thinking less of whether the Divine Bodies remained, and more of what wonders might await us at the next shore."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_023\".m_mContent: "Behold! The howling tempest! The surging waves! A breathtaking vista, gifted to us by the sea itself!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_024\".m_mContent: "Look upon these carved windowpanes, this crest of the sirens—treasures left to us by our noble bloodline!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_025\".m_mContent: "What an honor it is... to have such a worthy audience bear witness to the glorious rebirth of our mistress—Ranna!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_026\".m_mContent: "Let him go! Ami, are you alright?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_027\".m_mContent: "No one shall interfere with our great mistress's rebirth."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_028\".m_mContent: "Hey, Jacintha, you're supposed to be strong! Why did you charge in first without saving that jellyfish?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_029\".m_mContent: "Ending Famine in its incomplete state wouldn't be difficult. But ensuring The Hermit's survival would be... Especially since she's already halfway merged..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_030\".m_mContent: "I had thought, since the Bathory and Ganelon families have severed ties with the Church, you'd understand our family's vision—and the true nature of this world."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_031\".m_mContent: "H-How do you know about us...?! Who even are you!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_032\".m_mContent: "If I'm not mistaken... He's a descendant of the Landis family. While Ami is the final heir of its true bloodline."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_033\".m_mContent: "Landis... That great family engulfed by the sea forty-four years ago? Even if they survived, weren't they meant to be Gravekeepers of the Divine Body? Then why...?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_034\".m_mContent: "The Gravekeepers... Instead of protecting the Divine Body, they're resurrecting the Calamity? What kind of madness is this?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_035\".m_mContent: "Hahahaha... You of all people should understand."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_036\".m_mContent: "When you struck down our mistress earlier, you used another Calamity's power, didn't you? You're no different—a fugitive who killed the Gravekeeper and ran."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_037\".m_mContent: "I... I didn't... That was... I'm not..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_038\".m_mContent: "And you, the loudmouthed Bloodborn! You're from the Bathory family, aren't you? You lot saw through the Church's lies and turned your backs on them long ago!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_039\".m_mContent: "That was before I was even 'born'! Why pin that on me!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_041\".m_mContent: "And you... that masked witch. Even cloaked as you are, you can't hide the stench of the Divine Body on you..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_042\".m_mContent: "You're not merely a Landis survivor... are you..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_043\".m_mContent: "Indeed. He is the descendant of countless Landis people."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_044\".m_mContent: "What's that supposed to mean? That's creepy... Are you saying he's not just one person?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_045\".m_mContent: "It's collective memory. When the Landis family sank beneath the sea, most perished. But they had already turned to Famine's Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_046\".m_mContent: "Through the resonance of Black Blood, their memories merged—and those memories now live on in survivors like him."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_047\".m_mContent: "It's Aeon's fault. That shameless false god who poisoned the world with her lies about order!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_048\".m_mContent: "We kept our vow. We guarded the Divine Body and offered our sacrifices. Yet year after year, our home kept sinking."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_049\".m_mContent: "It was Ranna—our great mistress—whose whispers led us to salvation! She showed us the truth: we could cut down the Divine Body and use its sacred wood to build a great vessel that would carry us to a new homeland!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_050\".m_mContent: "Sounds more like she preyed on your desperation and tricked you into destroying the Divine Body... just so she could escape."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_051\".m_mContent: "Your understanding is far too shallow. We won't waste time trying to bring you to our side."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_052\".m_mContent: "Let your foolish—but delectable—blood become our offering for Ranna's glorious rebirth!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_053\".m_mContent: "You've lost! And just your luck—we're not exactly short on heavy hitters today."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_054\".m_mContent: "Lady Empousa, parading around in borrowed plumes does little to impress."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_056\".m_mContent: "It's no use... Even if you kill us, we'll always remain with our mistress. And she will create new vessels to carry us forward."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_059\".m_mContent: "Landis... doesn't belong here anymore. Go back... return to where everyone is waiting."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_060\".m_mContent: "We know this must hurt you, Lady Ami... But soon..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_061\".m_mContent: "You'll return to Ranna's memory, and be reborn as the new, perfected Ancestors of Landis!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_063\".m_mContent: "Hey! No matter how you look at it, isn't Famine just using you? What exactly are you even following?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_064\".m_mContent: "I thought a family like Bathory—Apostates yourselves—would understand the truth behind the Moonblessed. But I see now... your blood only gets duller with each generation."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_065\".m_mContent: "Excuse me!? I know about the Moonblessed too, thank you very much!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_066\".m_mContent: "But I don't get it... She turned you into this. Even if you're with family now... is losing your sense of self really what you wanted?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_067\".m_mContent: "And more importantly—those whispers you followed back then... Did they save you in the end?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_068\".m_mContent: "Enough! Our ship was nearly complete! El Dorado was meant to be the final vessel! But that day..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_069\".m_mContent: "The Church sent that Bell Ringer. She destroyed our homeland and ships..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_070\".m_mContent: "Then the truth behind the sinking of the Landis family... was this?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_071\".m_mContent: "I've no more words for you. The ritual is one step from completion!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_072\".m_mContent: "And here I was, thinking if I let you talk long enough, I might hear something interesting."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_073\".m_mContent: "Where did you—Wait! The hidden tunnel from earlier!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_074\".m_mContent: "Van Helsing... you truly are brilliant—just the kind of mind we've longed to welcome. But it's far too late now. No one can stop the final step of the ritual!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_076\".m_mContent: "There is another way to stop Famine."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_078\".m_mContent: "I won't let you harm my mistress!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_079\".m_mContent: "And I won't let anyone harm Ami!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_080\".m_mContent: "Great Ranna, receive now the blood of your children—may your resurrection be complete!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_082\".m_mContent: "Have you lost it?! Are you really planning to kill Ami just to stop Famine!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_083\".m_mContent: "So this is the fabled Justice they say never wavers?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_084\".m_mContent: "No... It seems Mr. Van Helsing was never aiming at Miss Ami at all, but rather..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_085\".m_mContent: "Wait—was that the red jewel from that jellyfish's necklace?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_086\".m_mContent: "According to Goldland's journals, after the Landis family sank, two Divine Body jewels still remained in the world. This red gem... is one of them."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_087\".m_mContent: "If we can combine them in a certain way—as the journals described—we may be able to suppress Famine. And maybe... save Ami."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_088\".m_mContent: "Ami's still alive, right!? We can still save her!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_089\".m_mContent: "Well then, little Justice... After all that setup, do you even know where the other jewel is?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_090\".m_mContent: "The jewel... Wait! I think I do!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_091\".m_mContent: "Back in the warehouse with Ami—I saw Famine devour the Captain's body then spat something out!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_092\".m_mContent: "Wow! For a dumb wolf, you memory is impressive!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_093\".m_mContent: "Famine devours all things. But the very object meant to seal her... That's the one thing she can't digest."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_094\".m_mContent: "The fruit of the Divine Body. The second jewel must've fallen in the warehouse, right along silver-haired's path..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_096\".m_mContent: "So this is Famine’s true form... The Devil finally bares her teeth."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_098\".m_mContent: "I'm leaving this to you. I need to reach the deck."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_099\".m_mContent: "An arrangement's already been made. The final battle will take place there."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip13_100\".m_mContent: "At this rate, I'll never catch up... Looks like I'll have to fly there in my beast form!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_001\".m_mContent: "March – Time moves faster than I'd like. By this time next year, Ami will be twenty."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_002\".m_mContent: "After coming up empty in the Ganelon and Bathory Territories, it took us half a year more to locate the next possible site where a Divine Body might be sealed."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_003\".m_mContent: "A place absent from every known nautical chart: Sunset Isle."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_004\".m_mContent: "When no one was around, I asked Ami to join me at the helm to plot our course—just like we used to."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_005\".m_mContent: "As always, she didn't ask a thing. But for once, I asked her something. Would she like to go ashore… to simply walk around?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_006\".m_mContent: "It struck me that ever since we found her, I had never once let her step off this ship."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_007\".m_mContent: "At first, I kept her close under protection—a key to unlocking the mystery of the Landis legacy. And now… under surveillance, for she is one of the jewel holders."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_008\".m_mContent: "Just like with William, back then. I thought I was protecting him—shielding him behind me while chasing down my own obsessions."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_009\".m_mContent: "But when I finally turned around, I saw how far we'd drifted. I hadn't protected him at all. I'd only been trying to protect my idea of him."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_010\".m_mContent: "It wasn't William who changed... I had been wrong the entire time."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_011\".m_mContent: "Even now—knowing what he's done, knowing what he's become... I've spent this entire year lacking the courage to face him."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_012\".m_mContent: "I wonder… does Ami see me as a selfish Captain? A poor excuse for family?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_013\".m_mContent: "She didn't answer. Instead, she asked for a pen. She sat quietly at the bow and began sketching every crew member—face by face, name by name."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_014\".m_mContent: "I never knew she could draw like that. I watched her work from sunset to starlight."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_015\".m_mContent: "That night… was the first time in a year that the nightmares left me alone."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_016\".m_mContent: "Ranna of the Famine... A name I knew only from history. The nightmare whispered of by countless souls."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_017\".m_mContent: "Even from here, I can feel the overwhelming pressure... So this is what it means to face a Calamity..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_018\".m_mContent: "You won't let me through? Then I take it you fear what I carry—a fruit of the Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_019\".m_mContent: "How tragic. That's the difference between you and us. You bar the path of what you fear, while I pursue what I revere."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_020\".m_mContent: "You may bring thousands to their knees again and again... But so long as adventurers still draw breath, there'll always be one who rises to meet you."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_021\".m_mContent: "Out of my way—I'm not here for you! It's your master I'm after!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_022\".m_mContent: "As expected from a Calamity's servant… their regeneration is relentless."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_023\".m_mContent: "We're out of ammunition… and they just keep coming. There's no time left to hesitate."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_024\".m_mContent: "Do I use the metamorphosis again? I was saving it for Famine."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_025\".m_mContent: "The physical toll is too great. No one's ever survived using it twice in one day."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_026\".m_mContent: "Now I understand why they call it by its other name. Whether I use it or not... death waits on both sides."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_027\".m_mContent: "But if there's no other choice... Then you'll be my final measure."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_028\".m_mContent: "Your final moment is still a long way off."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_029\".m_mContent: "You're not the only one with a 'final measure.'"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_031\".m_mContent: "Who're you looking down on? I was hunting Heretics for the Silver Cross before you were even born... (coughing)"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_032\".m_mContent: "This isn't the time to play the veteran. These wounds… should've killed anyone three times over."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_033\".m_mContent: "That monster tearing up our home... It's the same one that's haunted the Captain for over a year, isn't it?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_034\".m_mContent: "It's trying to rip the ship apart and drag us all into the sea…?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_035\".m_mContent: "Save your strength for that wretch! I'll clear a path for you."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_036\".m_mContent: "I know El Dorado won't last long under its claws. Just like I know I'll never conquer the sea."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_037\".m_mContent: "Every plank on this ship is fragile. Every soul aboard is ordinary."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_038\".m_mContent: "But when planks come together, they become a ship. When people come together, we become..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_040\".m_mContent: "Bob's weapons are too old. Even with the metamorphosis, they'll only stagger Famine's minions, not stop them..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_041\".m_mContent: "What are you waiting for? Your job isn't to fight them off! It's to break through and face the big one!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_042\".m_mContent: "That's it! I don't need to destroy these tentacles. I just need to strike while they flinch!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_043\".m_mContent: "Compared to Bob, I still have a long way to go."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_044\".m_mContent: "Stop wasting time reflecting and move! I'm almost out of ammunition!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_045\".m_mContent: "Bob, the courage you've loaded into this ship… I'll carry it."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_046\".m_mContent: "How cruel of you. You've gone and reminded me what it felt like to be young. To be like you."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_047\".m_mContent: "But you're not the only one keeping secrets. I never told you about my final measure either."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_048\".m_mContent: "These old hands can't use the metamorphosis anymore... But they still remember what it means to fire one last shot."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_049\".m_mContent: "I've grown too old… too old to love any crew or ship but this one."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip14_050\".m_mContent: "So come, Captain... Let's share a drink—just like we used to."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_001\".m_mContent: "December 1353 – I finally found Sunset Isle. But it was no ordinary island. It was a resting place of memories."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_002\".m_mContent: "I had a premonition: this was no place mortals were meant to tread. Another followed—it told me this was a voyage I should abandon entirely."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_003\".m_mContent: "And yet, I set the course anyway, using the two jewels. When placed on opposite sides of the helm, they pull toward one another—and the storm will come."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_004\".m_mContent: "And when we pass through that storm—even if something happens to me, even if the ship is lost—we will reach Sunset Isle."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_005\".m_mContent: "Because I must face it. I must face the final consequences of the choices I made. And I must face William—truly face him."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_006\".m_mContent: "I've played out countless versions of that confrontation in my mind. But there is only one ending. Because I know him too well."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_007\".m_mContent: "Even so, though the destination cannot be changed, and though the ending is already written. I still feel unease."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_009\".m_mContent: "The first went to the Silver Cross, where Bob once served. I couldn't rely on Jones for this voyage—I needed someone impartial. Someone new."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_010\".m_mContent: "I want William to receive a fair trial. The punishment he deserves. For he sold his soul to demons."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_011\".m_mContent: "And yet... I want him to live—because he is still my family."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_012\".m_mContent: "The second letter went to the alchemist Cain Lamboza. He aided my search for the Divine Bodies time and time again, yet asked for nothing in return."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_013\".m_mContent: "I know he has long taken interest in the El Dorado—and in my adventures aboard her."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_014\".m_mContent: "He has both the power and the reason to protect this ship. And if I'm wrong... at the very least, he will preserve my story."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_015\".m_mContent: "The third letter I sent to elder Bella Slade of Bathory Castle. The Puppet Association has long been my trusted partner, and the Bathorys—like the Landis—are a reclusive family."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_016\".m_mContent: "If both I and this ship were to vanish, that would be the safest place for Ami to begin a new life. A life of true freedom."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_017\".m_mContent: "But Bella recommended another—Jacintha Dalcarlo, undisputedly the strongest of the Bathory Elders."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_018\".m_mContent: "At last, I no longer need to worry about endangering Ami—the Hermit I was meant to protect."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_019\".m_mContent: "She's... she's so strong! Even stronger than Uncle Gadric!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_020\".m_mContent: "So Jacintha, you were here to protect that jellyfish from the start—because of a deal!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_021\".m_mContent: "Bella made the deal with Goldland. I simply benefited from it. But as for the kitten..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_022\".m_mContent: "What I truly desire? I won't trade for it. I'll steal it."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_023\".m_mContent: "Ah... So all those cat burglar sightings in the castle were..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_024\".m_mContent: "Even if you're really cool and strong... stealing's still wrong!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_025\".m_mContent: "What else do you want from this ship? Gems? That golden statue? The helm?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_026\".m_mContent: "...This isn't the time to talk about that."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_028\".m_mContent: "That voice... It sounds like Miss Ami, but how...?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_029\".m_mContent: "The Landis ritual has completed. Famine has devoured Ami—and now it's whole."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_030\".m_mContent: "N-No wonder it suddenly got bigger than the whole ship... So it wasn't even using half its power when it fought me earlier!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_031\".m_mContent: "What are we supposed to do now?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_032\".m_mContent: "That little Justice seems to have found a way. Until then, I suppose I'll lend a hand."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_034\".m_mContent: "We did it! With Jacintha on our side, maybe Famine really can be defeated!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_035\".m_mContent: "Don't celebrate yet. The complete form of the Moonblessed Famine… is the legendary Thousand-Mouthed Calamity."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_036\".m_mContent: "What!? So that was just one tongue—there are still over nine hundred more!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_037\".m_mContent: "No need to panic. Legends tend to exaggerate. Take Sheila, another Moonblessed you're familiar with—they call her the Thousand-Winged Calamity."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_038\".m_mContent: "Ah... so if I master Sheila's power... I'll grow a thousand wings and become super strong too!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_039\".m_mContent: "...No. That's not the takeaway. I meant—don't believe every legend you hear. Who would even need that many wings?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_040\".m_mContent: "Sounds of battle... coming from the upper deck."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_041\".m_mContent: "Of course! That lifeless eyes said he'd meet Noah on deck! They must be fighting Famine right now!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_042\".m_mContent: "Noah! We haven't seen him in so long... Is he really up there? I hope he's okay..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_043\".m_mContent: "What are you worried about?! It's Noah! No danger's going to bring him down."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_044\".m_mContent: "Indeed. I can't even imagine what Noah would look like in a panic."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_045\".m_mContent: "Whether it's our dependable little Fool, or Justice, who seems to have foreseen all of this..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_046\".m_mContent: "They've already taken the main stage. So? Are we just going to stand around here?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_049\".m_mContent: "At this rate... I won't have the strength left to face Famine."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip15_050\".m_mContent: "Still not here... Silver-haired, we need you..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_002\".m_mContent: "But the Captain said we don't feel hunger in dreams... So where am I...?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_003\".m_mContent: "This is our shared homeland. The place that's been waiting for your return."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_004\".m_mContent: "You're... the enemy who fought Hati. The one who devoured everyone. The one who's been hiding on our ship from the very start. But... you're also..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_005\".m_mContent: "Yes. As long as you're here, you'll remember everything. All that the Landis people saw, heard, and felt lives on within my memories."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_006\".m_mContent: "I am the first of the Landis line. Ranna Landis."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_007\".m_mContent: "So I'm... of Landis. And you're... an Ancestor?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_008\".m_mContent: "It's alright if you can't believe it yet. Here, you'll have all the time in the world to understand..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_009\".m_mContent: "I believe you. You're Landis's Ancestor. After all, we both love to eat."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_010\".m_mContent: "That alone may prove you're truly Ranna's descendant. Such calm, such clarity."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_011\".m_mContent: "Now that you know our blood is the same... Become one with me. Let us return to our original form."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_013\".m_mContent: "Very good... worthy of being my child... Hm? What did you say? You refuse? But you've learned of your lineage—this is your destiny!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_014\".m_mContent: "Why should you devour me... when I could devour you?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_015\".m_mContent: "Hahahahahaha! Never have I met a descendant so bold. You'd dare speak to me this way? How amusing."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_017\".m_mContent: "Lady Ranna was one of the original thirteen Moonblessed. The source of the twelve great families across the continent."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_018\".m_mContent: "And yet the Church... The Church has lied to us for generations. They sealed away our Ancestors using those cursed Divine Bodies, twisting our true gods into monsters."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_020\".m_mContent: "Of course you don't! None of us did at first! The Church feared the power of the Ancestors—so they named them Calamities. They made us turn our blades against our own kind."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_021\".m_mContent: "I don't understand. If there were thirteen Moonblessed, why are there only twelve great families?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_022\".m_mContent: "Eh? That's your question...? Well, that's, uh..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_023\".m_mContent: "No need to explain all that. Ami's still young—barely fifty. She's only just met you all. No wonder she can't accept what you're saying."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_024\".m_mContent: "I've known Jack for a long time. I know he wouldn't lie."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_026\".m_mContent: "Apparently, I'm the only one on this ship who remembers his name. That seemed strange, so I started digging."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_027\".m_mContent: "I found the Captain's diary. And after a few conversations with Jack... I confirmed it all."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_028\".m_mContent: "So I've known about everything you mentioned for quite some time."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_029\".m_mContent: "You knew all along?! Why didn't you act? Why didn't you try to change anything?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_030\".m_mContent: "What good are all these memories if they can't even fill your stomach?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_032\".m_mContent: "Told you. I did say it would upset your stomach."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_033\".m_mContent: "One of my tongues... severed!? Are those worthless rats on this ship trying to resist?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_034\".m_mContent: "Let us raise more Vassals, my Lady. We'll drown this ship in your blood and silence every last defiant soul!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_035\".m_mContent: "There's no need. I have Ami and now that I've reclaimed the final drop of Landis blood, nothing can stand in my way."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_036\".m_mContent: "Return to me. Become my strength. Let me shatter this prison-ship that has caged me for a hundred years!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_037\".m_mContent: "As life returns to the sea, so shall we return to your blood, master."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_038\".m_mContent: "Only you remain... Come, Ami. Return to your true homeland."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_039\".m_mContent: "Why do you hesitate? Everyone you know is gone. The world you lived in is a fabrication of Aeon's false order. You have nothing left on that side."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_040\".m_mContent: "Just like Landis sinking beneath the waves, you'll descend into the lightless deep. Alone. Sinking... endlessly... deeper..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_042\".m_mContent: "It wasn't a dream. It wasn't someone else's memory. It was my own."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_043\".m_mContent: "So I've always been alone. I am nothing. I have nothing..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_044\".m_mContent: "But that was all before you met us."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_045\".m_mContent: "Oh! I think we've found something! Although it looks like..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_048\".m_mContent: "As punishment for reading my diary, you'll be restricted to only two afternoon tea sessions per day for the next three days!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_050\".m_mContent: "Even if you fall into the sea again, someone will be there to pull you out. Don't forget—you've got a whole ship full of sailors behind you."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_051\".m_mContent: "That's true... The Captain does make everyone take turns on watch. No one's allowed to rest."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_052\".m_mContent: "That's right, you're surrounded by a crew that may not be the brightest, or the most articulate..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_053\".m_mContent: "Or the toughest... But we'll always be the ones standing between you and danger."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_054\".m_mContent: "Marlow, Joseph... If only I'd finished the food in the kitchen faster... maybe you wouldn't have—"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_055\".m_mContent: "Huh? Why am I here too? Am I supposed to say something?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_057\".m_mContent: "No... this isn't right! I didn't summon these creatures—where did they come from?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_058\".m_mContent: "They're not in my memories... They're not of my bloodline!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_059\".m_mContent: "They came from my memories. They're my family."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_060\".m_mContent: "Impossible... You shouldn't be capable of this—constructing memory worlds is a power only the oldest Moonblessed once possessed..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_061\".m_mContent: "You're just a mortal! How dare mortals trespass into the domain of a Scourge..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_063\".m_mContent: "They are the crew of the El Dorado—the bravest adventurers of all."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_064\".m_mContent: "I'm not a mortal either, I am..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_065\".m_mContent: "The next Captain of the El Dorado!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_066\".m_mContent: "Hey now—wait just a minute. Thats just your fantasy. I never agreed to—"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_067\".m_mContent: "Ami... I'm disappointed. You defy me... and mock me!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_069\".m_mContent: "No one ever taught you, did they? The louder you roar, the more it betrays your fear. Then again... who do you even have to talk to?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_070\".m_mContent: "What's the matter? Suddenly stopped attacking? You look like you're in pain... Did I hit a nerve?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_071\".m_mContent: "Ami won't be devoured so easily. She must be fighting inside Famine."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_072\".m_mContent: "Then wasting the time she bought us would be a grave sin. Especially for a latecomer like you, Silver-haired."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_073\".m_mContent: "The sea winds were so strong, I almost lost my way for good."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_074\".m_mContent: "And yet you still brought the one thing that mattered most."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_075\".m_mContent: "So you've figured out how to use the two jewels?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_076\".m_mContent: "I've read through nearly half of Goldland's journals. I'm not stopping here."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_078\".m_mContent: "I'll devour you all! The ship, the sea—everything!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_080\".m_mContent: "There! I see Ami! She's trapped... in the abdomen!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_081\".m_mContent: "Then I'm ready. Everything hinges on this moment."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_082\".m_mContent: "That golden helm... it reeks of Divine Body... What are you planning!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_083\".m_mContent: "She noticed it! the Divine Body that had sealed her away is now emanating power!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_084\".m_mContent: "Crimson to the north, azure to the south..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_086\".m_mContent: "Turn the golden wheel, follow where my heart leads..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_087\".m_mContent: "So this helm was the ring from the Divine Body's right hand...?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_088\".m_mContent: "And these two gems... the fruits in its grasp. Back off, Silver-haired!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_091\".m_mContent: "Ami! There's still time! Merge with me! If we're sealed away, we'll vanish together!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_092\".m_mContent: "You can devour me, take my strength! As long as the Landis bloodline survives, I'll become your power!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_094\".m_mContent: "You—what!? To think a fool like you is the last of the Landis line... You'll die too!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_095\".m_mContent: "I don't care what blood runs in me. What I do know—Is that before any of that, I was part of the El Dorado's crew."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_096\".m_mContent: "And I'm not afraid of dying. Because everyone's already waiting on the other side."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_097\".m_mContent: "Fools! Absolute fools! Then you'll all die with me!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_099\".m_mContent: "Where's Ami? Is she still in there?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_100\".m_mContent: "Did you defeat Ranna? She looked... different."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_101\".m_mContent: "This pressure… it's not just bloodlust. She's trying to take us all down with her."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_102\".m_mContent: "What… How does she still have this much power!?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_103\".m_mContent: "Anyone who can fly or shift forms, leave now! Everyone else, get ready to jump. The sea might be our only hope!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_104\".m_mContent: "Where's Ami? What's going to happen to her?!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_105\".m_mContent: "Wait—where's Noah?! I don't see him anywhere!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_106\".m_mContent: "There's no time to worry about anyone else!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_107\".m_mContent: "Empousa… You must survive. We all must survive."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_110\".m_mContent: "So close… I nearly defeated the Calamity… and this is where it ends?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_111\".m_mContent: "Oh? Everyone's already here... Did I arrive at a bad time?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_113\".m_mContent: "Ah! You're that child I saw in the kitchen!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_114\".m_mContent: "No! They've found me... there's no helping it now..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_115\".m_mContent: "What about that silver-haired one and the maid who almost caught me? I can't hear their heartbeats on the ship anymore..."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_116\".m_mContent: "Could they have... jumped into the sea together?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_117\".m_mContent: "I don't care who you are, whelp! I'm not in the mood for your nonsense!"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_118\".m_mContent: "She's not just any whelp. She might be our last hope."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_121\".m_mContent: "You're the one who wrecked my barrel back in the kitchen! Looking at you now, all beaten and bloated with rage… I can't even stay mad."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_122\".m_mContent: "But since you're about to blow, how about I help you cool off?"

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_123\".m_mContent: "The hymns of the temple, a requiem for the departed."

\"Dialogue_B_70001_Clip16_126\".m_mContent: "She's one of the Church's Bell Ringers. No. X: Acappella."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_01\".m_mContent: "O revered Aeon, though I have long departed from the lands under your protection, I still believe..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "...That in your infinite mercy, you can still hear my voice and answer my humble prayers..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_04\".m_mContent: "May our path forward be bathed in the Light, unhindered by the shadow."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_05\".m_mContent: "May the mortals of both shores be freed from sorrow, no longer divided by the veil of life and death."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "May Noah find the true path home, no longer ensnared by the web of false memories."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_08a\".m_mContent: "Finally, may we both... survive to see our paths cross once more."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_09\".m_mContent: "I will wait for you, always... Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_12\".m_mContent: "The sun... I can feel it's setting light, yet I feel no pain... Am I still in the dream?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_13\".m_mContent: "This coast feels oddly familiar... Is it just my imagination? I can't shake the feeling that I've been here before."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_15\".m_mContent: "Ah, that's right... to save Ami from Famine, I grabbed her and dove into the sea..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_16\".m_mContent: "Did the waves wash me ashore? And Ami... could she be nearby?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_17\".m_mContent: "I wonder what happened to Empousa and the others on the ship... Hm?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_18\".m_mContent: "...Empousa? It couldn't be. Such a bestial transformation would surely offend her sense of aesthetics."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_20\".m_mContent: "Seems I was right. They all bear markings on their bodies—some kind of symbol."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_21\".m_mContent: "Hmm, this symbol of a sea monster looks almost exactly like the emblem of the El Dorado."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip01_22\".m_mContent: "As I recall, Goldland's notes also mentioned that they would mark their Blood Beast experiments."
