\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_73\".m_mContent: "That concern doesn't seem to extend to me."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_74\".m_mContent: "Come on, we've been at this for 66 years now. Stop talking nonsense and let's focus on finding him first—"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_76\".m_mContent: "What the hell are these things?! They're not ghosts, they're not Blood Beasts—they won't die, and more keep showing up!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_77\".m_mContent: "Legend has it that the Divine Body on Sunset Isle creates phantoms of the deceased, blurring the boundary between life and death. These seem to be those phantoms."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_78\".m_mContent: "Oh, come on! We were just following Aiona's advice to meet in the village. How did we end up in this mess?!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_79\".m_mContent: "Hey, quit slacking off! I've already taken out three of these things!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_80\".m_mContent: "This isn't a contest! Besides, you can't even kill them!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_82\".m_mContent: "—A loud sound is coming from the easternmost part of the island."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_83\".m_mContent: "Acappella's voice? Where are you?! Why did you run off and abandon us here?!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_84\".m_mContent: "—There are four noisy people, accompanied by some eerie whispers of Death's minions."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_86\".m_mContent: "Four noisy people... I wonder, am I included in that count?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_87\".m_mContent: "—Indeed. It seems they've been trapped by Death's minions. What incompetence."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_88\".m_mContent: "Cut it out, you brat! If you're here, show yourself already!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_89\".m_mContent: "It's pointless. She's likely far away from here."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_91\".m_mContent: "Acappella was born with hearing far beyond those of normal humans."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_92\".m_mContent: "After inheriting the 'Air Manipulation' ability from the 10th Bell Ringer, she became even more adept at controlling the air to enhance her sound abilities."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_93\".m_mContent: "'Air manipulation'? So that's what that move on the ship was... I've got to say, that was seriously impressive."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_94\".m_mContent: "—Hahahaha! This is something you mortals could never master in your pathetic lifetimes. You might as well bow down and worship me!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_95\".m_mContent: "Ugh, this brat! She can clearly hear us, but only listens when it's about her!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_96\".m_mContent: "Acappella! I don't expect you to come help us, but could you at least tell us how to beat these minions?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_97\".m_mContent: "—Absolutely not. Why would I help you? You've got a bunch of heretics with you."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_98\".m_mContent: "You little brat! Just wait till I find out where you are—I'll fly over and teach you a lesson."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_99\".m_mContent: "—Just ignore them. Let's focus on tracking down the one with silver hair."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_100\".m_mContent: "Did she say silver hair?! So she's looking for Noah too?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_101\".m_mContent: "Lady Acappella... did you just imply Noah's presence on this island as well?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_102\".m_mContent: "—Hmm, you've got a point, Darcias. If we help out this Van-whatever kid, Albrecht will owe me another one."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_104\".m_mContent: "And this has nothing to do with Master Albrecht. Stop trying to use me to get to him all the time!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_105\".m_mContent: "—Listen up, I'll only say this once: those minions are all smoke and mirrors. They're actually very weak..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_106\".m_mContent: "—Their weak point is located just above the center of their chest. Target that spot and strike!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_107\".m_mContent: "Why didn't you tell us in the first place."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_108\".m_mContent: "Albrecht's dim-witted disciple should be able to put two and two together by now. I've dropped enough hints, after all."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_109\".m_mContent: "Are we sure about this? We're helping Isaac again, even though he's running with the Bloodborn now."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_110\".m_mContent: "And he's probably here to investigate Piera too."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_111\".m_mContent: "I'll admit, those Bloodborn with him have piqued my curiosity, but dealing with them isn't part of my current mission."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_112\".m_mContent: "But there's one thing I'm absolutely sure of: when it comes to Piera, he's definitely on our side."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_114\".m_mContent: "Wait, I found him. There's a very constant heartbeat in the forest to the southwest."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_116\".m_mContent: "I recognize his heartbeat from the ship, it's him... but..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_117\".m_mContent: "'—You said the village was at the base of the mountain... so why haven't we arrived yet... are we going in circles?'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_118\".m_mContent: "He seems to be talking to someone, but he's the only one there."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_119\".m_mContent: "Could it be... a 'shade' of an old friend?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_120\".m_mContent: "It's a phenomenon that transcends the boundary between life and death, allowing the living to commune with memories of the departed who take the form of shades."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_122\".m_mContent: "Rumors from beyond the island, as well as the islanders themselves, claim that these shades formed from memories of longing are a blessing from the Divine Body upon Sunset Isle."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_123\".m_mContent: "Yet, the truth is far more somber. They are but 'restless spirits,' forever caught in the turbulent struggle between Death and the Divine Body, unable to find peace."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_125\".m_mContent: "Just as I am now—a lingering memory. It's been so long, Darcias, Acappella."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip13_126\".m_mContent: "T-Tris? But... you died in battle 66 years ago!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_01\".m_mContent: "People are made up of their 'thoughts' and 'longings.'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_02\".m_mContent: "Thoughts come from oneself while longings involve others."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_03\".m_mContent: "All 'thoughts' eventually die, becoming 'longings' that rely on other 'thoughts.'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_04\".m_mContent: "The Bloodborn, who proclaim themselves immortal, embody this truth; as do the Bell Ringers who have transcended the shackles of time."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_05\".m_mContent: "Our methods are no different than those of the Bloodborn. We preserve the self, 'thoughts,' through the ceaseless transference of memories into new vessels."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_06\".m_mContent: "—A prison called 'divinity,' wrought from an insatiable obsession with 'immortality.'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_07\".m_mContent: "You, in contrast, perpetuate the longing's 'self' by passing it to your progeny."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_08\".m_mContent: "And that is the indomitable courage of 'humanity,' something unique only to you."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_09\".m_mContent: "Death stands as the ultimate testament to your defiance against fate. I hope you will remember this always."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_11\".m_mContent: "Piera! It's you! You're little Piera, right? Hahaha!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_12\".m_mContent: "Um... I think you might have me confused with someone else. My name is Piera, but... the Piera you know... is probably my grandmother?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_13\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! Oh no, we know exactly who you are, little Piera. You're you, and your grandmother is your grandmother!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_14\".m_mContent: "But... but I don't remember ever meeting you... Are you all... phantoms?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_15\".m_mContent: "I hate to admit it, but you're right. We've left this world long ago, hahaha!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_16\".m_mContent: "You're also right about not being able to see the longing of people who don't exist in your memories."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_17\".m_mContent: "But if that's true... how am I able to see all of you?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_18\".m_mContent: "Because we're all Gravekeepers, every one of us!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_19\".m_mContent: "Eh? You're all Gravekeepers...? Then all of you are from the Paracelsus family?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_20\".m_mContent: "That's right, we're all family! Even though we lived in different eras of history."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_21\".m_mContent: "The Gravekeepers are our family's heroes, chosen by the Divine Body to battle against the Calamity across generations. And what's passed down isn't just knowledge and power..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_22\".m_mContent: "It's also our shared memory of fighting against Death, coursing through our blood."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_23\".m_mContent: "That's why when you enter these blessed grounds, we can all connect through our shared memories."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_24\".m_mContent: "So that means... you're all... my ancestors?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_25\".m_mContent: "Haha! That's right, I'm your grandmother's grandfather!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_27\".m_mContent: "Eh? But you look much younger than the elderly gentleman... Ah... sorry."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_29\".m_mContent: "Little Piera, it's wonderful to see you all grown up. You look just like your grandmother at that age."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_30\".m_mContent: "I'm so glad... I made the right decision to come back here... I'm so glad I'm not alone anymore... We can definitely succeed!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_31\".m_mContent: "So Piera, what brings you back here this time? Don't tell me you just came to see me?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_32\".m_mContent: "Great ancestors... please hear me out. Death, who was sealed away 66 years ago by my grandmother and the Church, has broken free and returned."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_33\".m_mContent: "Grandmother... once told me that Death left behind its most precious possession on this island..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_35\".m_mContent: "Well... Grandmother didn't say... but she did say that if Death ever escaped, it would definitely..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_37\".m_mContent: "I see. That wasn't very helpful of her, leaving out part of the story like that."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_38\".m_mContent: "...But she was right. Death has truly returned, and... it will indeed come back to the blessed grounds where it was once sealed."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_39\".m_mContent: "So that's why you braved the perils to come here alone, carrying such a heavy burden."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_40\".m_mContent: "...Yes, great ancestors. Since so many of our family are here... together, we can..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_41\".m_mContent: "We can fulfill the shared wish of countless generations of Gravekeepers. Death... we can..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_42\".m_mContent: "You must leave now, little Piera. You can't go any deeper."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_44\".m_mContent: "That's right, this place was never meant for a child like you in the first place."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_45\".m_mContent: "B-But... everyone was just saying... I'm not a child anymore! I'm the last Gravekeeper of the Paracelsuses!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_47\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! Then if we kill you, there won't be any pesky Gravekeepers left to threaten Lord Death's revival?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_48\".m_mContent: "What? But you're my ancestors! You're not Gravekeepers—you've become Death's pawns!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_49\".m_mContent: "Naive child, there's so much you've yet to understand."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_50\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! We are indeed your ancestors, and we were once Gravekeepers. However..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_52\".m_mContent: "We were going to spare you, as one of the family, but you know too much..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_53\".m_mContent: "And what's truly infuriating... is your tone. Urging us to fight Death, to abandon our current existence..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_54\".m_mContent: "You're the spitting image of that self-righteous Piera. Just looking at you is..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_56\".m_mContent: "How... How is this possible... The Gravekeepers... my ancestors became pawns of Death?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_57\".m_mContent: "How do you think we could stand before you when we should have perished long ago?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_59\".m_mContent: "Why do you think this island is the only place in the world with these phantoms?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_61\".m_mContent: "No, not one Gravekeeper on this island has ever laid eyes upon the true form of the Divine Body. It was Death, long portrayed as our enemy, who was actually—"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_63\".m_mContent: "No... this can't be right. You must have been deceived by Death... How... How could this be??"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_68\".m_mContent: "...Master, even though you never allowed me to use the things inside..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_69\".m_mContent: "...Acappella, even though you warned me not to open it before you returned..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_70\".m_mContent: "...Noah, even though I haven't had the chance to tell you what's inside..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_71\".m_mContent: "Noah... our agreed-upon gesture... was it also fated?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_77\".m_mContent: "I've learned a lot from the Church... from my master. But he's never told me what I should believe."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_78\".m_mContent: "I am Piera's granddaughter, I am the Paracelsus Gravekeeper. I will defeat Death. I have never wavered..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_80\".m_mContent: "What's that commotion... Piera, that fool! She broke our agreement! Though I was also..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_81\".m_mContent: "Ah, what burden must a girl bear to willingly sacrifice her life and tap into the uncontrollable power of the Covenant?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_82\".m_mContent: "Commander! She's... my friend! How can you speak of this so lightly..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_83\".m_mContent: "Acappella, as my successor, you're far too naive. For a Bell Ringer, having 'humanity' is a fatal flaw."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_84\".m_mContent: "You expect me to... just do nothing? To let her march off to her death alone...?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_85\".m_mContent: "...I should be used to it by now... having no one by my side..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_86\".m_mContent: "I can face this alone... I already made up my mind long ago... If only I hadn't met him and the others today..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_87\".m_mContent: "But my ancestors who lost their way... have given me clarity..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_88\".m_mContent: "...Fear and hesitation are behind me now... Goodbye, Master, Acappella, Grandmother, and ...Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip14_90\".m_mContent: "It's coming from the village! Did something happen there?!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_01\".m_mContent: "The 'blessed grounds'... a forbidden place I'd only heard of in scary stories..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_02\".m_mContent: "This statue... it's beautiful, but also so... full of sorrow..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_03\".m_mContent: "Behind it... stands the sun that never sets; yet its eyes... are forever fixed upon the 'darkness' sealed within the coffin."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_04\".m_mContent: "And now I gaze at the same place as you, and what lies within... could it be Death, returning home?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_05\".m_mContent: "But why... why is my mind filled with... fear, despair, and uncertainty... of death... of being alone... of my duty..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_06\".m_mContent: "My noble ancestors, the Gravekeepers of old... what torments did they endure over all those years..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_07\".m_mContent: "Only to finally choose to follow Death? If even they could never succeed..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_10\".m_mContent: "I... was born bearing both duty and curse, yet under the protection of the Church... under Grandmother's care, under Master's guidance..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_11\".m_mContent: "Twenty years of living a normal life... that's enough... I should be content with that."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_12\".m_mContent: "If Death hadn't escaped from the Church, I would have almost... fallen into a life that was never meant to be mine..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_13\".m_mContent: "A Gravekeeper is born to guard the abyss... and they must know... how to find their way in the darkness..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_14\".m_mContent: "Noah... I'd glad to have met you in my final moments..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_15\".m_mContent: "But... I'm also... a bit angry at you. I was ready to say farewell..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_16\".m_mContent: "But then you came along and gave me a new curiosity for this world... and new hope for this life as Piera."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_17\".m_mContent: "Grandmother... what was the Other Side like... the world you used to tell me about?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_18\".m_mContent: "Will I also remain on Sunset Isle... as someone's 'longing'?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_19\".m_mContent: "I won't, right? This ritual will erase Death along with this island... from this world!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_20\".m_mContent: "The blood before us is guidance left by our ancestors..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_21\".m_mContent: "The shadow behind us is determination to protect our descendants..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_22\".m_mContent: "It's time to end this... end this curse that has shackled us for generations..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_23\".m_mContent: "...In the name of Paracelsus... I offer my life for the legacy..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_25\".m_mContent: "H-How could this be... is it you?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_29\".m_mContent: "Have you forgotten everything I taught you, you foolish girl!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_31\".m_mContent: "Do you understand what you're doing? This forbidden ritual requires a 'living sacrifice.'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_32\".m_mContent: "I know... but I'm the family's last Gravekeeper. This is the duty you entrusted to me, Grandmother. I have to..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_33\".m_mContent: "Foolish child... you don't... understand at all..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_35\".m_mContent: "How could anyone in this world wish for their grandchild to sacrifice their life for a duty they themselves had fled from?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_37\".m_mContent: "When I was just a girl even younger than you, I had already witnessed too many loved ones become sacrifices to seal Death away. And what did it achieve?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_38\".m_mContent: "Death remains an inescapable nightmare looming over our homeland."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_39\".m_mContent: "Compared to our short, mortal lives, Death is truly 'eternal.'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_41\".m_mContent: "We stand no chance... Life cannot triumph over Death."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_42\".m_mContent: "So that's why those former inhabitants of Sunset Isle became Death's followers... and turned into those monsters."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_44\".m_mContent: "Spending one's whole life fighting something, sacrificing everything... All their effort, just to become part of the enemy."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_45\".m_mContent: "How ironic... Something our family only realized after generations of struggle, so casually stated by an 'outsider.'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_46\".m_mContent: "Noah is right, from the moment we're born, death is inevitable. No matter how we struggle, we cannot change this."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_48\".m_mContent: "It's because of Death's power that this island has these 'phantoms of longing,' allowing us to converse like this..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_49\".m_mContent: "Ironic indeed... Death took your lives, yet granted you this 'eternity' in return."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_50\".m_mContent: "That's precisely why more and more members of the Paracelsus family have come to believe that Death is our true god."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_52\".m_mContent: "No... no! Grandmother, you once told me... this isn't... isn't how we should 'live'!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_53\".m_mContent: "My Piera... though you've grown up, you're still my brightest, most dependable granddaughter... and the one most like me..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_54\".m_mContent: "Although I couldn't refute our family's views, I absolutely refuse to accept such methods! And so I contacted the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_55\".m_mContent: "Grandmother... so that's why we went to live with the Church..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_56\".m_mContent: "Though I don't know why, the Church has always wanted the Divine Body to be watched by different families, so I gave up my duty as Gravekeeper..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_57\".m_mContent: "Exchanging the Calamity and Divine Body to the Church for the safety of the family?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_58\".m_mContent: "No... that can't be! The grandmother in my memories would never be... be someone who would choose to give up..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_59\".m_mContent: "At that time... more and more family members began to convert to Death's faith. The Divine Body no longer responded to us, and no one even knew where on the island it was."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_61\".m_mContent: "I don't think your judgment was wrong. Without outside intervention, Death's dominion over Sunset Isle would likely have been even worse."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_62\".m_mContent: "Thank you for understanding... Noah, I remember 66 years ago, you were the only one who understood my decision..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_63\".m_mContent: "What...? So the reason you can see Grandmother is because... you were here 66 years ago?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_64\".m_mContent: "Yes, though I remember his appearance was somewhat different back then, I can recognize that insufferable way of talking anywhere."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_66\".m_mContent: "Is Death in there? Has he returned...? Is he... awakening?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_67\".m_mContent: "Very likely. As I recall... 66 years ago, on the day the Calamity of Death broke out, I witnessed a similar sight!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_69\".m_mContent: "Don't be afraid, I'm here with you. We'll face this together, so throw away that relic 'salt stake'... Did that bastard Albrecht give it to you?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_70\".m_mContent: "Grandmother... you knew Master Albrecht? You two sound close."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_71\".m_mContent: "I entrusted you to him, only for him to teach you this forbidden ritual! And even more infuriating..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_72\".m_mContent: "He gave you the salt stake that I had sealed away... if you really became a sacrifice, he'd be Death's accomplice!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_73\".m_mContent: "I hate to interrupt this touching reunion, but I'm afraid we need to pause for a moment."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_74\".m_mContent: "Their leader looks just like Death's true form!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_75\".m_mContent: "But he must have just returned to this island. While he's weakened, it's our chance to send him back to the 'abyss.' But protecting Piera takes priority!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_76\".m_mContent: "Please don't worry about me... I want to be... the Piera that can fight by your side!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_79\".m_mContent: "It seems we managed to defeat Death before he could recover his power."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_81\".m_mContent: "It's all thanks to you, Piera. I didn't know you could use Covenant... I've only seen the Church's elite use it before."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_82\".m_mContent: "Piera! Are you alright?! Are you hurt anywhere?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_83\".m_mContent: "No... I'm fine... It's just... I haven't mastered the Covenant yet.. my body is a bit..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_84\".m_mContent: "Those 'salt-transformed' minions of Death we saw on the way... you defeated them using what was in this coffin, didn't you?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_86\".m_mContent: "Because the salt stakes in the coffin were originally researched by Albrecht and I."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_87\".m_mContent: "So he chose me because you two worked together..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_88\".m_mContent: "I knew he couldn't be trusted! Curse that heartless man!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_90\".m_mContent: "The salt stake was a weapon I researched to fight against the Calamities. After I joined the Church, Albrecht, the world's most renowned alchemist, approached me because of them."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_91\".m_mContent: "He said he could modify my salt stake to serve as a medium that would allow ordinary people to master the Covenant, unleashing the true power of this 'perfect form.'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_92\".m_mContent: "At the time, I still held onto my determination to destroy Death with my own hands, so I agreed. But little did I know..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_93\".m_mContent: "Covenant is a way of borrowing power from their 'gods' by consuming one's life force. While Bell Ringers might be unaffected, for ordinary people..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_94\".m_mContent: "It shortens their lifespan... Is that why Piera became so weakened after using it twice?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_95\".m_mContent: "That bastard Albrecht... how could he be so heartless towards you!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_96\".m_mContent: "No, Grandmother... it's not like that... you've misunderstood him..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_97\".m_mContent: "Master... he only told me stories about you... Coming back to the island and stealing the 'salt coffin'... those were my decisions..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_98\".m_mContent: "You... why are you still defending him! He's a Bell Ringer! How could he not know what you were doing right under his nose!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_99\".m_mContent: "By not stopping you, he was putting you in danger!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_100\".m_mContent: "It may not be my place to say this, but I believe Piera's master wanted her to choose her own path in life."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_102\".m_mContent: "You're wrong! You don't know anything about that madman! His eyes see nothing but his work and evolution!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_103\".m_mContent: "Piera told me that her master would always tell her stories about her grandmother... about you..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_104\".m_mContent: "Piera, what kind of person was your grandmother, according to your master?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_105\".m_mContent: "In his eyes, Grandmother was... smart, brave, and bold... He always spoke well of her, but there was one thing that would always make him sad..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_106\".m_mContent: "That bastard is capable of feeling sadness? Hmph!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_107\".m_mContent: "Yes... He said grandmother was always putting on a courageous smile, but deep down she was full of regret."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_108\".m_mContent: "R-Regret? That Albrecht was always spouting nonsense!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_109\".m_mContent: "...He said grandmother regretted betraying the family's heritage; regretted running away from her duty."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_110\".m_mContent: "I... What would he know about me!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_111\".m_mContent: "Though I haven't known Piera long, I can sense her confusion. She fears death, fears Blood Beasts, and even fears animals..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_112\".m_mContent: "Yet she came back on her own, because she admires you—you who bear the family's honor as the Gravekeeper."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_114\".m_mContent: "She wants your approval; she wants to inherit your title; she wants to complete the duty you left unfinished, even if it means facing everything she fears."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_115\".m_mContent: "She may be more timid than most, but your existence and her master's support have given her courage far beyond ordinary people."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_116\".m_mContent: "...I'm... not as amazing as Noah says... but I... I did make this decision on my own..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_117\".m_mContent: "I know that... if I hadn't met Noah, I probably would have died soon after arriving on the island..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_118\".m_mContent: "I could die from using Covenant... die from Blood Beasts... die from being consumed by nightmares. Once we're born... death is always looming... isn't it?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_119\".m_mContent: "So... I think... what matters isn't how I'll die, but how I've 'lived.'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_121\".m_mContent: "Grandmother, you are... our family's proud 'past,' so when duty calls..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_122\".m_mContent: "I didn't hesitate at all... I just want to become... the 'future' that would make you proud."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_123\".m_mContent: "What are you saying... you've been my pride and joy since the day you were born."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_124\".m_mContent: "But after I arrived here... and I saw the sun that never sets... I felt afraid... Not because of having to face it alone..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_125\".m_mContent: "But afraid that... when I'm gone, no one will grieve for me... no one will remember me..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_126\".m_mContent: "Am I being too presumptuous... I haven't done anything for everyone... yet I hope they'll feel 'longing' for me."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_128\".m_mContent: "I told you this when we first met. This is proof that we're companions who will support each other and face things together."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_129\".m_mContent: "Thank you, Noah... It makes me happy. If I hadn't found the courage to come back, I would never have met you, nor seen Grandmother again..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_130\".m_mContent: "Nor been able to defeat Death together."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_131\".m_mContent: "Perhaps your mentor wanted to show you through their own actions what your predecessors may have proven: that life cannot truly overcome Death..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_132\".m_mContent: "But you can also prove to them: as long as your heart beats and your blood flows, you have the power to choose how to 'live.'"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_133\".m_mContent: "My my... It seems my granddaughter is even luckier than I am, meeting a better Noah in a better era during better times."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_135\".m_mContent: "It seems the 'longing' between us has also fulfilled its purpose."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_136\".m_mContent: "But grandmother... you haven't seen me grow up yet!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_137\".m_mContent: "My Piera... you've already grown so much."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_138\".m_mContent: "Are you... no longer attached to this place?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_139\".m_mContent: "I spent the first half of my life on this island, and I've seen my share of 'longing'..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_140\".m_mContent: "So this is what it feels like to fade away... There's no pain... but I still can't help feeling attached."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_141\".m_mContent: "You know, for a moment there I thought you might be a 'longing'... How embarrassing of me..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_142\".m_mContent: "If possible, I hope you can stay by Piera's side from now on. More than me, her 'future' needs you."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_143\".m_mContent: "...If Dr. Ressa hadn't taken you in 66 years ago, I wonder what different paths our lives would have taken?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_144\".m_mContent: "Wait... Ressa took me in? So I wasn't originally from this island?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_145\".m_mContent: "Of course, don't you remember? The name 'Nevernight' was given to you after we found you on Sunset Isle..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_146\".m_mContent: "What... did you say!? I came here 66 years ago? Just who am I?!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_147\".m_mContent: "Didn't you just say those inspiring words to Piera? What matters is your shared future, not your past... Your past is—!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip15_151\".m_mContent: "What was Grandmother trying to tell me?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_07\".m_mContent: "Damn it... I was distracted... didn't notice them... It's all my fault."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_09\".m_mContent: "Don't talk. Save your strength. I'm going to heal you..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_10\".m_mContent: "Think, damn it! I know how to do this!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_12\".m_mContent: "Just hold on! I'm trying to remember! I have to stop the bleeding somehow!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_13\".m_mContent: "No... not that... I mean... hurry... and go..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_14\".m_mContent: "The servants of Death can't hurt me. I'm getting you down this mountain! You're going to be okay!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_19\".m_mContent: "The ritual... you only... interrupted it... but... only the last step remains..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_20\".m_mContent: "The last step? Wait, you mean sacrificing a 'Gravekeeper'?!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_21\".m_mContent: "When I... die... the ritual... will... complete... The entire island will be..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_22\".m_mContent: "While I can... still hold on... run Noah... the further... the better..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_23\".m_mContent: "I won't leave you behind, no matter what happens."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_24\".m_mContent: "Please... I can't control it... for long... *cough*"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_26\".m_mContent: "I... used the salt crystals... stopped the bleeding... I can still... still hold out a bit longer..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_27\".m_mContent: "In that coffin... is Grandmother's research... and the remains of my people..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_28\".m_mContent: "My master... transmuted them into... the 'perfect form'... There's no way to destroy it..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_29\".m_mContent: "It's my fault... I can only... rely on the power of my ancestors *cough*"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_30\".m_mContent: "In the end... I just caused more trouble... for you... for everyone..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_33\".m_mContent: "The Spirit Bone Tower... it's the perfect form made from the blood and bones of my people... It's indestructible..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_34\".m_mContent: "But... as one of the Paracelsus bloodline... I will become its weakness!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_35\".m_mContent: "I finally understand... Someone as weak and pathetic as me... being born into this family... this must be my destiny."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_36\".m_mContent: "Don't ever say that. You're not weak. You're stronger than anyone I know."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_37\".m_mContent: "Noah... I'm really happy to have met you..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_38\".m_mContent: "But in the end... I'm not the one who can accompany you on the journey ahead..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_40\".m_mContent: "If only... I had told you everything from the beginning... maybe things could have turned out differently... *cough*"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_41\".m_mContent: "Why... Ever since I set foot on these 'blessed grounds,' the pain and anger inside feel like they're about to pour out..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_42\".m_mContent: "This isn't who I am! And you, Piera... this can't be your destiny!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_43\".m_mContent: "I'll get you out of there! I'll take you away from this place!"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_45\".m_mContent: "I... I feel myself slipping... The ritual is... almost done..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_48\".m_mContent: "You have to live on... Carry my 'longing' with you, and see the world beyond this island."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_51\".m_mContent: "Didn't you promise me we'd meet back at the village no matter what?"

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_52\".m_mContent: "Geez, I've been waiting all this time..."

\"Dialogue_B_80001_Clip16_53\".m_mContent: "Yeah... Sorry to keep you waiting, Ressa..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_002\".m_mContent: "O revered Aeon, though I have long departed from the lands under your protection, I still believe..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_003\".m_mContent: "...That in your infinite mercy, you can still hear my voice and answer my humble prayers..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_004\".m_mContent: "May our path forward be bathed in the light, unhindered by shadow. May both sides..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_006\".m_mContent: "Sorry... Did I interrupt your—what's it called—prayer?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_007\".m_mContent: "You didn't interrupt anything. I'd just finished."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_008\".m_mContent: "What's wrong, Leonard? Have you been crying?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_009\".m_mContent: "… I wanted to pick flowers for Mother to make her happy, but… I kept walking and walking… and ended up all alone..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_010\".m_mContent: "So you got separated from your mother again."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_011\".m_mContent: "Is it because I'm a bad child… that Mother and Father don't want me anymore?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_012\".m_mContent: "That's not true at all. Leonard is a very good boy who just got a little lost."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_013\".m_mContent: "Your parents must be so worried. Come, I'll help you find them."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_014\".m_mContent: "Do you know where Mother and Father are?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_015\".m_mContent: "Hmm... Ah! They're searching for you at the Painter's Bluff."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_016\".m_mContent: "Wow! You're amazing! You can see all the way up the cliff from down here!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_017\".m_mContent: "Hmph! Don't forget, I'm the all-knowing Dr. Ressa."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_018\".m_mContent: "Oh right! Everyone in the village talks about you—and Mother and Father always praise you too!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_019\".m_mContent: "Oh? What do they say about me?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_020\".m_mContent: "They say that Dr. Ressa can handle anything... except medicine!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_021\".m_mContent: "…So the one thing I want to be good at is the one thing I'm not. It's not as simple as I thought…"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_022\".m_mContent: "If I want to be a real doctor here, I've still got a lot to learn."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_024\".m_mContent: "Yes, we shouldn't keep your parents waiting. Shall we head to Painter's Bluff?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_026\".m_mContent: "Not so fast, Leonard! You'll get lost again if you run off alone."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_027\".m_mContent: "No way! This is the Mourning Hollow, I know this place!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_028\".m_mContent: "Oh? Tell me—do you know why it's called the the Mourning Hollow?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_030\".m_mContent: "Because this is where longing lingers... before it continues the passage to its final rest."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_031\".m_mContent: "Each longing sheds a tear before it goes—and over time, those tears formed this pool."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_032\".m_mContent: "Oh, I know what longing is! The grown-ups say when someone dies on the island, they become longing and stay with us."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_033\".m_mContent: "What do you mean by 'continuing the passage'?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_034\".m_mContent: "It means being guided to the place where they're meant to go."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_035\".m_mContent: "Guide them? Where to? Wouldn't it be better if they stayed with us?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_036\".m_mContent: "This world lives by the law of balance. What do you think would happen to our island if there was only life, and no death?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_038\".m_mContent: "What a clever boy. Even when longing continues its passage, it doesn't vanish—it remains with us."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_039\".m_mContent: "They return to us through their longing, and we hold them close through ours."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_040\".m_mContent: "I don't really get it, but… it sounds sad. Can't we just not send them away? "Balance" sounds mean!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_041\".m_mContent: "Yes… I once thought the same. That's why I came to this island to study medicine."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_042\".m_mContent: "I want to understand the truth of life and death, so that one day, I might stand against 'balance' itself."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_043\".m_mContent: "What's wrong? Why do you sound so serious?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_044\".m_mContent: "Because if we defy balance... we'll face those who enforce it. Like these—"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_046\".m_mContent: "Father said we have to run if we see one, or they'll eat us!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_047\".m_mContent: "Don't be afraid. Close your eyes and stay behind me."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_049\".m_mContent: "…There. You can open your eyes now—it's over."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_050\".m_mContent: "Wow! You scared them off just like that! Ressa, you're amazing!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_051\".m_mContent: "I'm all grown up now, but when I was your age, I wasn't half as brave as you are."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip01_052\".m_mContent: "When I grow up, will I be as strong as you?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_001\".m_mContent: "I feel like I've walked this path so many times before, but I can't remember... How strange."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_002\".m_mContent: "When I first came here three years ago, I got lost quite a few times too."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_003\".m_mContent: "Even you? That makes me feel better."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_004\".m_mContent: "Mother and Father always say I'm silly... Sometimes I get scared they won't want me anymore."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_005\".m_mContent: "Dr. Ressa? What are you doing here?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_007\".m_mContent: "Ahem! It's Piera! a name worthy of the Gravekeepers."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_008\".m_mContent: "You've finally inherited the role? My congratulations, Piera."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_009\".m_mContent: "Thank you... but that doesn't answer my question. You left without a word. As your escort, I should have noticed."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_010\".m_mContent: "I-I'm sorry! Please don't blame Ressa—I got lost, and she's helping me find my parents."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_011\".m_mContent: "I see... Wait… You're Leonard? And you're searching for your family?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_013\".m_mContent: "Ressa! Look! Mother's favorite flowers are growing over there! Can I go pick some?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_014\".m_mContent: "Go ahead. But stay where I can see you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_015\".m_mContent: "Don't tell him about his parents. He's not ready."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_016\".m_mContent: "But if we keep him in the dark, won't it become dangerous over time?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_017\".m_mContent: "With me here, there's nothing to worry about."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_018\".m_mContent: "You're right. Of all the warriors I've seen, none fight better than you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_022\".m_mContent: "Is it my imagination? Lately, the dreamfeeders seem more restless than before."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_023\".m_mContent: "It's not your imagination. There's too many longings left behind... and not enough to guide it."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_025\".m_mContent: "I've only just become Gravekeeper. Couldn't this have waited for the next in line?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_027\".m_mContent: "Stay back. You're safe there. Let us handle this."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_028\".m_mContent: "We've made it to Painter's Bluff. Thankfully, no more dreamfeeders crossed our path."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_030\".m_mContent: "It's alright. Let's wait a little while. They'll come… I promise."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_031\".m_mContent: "But I really wanted to give Mother the flowers…"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_032\".m_mContent: "Dr. Ressa, Piera? What brings you here?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_033\".m_mContent: "Because I knew if we wished to find you, this would be the place."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_037\".m_mContent: "Someone who couldn't bear to see your sorrow entrusted me with a task: To bring you these flowers."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_038\".m_mContent: "These flowers... I once loved them dearly. But Leonard... he fell from here, trying to pick one for me."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_039\".m_mContent: "We're grateful for the gesture, truly. But we cannot accept this gift."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_040\".m_mContent: "There was a time we returned to Painter's Bluff each year, hoping to feel Leonard's longing... But grief held us captive."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_041\".m_mContent: "Now, at long last, we've chosen to release that grief. To look ahead."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_043\".m_mContent: "They cannot see Leonard because they've severed their longing?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_044\".m_mContent: "Then congratulations are in order. Leonard would be glad."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_045\".m_mContent: "Thank you, Ressa. And to whoever sent the flower—please give them our thanks as well."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_047\".m_mContent: "Ressa... they really don't want me anymore, do they?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_049\".m_mContent: "As I told you before, they haven't forgotten. They're simply moving forward while still carrying their longing for you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_050\".m_mContent: "I understand! I won't cry. If Mother and Father knew I'd left tears in the Mourning Hollow... it would only bring them more pain."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_052\".m_mContent: "Thank you, Ressa... For staying with me—until I finally found them."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_053\".m_mContent: "I wonder if the ritual went well... It's rare to see Ressa this serious."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_054\".m_mContent: "You mean Dr. Ressa! Though you're right... even Piera looks troubled."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_055\".m_mContent: "This is getting serious. Should we sneak a peek?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_056\".m_mContent: "Re- I mean Dr. Ressa! Have you completed the ritual?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_057\".m_mContent: "Why all the sneaking? Don't tell me you two were trying to spy on the ritual?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_060\".m_mContent: "Good. Because ordinary folk who meddle in the passage rites might find themselves stalked by spirits... Ones that never let go..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_061\".m_mContent: "Don't frighten them, Piera. The guards already have enough to bear."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_062\".m_mContent: "Oh—Doctor Ressa! That flower you were carrying earlier… was it from a secret admirer?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip02_067\".m_mContent: "Return... Return home... Return to where it all began..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_002\".m_mContent: "Did that couple truly let go of Leonard?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_003\".m_mContent: "They claimed they would move on... but their eyes were hollow."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_004\".m_mContent: "Not drawn toward life, but consumed by death's eternity..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_005\".m_mContent: "It's exactly how my people looked... Just before my home fell."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_006\".m_mContent: "I must visit them as soon as possible..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_008\".m_mContent: "Jason? You're hurt. Let me tend to you first."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_009\".m_mContent: "It's nothing. I tripped while running. Piera and Sora are in danger! Please go to the blessed grounds now!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_010\".m_mContent: "Black mist rising from the blessed grounds... just like it did in my homeland..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_011\".m_mContent: "Should I warn the others? Tell everyone to stay away?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_012\".m_mContent: "Don't push yourself, your wounds are worse than you think."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_013\".m_mContent: "I'll notify them right away! Dr. Ressa, please take care of Piera and Sora!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_014\".m_mContent: "...There's no time to waste, I must get to Piera!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_016\".m_mContent: "This is bad. Could things really be heading in the direction I feared they would?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_017\".m_mContent: "The dreamfeeders were here long before us. After we arrived, they began to feed on the longing that appeared now and then."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_018\".m_mContent: "They were the island's Defenders—keepers of balance."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_019\".m_mContent: "But now... they've turned on us. Which can only mean... The balance has already shattered."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_021\".m_mContent: "But between this island—formed from a Divine Body—and the Death sealed within it."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip03_022\".m_mContent: "If that's true... Then we may be standing at the brink of another catastrophic crisis..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_001\".m_mContent: "Damn it... I didn't think they'd be so relentless!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_003\".m_mContent: "Don't be foolish. I'm not leaving you behind!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_004\".m_mContent: "Just a little longer. Jason's gone to fetch Ressa. She'll come. She will!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_005\".m_mContent: "They... they were human just moments ago. How did they turn into this..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_009\".m_mContent: "Piera, stay with Sora. Do not let those things get close."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_011\".m_mContent: "This isn't the time for heroics. They can't be killed by ordinary methods—and if even a drop of Black Blood enters your wounds, there's no saving you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_013\".m_mContent: "There are many of them... but their Black Blood can't harm me. Wait... You are—"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_014\".m_mContent: "Is this what you meant yesterday? When you said you'd move forward?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_015\".m_mContent: "Life and death, right and wrong, past and future... Who decides what any of it means?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_016\".m_mContent: "When we lost Leonard, we believed death marked the end. But if it lets us be with those we love... Isn't death also a kind of rebirth?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_017\".m_mContent: "Do you truly believe this is what Leonard would have wanted? You've been deceived—by death itself!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_018\".m_mContent: "Deceived? Then perhaps life and death were never truths to begin with—just a grand illusion reversed."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_019\".m_mContent: "Born upon this island to serve a mission. Born into this world to die for faith. Is that truly what's right?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_020\".m_mContent: "What if we—the so-called guardians of the Divine Body—were never chosen? What if we were merely vessels… And longing was the only thing that was truly ours?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_021\".m_mContent: "We don't want a world without Leonard..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_023\".m_mContent: "My love... it seems... I'll reunite with our son first..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_024\".m_mContent: "He'll be so happy. You were the first person he saw when he was born."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_025\".m_mContent: "It took him so long to call me "Father"..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_029\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, Leonard... If only I'd seen through it sooner..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_031\".m_mContent: "A dreamfeeder... but I've never seen one this massive before."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_032\".m_mContent: "Wait—how can a dreamfeeder devour living people?! Wouldn't that be a people-feeder?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_033\".m_mContent: "Names... are given by humans. But what if everything we've ever named—we've misunderstood?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_034\".m_mContent: "This thing doesn't devour longing... It devours everything touched by Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_036\".m_mContent: "Because maybe longing was never about clinging to life... Maybe it was always a bond... with death."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_037\".m_mContent: "Then that means... The longing on this island didn't come from the imagination of the Divine Body's Skull..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_038\".m_mContent: "No. It may be a privilege—bestowed by the death sealed beneath this island. A parting gift... to those who die here."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_039\".m_mContent: "No—no, that can't be... Why would Death—a Calamity no less—help us reunite with the dead?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_040\".m_mContent: "Just as we name things to make sense of them... Maybe life and death are only names, too. I thought I understood."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_041\".m_mContent: "What kind of revelation did Leonard's parents receive? And from whom?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_042\".m_mContent: "But I'm certain now. You are the enemy of longing, therefore you are our enemy!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_045\".m_mContent: "Why are you so surprised? This isn't the first time you've seen her fight."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_046\".m_mContent: "No, it's not that... Dr. Ressa just destroyed everything, including the Phantom of Aeon..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_047\".m_mContent: "We can just get someone to fix it later!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_048\".m_mContent: "But... did someone just walk out of the Phantom of Aeon?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip04_049\".m_mContent: "No way?! Did the goddess just... give birth?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_002\".m_mContent: "Sage, chamomile, and thyme... hmm, if it's something to calm the mind, we'll need mint as well."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_003\".m_mContent: "Sora's share is ready. Now I need rosemary and hops for Eustace."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_004\".m_mContent: "When I first found you, you couldn't even speak. Now you know how to gather herbs and how much to use in each dose."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_006\".m_mContent: "I don't believe it. It took me ages to learn how to identify herbs and memorize recipes."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_007\".m_mContent: "And you still get them wrong all the time."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_008\".m_mContent: "Well, well, look who's learned how to tease people now."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_010\".m_mContent: "I can't even stay mad at you anymore... Noah!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_011\".m_mContent: "I can manage this myself. Or do you still suspect I'll bring harm to the island?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_012\".m_mContent: "At first, yes—I was wary of your past. But after all this time, I've come to trust you. You're not a bad person. And..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_014\".m_mContent: "...you and I are the only outsiders here. Shouldn't we support each other?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_015\".m_mContent: "Support each other, hmm? Then why have I ended up with all the chores and potion work?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_016\".m_mContent: "Because I'm protecting you in return—especially since you can't fight. And with the crisis looming, that's no small task."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_017\".m_mContent: "The crisis... you mean the Black Blood?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_018\".m_mContent: "Yes. The Black Blood disease spreads through blood contact. Those it infects soon lose their minds, becoming little more than beasts."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_019\".m_mContent: "The island's small, with scattered homes. That's why it hasn't gone out of control like it did in my homeland."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_020\".m_mContent: "But it's already been three months. We need to find herbs—and formulas—fast, to suppress both the symptoms and the spread."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_022\".m_mContent: "One day... I will find the way."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_023\".m_mContent: "Do we really need to wait for "one day"? I remember reading something in the medical book you kept—there was a method written clearly inside."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_024\".m_mContent: "That method is absolutely out of the question!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_025\".m_mContent: "Is it really that hard? All you need to do is drink the crimson blood of others to dilute the Black Blood inside you..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_026\".m_mContent: "Don't suggest something that vile without an expression."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_027\".m_mContent: "Do you understand what it means to drink someone else's blood? Sacrificing others to save ourselves. That is never the path we should take."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_028\".m_mContent: "Noah, remember this well: Resorting to that method would pull you into a darkness deeper than the Black Blood itself."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_029\".m_mContent: "Ressa... Do you remember why you left your homeland to come here?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_030\".m_mContent: "To defy death. To find a way to eradicate the Black Blood entirely."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_031\".m_mContent: "Whether you mean death as a natural end—or the Calamity sealed on this island—neither can be undone by sheer will alone."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_032\".m_mContent: "I know. Of course I know. I've lived on Sunset Isle for over three years... and I've made no progress."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_033\".m_mContent: "But the balance of life and death is a law nurtured over countless ages. Three years is nothing against that."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_034\".m_mContent: "I understand. But in just three months, more than ten villagers have already shown symptoms."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_035\".m_mContent: "Are you using time to pressure me?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_037\".m_mContent: "You know your past, you know your purpose. You even take pride in your principles."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_038\".m_mContent: "I don't remember who I was, or what I want to do. All I have is the name "Noah." Nothing else."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_039\".m_mContent: "You were Noah before, and you're still Noah now—working beside me to heal this island. You'll take pride in that one day. Isn't that enough?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_040\".m_mContent: "Ah—wait! You think a single name isn't enough. You want a last name, too?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_041\".m_mContent: "Then from now on, your name will be... Noah Nevernight."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_042\".m_mContent: "Like the island itself—bathed in twilight, yet never engulfed by darkness."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_043\".m_mContent: ""Never engulfed by darkness." You're still warning me... not to use that method. But..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_044\".m_mContent: "Noah Nevernight... I do love this name. I promise you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_046\".m_mContent: "As long as you remain Noah Nevernight, as long as you live on, as long as you remember this place..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_047\".m_mContent: "This will always be the home you can return to."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_051\".m_mContent: "That scared the life out of me... I thought I was done for..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_052\".m_mContent: "Jason, why did you come here alone? I told you to stay and watch over Sora."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_053\".m_mContent: "That's why I came to find you..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_054\".m_mContent: "Sora... Sora's becoming less and less human!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_056\".m_mContent: "These recipes still can't hold back the Black Blood..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_057\".m_mContent: "Does Piera know? We haven't seen her for days."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_058\".m_mContent: "She asked me not to tell anyone, but... she left the island days ago."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_059\".m_mContent: "His body's begun to mutate... We can't hold out like this. I must leave the island and find help."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_060\".m_mContent: "Leave the island? Since our ancestors settled here, no one's ever left Sunset Isle."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_061\".m_mContent: "There is a way! Just as Dr. Ressa once reached this place."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_062\".m_mContent: "But only the Paracelsus main family knows the method. I'm sorry for keeping it from you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_063\".m_mContent: "Forget that! Who are you even going to find? Who else can save us!?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_064\".m_mContent: "The Church. I'm going to the Church!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip05_066\".m_mContent: "So it exists... even beyond this island?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_001\".m_mContent: "Dr. Ressa... about Sora... You should prepare yourselves."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_002\".m_mContent: "What kind of doctor would I be if I couldn't even face my patient?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_003\".m_mContent: "Re... ssa... you came... to see me..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_005\".m_mContent: "As long as I'm here, I won't let you leave this world in regret."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_010\".m_mContent: "You should leave. He's terrified he might harm you in this state."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_011\".m_mContent: "Shut your trap! No one asked for your opinion!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_012\".m_mContent: "If it weren't for you, Sora—he would never have turned out like this!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_013\".m_mContent: "Calm down, Jason. Noah happened to be at the blessed grounds—he's not the cause of the Black Blood outbreak."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_014\".m_mContent: "Then who can I blame?! Myself? For being useless?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_015\".m_mContent: "The dreamfeeders are reacting more violently to the Black Blood..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_019\".m_mContent: "There are too many of them... I can handle the fight—but not while protecting you both!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_020\".m_mContent: "Sora... You're not giving up like this, are you? Losing to that Noah..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_022\".m_mContent: "He's restrained—for now. Should we help Ressa?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_023\".m_mContent: "Sora? What are you trying to tell me?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_027\".m_mContent: "(Cough) You said... you didn't want to... harm anyone..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_028\".m_mContent: "What kind of... fri...end... am I... if I can't even help you... in the end..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_031\".m_mContent: "I'll stay with him. You... go help... Ressa..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_032\".m_mContent: "Why are they suddenly moving in one direction?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_034\".m_mContent: "No, that direction... it's the blessed grounds."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_035\".m_mContent: "The black fog rising there is far thicker than it was three months ago. Could it be... That Death is awakening?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_036\".m_mContent: "Wow... so this is what it's like inside Sunset Isle?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_037\".m_mContent: "Just like the legends say—darkness outside, yet dusk lingers within."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_039\".m_mContent: "Darcias, take her back to the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_040\".m_mContent: "Wait—no! I finally get to come out with you! Please let me stay, just this once!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_042\".m_mContent: "The Divine Body on this island has inexplicably ceased its response—this may be connected to the awakening of "Death" noted in the reports."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_043\".m_mContent: "No wonder the air reeks of Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_044\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, Commander! I'm much stronger now! Besides, my power might actually help you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_045\".m_mContent: "What a troublesome child... Very well. But do not stray from my sight."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_047\".m_mContent: "But where's the Gravekeeper who summoned us? Without her to guide us, how are we supposed to find where Death is sealed?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_048\".m_mContent: "We came swiftly by soundwave resonance. She, on the other hand, had to return by sea. It'll take her some time."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_049\".m_mContent: "She mentioned the east... or was it west?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_050\".m_mContent: "ARGHHH—! I should have pressed her for clearer directions back then!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_051\".m_mContent: "No need to worry. I have a way. Covenant."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_053\".m_mContent: "To shape seven voices into a chorus of battle—only our Commander could do that!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_055\".m_mContent: "Acappella's musical gift is beyond question. In time, she'll succeed me..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip06_056\".m_mContent: "And take my place as Bell Ringer No. X."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_002\".m_mContent: "These are the longings I've sent to the blessed grounds over the past three months. Why are they still lingering..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_003\".m_mContent: "Indeed, I recall you saying that means helping longings with their final departure from this world, sending them to the Other Side, where they belong."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_004\".m_mContent: "Are they trapped here because the awakening of "Death" has blocked the passage?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_006\".m_mContent: "Leonard? Haven't I led you through the passage already?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_007\".m_mContent: "Yes! After I bid you farewell, I reached a place of warmth and light. But someone bade me not go further and to return to this side…"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_010\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, I... don't remember anything like that."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_011\".m_mContent: "That's right! He stopped everyone, saying bad people would feed on us if we went further."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_012\".m_mContent: "Feed on you... Do you mean the dreamfeeder?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_013\".m_mContent: "He said it was an even bigger and more powerful enemy!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_017\".m_mContent: "Now that Noah has returned, can he guide us to the Other Side?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_018\".m_mContent: "Your hands... they are truly warm, Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_020\".m_mContent: "Ressa, thank you! You found my parents and brought back Noah to guide us."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_022\".m_mContent: "So Leonard has reached the Other Side? Noah, you really…"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_023\".m_mContent: "What's happening? I think I saw this child's memories."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_024\".m_mContent: "Plucking wildflowers by the cliff for his mother, listening to tales spun by his father… And whenever he lost his way, Ressa, you would guide him back to the Painter's Bluff."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_025\".m_mContent: "Usually, longings take the Phantom of Aeon's hand to go through the passage. But just now, it was your hand that Leonard took, as he crossed to the Other Side..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_026\".m_mContent: "That's why you emerged from the Phantom of Aeon, Noah... because all along, you were the guide—"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_027\".m_mContent: "Yes, he is the one who leads us to the Other Side."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_028\".m_mContent: "Yes, he is Death—the god who delivers us from separation and sorrow."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_030\".m_mContent: "So youthful and gentle in form, yet known by a fearful name."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_031\".m_mContent: "Even so, Death shouldn't be the one that sends longings to the Other Side..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_032\".m_mContent: "We doubted it at first too. But you saw it—Leonard reached his final destination with his guidance."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_033\".m_mContent: "As I said before, death is not what I once believed—not an end, but the dawn of a new beginning."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_034\".m_mContent: "It is the Divine Body, the protector, who leads longings across to the Other Side."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_035\".m_mContent: "We always believed that "Death," as a Calamity, devoured longings, dragging them into oblivion."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_036\".m_mContent: "If what you're saying is true, then we've had it all wrong from the start?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_037\".m_mContent: "Just as my wife said, we who guarded the Divine Body were but vessels, beings trapped in deception."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_038\".m_mContent: "At least for us who were fed upon by dreamfeeders, we felt the cruel truth—how these minions of the Divine Body tried to make us their prey."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_039\".m_mContent: "Yet this young man known as Death defied the god to protect us, slowly losing his strength until he became what he is now."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_040\".m_mContent: "Please guide us to the Other Side, to be reunited with Leonard… You are our true god."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_041\".m_mContent: "Leonard, your mother and I have come back..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_042\".m_mContent: "I am Death... their passage to the Other Side."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_043\".m_mContent: "Noah… when did it...? No—You've been our true enemy all along."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_044\".m_mContent: "Forgive our past ignorance and betrayal. You are the Ancestor, our true god."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_045\".m_mContent: "Noah, incarnation of Death, please bring us to our beloved ones and back to the home that is rightfully ours."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_046\".m_mContent: "Be it here, the Other Side, or anywhere beyond—so long as you remain with your longings, that place is home."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_047\".m_mContent: "Innocent children, your journey ends here. Return home—"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_052\".m_mContent: "Yet I remain uncertain about who you are..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_054\".m_mContent: "Things were different back then… Anyway, I've got a few scores of my own to settle with them."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_055\".m_mContent: "Leonard, his parents, and the others have safely crossed to the Other Side, where new lives now await them."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_056\".m_mContent: "Indeed, I can no longer sense their echoes."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_057\".m_mContent: "Thanks to you, those intruders in white couldn't interfere. I knew I could trust you, Ressa."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_058\".m_mContent: "But now I'm not quite sure who you really are."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_059\".m_mContent: "You are "Death" itself, sealed upon this island, yet known to the longings as the god who guides them to the Other Side..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_060\".m_mContent: "You always do this—shattering everything I've come to believe in over these three years on the island."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_061\".m_mContent: "If "Death" is not the enemy of life... then who is?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_062\".m_mContent: "If there was never an enemy... then did the eternity I crossed to the Other Side for ever truly exist?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_063\".m_mContent: "For eternity... So this is why you left the Church of your own accord?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_064\".m_mContent: "I was wondering why the dreamfeeders grew so restless. A Bell Ringer has arrived on this island… Tris Tepes. That explains it."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_065\".m_mContent: "I wondered as well—how anyone on this remote island could have bested my choristers."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_066\".m_mContent: "Even through these years of silence, you remain the indomitable clergy, Ressa Ambolia."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_067\".m_mContent: "Yet your words just now reveal a grave sin. The Church upholds the order of time, and still, you leave the Church in search of eternity..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_068\".m_mContent: "By this, you have cast doubt upon Aeon's eternity and betrayed the sacred truth of the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_069\".m_mContent: "Is it heresy to seek one's own path rather than blindly follow doctrines?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_070\".m_mContent: "Ressa, know this: no matter which Other Side it may be, the same Tempus Church watches over every flow of time."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_071\".m_mContent: "Even if you cheat life and death, fleeing to the edge of space and time, you will ultimately face us."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_072\".m_mContent: "Tris, have you ever considered that time may not be the key to eternity—but its greatest betrayal?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_073\".m_mContent: "You Bell Ringers are not truly immortal, but forsaken by time."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_074\".m_mContent: "I wonder how many secrets you learned while serving as the Saint's guard."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_075\".m_mContent: "But in my years as a Bell Ringer, I learned that some secrets remain veiled not always because they're forbidden to share, but because even truth itself changes nothing."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_076\".m_mContent: "So you've come because the Saint sent you to bring me back for judgment?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_077\".m_mContent: "No, I think her target... must be me. The one deemed a "Calamity," the one known as "Death.""

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_078\".m_mContent: "He admits to being the Calamity "Death," so what will you do?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip07_079\".m_mContent: "Whether in your heart you remain the clergy from days long past, or have become a healer battling mortality on this island."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_001\".m_mContent: "Ressa, you must understand the meaning when a Bell Ringer is given the order of elimination—"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_002\".m_mContent: "—To eliminate, at any cost, all beings potentially controlled by the Black Blood in the target area."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_003\".m_mContent: "Then you must also know under what circumstances the Saint would assign a Bell Ringer to carry out such a merciless order."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_004\".m_mContent: "—When the Ancestral Black Blood breaks the Divine Body's seal, it may stir a "Calamity" capable of plaguing the entire continent."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_005\".m_mContent: "If you know all this, why are you still taking his side?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_006\".m_mContent: "I know. Noah is likely Death itself—the one the Church calls the seed of Calamity, the demon sealed within the Divine Body, the very source of Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_007\".m_mContent: "But in these past three months, I've seen the truth with my own eyes. He's a kind young man who works without rest to gather herbs, prepare medicine, and tend to the sick."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_008\".m_mContent: "And today, I learned he is the guide—long misunderstood by legend—who guides the longing to the Other Side."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_009\".m_mContent: "Perhaps from the very beginning, we were misled by those names the Church branded him with... "Calamity "... "Death"... Noah..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_010\".m_mContent: "He merely possesses great power. That is no crime—he has done no wrong!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_011\".m_mContent: "If anything deserves scrutiny, it is not Noah, but the Divine Body! The one commanding dreamfeeders to attack villages and devour both the living and their longing!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_012\".m_mContent: "As I said before, knowing the truth does not always grant the power to change it."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_013\".m_mContent: "Because truth is not the same as principle."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_014\".m_mContent: "Then allow me to say this: The "justice" the Church proclaims... is not always right."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_016\".m_mContent: "Whether I stood as the Saint's guard, or crossed into the Other Side after leaving the Church, my conviction has never wavered."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_017\".m_mContent: "I will save as many lives as I can. And I will stand against every unjust death in this world."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_018\".m_mContent: "My colleague, Yggdrasill, once told me he entrusted his medical texts to a warrior. One who lacked knowledge but bore a heart filled with compassion."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_019\".m_mContent: "Now that I think about it, you were the naive fool who once believed death could be cured. Who even dared imagine it might be kind."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_020\".m_mContent: "Thanks to you, I now believe that perhaps Death... is not evil."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_021\".m_mContent: "Then it is unfortunate. You shall slumber forever. Alongside your "Seed of Hope.""

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_023\".m_mContent: "Two against two. Do you truly think that guarantees your victory?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_026\".m_mContent: "How could you, Commander! Swapping places with your Chorister to teleport ahead, and leaving us stranded behind!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_027\".m_mContent: "You're the one who got lost. I arrived just fine."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_028\".m_mContent: "Acappella, stay out of this. You're not strong enough to face them."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_029\".m_mContent: "You heard her. That was Tris who said you're weak—not me."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_030\".m_mContent: "I object! She's just an ordinary nun! ...Wait..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_031\".m_mContent: "Y-y-you're... Ressa Ambolia? The Valkyrie who once stood at the Saint's side!?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_032\".m_mContent: "It's been a while since anyone called me that."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_033\".m_mContent: "This is ridiculous! How could you be involved with a Calamity!?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_034\".m_mContent: "Do as I say, Acappella. This is no place for a child—descend the mountain at once."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_035\".m_mContent: "So even one as detached from the world as a Bell Ringer has someone she holds dear."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_036\".m_mContent: "One voice alone does not make a Choir."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_037\".m_mContent: "Weren't you the one who trusted only your Choristers? Seems you're the one who's changed the most."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_040\".m_mContent: "So what's the situation? Are we going into a two-on-two fight with a child in tow?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_042\".m_mContent: "Acappella, if there's any danger, you must protect yourself first."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_045\".m_mContent: "Let us perform a requiem for the Calamity called Death—and for Ressa Ambolia, the Apostate."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_046\".m_mContent: "I must be out of practice... To be losing ground to the current Bell Ringer. But I'm not alone this time—Noah is with me."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_048\".m_mContent: "I'm fine. It's just that after regaining some of Death’s memories, the Black Blood in me has started to stir again... This body still isn't used to it..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_049\".m_mContent: "How can this be!? The Calamity... and the Church's Valkyrie... moving in perfect harmony!?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_051\".m_mContent: "No fair! The Commander's stronger than any of them! If only we weren't so useless..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_052\".m_mContent: "You've done well. I'm the one who failed—I underestimated the bond between them. Leave the rest to me. This is my duty... as your Commander."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_054\".m_mContent: "Forgive me, Darcias. You've stayed by my side longer than anyone. Just this once... let me be selfish."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_055\".m_mContent: "Forgive me, Acappella. I've always seen you as a child… But I won't be there to watch you grow."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_057\".m_mContent: "There are only two things in this world that can counter a Calamity..."
