\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_058\".m_mContent: "The Divine Body... And the Silver Blood of a Bell Ringer."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_063\".m_mContent: "This is the Land of No Return... A moment of absolute stillness, conjured by my Covenant, beyond the reach of time. No breath, no sound, no interference."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_065\".m_mContent: "There’s no need to worry. Even the Saint cannot hear us within the Land of No Return."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_067\".m_mContent: "Time is frozen, but only for a breath. Listen closely."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_068\".m_mContent: "I know the claim. That the Divine Body is the seal that protects the world, and the Black Blood is the Calamity that destroys it. But that's not the truth."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_069\".m_mContent: "And I know this as well. The eternity given to Bell Ringers is nothing but a curse. Every choice we make is already inscribed in the will of Aeon."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_070\".m_mContent: "Even before I set foot on this island... I knew I would meet you. I've been waiting for this moment... for a very long time."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_072\".m_mContent: "Let me be selfish—just this once. A rare chance, a moment unrepeatable."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_073\".m_mContent: "Today, Bell Ringer No. X, Tris Tepes, will cross blades with the Valkyrie… Then fall at Sunset Isle, sealed alongside Death, remembered only as a fading legend."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_074\".m_mContent: "And what about that child? What will become of her? She’s the one you cherish most, isn't she?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_075\".m_mContent: "She's gifted beyond measure. She'll inherit my place soon enough. And when that day comes… she'll begin to see the truth for what it is."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_076\".m_mContent: "She'll learn what it means to understand everything—yet be powerless to choose. I wonder how she'll struggle against it... That's what I look forward to most."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip08_078\".m_mContent: "I'd rather you call me a good opponent instead."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_001\".m_mContent: "Looks like we've shaken off those minions for now."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_002\".m_mContent: "What is with this island? It's crawling with strange enemies, we've been running forever, and the sun still hasn't set!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_003\".m_mContent: "More importantly… Lady Empousa, are you all right?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_004\".m_mContent: "Why wouldn't I be? Oh! Now that you mention it..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_005\".m_mContent: "We've been running under sunlight this whole time, and I'm not burning?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_006\".m_mContent: "Could it be... you've overcome your weakness to sunlight, you silly bat!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_007\".m_mContent: "Seems like I'm the type who grows stronger without even realizing it!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_008\".m_mContent: "No... something's not right about this sun."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_009\".m_mContent: "Hey... it hasn't moved. Since we arrived, it's just there—motionless over the mountains."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_011\".m_mContent: "Something's falling from the sky... is it snow?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_012\".m_mContent: "No... this scent... salt! Her salt crystals?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_013\".m_mContent: "Forget the salt—look! The crack in the sky is getting wider—"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_017\".m_mContent: "Am I dreaming... the sky is breaking apart?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_018\".m_mContent: "The unmoving sun has vanished… and now, the sky is shrouded in darkness."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_019\".m_mContent: "No wonder few ever found Sunset Isle. That false sky—it served as a veil, hiding the island from the world."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_020\".m_mContent: "And I thought… I could finally walk freely beneath the sun… But the sunlight here wasn't real..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_022\".m_mContent: "Those white crystals falling from the sky… They must be the salt Mr. Van Helsing mentioned."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_023\".m_mContent: "...This is Piera's doing. She's here. Somewhere on this island."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_024\".m_mContent: "Piera? Who's that? When you say it's her doing, do you mean the salt on the ground… or the sky exploding?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_025\".m_mContent: "I suspect both. Though I never thought she'd unleash something on this scale."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_026\".m_mContent: "Wait—you're saying she alone shattered the sky with salt?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_027\".m_mContent: "Whoa—another powerful name!? Who exactly is this Piera!?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_028\".m_mContent: "She's my senior. Vice-Commander to Bell Ringer Albrecht and..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_029\".m_mContent: "The reason I boarded the El Dorado to reach Sunset Isle."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_030\".m_mContent: "But for an explosion like this—she must be in danger too…"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_031\".m_mContent: "Only one possibility. She encountered something she couldn't defeat. A Calamity… one as powerful as Famine."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_036\".m_mContent: "C-could it be the sunlight from earlier? Why such a delayed reaction?!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_037\".m_mContent: "No... it's Noah. I can feel his pain..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_038\".m_mContent: "A resonance between those connected by blood... just like when Noah sensed you, back at the castle."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_039\".m_mContent: "He's not far from us... he's here... on this island!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_040\".m_mContent: "I knew our silver-haired friend wouldn't vanish so easily at sea. Can you tell which direction?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_042\".m_mContent: "As I thought. The enemies often come from the very place they most wish to keep us from."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_043\".m_mContent: "What was that?! Why did the monster's form change when that fake sky shattered?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_044\".m_mContent: "Crystallization. The salt crystals Mr. Van Helsing mentioned haven't only spread across the land, they've altered the minions too."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_045\".m_mContent: "Piera... why would you go this far? Don't you dare die before I find you!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_046\".m_mContent: "If she really triggered the crystal surge, we might trace her by tracking the shifts in crystal density, and follow it back to the source."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_047\".m_mContent: "Which seems to lead... straight to the peak."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_048\".m_mContent: "Perfect! We're heading there to find Noah too! Strength in numbers!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_051\".m_mContent: "She fulfilled her duty as a Gravekeeper. She gave her life to deny the enemy escape. Just as I once did, sixty-six years ago."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_053\".m_mContent: "I'm nothing more than a longing now. Sunset Isle is no more... and soon, I as well."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_054\".m_mContent: "Wait! Darcias and I... We've been through so much together, and I never got the chance to tell you everything..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_055\".m_mContent: "I'm glad you never strayed from the path you chose, Acappella. It's been a joy watching over you, helping you grow..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_056\".m_mContent: "Do you remember the first song you wrote for me? I wove it into the most beautiful sheet music."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip09_058\".m_mContent: "Sing it for me... It's the last gift I prepared for you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_002\".m_mContent: "Your heart. Your mind. In your blood. In the deepest corridors of memory..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_003\".m_mContent: "Lies a world that belongs to us, and us alone."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_004\".m_mContent: "And I've been waiting here for you, Noah Nevernight... For far longer than you know."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_005\".m_mContent: "Then what I just saw... those past events... They weren't dreams. They were memories returning to me."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_006\".m_mContent: "How can you reclaim what was never truly lost? You never forgot. You simply had no need to remember."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_007\".m_mContent: "My presence here is proof that you've always known who you are. Death."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_008\".m_mContent: "But... sixty-six years have passed since the battle with the Bell Ringer—since I parted ways with Ressa..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_009\".m_mContent: "And I still don't remember what happened in all that time."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_010\".m_mContent: "Don't worry. I'll help you remember it all. Bit by bit..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_012\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry... I never imagined she would..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_013\".m_mContent: "Spare me your smug remarks, you traitor!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_014\".m_mContent: "You think I wanted this? Your Commander left of her own will—and now Noah has become... this."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_015\".m_mContent: "He just turned into an egg! He's not dead! You're not the one suffering here!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_016\".m_mContent: "Must we quarrel now, of all times?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_018\".m_mContent: "Death can't fight back now. I'll finish him myself and avenge our Commander!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_019\".m_mContent: "Listen here, whelp. Lay a hand on Noah, and you'll regret it."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_020\".m_mContent: "Hmph! Don't underestimate what Darcias and I can do together!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_021\".m_mContent: "Enough. Don’t let Tris's sacrifice be in vain."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_024\".m_mContent: "Take the black cocoon that seals Death and return to the cathedral."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_025\".m_mContent: "So... it's not an egg... Wait! Are you truly the Saint?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_026\".m_mContent: "But he's a Calamity! Shouldn't we destroy him completely!? Why are we bringing him back to the Church?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_027\".m_mContent: "I have no obligation to answer that question."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_028\".m_mContent: "The Saint's Descent... so Darcias was an Ascendant all along..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_030\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry... My Lady. But I haven't finished what I'm here for..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_031\".m_mContent: "That was not a request. It was an order."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_032\".m_mContent: "If you hoped to delay me by hiding on Sunset Isle... You've misjudged."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_033\".m_mContent: "I knew where you were long before you thought to flee."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_035\".m_mContent: "So... you did hold me in such high regard after all?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_036\".m_mContent: "That old woman... how dare she! Our Commander sacrificed herself, and she doesn't even care!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_037\".m_mContent: "She can hear you when you call her that."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_038\".m_mContent: "But why? Why would she take Death back instead of destroying him?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_039\".m_mContent: "Are you asking me? I don't know."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_040\".m_mContent: "But at least this way Noah will survive..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_044\".m_mContent: "Hah... I should've known. Ressa handled it already."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_045\".m_mContent: "But seriously, why were those dreamfeeders attacking me!? I don’t even look like a longing... huh?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_046\".m_mContent: "I know you two! The warrior and the child with the Bell Ringer!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_047\".m_mContent: "Don't call me a child! Death and the Valkyrie are one thing—but there’s no way you’re older than me!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_049\".m_mContent: "Are you kidding me!? I just finished reporting to the Church, and you all ran off without me! I finally caught up, and now you're leaving again!?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_050\".m_mContent: "Is the Black Blood under control? Death hasn't revived, right? The Bell Ringer's here, so I assume things are resolved?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_051\".m_mContent: "How are Jason and Sora? What about Noah?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_052\".m_mContent: "He's always sticking close to you, Ressa—but when danger strikes, where is he? I knew he couldn't be trusted."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_053\".m_mContent: "...I'll explain everything later. Is your method of leaving Sunset Isle still viable?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_054\".m_mContent: "Huh? You want to leave the island? Well... it's possible, but I can only take one person at a time… And I just got back..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_055\".m_mContent: "Then you'll have to make several trips."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_056\".m_mContent: "Wait—are you planning to evacuate multiple people? That goes against my family's code! Just how many are you thinking of?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_057\".m_mContent: "Everyone. Every last survivor on this island."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_058\".m_mContent: "Wha—?! Ressa, you can't be serious! All survivors... All survivors?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_059\".m_mContent: "We've found no cure for the Black Blood. And we can't stop the true enemy of this island from awakening at any moment."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_060\".m_mContent: "The true enemy... You mean Death? Even the Bell Ringer can't stop him? Ressa... Does that mean Jason, Sora... they can't be saved?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_061\".m_mContent: "You sure ask a lot of questions. Bell Ringers aren't miracle workers, you know! If you want to stay behind and rot with the Black Blood, that's your choice!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_062\".m_mContent: "Even so... to leave the homeland we've known all our lives..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_063\".m_mContent: "Homeland isn't always a place. Sometimes it's the memories we share with family, with those we love... with those we long for."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_064\".m_mContent: "That's what someone dear to me just reminded me of."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_065\".m_mContent: "I'm sure you have your ways of leaving this place."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_066\".m_mContent: "Naturally. We'll be transporting the black cocoon as well."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_067\".m_mContent: "Then I'll entrust Noah to your care."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_068\".m_mContent: "Aren't you afraid we'll kill him? Or toss him into the sea on the way?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_069\".m_mContent: "I believe you've inherited Tris's nobility. And I believe Noah carries a strength that rivals any of us."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_070\".m_mContent: "But once we're gone... where could we possibly settle?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_071\".m_mContent: "There's enough land within the Church's territories. Houses too. Acappella will help you. Try to get along with her."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip10_072\".m_mContent: "Don't think I didn't hear that! And stop making promises on my behalf!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_001\".m_mContent: "There are even more traces of crystals around us..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_002\".m_mContent: "Perhaps we're getting closer to where Piera is channeling her power."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_003\".m_mContent: "I still can't believe that she could transform the entire island like this."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_004\".m_mContent: "I've been wondering why those creatures were also covered in crystals."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_005\".m_mContent: "Piera and I were both disciples of Master Albrecht, and the very first lesson we learned was how to control our own power. But the current situation seems like..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_007\".m_mContent: "Speaking of which, don't tell me you boarded the El Dorado just to find Piera on Sunset Isle?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_008\".m_mContent: "As a Bell Ringer's Vice-Commander and an Ascendant, she wouldn't be permitted to leave without authorization from the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_009\".m_mContent: "Finding Piera on Sunset Isle isn't just a matter of Church protocol. It's about answering some questions I've had."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_010\".m_mContent: "Master always warned us: every action carries a price. So why would Piera risk punishment by returning to this place?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_011\".m_mContent: "Maybe it's because of her family... just like me."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_012\".m_mContent: "The Paracelsus name had already fallen from grace by the time she was born into the Church's territories. She shouldn't have any deep ties to Sunset Isle."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_013\".m_mContent: "If something happens to her... I don't know how I'll explain this to Master Albrecht."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_014\".m_mContent: "It seems Miss Piera has lost control of her powers due to unforeseen circumstances. This has resulted in the island and its inhabitants being crystallized..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_015\".m_mContent: "However, this appears to be the only explanation that fits our current situation."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_016\".m_mContent: "She's not as fragile as you're making her out to be."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_017\".m_mContent: "But what other explanation could there be? I certainly can't think of any..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_018\".m_mContent: "The crystal traces become increasingly prominent as we venture deeper. It should lead us to Miss Piera."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_019\".m_mContent: "Noah seems to be there as well."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_021\".m_mContent: "They're blocking our path. Eliminate them and push forward!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_022\".m_mContent: "Look there! The crystal traces are much more visible in that area!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_023\".m_mContent: "As expected, you really have a wolf's nose."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_024\".m_mContent: "Is this the time to be snarky... Huh?!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_026\".m_mContent: "It feels like something's burrowing up from underground."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_031\".m_mContent: "I can't catch my breath all of a sudden... It's so... uncomfortable..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_032\".m_mContent: "It's not just affecting Hati... I'm feeling it too, albeit to a lesser degree."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip11_033\".m_mContent: "Could it be... because of that black mist? Why does it feel so familiar..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_001\".m_mContent: "Dr. Ressa, the one named Darcias has already evacuated the residents. Shouldn't we return to the Church as well?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_002\".m_mContent: "Piera... do you hate me? For lacking the resolve to kill Noah... even knowing he is Death?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_003\".m_mContent: "Of course not. If it weren't for you, Dr. Ressa, who would have treated our wounds and illnesses?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_004\".m_mContent: "And besides, even without his memories, Noah helped us many times. Even if he is Death..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_005\".m_mContent: "If you're not leaving now, find your own way off Sunset Isle!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_007\".m_mContent: "Dr. Ressa, let's take Noah and leave this place together!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_008\".m_mContent: "You were sealed by Bell Ringer Tris and taken away from Sunset Isle... What you see now is the memory you lost."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_009\".m_mContent: "But in my memory… it was Agares who took me away."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_010\".m_mContent: "That's because during those sixty-six years inside the black cocoon, you fell into a dream of your own making..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_011\".m_mContent: "A dream of Sunset Isle and Ressa."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_013\".m_mContent: "You believed yourself to be a simple doctor, healing villagers beside Ressa."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_014\".m_mContent: "But in reality, once removed from Sunset Isle, we were locked within the Church's alchemy chamber, sealed inside the black cocoon for study."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_016\".m_mContent: "This is where you truly were for those sixty-six years."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_018\".m_mContent: "Only fragments of memory from that time. There's no need to be afraid."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_019\".m_mContent: "You never imagined I would take Commander Tris's place and become a Bell Ringer, did you?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_020\".m_mContent: "Damn it... I accepted Aeon's Silver Blood... my resolve should be unshakable... So why..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_021\".m_mContent: "Why do I still feel such hatred when I look at you?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_022\".m_mContent: "Mark my words. The moment I get the chance... I will kill you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_023\".m_mContent: "Her hatred has never waned—not once across the years."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_024\".m_mContent: "But she is young. A Bell Ringer who cannot yet master her own power."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_025\".m_mContent: "Albrecht. The weakest of the Bell Ringers. And yet the greatest alchemist in the world."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_027\".m_mContent: "Not the one you knew. This Piera is her granddaughter. A descendant of the Paracelsus bloodline. Ah, but yes... you've met her already."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_029\".m_mContent: "We'll continue what was left unfinished. This time, Van Helsing will conduct them."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_030\".m_mContent: "As my third student, you've mastered theory. Let us see how you perform in practice."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_032\".m_mContent: "Each day, Albrecht drew material from us. To fuel his Black Blood research."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_033\".m_mContent: "I overheard a guard once say: He succeeded in refining a potion from a rare fungus... One that could suppress the Black Blood's effects."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_035\".m_mContent: "I believe I made myself clear that no one is to enter without my permission."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_038\".m_mContent:
"(Sighs) Withdraw your power. You cannot afford to damage the test subject.
"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_039\".m_mContent: "Thibault. The most inscrutable of all Bell Ringers. Though a healer, she can make kings kneel with but a glance."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_040\".m_mContent: "Yet before us, she says nothing. She merely stands... unmoving. Watching."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_042\".m_mContent: "I heard you drove Albrecht away again?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_044\".m_mContent: "The man who executed you. A Bell Ringer of absolute authority."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_045\".m_mContent: "One bell toll has passed. Let me speak with him alone, would you?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_047\".m_mContent: "But next time you speak to me, lose that smile."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_049\".m_mContent: "Now it's just the two of us, my silver-haired friend…"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_050\".m_mContent: "I regret that we must meet like this."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_052\".m_mContent: "An illusion? This is merely a memory replaying. It should not be able to think..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_053\".m_mContent: "This isn't the place for conversation. Come, let's speak elsewhere."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_055\".m_mContent: "Come. Draw your blade. Let me see how far you've come."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_056\".m_mContent: "This really does come as a surprise."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_057\".m_mContent: "How are you speaking to me... inside a memory?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_058\".m_mContent: "No, no, no. I am the only one who can reach you here."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_059\".m_mContent: "Once you break free of this place, find me. Seek me in the sealed area of Starfall Valley."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_061\".m_mContent: "Lest you forget—I'm the one who helped you escape the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_063\".m_mContent: "Isn't it strange? Why did you awaken in that carriage? And why did I allow the Bathorys to take your blood... for resurrection?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_064\".m_mContent: "If you want answers, then find me in the sealed area..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip12_065\".m_mContent: "Remember, the sealed area in Starfall Valley. That's where I'll be waiting."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_002\".m_mContent: ""He is Death, veiled in shadow, who leads all life to its appointed end. He is Rebirth, crowned in light, who calls what withers to rise anew.""

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_003\".m_mContent: "The Moonblessed Death we seek... Could that be the source of the black mist?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_004\".m_mContent: "You damn bat... Don't tell me you think Noah is in there?!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_005\".m_mContent: "I'm certain of it... I can feel Noah's pain, he's trapped in there!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_006\".m_mContent: "But this thing... Just a fraction of its pressure... It’s stronger than that giant we faced on the ship!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_007\".m_mContent: "Is Noah... really inside that... all by himself?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_008\".m_mContent: "He's not alone. The concentration of crystals in the area is high—they're Piera's salt crystals. There was an explosion here."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_009\".m_mContent: "Are you saying... are you saying the one you're looking for is trapped inside that thing—with Noah?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_010\".m_mContent: "Hard as it is to believe, it's the only lead I've found."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_011\".m_mContent: "Then what are we waiting for? Let's get Noah out of there!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_012\".m_mContent: "I won't allow it. The one in there is my prey."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_014\".m_mContent: "What are you planning to do to Noah!?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_015\".m_mContent: "Isn't it obvious? I'm going to kill him here!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_016\".m_mContent: "Aren't you Albrecht's student? I'll let you off. Leave now."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_017\".m_mContent: "I'm afraid... I can't comply with that."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_019\".m_mContent: "Don't misunderstand me. If Piera is in there, then I can't guarantee her survival once the Bell Ringer strikes."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_021\".m_mContent: "We're not letting you lay a hand on Noah!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_022\".m_mContent: "The sacred texts forbid a Bell Ringer from striking without cause..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_023\".m_mContent: "But they say nothing about using the weapons of one who came before."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_024\".m_mContent: "So this is the power... of a Bell Ringer..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_025\".m_mContent: "Noah... how long will you stay silent in there!?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_026\".m_mContent: "You chose "Death"—and in doing so, severed your path to life."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_027\".m_mContent: "If that's how it is... Then you'll all be buried here!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_028\".m_mContent: "What just happened... it wasn't an illusion?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_029\".m_mContent: "It seems someone is eager for you to remember. Very well."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip13_030\".m_mContent: "Come, show me just how strong your resolve is!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_001\".m_mContent: "It appears that you, in your current state, have lost your power."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_002\".m_mContent: "It's still more than enough to deal with you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_003\".m_mContent: "Since my arrival on this island, you were the one who used nightmares to force me to recall my past."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_004\".m_mContent: "Using those phantoms of Jason, Sora, and Piera's grandmother, you led me step by step into the depths of my memories in order to awaken my past self."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_005\".m_mContent: "But I don't get it. What purpose does this serve you?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_006\".m_mContent: "Don't forget, Noah... From the beginning, you and I were one and the same."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_008\".m_mContent: "This person is a testament to your friendship."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_009\".m_mContent: "Her existence serves to remind you of the warmth you once experienced as a human."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_010\".m_mContent: "Death and life, cold and warmth. Only when you become aware of their existences and duality will you truly take form."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_011\".m_mContent: "And she is a testament to the bonds you've made."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_012\".m_mContent: "Her existence serves as a reminder of what you once cherished."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_013\".m_mContent: "Death and rebirth, bitterness and sweetness. Only when you can walk both paths and embrace their duality will you truly have a soul."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_014\".m_mContent: "Surely by now you understand why I made you remember?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_015\".m_mContent: "Only by awakening completely... can we become "Death" once more."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_016\".m_mContent: "I'm more conscious than I've ever been."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_017\".m_mContent: "You've prepared quite the speech. It seems you knew I would return here after sixty-six years."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_018\".m_mContent: "Naturally... because you left behind two very important things."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_020\".m_mContent: "Only by retrieving these memories will your soul be complete. And only then... will you be able to use this power to reshape your form."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_021\".m_mContent: "At this moment, we are the knight and the blade."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_022\".m_mContent: "Originally, you wielded this blade, but finding it too cruel, you wanted to cast it aside."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_023\".m_mContent: "Yet you had to rely on it to survive in the chaos. Little by little, you became enslaved to the blade."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_024\".m_mContent: "And now that blade... is transforming into the knight that will dominate you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_025\".m_mContent: "You... have mistaken the relationship between the knight and the blade."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_026\".m_mContent: "A knight becomes a knight because they trust the blade in their hand to carve out their own path."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_027\".m_mContent: "And a blade is called a blade because, guided by the knight's strength, it proves its edge."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_028\".m_mContent: "And I... am both the knight and the blade..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_029\".m_mContent: "To defeat the enemy before me, I will become the blade of my companions."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_030\".m_mContent: "So, you're ready... to accept this power."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_031\".m_mContent: "You're wrong. It wasn't you who chose me, but I who chose you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_033\".m_mContent: "But, I hadn’t thought you so well-loved."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_034\".m_mContent: "This is bad… If this keeps up, the Bell Ringer's going to wipe us out sooner or later!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_035\".m_mContent: "We can't match her head-on, we need to find another way..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_036\".m_mContent: "Wait… this black mist... Is it about to explode?!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_039\".m_mContent: "And this time, don't throw the blade away again."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_042\".m_mContent: "Though something has changed. You seem more mature than when we first met."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_043\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, Noah... I wish I could be there with you."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_044\".m_mContent: "But it seems you haven't forgotten our promise."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_045\".m_mContent: "Even without my memories, I never forgot the promise I made."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip14_046\".m_mContent: "Sorry to keep you waiting... I'm back, Ressa. Piera."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_001\".m_mContent: "And right now... I'm not your enemy."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_002\".m_mContent: "Silence! I must complete Commander Tris's unfinished mission and seal you here!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_003\".m_mContent: "Otherwise... I'll never break free from that day's shadow!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_004\".m_mContent: "How unfortunate. I don't have time for you right now."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_006\".m_mContent: "Didn't you hear me!? I told you to stop!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_007\".m_mContent: "Why… Even after becoming a Bell Ringer, why am I still powerless against Death?!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_008\".m_mContent: "Because I am not the one you need to fight."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_009\".m_mContent: "Damn it… Then who? If not you, who am I supposed to hate...?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_011\".m_mContent: "No... this feeling, it's like something's burrowing up from underground."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_014\".m_mContent: "It's those creatures from before! And they're even more aggressive now!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_016\".m_mContent: "I know what you've all done for me."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_019\".m_mContent: "It's more like I've gained full control of its power."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_021\".m_mContent: "At least the part about my identity as Nevernight."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_023\".m_mContent: "No matter how far back my past stretches... What matters is the present."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_025\".m_mContent: "I am—and will always be—Noah Nevernight. The vassal saved by Empousa Bathory."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_030\".m_mContent: "Now that your memories are back, is there any reason for you to stay on Sunset Isle?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_031\".m_mContent: "There's still one thing I must resolve."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_032\".m_mContent: "The anomaly within the Divine Body… You've all felt it, haven't you?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip15_033\".m_mContent: "Unless I destroy it... None of us will ever leave this place."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_001\".m_mContent: "So it finally shows itself... Is this the true form of the Divine Body on Sunset Isle?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_003\".m_mContent: "It’s sensed that I've awakened Death's power. That's why those creatures went berserk before."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_004\".m_mContent: "Having lost all means of resistance, its only option is to detonate its core, trapping me on Sunset Isle forever."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_005\".m_mContent: "But Noah, how are you planning to destroy the Divine Body?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_008\".m_mContent: "When I received Death's memories, I also learned about the Divine Body's weakness."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_009\".m_mContent: "You guys get out of here when you get the chance, don't worry—"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_011\".m_mContent: "Are you trying to play the lone hero again? Just like on the ship?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_012\".m_mContent: "From now on, don't even think about leaving my sights!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_013\".m_mContent: "But dealing with the Divine Body is not going to be easy."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_014\".m_mContent: "Who's the Vassal, you or me? If you can do it, so can I! Don't forget—we're partners in crime!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_015\".m_mContent: "And I'm sure everyone here feels the same way—"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_016\".m_mContent: "I've never smacked a Divine Body before. I want to see just how tough it is!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_017\".m_mContent: "Speak for yourself... but I still need to find Piera's remains before the island sinks."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_019\".m_mContent: "Perhaps Death is lonely. At the end of life, only a lonely soul was left to sink silently into the abyss."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_020\".m_mContent: "But, you are not Death. You are Noah Nevernight."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_021\".m_mContent: "...Well, it appears I'm terrible at persuading people."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_022\".m_mContent: "But if anything bad happens, just run. And don't look back!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_023\".m_mContent: "If you don't run, then I don't run!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_025\".m_mContent: "I suppose I'll humor your recklessness for a bit."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_027\".m_mContent: "First, we stop the Divine Body. Then we find a way for all of us to escape together!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_029\".m_mContent: "This feeling, I've felt it before... This is bad!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_030\".m_mContent: "The Divine Body... I think it's trying to blow up early!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_031\".m_mContent: "Is there no way to stop it?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_032\".m_mContent: "The Divine Body is essentially the remains of a god. It's not something that normal weapons can even scratch."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_033\".m_mContent: "Even the Bell Ringers probably couldn't damage it..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_035\".m_mContent: "Maybe this is a little late, but we must leave this place immediately."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_036\".m_mContent: "Escape to where? The Divine Body will probably destroy the whole island before we can get away."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_037\".m_mContent: "Even though I've prepared for this, I don't know if I can really wield this power."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_039\".m_mContent: "If I can't even save my friends with this power, then I have no right to wield it."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_041\".m_mContent: "If I use this power, I might transform into Death..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_043\".m_mContent: "You'll always be Noah Nevernight, the Noah we all know."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_044\".m_mContent: "Remember, Death took many lives, but it also allowed everyone who once lived on Sunset Isle to have the most beautiful farewell."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_045\".m_mContent: "As life fades, the remains left behind nourish the land, ushering in new life."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_046\".m_mContent: "Perhaps beyond death lies only darkness, but for those behind you, it becomes a door to the future."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_047\".m_mContent: "Hesitation... that's not the Noah I know..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_048\".m_mContent: "The Noah I know never hesitates or wavers..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_049\".m_mContent: "Because it's that Noah who gave me the courage to face my fate, isn't it?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_051\".m_mContent: "You better cheer up! If you keep being gloomy, I'm really going to get mad."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_052\".m_mContent: "As long as you remember our promise, you will always be Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_054\".m_mContent: "Keep moving forward, Noah! Don't look back!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_055\".m_mContent: "Noah... is Noah, and that... will never change!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_056\".m_mContent: "I never thought I'd hear Ressa's lecturing again..."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_057\".m_mContent: "But everyone is right, there's no need for hesitation."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_060\".m_mContent: "Even if I become Death, I am still Noah... Nevernight!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_063\".m_mContent: "I won't let it... end like this!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_066\".m_mContent: "You did it. Noah! You really stopped the Divine Body!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_067\".m_mContent: "Hate to say this, but we're not out of the woods yet."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_070\".m_mContent: "It's too late! We'll never make it in time!"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_071\".m_mContent: "Rest assured. Someone will come to take you home."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_072\".m_mContent: "Elder Jacintha? How did you get here?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_073\".m_mContent: "I'm just here to return something. Thought I'd lend a hand while I'm at it."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_076\".m_mContent: "Do you really think that silver-haired fool believes you're nothing more than a longing left behind on Sunset Isle?"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_077\".m_mContent: "The Saint's final order still stands: Eliminate the traitor among the Bell Ringers. Let’s go…"

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_079\".m_mContent: "I don't think I'll return to see you again, Commander."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_080\".m_mContent: "But you'll always be in my heart."

\"Dialogue_B_90001_Clip16_081\".m_mContent: "Take care, Acappella. Take care, Ressa. You're about to face a foe no one can overcome..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_002\".m_mContent: "The bell hasn't rung yet. Stay sharp. This watch is not to be taken lightly."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_003\".m_mContent: "What are we even guarding? The mines in Starfall Valley have been deserted for years. Who'd bother attacking this place?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_004\".m_mContent: "You young ones really don't know a thing. Starfall Valley's changed."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_005\".m_mContent: "Changed? How? Still the same damp fog, same red mist choking the air…"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_006\".m_mContent: "You remember when Lord Agares executed that silver-haired heretic here a few days ago? Where did he go after that?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_007\".m_mContent: "How would we know what happened after that? Someone like him probably returned to the Church, right?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_008\".m_mContent: "No. He stayed. He's searching for the Divine Body—said to be buried deep beneath this valley."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_009\".m_mContent: "A Divine Body? Here? That's the first I've heard of it… But what's it got to do with us?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_010\".m_mContent: "You still don't get it?! The Bell Ringer himself is here, scouring our post for the legendary Divine Body!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_011\".m_mContent: "All I know is my shift got longer because of it... (yawn)"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_012\".m_mContent: "Kenneth reporting in. Here for the shift change. Appreciate your hard work."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_013\".m_mContent: "Heh, was just thinking you should've shown up by now. Finally, I can get some sleep."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_014\".m_mContent: "Are you two the only ones stationed here tonight? Where's the rest of the watch stationed at?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_015\".m_mContent: "It's always been the two of us covering this path... Kenneth, what's with the strange question?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_016\".m_mContent: "I see. Just the two of you… That makes it easier."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_019\".m_mContent: "The older one must be in charge of this route. Good. I'll take his form next."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_020\".m_mContent: "...Is it time to ring the bell?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_021\".m_mContent: "Kenneth's team reporting in for scheduled relief..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_023\".m_mContent: "Who are you?! Why do you look like me?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_024\".m_mContent: "The Tempus Church trains its soldiers well. Punctual to a fault. Should I applaud your devotion to Aeon?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_025\".m_mContent: "What are you?! Some kind of heretic?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_026\".m_mContent: "Just someone who hopes you'll pretend none of this ever happened."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_028\".m_mContent: "You… you look just like me. Who… what are you?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_029\".m_mContent: "I become whoever you need me to be."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_030\".m_mContent: "Why hasn't Kenneth's squad come to meet us? The patrol unit's missing too... Am I late again?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_031\".m_mContent: "...No, we're right on schedule. Strange—Kenneth is never late."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_033\".m_mContent: "...It's Kenneth. The others are dead too."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_034\".m_mContent: "These wounds weren't made by Blood Beasts... These were clean, deliberate strikes. The killer was no amateur."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_035\".m_mContent: "Have the traitors who seek to ignite war already begun to move?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip01_036\".m_mContent: "But the commander said they would wait for the full moon... and that night has yet to come—"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_001\".m_mContent: "You're the heretics who slaughtered your own at the northern camp! To think you've invaded..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_002\".m_mContent: "Faithless Apostate! Aeon sees all, and Her wrath shall descend upon you!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_003\".m_mContent: "Oh? I've already cut down so many of Her faithful. Where's that divine wrath, then?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_005\".m_mContent: "Because She isn’t omniscient? Or maybe—just maybe—the one you've given everything for…"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_007\".m_mContent: "Pestilence. Famine. War. The world drowns in suffering. Has She ever come to save you? Even once?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_008\".m_mContent: "Your faith is a lie you tell yourselves to survive. Deep down, you've always known this. You just never had the courage to face it."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_009\".m_mContent: "No... You're lying! The great Aeon will bless us..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_010\".m_mContent: "Then go to the Other Side and see for yourself if that eternal paradise was ever real—"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_011\".m_mContent: "Whether it's trampling another's faith, or taking another's life... I won't allow it."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_013\".m_mContent: "...It's Sir Gadric! Sir Gadric is here!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_014\".m_mContent: "Gadric... Vice-Commander of Bell Ringer Unit No. XI?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_015\".m_mContent: "Typical. The Bell Ringers send their self-righteous lieutenants to grandstand, while they cower in their Cathedral, watching from a distance."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_016\".m_mContent: "You clearly harbor deep resentment toward the Church and Bell Ringers. Though I'd prefer to understand the reason behind it, there's something I must know first:"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_017\".m_mContent: "How did you take Kenneth's appearance? And to what end?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_018\".m_mContent: "Appearance? Even those closest to him can't tell the difference."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_019\".m_mContent: "Had I not found Kenneth's body myself, I might've been fooled as well."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_020\".m_mContent: "If you couldn't tell... I wonder—can the Bell Ringers?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_021\".m_mContent: "I won't give you the chance to test it!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_022\".m_mContent: "Ah yes, Sir Gadric. The continent's famed swordsman. If someone were foolish enough to challenge you... I suppose they'd never leave this valley alive."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_024\".m_mContent: "Let's just say—I have more pressing matters to attend to."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_025\".m_mContent: "I never imagined I'd one day raise my sword against you, Sir Gadric."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_026\".m_mContent: "You... we're all members of the Church! We shouldn't be crossing swords!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_027\".m_mContent: "We know you're no villain, sir. We also know we're no match for you. But we still cannot let you pass."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_028\".m_mContent: "...To stand your ground with such clarity of mind... Why?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_029\".m_mContent: "You once served with honor. You were devout followers of Aeon. What could have driven you to this?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_030\".m_mContent: "I no longer know if salvation exists… But I know what doesn't."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_031\".m_mContent: "When my wife and children were infected with Black Blood... They looked just like the heretics we used to hunt. They begged me to end their suffering. Begged me..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_032\".m_mContent: "Should I have joined them in death, Sir Gadric?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_033\".m_mContent: "No. I will never condone surrendering one's life—no matter the pain."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_034\".m_mContent: "You've fought more mutations than any of us. Surely, you know the truth. There is no cure for Black Blood… unless—"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_035\".m_mContent: "No! To surrender to Black Blood—to accept its power... That is a sin I will never permit."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip02_036\".m_mContent: "What if we've had it backwards all this time? What if Black Blood is our true ancestral origin...?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_001\".m_mContent: "Soon, we shall be reunited—my kindred, bound by the Blood of Dracula."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_002\".m_mContent: "Sealed beneath the wings of the Divine Body… Limine Bathory, the Everlasting Night."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_003\".m_mContent: "Even from here, I can feel it—your ambition burns hotter than ever."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_004\".m_mContent: "Indeed. My flames only grow stronger. I take it all proceeds smoothly on your end?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_005\".m_mContent: "With shapeshifting so precise even a Bell Ringer's Vice-Commander couldn't sense it—It's child's play to sow discord among the Church's soldiers."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_006\".m_mContent: "All the more so in an age where the Black Blood sickness has slowly hollowed out mankind's faith."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_007\".m_mContent: "The deeper the conflict here in Starfall Valley, the stronger the Black Blood becomes..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_008\".m_mContent: "Until the Divine Body's seal can no longer contain it."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_009\".m_mContent: "Pestilence shattered their faith. Famine drained their reason. Death fractured their minds..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_011\".m_mContent: "Cruel, but necessary for a new age to begin."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_012\".m_mContent: "Just like when you toppled the old Carrelle house eighty-eight years ago?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_013\".m_mContent: "Wherever humanity lingers, conflict follows. Yet each time, I still hope for a war without bloodshed."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_014\".m_mContent: "Spare me. No era will ever sing praises of your kind, Calamity of War."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_015\".m_mContent: "By the way—how long do you plan to keep wearing that face around me?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_016\".m_mContent: "I've grown fond of it. He seems far more trusted than someone I know."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_017\".m_mContent: "Still... spending such a meaningful night talking to a "man" when my greatest wish nears fruition? You're spoiling the moment."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_018\".m_mContent: "I recall you had quite the lovely chat with that silver-haired one in the carriage."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_019\".m_mContent: "Oh? You heard about that? Don't tell me you got jealous—and let the young miss from the Bathory family hijack the carriage on purpose?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_020\".m_mContent: "Shall I take another form, then? Perhaps that Vice-Commander who used to follow you like a shadow... What was her name again? Setti?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_021\".m_mContent: "Please. Your true form is fine too."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_022\".m_mContent: "...How disappointing. Still unwilling to show me your true form, Mass?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_023\".m_mContent: "What a pity. And here I thought you weren't the sort to judge someone by their looks..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_024\".m_mContent: "Ugh—what are these vile things? Blood Beasts?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_025\".m_mContent: "Blood Beasts—from the valley. Drawn by the scent of Ancestral Black Blood leaking from the Divine Body's seal."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_026\".m_mContent: "I suppose we smell like food to them..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_028\".m_mContent: "A few days ago, I may have accidentally slain their... king."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_029\".m_mContent: "Is it just me, or… even with those things gone, the ground's still trembling?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_030\".m_mContent: "It's not just you. The Divine Body—it's reacting. The sealed chamber ahead is starting to quake. The gate's seal is faltering."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_031\".m_mContent: "...Earlier than expected. I thought we'd have to wait until the full moon tomorrow night."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_032\".m_mContent: "Isn't that better? The Church won't be ready for a breach today."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_033\".m_mContent: "No—this is exactly as Setti foresaw. We don't yet know how many have come. But one thing is certain:"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_035\".m_mContent: "Darcias should've landed by now. Has your garlic-head Vice-Commander shown up yet?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_036\".m_mContent: "Gadric knows how vital this mission is. He wouldn't be late—at least, not on purpose."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_037\".m_mContent: "...Still, trouble has a way of finding him. Let's hope they're able to meet safely."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_038\".m_mContent: "And to think—this is the first time in a hundred years the old Saint's had two Bell Ringers work together."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_040\".m_mContent: "Oh? There have been other paired missions?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_043\".m_mContent: "Agares? Why are you here? Did the Saint give you a mission as well..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_044\".m_mContent: "...Do you think I'd ask that?! We already know what you've done. You're the traitor in our midst! And not just that..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_045\".m_mContent: "You stole Death's vessel without sanction. You brought it to Pestilence and Famine. And now, wearing the face of War, you dare attempt to awaken the Long Night..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_046\".m_mContent: "You haven't just fallen to Black Blood. You've become War—the Calamity itself..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_047\".m_mContent: "Careful now, darling. You've misunderstood one thing. I didn't succumb to Black Blood. I am Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_048\".m_mContent: "I am War, first to awaken among the Thirteen Ancestral Black Bloods. The Calamity given form."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_049\".m_mContent: "Y-you mean… you were already that when you joined the Church?! That's—That's impossible!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_050\".m_mContent: "The Saint would've known! She'd never make the Church's greatest enemy into a Bell Ringer! H-how is any of this possible?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_051\".m_mContent: "You found the root of the lie. Of course she knew. And yet, she still chose me. The real question is—why?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_052\".m_mContent: "Perhaps everyone's been mistaken from the start."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_053\".m_mContent: "Are we—the Black Blood—the Church's greatest enemy... Or hers? Does she truly seek to stop the Calamities foretold in the Apocalypse? Or has the end already begun?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_055\".m_mContent: ""...is not about to happen, but rather...""

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip03_059\".m_mContent: "The flower dwells within me… and we shall bloom together."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_001\".m_mContent: "Thank you for escorting us this far."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_002\".m_mContent: "We owe it to Ami's friend. Without them, we wouldn't have landed safely."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_003\".m_mContent: "They got the hang of their powers later than you, but look at them—way better at using them."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_004\".m_mContent: "And you? Couldn't you have flapped those giant moth wings and flown us here yourself?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_006\".m_mContent: "What's strange is why you're tailing us."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_007\".m_mContent: "Before we set off, I heard the Church had reinforced Starfall Valley."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_010\".m_mContent: "So you've made up your mind, Mr. Lifeless Eyes? Once you leave this path, we might not meet again."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_012\".m_mContent: "I said it before—once we're past that sea, we're enemies again."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_013\".m_mContent: "What a polite way of saying you're off to fetch backup because you know you can't win."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_014\".m_mContent: "Not before I repay Miss Aiona for mending my wounds."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_015\".m_mContent: "The next time we meet... it'll likely be with blades drawn."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_016\".m_mContent: "If you'd prefer a friendly duel instead, I wouldn't mind."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_018\".m_mContent: "By the way, Jacintha—what you said earlier... Was it true?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_019\".m_mContent: "That the fourth Moonblessed, the Calamity called War, is here?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_020\".m_mContent: "This is where I first met Noah… Does that mean we've come full circle?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_021\".m_mContent: "There was a theory that the world was round."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_022\".m_mContent: "You still believe in stuff like that? You're more of a Heretic than the Heretics themselves…"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_023\".m_mContent: "What Noah means… is that many an odyssey ends where it first began."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_025\".m_mContent: "Speaking of rhythm, why not let your glowing cards show us where to go next?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_026\".m_mContent: "Didn't those things get burned to ash already?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_027\".m_mContent: "It'll take time to craft a new deck—but we have other methods."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_028\".m_mContent: "Let's retrace the path that Inquisitor took when he stole our little Fool."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_029\".m_mContent: "Even though Mr. Lifeless Eyes left the ship, it still feels like he's around… Guess that means everyone liked him more than they let on."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_031\".m_mContent: "If I had to guess, the carriage that took Noah headed that way."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_032\".m_mContent: "That direction… it leads to the Blood Moon Seal. So the threads converge after all."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_033\".m_mContent: "Sealed area? That name… sounds familiar. Like I heard it once, a long time ago..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_034\".m_mContent: "That's where Lady Limine's Divine Body lies sealed—"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_036\".m_mContent: "We were chasing after a Moonblessed—now you're telling me Mother is here too?! Why didn't I know any of this?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_037\".m_mContent: "It happened before you came to exist."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_038\".m_mContent: "Wait, I know that name! She's the one who brought down House Ganelon during the Bathory uprising!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_039\".m_mContent: "But why's she sealed here? Isn't the Bathory estate across the sea?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_040\".m_mContent: "The Bathory guard a Divine Body known as the Wings. Unlike the others, this one exists as a pair..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_041\".m_mContent: "One in the castle on Howling Peninsula, the other here in Starfall Valley. These two places have always been connected."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_042\".m_mContent: "Connected? But there's an entire ocean between them!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_044\".m_mContent: "You've been there before. That bottomless tower."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_046\".m_mContent: "Even then, I wondered where the base of that tower led. Who would've thought… the opposite end of the continent."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_047\".m_mContent: "But saying they’re connected doesn't explain how. What exactly connects them?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_048\".m_mContent: "Curious as ever, my little Fool. If you wish to understand, you'll have to carve your way into the sealed area and see with your own eyes."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_049\".m_mContent: "Then answer me this. If the Bathory were meant to guard this Divine Body..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_050\".m_mContent: "Why was their matriarch sealed inside it?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_051\".m_mContent: "She was the Bathory's new dawn—born in sunlight to serve as their Gravekeeper. But her black wings eclipsed the light..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_052\".m_mContent: "...and she turned her back on Aeon's truth. Thus, she became heir to Dracula's bloodline."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_054\".m_mContent: "Dracula is not a human. He is a will. A spirit that defies the world order Aeon created."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_055\".m_mContent: "That is why the Church named him so. The truth in the title Son of the Demon… lies in that defiance."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_056\".m_mContent: "Then am I right to assume—Dracula is the source of all Black Blood?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_058\".m_mContent: "Or maybe… the origin of the Moonblessed?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_059\".m_mContent: ""Calamity" is a profane title the Church invented for the Moonblessed. They were always meant to carry Dracula's bloodline."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_060\".m_mContent: "His first four drops of blood birthed the Four Calamities. The rest became the Scourges."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_061\".m_mContent: "So the four Moonblessed Cain spoke of... They correspond to the Four Calamities?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_062\".m_mContent: "Sheila of Pestilence. Ranna of Famine. And I… who am Death. That means only War remains."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_063\".m_mContent: "Four Moonblessed. Four drops of Dracula's Blood. That is the key to reaching the Far Side of the moon."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_065\".m_mContent: "No. Lady Limine was the last to inherit Dracula's power. Among the Scourges, she embodies Long Night."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_067\".m_mContent: "The most improbable answer may be the right one. And I suspect Noah thinks the same."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_069\".m_mContent: "What?! But he's a Bell Ringer—how could he be a Moonblessed?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_070\".m_mContent: "And he's the one who killed Noah, right here... Ah, could it be!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_071\".m_mContent: "When he took me from the Church, his aim was to use the blood of the Calamity to awaken the final Scourge."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_072\".m_mContent: "No wonder it felt strange at the time—he just let Aiona and me leave..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_073\".m_mContent: "Perhaps he meant let you leave. His true goal remains unclear, but the result is certain:"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_074\".m_mContent: "Once he arrives, all four Moonblessed will be gathered here, in Starfall Valley. And their destination will be..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_077\".m_mContent: "Sheila of Pestilence, Ranna of Famine, and... Noah of Death."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_078\".m_mContent: "Only three Calamities? A pity. I was hoping all of you'd be here."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_080\".m_mContent: "Hello, I'm Ami, the new Famine. I used to be the captain of the El Dorado."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_081\".m_mContent: "Just how badly do you want to be captain..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_082\".m_mContent: "Then I'm Hati, Pestilence—though I haven't fully mastered that power yet."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_083\".m_mContent: "Hey! Save the introductions—That woman is clearly no ordinary enemy!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_084\".m_mContent: "She is Joan Astolfo, Bell Ringer No. V and leader of the Chamber of War in the Church."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_085\".m_mContent: "Strange. I feel like I know you..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_086\".m_mContent: "No matter. I don't care who you were—You stand now as pawns of the Apocalypse."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_087\".m_mContent: "A Bell Ringer... the Church's strongest combatant! I can't believe I get to fight one!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_088\".m_mContent: "What are you so excited about? You can't even use your powers yet."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_089\".m_mContent: "Hmph! What's so great about the strongest? We have the Bathory's strongest fighter on our side—Elder Jacintha!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_090\".m_mContent: "I have someone to meet at the sealed area, so I'll wait for you there, meow."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_091\".m_mContent: "Wait—what?! We'd stand a better chance together! Why are you running off now?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_094\".m_mContent: "This… is the true power of Death?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_095\".m_mContent: "Ironic, isn't it? You, named for Death itself… Choosing to protect life."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_096\".m_mContent: "And you, leader of the Chamber of War, should be ending conflict. Yet here you are—relishing it."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_098\".m_mContent: "So the silver-haired one is here too? Perfect. You'll all fall before me!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_099\".m_mContent: "You're not worthy to be my opponent."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_100\".m_mContent: "Where's that arrogance coming from? You're up against three Bell Ringers!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_101\".m_mContent: "And if you keep playing dead after that speech… we're all in trouble."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_102\".m_mContent: "Ow, ow… give me a break. I just crawled out of a brutal fight—can't a man rest for one moment?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_103\".m_mContent: "Even with you, it's three against two. I despise uneven fights."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_104\".m_mContent: "Hey! One's Death and the other's a traitorous Bell Ringer. They don't deserve fairness!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip04_105\".m_mContent: "Then… what if I even the odds?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_001\".m_mContent: "No… We can't just leave Noah to fight them alone. I have to go back."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_002\".m_mContent: "Even if I haven't awakened my full power like Ami… if she can do it, so can I!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_003\".m_mContent: "Even if you could, you still wouldn't be able to defeat her."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_004\".m_mContent: "Hey! Are you insulting me and yourself at the same time?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_005\".m_mContent: "Ami is right. Back on Sunset Isle, even all of us combined couldn't defeat Acappella without Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_006\".m_mContent: "And Joan—leader of the Chamber of War—is far more skilled than she is."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_007\".m_mContent: "...Let's keep going. Noah won't break his promise. He'll make sure no one misses their return to the promised home."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_008\".m_mContent: "So what, we're just going to run away every time we see a Bell Ringer?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_009\".m_mContent: "What's wrong with running? Staying alive is what matters."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_010\".m_mContent: "Well said. Life is a precious miracle—cherish all life, and stay away from all calamities."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_012\".m_mContent: "No way… is it those rats again!?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_013\".m_mContent: "The Blood Beasts we encountered in Starfall Valley..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_015\".m_mContent: "Not offspring in the usual sense, but yes… they share its blood."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_016\".m_mContent: "Tch, just as annoying as the last one. Tell me they don't get back up too?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_018\".m_mContent: "Y-you're kidding! They regenerate faster than normal Blood Beasts?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_019\".m_mContent: "It appears someone is healing them from afar."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_020\".m_mContent: "Life is more fragile than you think—yet far braver than you'd ever believe."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_021\".m_mContent: "Those who share the gift of consciousness… should never raise arms against one another."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_023\".m_mContent: "It's not the beasts speaking. Someone behind them is sustaining them."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_025\".m_mContent: "Would you stay and speak with me… until this war is over..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip05_028\".m_mContent: "Yggdrasill... Among the Bell Ringers, he's as old as the Saints—perhaps older than the Church itself."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_001\".m_mContent: "You… you were there, in my memory. You sealed me with your own blood..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_004\".m_mContent: "No, no, no! We just bid farewell at Sunset Isle, so what is that longing!?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_005\".m_mContent: "Stay calm. On Sunset Isle, it's not uncommon to mistake memories… for longings."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_006\".m_mContent: "A Bell Ringer who betrayed the Church. Another risen from death. All gathered to stand by a Calamity. ...Fascinating."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_007\".m_mContent: "From a combat standpoint, this might be a perfectly matched opposition."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_009\".m_mContent: "It's been a while… or perhaps only a moment for you, Noah Nevernight. The one who died."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_010\".m_mContent: "Indeed. Though sixty-six years have passed, it felt like mere days while I slept."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_011\".m_mContent: "Stop treating me like a child! And stop avoiding my questions, Commander—!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_012\".m_mContent: "Thibault. Would you allow me a moment alone with this child? There are things I must say to her."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_013\".m_mContent: "Just as you did with me, back then...?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_014\".m_mContent: "Very well. I also have business with Silver-Haired."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_015\".m_mContent: "Um… do you want to speak with me?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_018\".m_mContent: "Still, I've been waiting to cross blades with you, Brennholt. Let's see what you're truly made of!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_019\".m_mContent: "This is... Sunset Isle? I'm back here again."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_020\".m_mContent: "Something wrong? You look uneasy. If you're tired, we can head in and rest."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_021\".m_mContent: "...Yes, I should have known when I remembered who I was."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_022\".m_mContent: "There you go again, saying strange things."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_023\".m_mContent: "You told me you'd wait for me… Wait until I came home. And that's exactly what you did. You waited—always."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_024\".m_mContent: "For sixty-six years we were at the Cathedral and you'd visit me..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_025\".m_mContent: "And after I awoke, you traveled with me through Starfall Valley, Mouret, Sunset Isle…"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_026\".m_mContent: ""Our home"—you never meant the cottage. You meant wherever we were together."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_026a\".m_mContent: "Thank you for staying by my side. Thank you for keeping your promise."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_027\".m_mContent: "You haven't changed at all. You always understand, even before I speak."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_028\".m_mContent: "Then will you keep your promise to me—and stay?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_029\".m_mContent: "Your power is far too dangerous. That's why the Saint chose to seal you alongside the equally dangerous Divine Body, Brain. Only eternal, beautiful dreams… can contain the Death that cannot die."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_030\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, Ressa... but this time, I have no choice but to break my promise."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_031\".m_mContent: "If you no longer wish to remain caught in this fleeting dream called Sunset Isle... Then let's go somewhere else."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_032\".m_mContent: "We can build a new reality—return to an ordinary life, just like before..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_033\".m_mContent: "But now I know who I am. I understand the power I carry… and the mission entrusted to me."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_034\".m_mContent: "I have promises to keep. People waiting for me beyond this dream. They pulled me back from the void, back from the dark."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_035\".m_mContent: "The life we shared… that quiet, ordinary time… It's a precious memory—one I'll carry always."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_036\".m_mContent: "But memories remain in the past. And dreams… Dreams are only dreams because we must wake from them."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_037\".m_mContent: "…Then I'll do what I must to keep you here. To ensure your survival."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_038\".m_mContent: "Is this truly the present you've chosen, Noah?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_039\".m_mContent: "And what about you? Have you found it yet? The future you've searched for all your life—Where no life will ever face death again?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_040\".m_mContent: "Since that day, I've lived countless lives… witnessed countless choices."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_041\".m_mContent: "And in the end, all it did was confirm my deepest fear: Time and space… are nothing but a circle."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_042\".m_mContent: "The more I cursed death, the more I came to understand it. I wanted to run from you—and find you again."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_043\".m_mContent: "The more I feared time, the closer it drew. So I returned to the Saint…"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_044\".m_mContent: "And received the baptism that made me a Bell Ringer."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_045\".m_mContent: "So you're using a Bell Ringer’s power to hold me here. Each of you can command a force of nature..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_046\".m_mContent: "Dust. The power of the earth—passed down through every Bell Ringer No. XI."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_047\".m_mContent: "The first believed the earth is both cradle and grave."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_048\".m_mContent: "He fought with its fury—clouds of dust swallowing his foes."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_049\".m_mContent: "And he healed with its grace—nurturing herbs, mending flesh, tilling life from soil."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_050\".m_mContent: "Every successor who bore his title followed in his footsteps, carrying the roots of all medicine forward."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_051\".m_mContent: "Then dust, and healing… Yes. Both suit you perfectly."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_052\".m_mContent: "When I accepted the Silver Blood ritual, I let go. The pain of crossing to the Other Side… The comfort of living by your side… All of it was replaced by a single purpose."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_053\".m_mContent: "I'm happy for you. The road to your dream may still be long, but at least now you walk it without doubt."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_054\".m_mContent: "And I'm glad for you. Though we've both lost the home we once shared, you've found people who await your return. You are no longer alone."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_055\".m_mContent: "Then let me go, Ressa. No… Bell Ringer Thibault."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_056\".m_mContent: "It is my duty to stop the four Calamities from gathering at the sealed area, Noah of Death."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_057\".m_mContent: "Nevernight... That name is all that remains to prove we once lived side by side. I won't let you near the Long Night."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_058\".m_mContent: "Then I will honor the name you gave me."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_059\".m_mContent: "And prove I will never be bound by darkness again."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_060\".m_mContent: "...What is this...? The entire Starfall Valley—it's trembling."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_061\".m_mContent: "This presence... Has the gate to the sealed area been opened?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip06_062\".m_mContent: "How?! With Joan standing guard—how did Agares reach the sealed area?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_001\".m_mContent: "This is... have I returned to the Church?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_002\".m_mContent: "With Thibault's power, I brought you back to the place where I once watched you grow."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_004\".m_mContent: "You can hear it, can't you? The heartbeat that proves I'm still here."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_005\".m_mContent: "Of course I hear it. That's exactly why I don't understand…"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_006\".m_mContent: "I left the Saint's sight because I had to seek the truth."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_007\".m_mContent: "And you've proven yourself more than worthy as my successor—beyond what I ever imagined."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_008\".m_mContent: "No... that's not what I wanted to ask."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_009\".m_mContent: "What I don't understand is... Why didn't you take me with you when you decided to leave?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_010\".m_mContent: "You're still a child. The road I've chosen is far too dangerous."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_011\".m_mContent: "Stop calling me a child. I'm over a hundred years old..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_012\".m_mContent: "So long as a mother lives… her child remains a child."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_013\".m_mContent: "Or have you stopped seeing me as your Commander?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_014\".m_mContent: "You'll always be my Commander. And that's exactly why I need to know... Why won't you tell me what you're trying to do?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_015\".m_mContent: "Silly child. All parents want just one thing—to see their children grow up in freedom."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_016\".m_mContent: "What kind of freedom would it be if you're not even by my side?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_017\".m_mContent: "Had you inherited your position through traditional means. Then, like me..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_018\".m_mContent: "...you would've received the memories of every Bell Ringer before you. And the memory of history itself."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_019\".m_mContent: "You'd realize there’s no such thing as freedom. Only a script we've all been forced to play."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_020\".m_mContent: "I chose to bear that weight alone. So you wouldn't have to. You're now Bell Ringer No. X."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_021\".m_mContent: "Even if your body is caged beneath the Cathedral, under the Church's constant watch… Your soul will remain free."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_022\".m_mContent: "You will always be my child. That wild, untamed soul who loves to sing."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_023\".m_mContent: "Even so... why did you come back?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_024\".m_mContent: "Because I've found a way. A way for both you and this world to be free. By shattering this false world imprisoned by time."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_026\".m_mContent: "Do you know? Humanity once had Black Blood running through its veins. We are descendants of Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_027\".m_mContent: "What are you saying?! Have you gone mad?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_028\".m_mContent: "Why do you think animals are unaffected by Black Blood? Yet humans lose themselves to it, becoming beasts?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_029\".m_mContent: "Because it's divine punishment for heresy, of course! Animals don't have faith, so why would they suffer?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_030\".m_mContent: "Or perhaps… we were beasts to begin with."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_031\".m_mContent: "And this "human form" is the true curse. A lie forced upon us by the Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_032\".m_mContent: "I don't… I don't understand you anymore. If that's true, then everything we believed in—it was all a lie?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_033\".m_mContent: "Black Blood is not a disease, Acappella. It is a return—to what we were."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_034\".m_mContent: "The Calamity is our ancestral truth. Chaos is the natural state of the universe."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_035\".m_mContent: "The Womb that traps us in cycles. The Fingers that feed upon life. The Heart that burns humans as fuel. The Brain that devours longing..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_036\".m_mContent: "The Divine Body that seals the thirteen drops of Ancestral Black Blood. It is not our salvation. It is our prison. A deception created by Aeon to confine humanity."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_038\".m_mContent: "I don't care if you truly believe this, or if you've simply lost your mind. All I know is this: You, Tris Tepes, are now an enemy of the Church. A heretic I must vanquish!"
