\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_039\".m_mContent: "...As I expected. You're still that righteous child. I knew you wouldn't accept this easily."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_040\".m_mContent: "Then show me how much you've grown."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_041\".m_mContent: "Why are you holding back?! Why don't you just kill me?!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_042\".m_mContent: "Because you see me now not as Tris—but as a Heretic, through the eyes of a Bell Ringer. That is your choice, Acappella."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_043\".m_mContent: "You knew what would happen if you said those things! You knew the moment you defied the Church, you'd be marked for death by every Bell Ringer!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_044\".m_mContent: "I know. But to stand against the Church, even if it means becoming what I once hated, is my choice."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_045\".m_mContent: "I should kill you. That's my duty. I can't let you fall any further into the abyss, but..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_046\".m_mContent: "Tell me what I'm supposed to do."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_047\".m_mContent: "Return to the Church, Acappella. If you cannot walk this path with me, then live."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_048\".m_mContent: "Even if the Saint begins to doubt you because of me... As long as you remain useful, she will protect you."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_049\".m_mContent: "But what about you? Who will protect you?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_050\".m_mContent: "Foolish child, now you understand the danger. This path was never safe."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_051\".m_mContent: "So pray. To Aeon, or to our true ancestral Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_053\".m_mContent: "This feeling... the sealed area! The Divine Body has been opened!?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_054\".m_mContent: "Agares has succeeded. As expected of the one who mastered both Silver Blood and Black Blood to their limits."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_055\".m_mContent: "That kind of person shouldn't exist! Even Joan couldn't stop him…"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip07_057\".m_mContent: "We've both made our choice, Acappella. So now… we walk forward."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_001\".m_mContent: "Gone for only a moment… and already you stand with the Bloodborn, Aiona Alita?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_002\".m_mContent: "Not a moment... It's been forty years since you were my mentor, Sir Yggdrasill."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_003\".m_mContent: "What!? This strange old man was Aiona's mentor?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_004\".m_mContent: "Wait, so Aiona's over forty? That makes her ancient! No wonder she always wears a veil."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_005\".m_mContent: "Aiona… do you truly work for the Church? Or are you with the Bell Ringers?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_006\".m_mContent: "She only assisted at my institute. I never taught her anything. Her true mentor… is Saint Seth."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_008\".m_mContent: "Can we stop calling him "old man"? He doesn't even look human—"old creature" is more fitting."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_009\".m_mContent: "Aiona... is what that blue-skinned person said true?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_010\".m_mContent: "So you've hidden this from them. Afraid, are you? Afraid of letting them see who you truly are?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_011\".m_mContent: "I’m sorry… Lady Empousa. I never told you… I once served as the Saint's priestess."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_012\".m_mContent: "I always suspected you were extraordinary. That ability to reverse time… and the fact that you never needed to drink blood..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_013\".m_mContent: "But please believe me. I joined the Bathory because I truly believe in your dream—returning to the moon."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_014\".m_mContent: "You aren't lying. But you haven't told them everything. There's something more you're looking for in the Bathory."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_015\".m_mContent: "Aiona... are you still keeping secrets from us?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_016\".m_mContent: "Because I know… The Bathory betrayed the Church. They destroyed the Divine Body they were sworn to protect."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_017\".m_mContent: "And I want to learn from you... From Elder Jacintha, and from Cain... How to destroy the Divine Body. The true enemy of the Alita family."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_018\".m_mContent: "Alita… Wait! I remember that name! The great family up in the frozen north—that's where you're from!?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_019\".m_mContent: "Back at the Ganelon Forbidden Grounds, you mentioned your family had guarded a Divine Body for generations. But why call it your enemy?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_020\".m_mContent: "Because every Divine Body holds power beyond human control. They have never been humanity's friends."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_021\".m_mContent: "But… aren't you a Bell Ringer? How can you speak like that about the Divine Bodies?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_022\".m_mContent: "Being a Bell Ringer is my duty. It does not define my beliefs. The task of guarding a Divine Body… is a curse upon every family burdened with it."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_023\".m_mContent: "Hmph. I never imagined someone like you existed in the Church. Then again… you don't even look human. What are you?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_024\".m_mContent: "All you need to know is this: Like you, I am simply one of many forms life may take."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_025\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry. Lady Empousa… Hati, Ami… I've hidden things from all of you. Even if you hate me for it..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_026\".m_mContent: "Hate you? I'm relieved! I was worried you were planning some horrible betrayal. This is way better."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_029\".m_mContent: "We both come from the same family background! Why did you have to run off with those smelly bats!? You should've joined us!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_030\".m_mContent: "Agreed. She'd have made a great captain on the El Dorado—second only to me, of course."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_032\".m_mContent: "You've found companions who truly understand you. This journey wasn't in vain after all."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_033\".m_mContent: "I know how much you despise lies and deception, Sir Yggdrasill."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_034\".m_mContent: "Now that I’ve been honest with them... Will you grant me one request?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_036\".m_mContent: "That's it? I was kind of hoping to test my powers against a Bell Ringer."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_037\".m_mContent: "Stop wasting your energy, jellyfish girl! We're not here to fight the Bell Ringer—we need to find the Moonblessed in the sealed area!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_040\".m_mContent: "From the start, he never intended to let me leave."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_041\".m_mContent: "The perfect fusion of the Alita bloodline and the Eye of the Divine Body… The Saint never wished for you to walk freely in the outside world."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_042\".m_mContent: "Expect us to ditch her and just walk away? Absolutely not!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_043\".m_mContent: "Your companions believe in you—Just as you believe in them. That is worth something. But—"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_045\".m_mContent: "Those rats… they're merging into some kind of monster!?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_046\".m_mContent: "I'm far too old for battle. As in all my work with the Church, I seek only to heal, to evolve, to preserve."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_047\".m_mContent: "But know this: I always keep my promises. Without exception."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_048\".m_mContent: "If you realize you cannot win, you are free to surrender and leave. But Aiona Alita must remain here."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_049\".m_mContent: "You're a good per—I mean, you're a good tree."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_050\".m_mContent: "How very kind of you, blue-skinned elder!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_051\".m_mContent: "We'll send both you and that ugly rat sky-high!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_056\".m_mContent: "I don't need you telling me how to fight!!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_057\".m_mContent: "Lady Empousa, you're injured. Please, let me heal you..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_058\".m_mContent: "Just this once, Aiona… stay back. Let us handle this."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_059\".m_mContent: "That’s right! We’ll send that smug old codger hiding in the back flying!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_061\".m_mContent: "That stance... Don't tell me he's about to use Compost?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_063\".m_mContent: "They too are living beings. They feel fatigue. They feel fear. You have won."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_064\".m_mContent: "So… you'll let us leave? Even Aiona?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_065\".m_mContent: "Aiona, you must remember. The prophecy, inscribed in the Church's sacred texts:"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_066\".m_mContent: "Death returns to hallowed soil. The Four Calamities converge as one. And the hour of judgment begins."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_067\".m_mContent: "War will stain the moon red. Scourges will devour the sacrifice. And then, everlasting night shall descend."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_068\".m_mContent: "What are you talking about? Judgment? Sacrifice? Everlasting night? I've never heard of any of this!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_069\".m_mContent: "Do you truly have the courage to witness each Scourge aroused by the final judgment? Do you truly understand what that means…?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_070\".m_mContent: "Can you endure the grief—of farewells from which there is no return?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_072\".m_mContent: "Probably a sign you're not eating right."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_073\".m_mContent: "This force… it's even stronger than that sea monster on the ship… Stronger than when Noah awakened… It's crawling beneath my skin—"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_074\".m_mContent: "...It's coming from the sealed area. The Divine Body's seal… it's been broken."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_075\".m_mContent: "Then go. Face the fate you've chosen."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_076\".m_mContent: "My kin of Dracula's blood… I can hear your heartbeats. Feel your breath."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_077\".m_mContent: "Come. Return to this place. Welcome the night of blood. Ascend to the moon's embrace."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_078\".m_mContent: "You've lost. No incantation can change that."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_079\".m_mContent: "(Coughs) As expected from the Chamber of War's leader. You must be one of the strongest Bell Ringers."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_082\".m_mContent: "What!? The seal on the Divine Body… it's been broken!?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_084\".m_mContent: "Looks like I succeeded. My mission was to keep you occupied."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_085\".m_mContent: "You're not Agares? Then who are you?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_086\".m_mContent: "I become whoever you need me to be."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip08_087\".m_mContent: "One of the last two Brennholts in this world."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_004\".m_mContent: "And here I thought the silver-haired Agares was something special. Guess even he can eat dirt."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_005\".m_mContent: "He might've ruled this dump once, but now I'm the strongest!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_006\".m_mContent: "My head... One more hit like that and I really might die here."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_007\".m_mContent: "Anyone else? No? Then the victory's mine!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_008\".m_mContent: ""Stay alive"... I thought that'd be the easiest promise to keep... What a hassle..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_009\".m_mContent: "Still alive!? You're standing after that? You're tougher than you look!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_010\".m_mContent: "Before we start again, tell me. Why are you so desperate to win?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_011\".m_mContent: "Isn't it obvious? Only the arena's top slave earns a surname!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_012\".m_mContent: "And what's the point of that? With a face like yours, everyone knows who you are anyway."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_014\".m_mContent: "Don't you get it? Without a surname, you stay a slave forever."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_015\".m_mContent: "Here, on Carrelle land, it's our only shot at changing fate!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_016\".m_mContent: "Doesn't seem so bad… being a slave. So long as you're still alive."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_017\".m_mContent: "Then let my fists show you what this world is really like!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_018\".m_mContent: "So I won. Not that it means anything."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_019\".m_mContent: "Just another day survived. Will tomorrow even be different?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_021\".m_mContent: "Run! If he holds a grudge, we're finished!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_023\".m_mContent: "Oh come on... Can't you stay down?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_025\".m_mContent: "Freedom... this freedom that you all yearn for, what exactly is it?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_026\".m_mContent: "Let me go see for you... whether such a thing even exists."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_027\".m_mContent: "From this day forth, you are granted the surname Brennholt. You are now Agares Brennholt."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_028\".m_mContent: "Huh. What a surprise. Brennholt... the name of the estate we came from. It just means 'firewood,' doesn’t it?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_030\".m_mContent: "No, of course not. I'm deeply grateful for your... generous gift."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_031\".m_mContent: "Someone will come for you at dawn. Make sure you're cleaned up."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_032\".m_mContent: "Might I ask who I'll be serving? Could it be the young lady of House Carrelle?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_033\".m_mContent: "You're just a slave! You don't get to ask questions!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_034\".m_mContent: "But I thought getting a surname meant I was no longer a slave?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_035\".m_mContent: "Hah! You fancy yourself witty, do you?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_036\".m_mContent: "Well... the other slaves say that a lot."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip09_037\".m_mContent: "The first time I died, I was a nameless slave, unworthy of life."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_002\".m_mContent: "The last time... a sea of fire took away my light..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_003\".m_mContent: "The great Lord Carrelle gave you new life. In his mercy, he even gave you the name Brennholt."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_004\".m_mContent: "Praise the great Carrelle! We who bear the name Brennholt will fight to the death for our lord!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_005\".m_mContent: "Wait... you mean everyone here is named Brennholt?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_006\".m_mContent: "Oh, you must be new! I'm Michel Brennholt. Looks like we'll be working together—let's give it our best!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_007\".m_mContent: "So they hand the name out like candy."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_008\".m_mContent: "Who said you could whisper?! Your lives belong to Carrelle now! Show your gratitude!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_009\".m_mContent: "Gratitude... For what? We don't even know what we're signing up for."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_010\".m_mContent: "Haven't you heard? Pass the trials, and we'll be more than slaves—we'll become Carrelle's warriors!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_011\".m_mContent: "Another arena, huh? Different walls, same bloodshed. Is that what they call freedom?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_012\".m_mContent: "Some of us even get promoted to castle guards! Imagine that!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_013\".m_mContent: "Should I call you confident... or just hopelessly optimistic?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_014\".m_mContent: "What if Princess Carrelle notices me and falls in love? My whole life could change!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_016\".m_mContent: "Who else! She's the only daughter. I hear she's beautiful and kind—nothing like the other nobles."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_017\".m_mContent: "Maybe so. Maybe she's the kind of girl who makes promises to slaves..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_018\".m_mContent: "You've met her? No, no. You're delusional. I've seen your type before."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_019\".m_mContent: "Of course. In her eyes, there's no difference between me and you."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_021\".m_mContent: "Oh! The trials are starting! I'm so excited!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_022\".m_mContent: "Wait... what's that smell? Burning meat... No—burning flesh..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_026\".m_mContent: "So that's why everyone's named Brennholt, kindling for the fire."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_027\".m_mContent: "Our fate was sealed the moment we were born. Being chosen is just another form of purpose."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_028\".m_mContent: "Fire... is this what freedom feels like? So hot it sears the soul."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_029\".m_mContent: "I imagined a hundred ways to die... But I never thought I'd burn."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_030\".m_mContent: "What hurts more, I wonder—this, or being beaten to death in the arena?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_032\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, my lady. I won't be able to keep our promise to stay alive."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_034\".m_mContent: "So not only am I getting burned alive... now I'm food too?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_035\".m_mContent: "Can you hear me? Can you hear my voice?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_036\".m_mContent: "Loud and clear. I'm overheated, not dead."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_037\".m_mContent: "How curious... So many Brennholts have been thrown into the flames. And yet you're the first to answer."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_038\".m_mContent: "Who are you? Death's errand boy? Sent by Aeon to drag me across?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_039\".m_mContent: "Aeon? Quite the contrary. I am his enemy."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_040\".m_mContent: "So you're the demon of the Heretics?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_041\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! Not wrong. That's what your god named me—Dracula, Son of the Demon."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_042\".m_mContent: "I've heard the stories. Thought you'd be something impressive. And yet here you are—rotting in a hole?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_043\".m_mContent: "Impressive?! I am power! It was Aeon who tricked my bloodline—Carrelle betrayed me, sealing me with the Divine Body’s Heart."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_044\".m_mContent: "To keep that filthy thing beating, they burn slaves as fuel. You're one of them."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_045\".m_mContent: "Then my bad luck, I guess. Too bad I'm almost ash—go bug the next Brennholt."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_046\".m_mContent: "Are you really content to vanish like this? I feel it in you—your will to live. Promises still unfulfilled."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_047\".m_mContent: "Your soul burns red. Crimson. A color worthy of my flame."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_049\".m_mContent: "Take my burning wings. Live. Fly. Together, we'll be free."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_050\".m_mContent: "The Divine Body's hunger grows... these sacrifices won't last long."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_051\".m_mContent: "Better go find more slaves before I end up next..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_053\".m_mContent: "Hey, I heard if you survive the trial, you become a Carrelle Warrior? Maybe even marry into the noble house?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_055\".m_mContent: "Such a shame... So that last part was a lie after all?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_057\".m_mContent: "Now there's a hard one. A slave? A phoenix? Or maybe... the Calamity—War?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_058\".m_mContent: "No... You... You're the demon sealed in the Divine Body..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_060\".m_mContent: "For the second time, I died in fire as a Brennholt."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip10_061\".m_mContent: "And this time, rose again with Dracula's blood. Wings born from flame."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_004\".m_mContent: "Sixty years—I broke the seal of the Divine Body."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_006\".m_mContent: "Now, six days is all I need to reclaim everything I have lost."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_007\".m_mContent: "Lord Agares, the Carrelle family has rejected our terms for negotiation."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_009\".m_mContent: "My apologies, my Lord... It appears the rumors were true. She..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_010\".m_mContent: "Mass Carrelle betrayed her family, and attempted to destroy the Divine Body before leaping into the flames—on the very day of your resurrection."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_012\".m_mContent: "Take this earring. One for you, one for me. If anyone dares to bully you, just tell them you're under my protection."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_013\".m_mContent: "What? You can't accept it just because you're a slave? Hmph! Well, when I become the head of the family, the first thing I'll do is abolish this whole slave system!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_014\".m_mContent: "Promise me you'll stay alive and become stronger. I need you by my side as my personal guard!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_016\".m_mContent: "Lord Agares, are you alright? Everyone is waiting for your orders."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_018\".m_mContent: "Do you see the Aquila banner atop the clock tower?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_019\".m_mContent: "0Yes, my Lord. It's the Carrelle family's banner, representing honor and freedom."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_020\".m_mContent: "Remember how it flies now, for this once-proud symbol will soon be no more than ash and memory."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_021\".m_mContent: "The Garden of Asta is fortified beyond compare. An assault with our current numbers would come at a steep cost, my Lord."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_022\".m_mContent: "Of course not with our current numbers."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_024\".m_mContent: "We're not the only ones who yearn for freedom and justice."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_025\".m_mContent: "They burn the "firewood" for the god, never knowing we shall burn too for vengeance."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_026\".m_mContent: "Tonight, the Carrelle family's thousand-year reign of bondage comes to an end."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_027\".m_mContent: "Lord Agares, the remaining nobles are willing to submit to your authority. Should we..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_028\".m_mContent: "Very well—cast them into the hollow of the Divine Body. I shall see to their execution myself."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_029\".m_mContent: "Yes, my lord… though, would that not be… rather severe?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_030\".m_mContent: "To light the dawn of a new era, these old nobles make perfect "firewood.""

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_031\".m_mContent: "I wish you could witness it—a new order reborn from the embers."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_034\".m_mContent: "The third time, my humanity died with the old era."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip11_035\".m_mContent: "But you are our hero—you forged a new era on this land."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_002\".m_mContent: "In the end, Time eroded my very being."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_003\".m_mContent: "How long have I been fighting them?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_004\".m_mContent: "Am I destined to be trapped here for the rest of my life?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_006\".m_mContent: "Agares Brennholt, usurping chancellor of the Carrelle family, your sins weigh too heavily upon you."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_007\".m_mContent: "To move forward from here, you must face the anguish of these ghosts."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_008\".m_mContent: "Agares... you'll pay for this in blood!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_009\".m_mContent: "Someone's waiting out there. Taking too long here would just be a bother."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_010\".m_mContent: "No choice then. Let's end this in one go."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_012\".m_mContent: "Congratulations. You have passed the final trial."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_013\".m_mContent: "Spare me... I don't want to hear another word about trials."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_014\".m_mContent: "So you're the new successor of the flame? Let's hope we get along—as allies and rivals, like the last of flame and water did."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_015\".m_mContent: "Impressive. What's the law behind your ability to make everything burn? Perhaps one day, I shall test it myself."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_016\".m_mContent: "To be chosen by the Saint is a precious honor. You truly are someone special."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_017\".m_mContent: "Agares Brennholt, from this moment forth you shall serve as the Second Bell Ringer, standing as our fellow guardian of the supreme order established by Aeon."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_018\".m_mContent: "How ironic. You, who claimed to usher in a new era, have pledged yourself to an order even more ancient than the Carrelle family."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_019\".m_mContent: "Don't be so rigid about it. All I know is that joining the Church has made certain things much easier. They even assigned me a Vice-Commander."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_020\".m_mContent: "Looks like you won't be needing my assistance for now."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_021\".m_mContent: "Then I shall look forward to that day in the near future when we return home together..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_022\".m_mContent: "Farewell and take care—you are, besides me, the only other "firewood" left in this world."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_023\".m_mContent: "The fourth time, it was time itself that took away my days of glory and all my companions."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip12_024\".m_mContent: "But the flame of the "firewood" will never die."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_001\".m_mContent: "No wonder Agares was able to plan these operations while evading the Church's watchful eyes all these years."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_002\".m_mContent: "It's you who kept him safe from the Bell Ringer's informants."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_003\".m_mContent: "It's a pity that when I transform into someone stronger than me, I can only access half their true power."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_004\".m_mContent: "But right now, you must have more important matters to attend to, correct?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_005\".m_mContent: "I don't need a pretender like you to remind me."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_007\".m_mContent: "It seems this is where we part ways."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_010\".m_mContent: "But if you have questions, come to me next time."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_011\".m_mContent: "I almost forgot you were still here."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_012\".m_mContent: "Let's make this quick. I need to hurry and find Empousa and the others."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip13_015\".m_mContent: "The moon appears stained with blood... What could this portend?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_001\".m_mContent: "Sir Gadric... forgive us. It's all because of our weakness."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_002\".m_mContent: "But it was your sacrifice that made us realize how meaningless this conflict truly is!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_003\".m_mContent: "I clearly smelled garlic… but where is he?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_004\".m_mContent: "Which one of you is Gadric without his helmet?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_005\".m_mContent: "By her attire, she must be an accomplice of the one who killed Sir Gadric!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_006\".m_mContent: "No, I'm with the Choir. Just passing through."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_007\".m_mContent: "The Choir... outwardly performing the most sacred duties, while secretly engaging in unspeakable acts..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_008\".m_mContent: "Whether it was former leader Tris or current Acappella, they're nothing but filthy killers!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_010\".m_mContent: "Killer of the Choir... Why don't you kill us?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_011\".m_mContent: "I didn't receive any order to kill the Church's soldiers."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_012\".m_mContent: "Sir Gadric... we're so sorry... we couldn't avenge you..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_013\".m_mContent: "If you're talking about Gadric, he doesn't die so easily."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_014\".m_mContent: "Huh!? You mean... he could come back to life?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip14_016\".m_mContent: "Looks like there's no time to find other Vice-Commanders—we need to find Acappella immediately."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_002\".m_mContent: "Don't tell me you're scared of thunder, dumb wolf."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_005\".m_mContent: "Didn't that old man promise to spare us? Why are there more and more of these things?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_006\".m_mContent: "The breaking of the Divine Body's seal has unleashed the Black Blood, causing them to evolve by themselves."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_007\".m_mContent: "The forbidden grounds my father protected suffered the same..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_008\".m_mContent: "We could barely handle one just now, and now there are so many of them..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_009\".m_mContent: "It seems I've arrived at just the right moment."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_010\".m_mContent: "Noah, is your battle with Joan over? And that thunder just now... what was it?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_011\".m_mContent: "Let's deal with these creatures first, then we can discuss everything else."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_012\".m_mContent: "You've truly grown—solving them with such ease!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_013\".m_mContent: "Looks like things are getting more interesting around the sealed area."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_014\".m_mContent: "Could this world-shaking upheaval be a deadly fight between Bell Ringers?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_015\".m_mContent: "She must have gone to stop Agares—we need to hurry there too."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_016\".m_mContent: "Your safety comes first. Why don't we wait until they've worn each other out before we make our move?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_017\".m_mContent: "You mean we can rest here for a while?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_018\".m_mContent: "I have a bad feeling about this..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_019\".m_mContent: "Are you worried that the thunder woman will come after us if she defeats the fire guy?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_020\".m_mContent: "Or are you worried about what the fire guy might do if he defeats the thunder woman?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip15_022\".m_mContent: "No, we seem to have forgotten something—there might be an even more dangerous being..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_001\".m_mContent: "I heard it—the call of my brethren, the bloodline of Dracula, and this stirring deep within my veins."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_002\".m_mContent: "Limine Bathory, the "Everlasting Night." Once we have you, we'll be halfway to achieving our long-cherished wish."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_003\".m_mContent: "Unfortunately, I won't let you have your way, Agares Brennholt."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_004\".m_mContent: "So this Bell Ringer is the avatar of thunder... Your speed far exceeds my expectations."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_005\".m_mContent: "Your cunning far exceeds my expectations—using the Heart of the Divine Body to revive your pawn and ordering her to impersonate you and stall us."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_006\".m_mContent: ""Pawn" and "order" are such harsh words. Mass and I are accomplices bound by a common ideal."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_007\".m_mContent: "That must be the third toll of the night."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_008\".m_mContent: "The time for idle talk is over."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_009\".m_mContent: "Now, with no one standing between us, let's have an all-out battle—just me and your true self."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_012\".m_mContent: "This is truly awe-inspiring! To witness the legendary Covenant of the Goddess of War for the first time—and in a battle against me, no less?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_013\".m_mContent: "In all fairness, I should inform you—I've seen your Covenant, Prometheus' Purgatory, and I'm afraid it won't work against us."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_014\".m_mContent: "There's no need to feel guilty about that, for I had already planned to face you in a different form, because..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_015\".m_mContent: "I'm also eager to reunite with my brethren!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_017\".m_mContent: "This is my true self... The first awakened Dracula from the prophecy—"War" of the Apocalypse."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_018\".m_mContent: "A stalemate... This is not good. I'm pressed for time, while you only intended to stall me all along."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_019\".m_mContent: "If anyone should be worried, it's me—I came here with the resolve to kill you."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_020\".m_mContent: "The next strike shall put an end to your sins."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_021\".m_mContent: "I didn't want to resort to this, but to defeat you, it seems I have no choice."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_023\".m_mContent: "How is this possible? How can Silver Blood and Black Blood coexist within you..."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_024\".m_mContent: "You think something like this would shake my resolve?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_025\".m_mContent: "Did I ever say your Covenant couldn't work against us?"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_026\".m_mContent: ""I miscalculated... The power of both Silver Blood and Black Blood combined cannot fell you in one strike...""

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_027\".m_mContent: "Is that what you thought I'd say? My real objective was to make you ignore what's behind you!"

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_029\".m_mContent: "Although the impostor can only move at less than half your speed, it was enough for me to make it here."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_032\".m_mContent: "Ugh, it burns! Want to know why you lost? Though you probably can't hear me anymore, I'll be kind enough to tell you."

\"Dialogue_B_100001_Clip16_033\".m_mContent: "You thought this was just a duel between Bell Ringers, but what's the truth?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_001\".m_mContent: "I heard it—the heartbeats of my kin, the resonance of blood born of Dracula."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_002\".m_mContent: "I heard it at time's end, the toll of the bell returning to zero."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_003\".m_mContent: "The Long Night draws near... and all returns to the beginning."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_004\".m_mContent: "Lord Agares, the survivors have regrouped and are on standby."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_005\".m_mContent: "Why are all of you here? Your orders were to delay the Church's reinforcements in Starfall Valley."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_006\".m_mContent: "The Kingdom alliance resisting the Church has arrived and seized control of the battlefield. So we've come to support you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_007\".m_mContent: "Earlier than expected... just like tonight's Blood Moon."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_008\".m_mContent: "My my, Cain is surprisingly dependable when he's our ally."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_009\".m_mContent: "Well... since our allies from the Kingdom are here, your mission is complete."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_010\".m_mContent: "As promised—you are free to return. From this day forward, no chains, no commands. You are your own."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_011\".m_mContent: "No, Lord Agares. Following you is our freedom!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_012\".m_mContent: "Come now, could you at least let me finish my heroic line?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_013\".m_mContent: ""Henceforth, I'll end this war myself!" ...or something along those lines."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_014\".m_mContent: "We've followed you since before you bore the Bell Ringer's title. And we still remember what you told us!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_016\".m_mContent: "Then all the more reason you shouldn't follow me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_019\".m_mContent: "For Lord Agares! For the freedom of will!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_020\".m_mContent: "Then follow me... and bear witness to the end."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_022\".m_mContent: "Stay back! Run while you still can—before the monsters reach us! Go!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_023\".m_mContent: "But I can't let them get to you..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_025\".m_mContent: "No... I don't want to be here... AHHH—!!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_026\".m_mContent: "What do I do... what do I do...!?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_028\".m_mContent: "I can't run... I have to kill this thing and get the message out!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_032\".m_mContent: "That weapon... You're Isaac Van Helsing of the Silver Cross!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_033\".m_mContent: "Forgive me, Lord Van Helsing! The rebel soldiers we were fighting... they suddenly turned into Blood Beasts, one after another. We were nearly wiped out."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_034\".m_mContent: "No... they haven't turned into beasts. They've become Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_035\".m_mContent: "Why are you the only ones here? Where's the Vice-Commander who was supposed to lead you?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_036\".m_mContent: "I came with Sir Gadric. He... he was killed. We were trying to get the message out..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_037\".m_mContent: "Even Gadric...? So this is Agares’s work. How many aces is he still hiding?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_039\".m_mContent: "At this rate, I'll be buried beside this garlic..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_040\".m_mContent: "Won't even live to see it sprout."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_041\".m_mContent: "So the report was true. A Bell Ringer's Vice-Commander is locked in a brutal fight."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_042\".m_mContent: "So, are you an agent of the Silver Cross, or companion to the silver-haired one?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_043\".m_mContent: "Friend or foe—that's for you to decide."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_044\".m_mContent: "But I'm definitely not with those things."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_045\".m_mContent: "...Rest well, Sir Gadric. I regret never crossing blades with you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_046\".m_mContent: "You may yet get your wish. Once he sprouts."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_047\".m_mContent: "They say all Bell Ringer Vice-Commanders are immortal Ascendants. Is it true?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_048\".m_mContent: "I've heard that ranked Silver Cross members are second only to the Bell Ringers in power..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_049\".m_mContent: "I want to know if that's true."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_050\".m_mContent: "So you want to finish our fight from Sunset Isle."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_051\".m_mContent: "This time, there'll be no superiors to get in the way."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip01_052\".m_mContent: "I wasn't working for that silver-haired. We fought side by side only because circumstances left us no choice."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_001\".m_mContent: "Surviving decapitation... I need to understand the Ascendants' secrets…"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_003\".m_mContent: "What? You as Vice-Commander? Did... something happen to Piera?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_004\".m_mContent: "She has crossed to the Other Side."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_005\".m_mContent: "My condolences... I knew how close you two were. I shouldn't have asked."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_006\".m_mContent: "Can she not be resurrected? Were her remains unrecoverable?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_007\".m_mContent: "You just want an excuse to fight, don't you?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_008\".m_mContent: "Come now—we're all allies here. Let's not break the peace we've managed to keep."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_009\".m_mContent: "Speaking of which, is everyone accounted for? If I recall, this operation was meant to be carried out by four Vice-Commanders."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_010\".m_mContent: "Not just us, but four Bell Ringers as well."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_011\".m_mContent: "Joan of the Chamber of War... My own Commander, Thibault... Your Choir’s Acappella... And for Van Helsing—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_012\".m_mContent: "Master Albrecht rarely travels. He's sent someone else in his place."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_013\".m_mContent: "Four Bell Ringers... What kind of enemy calls for this level of force?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_014\".m_mContent: "All four of the Calamities are converging here. Even a seasoned knight like you, Sir Gadric, was nearly struck down."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_018\".m_mContent: "Ah—never mind that. Looks like we've got more trouble heading our way."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_019\".m_mContent: "Again...? How many rebels have given in to the Black Blood?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_021\".m_mContent: "They don't look like Blood Beasts... More like Bloodborn—fused with Black Blood..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_022\".m_mContent: "You're right. Every last one of them was once with the Inquisition."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_024\".m_mContent: "It's not what he did—it's what they came to believe. From the looks of it, they joined him willingly."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_025\".m_mContent: "Seems we've underestimated what we're up against."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_026\".m_mContent: "Now, back to where we left off... With me standing in for Piera, are all four Vice-Commanders accounted for?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_028\".m_mContent: "That's odd. He's usually as swift and decisive as his superior, Joan. He should have arrived by now."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_031\".m_mContent: "If the four Bell Ringers are each to face the four Calamities... Then who are we, the four Vice-Commanders, meant to fight?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip02_032\".m_mContent: "Oh? Am I the first to arrive?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_002\".m_mContent: "Just a lost and helpless woman wandering through Starfall Valley."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_003\".m_mContent: "Hard to believe that from Lady Pavana, heir to House Astolfo."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_004\".m_mContent: "Pavana of Astolfo? They were assigned to guard the southernmost Divine Body. Have they turned against us too...!?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_005\".m_mContent: "That name—Astolfo... it's the same as Joan's."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_006\".m_mContent: "I'd advise you not to speak that traitor's name in front of me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_007\".m_mContent: "Compared to the so-called Desert Queen who became a Bell Ringer, you're the real traitors."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_008\".m_mContent: "The Silver Cross uncovered House Astolfo's betrayal long ago. Just like the Bathorys before them."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_009\".m_mContent: "Is that so? And here I thought my disguise was flawless. No point keeping up appearances now, is there?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_010\".m_mContent: "The Church's war machines!? How can you control them?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_012\".m_mContent: "What do you mean? The Church sold off its abandoned war machines... to the noble families?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_013\".m_mContent: "Or perhaps the rebellious families learned how to build them themselves."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_014\".m_mContent: "In this land, where the Black Blood once ran rampant... the Church fractured and turned on itself, while faith across the continent crumbled into dust."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_015\".m_mContent: "Ah—just picturing it sends shivers down my spine."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_017\".m_mContent: "Heh. A "person" as numb as you could never grasp true pleasure."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_018\".m_mContent: "Now, let us begin this tragic prelude of mutual slaughter!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_022\".m_mContent: "But how could those Divine Body families manufacture war machines without access to the Church's tech!?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_023\".m_mContent: "The process is clearly incomplete. They won't be hard to bring down."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_024\".m_mContent: "Real or fake, whether you win or we do—it no longer matters. The seeds of chaos have already been sown... in all four directions."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_026\".m_mContent: "Just as I thought. There isn't just one family in revolt."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_027\".m_mContent: "We were wondering what kind of threat warranted four Vice-Commanders."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_028\".m_mContent: "Now it all adds up—the Saint anticipated this."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_031\".m_mContent: "As expected of the Bell Ringers' Vice-Commanders. So quick to put the pieces together."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_032\".m_mContent: "If that's the case, we can't afford to be stalled here—especially not if they're after the sealed area as well."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_033\".m_mContent: "Oh? So you've figured that out too? Then I absolutely can't let you leave."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_034\".m_mContent: "Stay here and keep yourselves entertained with these "imitations"."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_035\".m_mContent: "I'll show you why an imitation can never replace the real thing."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_036\".m_mContent: "Save your fervor for another time. You're playing right into her hands."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_037\".m_mContent: "This isn't something you get to decide."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip03_038\".m_mContent: "So many imitations deployed at once... I've no choice but to—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_001\".m_mContent: "Is it really safe to leave Theophane alone against that many?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_003\".m_mContent: "But he's also the last survivor of his batch—and Joan's Vice-Commander, no less. He can handle it."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_004\".m_mContent: "If Theophane's here, then where is Lady Joan?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_005\".m_mContent: "The thunder you heard earlier... That was her."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_006\".m_mContent: "Then she must have arrived long before us... And yet—no sign of her since."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_007\".m_mContent: "She may already be inside the sealed area."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_008\".m_mContent: "But that's not our concern right now. Someone's approaching."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_010\".m_mContent: "I never expected our meeting would be under these circumstances."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_011\".m_mContent: "How pitiful—you've lost your mind, your will. Now you're nothing more than a puppet, dancing on the Church's strings."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_013\".m_mContent: "Is this the future you and Joan were fighting for?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_015\".m_mContent: "Then allow me to show you—what your teachings and her decisions have made of me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_016\".m_mContent: "Why do you hesitate? I am now your enemy. Isn't it your duty... to strike me down?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_020\".m_mContent: ""Never show mercy to an enemy, no matter the bond you share." That was your first lesson."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_021\".m_mContent: "Determination. Honor. All wiped clean by your beloved Church."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_022\".m_mContent: "Tell me. Why did you and Joan abandon our family?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_025\".m_mContent: "Then let me show you what House Astolfo has become."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_026\".m_mContent: "Van Helsing! Go to the sealed area—stop the fourth family!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_027\".m_mContent: "You mean the other families are already here?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_028\".m_mContent: "Two of them arrived at the same time."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_029\".m_mContent: "I'll leave here to you and hunt down the fourth family!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_030\".m_mContent: "I don't know from which direction they'll strike the seal, but I will stop them!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_031\".m_mContent: "The bone serpent...!? Then Ruthven is one of the traitors?! Then the last must be..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip04_032\".m_mContent: "I've always wondered... Are Ascendants truly immortal?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_002\".m_mContent: "It appears there was a fierce battle. Everything's been burned... utterly destroyed."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_003\".m_mContent: "But if there was a fight... where is everyone?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_004\".m_mContent: "No victors, no bodies. Was it a stalemate and they had to continue elsewhere?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_005\".m_mContent: "No... I think the battle's already been decided."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_006\".m_mContent: "...A golden spear? Whose weapon is this?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_010\".m_mContent: "She's the one who stopped us—surrounded by lightning."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_014\".m_mContent: "Of course he did! Would he be standing here otherwise?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_015\".m_mContent: "Wow! You're that strong now?! Took down a Bell Ringer alone? You have to teach me when we get back!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_016\".m_mContent: "No... I didn't win. Agares appeared and broke up the fight."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_017\".m_mContent: "Wait—him? That man with the sinister eyebrows?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_018\".m_mContent: "The situation... got complicated. From what I saw, he and Joan ended up fighting each other."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_019\".m_mContent: "That makes sense. Agares must have sought entry into the sealed area, and Joan, as its guardian, tried to stop him."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_020\".m_mContent: "So they fought here...? A battle between Bell Ringers—I wish I'd seen that!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_021\".m_mContent: "And now the headscarf woman's weapon lies here... abandoned."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_022\".m_mContent: "The gate to the sealed area's been forced open too. Just like when the forbidden grounds back home was breached..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_024\".m_mContent: "They're both Bell Ringers, right? I didn't think the gap between them would be that wide."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_025\".m_mContent: "It's like William and I both wanting to be captain—but I know I'd do a better job."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_027\".m_mContent: "What's even stranger is—where is she? If she lost, did she just vanish?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_028\".m_mContent: "Maybe she burned away? That happened to Noah once, didn't it?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_029\".m_mContent: "How can you say something that awful so casually...?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_030\".m_mContent: "Instead of her… I want to know where Agares went."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_031\".m_mContent: "Isn't it obvious? The gate's wide open—he's already inside."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_032\".m_mContent: "Then what are we waiting for?! We have to stop him!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_035\".m_mContent: "Are they going after that sinister eyebrows too?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_036\".m_mContent: "They're heading for the sealed area—but it looks like they plan to take us down first."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_037\".m_mContent: "Go on ahead. I'll hold them off."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_038\".m_mContent: "Alone again!? We just found you! Let me fight beside you this time!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_039\".m_mContent: "I haven't mastered Death's power. If I lose control... I could hurt you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_040\".m_mContent: "Have faith in Noah. He's nearly a Bell Ringer's equal now."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_041\".m_mContent: "Let's not slow him down. We should press on into the sealed area! This time, I swear I'll—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_042\".m_mContent: "Noah... you will return to us, won't you? I absolutely forbid you to..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_045\".m_mContent: "Is this what lies within the sealed area? The layout... it reminds me of our castle."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_046\".m_mContent: "Yet the murals and carvings have all been replaced. This is the Church's style."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_047\".m_mContent: "I can't say why, but something about this place feels... very off-putting."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_048\".m_mContent: "And no one's here to greet us."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_050\".m_mContent: "There are four paths ahead. Which one do we take?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_051\".m_mContent: "Three actually. The red door is closed."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_052\".m_mContent: "Then let's pick from the remaining three and stick together!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_054\".m_mContent: "Someone's calling me from down that corridor. I'll take the black door."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_055\".m_mContent: "...My instincts say I'm meant to follow the white path."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_056\".m_mContent: "What? You two are always joined at the hip, and now you want to split up?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_058\".m_mContent: "What do you understand? Don't tell me you're taking the gray door."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_059\".m_mContent: "Now I understand why the sealed doors opened and why the red door is shut."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_060\".m_mContent: "They are the Four Knights of the Apocalypse!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_061\".m_mContent: "Plague is the White Knight—whose power now flows through Hati. Famine, the Black Knight—passed her power to Ami through Ranna..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_062\".m_mContent: "The gray door is meant for Noah. And the red one... the one already closed..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_064\".m_mContent: "Then we've no choice. We’ll each follow the path that calls to us."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_067\".m_mContent: "So this is what lies within the sealed area... It feels like a twisted union—part Bathory, part Church."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_068\".m_mContent: "Three sealed doors... and one door left open. It seems my course is set."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_069\".m_mContent: "But something is wrong. Aside from Joan, I can't sense Ressa... no, Thibault, nor Acappella."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_070\".m_mContent: "They wouldn't simply let Agares pass without resistance."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_071\".m_mContent: "And they wouldn't have fallen—not Ressa. I know her strength."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_072\".m_mContent: "Unless... They faced something they never expected."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_073\".m_mContent: "What is this place? I know I stepped through the sealed gate... so why am I here?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_074\".m_mContent: "Ah, welcome, honored guest. You've wandered so far—why not rest awhile at my humble tea table?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_075\".m_mContent: "...So this is someone's trick, after all. How presumptuous. Don't tell me you truly believed..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_076\".m_mContent: "...A domain fashioned by mortals could bind a Bell Ringer?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_077\".m_mContent: "Just as I was told—fierce and fiery. A most spirited small guest indeed."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_078\".m_mContent: "Don't call me small! ...Who are you, to deflect my strike so easily?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_079\".m_mContent: "Nothing more than a humble butler. One who hopes to see his lady and companions reach the end they seek."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_080\".m_mContent: "Hmph... You're quite sure of yourself. But I'm not the only Bell Ringer in this place."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_081\".m_mContent: "You really believe you can keep all of us at bay?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_082\".m_mContent: "That would be... difficult. But I did say I strive to be a dutiful butler. And if it is my lady's wish..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_084\".m_mContent: "Cain Lamboza. Your name precedes you. Once a brilliant alchemist—until you allied with the Bathorys."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_085\".m_mContent: "I'm honored by your praise, Doctor Thibault."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_086\".m_mContent: "The Saint foretold four noble houses would betray the Church... That they would gather here, with the traitor Agares, to awaken the Long Night."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_087\".m_mContent: "So the Bathorys were the fourth. And yet not a single Vice-Commander detected your movements..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_088\".m_mContent: "Did you use the reversed linkage of the Divine Body’s Wings to invade from below once the seal was undone?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_089\".m_mContent: "Precisely. A flawless deduction. And to think—I went to such trouble returning Noah to your side."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_090\".m_mContent: "Then it was you... You were the one who revived this Noah."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_091\".m_mContent: "Ah, but what's the rush? We've all the time in the world to discuss such things, don't we? After all..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_092\".m_mContent: "We are blessed with something close to eternity... are we not?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_093\".m_mContent: "Life and eternity are contradictions by nature."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_094\".m_mContent: "After everything you saw beside Seth... after all that... Is that still the conclusion you've reached?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_095\".m_mContent: "I would not call it a conclusion. More... a question I have learned to carry."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_096\".m_mContent: "So you have changed after all. The man who once believed nothing existed beyond his own mind... Now dares to seek the answers of others."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_098\".m_mContent: "Whether I can truly hold you all within this domain..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_099\".m_mContent: "Whether my lady's long-cherished wish might yet be fulfilled..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip05_100\".m_mContent: "And as for him... Will he, at last, find the answer to the question that haunts his every step: "Who am I?""

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_001\".m_mContent: "Hey, bat—don't you think this is a little too easy? We haven't seen a single enemy so far..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_002\".m_mContent: "Isn't this the best? You're the one who chose this path. Hopefully, we'll regroup with the others soon enough."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_005\".m_mContent: "Enough with the games! Show yourself if you have something to say!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_007\".m_mContent: "It seems the young lady has grown quite a bit during this little journey... meow."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_008\".m_mContent: "Spare me the flattery and drop that form!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_009\".m_mContent: "Miss Dalcarlo... You left so suddenly back there. I thought you'd abandoned us."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_011\".m_mContent: "Oh no, Lady Empousa... this is no mere flattery. Even your mind has grown sharper."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_012\".m_mContent: "You say you have plans—but whose side are you truly on?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_013\".m_mContent: "The Empress guides the Star home... Yet on the far side of the Moon, there is only darkness."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_014\".m_mContent: "Miss Dalcarlo—are there others with you? Weren't you waiting for us here, in the sealed area?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_015\".m_mContent: "She was waiting for us. But this time..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_017\".m_mContent: "Wait—she's a Bathory, isn't she? Why is she attacking us?!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_018\".m_mContent: "...I'd like to know that myself. Jacintha—whose side are you really on!?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_019\".m_mContent: "Is it that sinister eyebrows? Have you joined him? Or is it... Cain? Are you working with him now!?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_020\".m_mContent: "I won't deny we share certain goals. But to say I serve them? No, no... that's not quite right."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_021\".m_mContent: "I have only ever served one lady. And I already told you who that was, when we were outside."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_023\".m_mContent: "Yes. Lady Limine lies in deep slumber, far below this sealed ground..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_024\".m_mContent: "But doesn't that make this stinking bat your lady as well? Why would you still fight us?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_025\".m_mContent: "Because... she wants to bring Mother back. So this... all of this... was for that."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_026\".m_mContent: "But what's that got to do with us? You got some bad blood with your mother or something?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_027\".m_mContent: "No... That's not it. Mother doesn't hate me. She... needs me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_028\".m_mContent: "She needs me... as a vessel for her resurrection."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_029\".m_mContent: "W-what?! What kind of mother does that?! What kind of family is this!?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_030\".m_mContent: "I've known since the beginning. Secretly saving Noah... seeking the Moonblessed who still believed in freedom..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_031\".m_mContent: "Somewhere along the way, I almost forgot. Forgot who I really was..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_032\".m_mContent: "From the beginning... I was no one. Only a vessel. For Mother. For Limine Bathory."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_033\".m_mContent: "Congratulations for facing the truth. You've grown into a worthy heir to the Empress."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_034\".m_mContent: "Come with me. If I had my way, I would never raise a hand against the Empress's child."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_035\".m_mContent: "Is this some kind of jest?! I don't care what twisted bloodline you serve or what rules you follow!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_036\".m_mContent: "If I don't protect this stinking bat—I'll be breaking the Ganelon family motto!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_037\".m_mContent: "Such spirit. But listen well, young one. When faced with a foe you cannot possibly defeat... You'd do well to value your life more."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_038\".m_mContent: "Don't underestimate me! When I made up my mind to protect that stinky bat, I felt it—my whole body surged with strength. Maybe, from the very beginning..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_039\".m_mContent: "The power my family taught me was the power to protect!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_041\".m_mContent: "These children are the future of those who have none. Let us not bind them to the cycle of sorrow their elders could not escape..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_042\".m_mContent: ""Who in this world is truly in the right?" ...such a heavy thing to consider."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_043\".m_mContent: "Perhaps it's best left to an adult like me to discuss this with you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_044\".m_mContent: "I thought you and Agares... are our allies."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_045\".m_mContent: "Just as Empousa once believed you stood with her, before stepping into this place."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip06_046\".m_mContent: "Then am I to understand... that once we stepped into this place, our alliance—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_001\".m_mContent: "I was moving too fast to notice earlier, but aren't those the same paintings all over the walls?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_002\".m_mContent: "They appear to depict pilgrims gazing at the sea... the sky... and time?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_004\".m_mContent: "Those three figures at the center—are they children?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_005\".m_mContent: "They look more like rocks than kids. How can you tell?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_006\".m_mContent: "I've heard a tale like this before, hidden within the Saint's scripture."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_007\".m_mContent: "At the end of time in every world, all wills will converge into one. Then 'he' will sail the ark to the Other Side."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_008\".m_mContent: "On the Other Side, 'he' will weave the 'preordained history' into new time, and from it, forge worlds that repeat."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_009\".m_mContent: "So in the end, we will all die and become one..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_010\".m_mContent: "Then 'he' will take us to another world to live, die, and live again. Over and over."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_011\".m_mContent: "I thought the tale would be difficult to grasp... Yet Ami has explained it more clearly than I ever could."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_012\".m_mContent: "I think I've heard it before. It doesn't sound as dry and complicated when I say it, huh?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_013\".m_mContent: "...So I'm a poor storyteller? That's a bit disheartening."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_014\".m_mContent: "But the version I know says there was a war before everyone became one."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_015\".m_mContent: "Yes. A final clash between three wills who could not become one. And so, they destroyed each other before the unification."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_016\".m_mContent: "Are these the children in the painting? Fighting like that… it's not right."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_017\".m_mContent: "They didn't want to. But perhaps this is what humans..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_018\".m_mContent: "No, this is the fate of all conscious life..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_019\".m_mContent: "Born with self-awareness, they gain freedom. But swollen egos bring conflict."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_020\".m_mContent: "Seth must have been heartbroken... watching her brothers fall by each other's hands."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_021\".m_mContent: "Seth… the Saint, right? Now I get it."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_022\".m_mContent: "You said you read this in her scripture, but it was really her diary. I keep one too!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_023\".m_mContent: "I honestly can't tell, Ami... Are you just that naive, or secretly a genius?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_024\".m_mContent: "But one thing still puzzles me. Why would this tale be carved into the walls of this sealed place?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_025\".m_mContent: "—Perhaps because one from the Bathory line once took part in that story."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_028\".m_mContent: "My blade takes no pleasure in bloodshed. My ears abhor the sound of screaming..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_029\".m_mContent: "So allow me to offer you a swift and peaceful death."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_030\".m_mContent: "I know Gilrain's abilities... I'll find a way to hold him off. Ami, you head on first."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_031\".m_mContent: "That makes me sound weak. I can transform too. I'll protect you. You go ahead."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_032\".m_mContent: "Many bask in the light as if it were eternal, forgetting that only shadow endures through every turn of day and night."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_033\".m_mContent: "And without the light... how would you even know what casts a shadow?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_034\".m_mContent: "I once thought that as long as the light cast mine, you'd catch up eventually."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_035\".m_mContent: "But the truth is... you didn't stop. You lost your way. You've become something monstrous, Gilrain."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip07_036\".m_mContent: "Why are you here of all places..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_001\".m_mContent: "So this whole setup was just to let me watch your little family squabble?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_002\".m_mContent: "This is a family matter. We'd prefer no outside interference."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_003\".m_mContent: "Besides, I'm sure you're eager to see how it all plays out. After all, your beloved Commander has been drawn into this conflict."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_004\".m_mContent: "You must be dying to know—why did she come here? What is she fighting for? So many questions... waiting for her to answer."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_005\".m_mContent: "Mind your own business! Whatever's between me and the Commander—I'll settle it myself!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_006\".m_mContent: "Are you not the least bit curious…"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_007\".m_mContent: "Why a fifth Bell Ringer—unforeseen—would appear? Friedrich Roland of the Light."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_008\".m_mContent: "I do not believe this Friedrich is real… yet the Gilrain who faces him—he is no illusion."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_009\".m_mContent: "Truth and falsehood… both illusion and reality—they together weave the world as we perceive it."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_010\".m_mContent: "They were both your students once. And now they cross blades unto death. Does that stir nothing within you?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_011\".m_mContent: "As I recall… you once studied alongside Albrecht. Why then do you now stand as his sworn foe?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_012\".m_mContent: "Speaking to an old, hollow tree like you drains the spirit. But I suppose I've stalled you long enough..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_013\".m_mContent: "Noah keeps running into powerful foes... yet you show no concern."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_014\".m_mContent: "He lived with me. In this world, he is unlikely to meet an opponent stronger than I. He'll survive."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_015\".m_mContent: "I must commend you… Miss Ressa, the Saint's Left Hand, and Noah, the Greatest Calamity—your balance of poise and precision is admirable."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_016\".m_mContent: "But tell me—do you still believe you can defeat me? Here, within my domain… where no Covenant may take form?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_017\".m_mContent: "I see. You've cut off our connection to Aeon… This space of yours nullifies the Covenant's reach."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_019\".m_mContent: "It is not space that bars you, but time. Our present is frozen."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_020\".m_mContent: "Time may be intangible, but it governs all motion, all record."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_021\".m_mContent: "In this place where time stands still, you may strike, scream, pray... But nothing shall pass beyond this moment."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_022\".m_mContent: "No deed shall be etched into time, or carried into the next moment."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_023\".m_mContent: "What you're implying is… you command time itself? As the Saint once did?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_024\".m_mContent: "I enjoy keeping secrets—but I do not lie. If I tell you this, it is only because I do not fear your knowing it."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_025\".m_mContent: "You claimed there are few in this world who surpass you—and that Saint Seth was one such soul."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_026\".m_mContent: "Do you believe I may be another?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_028\".m_mContent: "Yes, I acknowledge your strength… You may well be one of the few who could rival the Saint."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_029\".m_mContent: "But I never said the Saint was stronger than I am."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_030\".m_mContent: "Hey now... Seth never mentioned anyone quite like you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_031\".m_mContent: "The Other Side... In all my travels across countless worlds, I theorized that time itself was made of countless Other Sides."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_032\".m_mContent: "But you've shown me something else—A Side untouched by time, where nothing flows forward..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_033\".m_mContent: "That is the true source of your power."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_034\".m_mContent: "Noah Nevernight was the first to slip through the cracks of my design. But you... you've surpassed even him."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_035\".m_mContent: "And to think the two of you were bound so closely... Good thing that little dream has ended."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_036\".m_mContent: "I once heard a tale from some Other Side..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_037\".m_mContent: "At the end of time, before all wills could finally become one, three irreconcilable wills began to argue over who was truly right..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_038\".m_mContent: "They were the beginning, and they will be the end: Seth, Abel… and Cain."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_039\".m_mContent: "But surely you don't mean me. It's just a name. A common one at that."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_040\".m_mContent: "In that tale, Cain slew Abel and fed his blood to the beasts. Even Seth feared him."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_041\".m_mContent: "In that case, Cain should've become the master of the new world... That's why it couldn't have been me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_042\".m_mContent: "No. In the end, he paid the price. Exiled for the blood he shed."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_043\".m_mContent: "It was Seth who tattled to god. Seized victory without a fight, and took the world as Aeon's agent."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_045\".m_mContent: "We're merely telling stories, Doctor. And what are stories without a little imagination?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_046\".m_mContent: "Did you spin the same tale for Agares? When you swayed him to your side."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_047\".m_mContent: "So I suppose it is because of Ressa's destruction that you're capable of navigating your own nodes now."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_048\".m_mContent: "You possess overwhelming force. But in the end, your focus faltered."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_049\".m_mContent: "After all, you're holding back three Bell Ringers at once."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_050\".m_mContent: "Three? You're still underestimating me. You forget—there's one more I've had to keep preoccupied..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_051\".m_mContent: "You asked how I swayed Agares? Actually from the very beginning..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_052\".m_mContent: "...Wasn't it you who sought me out? And now, you would betray our alliance?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_053\".m_mContent: "You helped revive my silver-haired friend, led him to Famine and Plague. For that, I'm grateful."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_054\".m_mContent: "Grateful? So you repay your kindness by sending your two underlings to keep Empousa from me?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_055\".m_mContent: "I have no underlings. Those who fight beside me are companions—bound not by orders, but by shared will."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_056\".m_mContent: "…Ah, but I forget. A man like you wouldn't know what companions are."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_057\".m_mContent: "After all, weren't you the one who broke our pact first?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_058\".m_mContent: "I gathered the Four Calamities, just as the prophecy ordained. I awakened the Long Night—first of the Nine Scourges—to merge with you all..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_059\".m_mContent: "I guided you step by step into becoming the true Dracula, to lead everyone back to the Moon."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_060\".m_mContent: "So tell me, Mr. Brennholt. Where did I go so wrong that you would claim I broke our pact?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip08_061\".m_mContent: "Indeed—up to this point, we've followed every step of the pact. But the tragedy is… We both uncovered the other's intent to betray—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_001\".m_mContent: "So this old soul wakes once more from rust and ruin... to cross blades with you again."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_002\".m_mContent: "Silver hair, crimson eyes... cold, yet burning with might. How I have longed for this day—Noah Nevernight!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_003\".m_mContent: "I thought I'd left Sunset Isle behind. But I suppose this whole world is just another Sunset Isle in disguise."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_004\".m_mContent: "Though if I'm being honest—you're not someone I've been longing to see."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_005\".m_mContent: "You don't look the least bit surprised."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_007\".m_mContent: "What does life or death even mean to a suit of armor without flesh... Or a puppet, with four arms and two companions?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_008\".m_mContent: "Oh, don't mind me. I'm sure the he has plenty of nostalgic words to share."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_010\".m_mContent: "Your blood pressure—it's no longer the same as when you first came to the castle. Has Death fully claimed you?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_011\".m_mContent: "So you want to test yourself against me... now that I'm whole."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_012\".m_mContent: "That night—when you crushed me like an insect, even at the height of my power... is not something I'll ever forget!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_013\".m_mContent: "Apologies. I only remember days with my friends—and you are not one of them."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_014\".m_mContent: "Looks like the conversation's over. For someone so admired, he really is heartless, isn't he?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_016\".m_mContent: "Then allow me to leave an impression!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_018\".m_mContent: "Must be all those high-grade relics I so kindly sold him."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_019\".m_mContent: "Then we're amazing! We must spread the word!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_020\".m_mContent: "This power... The prophecy spoke true—Death's domain has awakened. You are my destined foe!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_021\".m_mContent: "I don't care about your fate or your delusions. If you yield, then step aside."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_022\".m_mContent: "Then perhaps this will interest you. The other two Elders have already arrived..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_023\".m_mContent: "No doubt they've dealt with that failure Empousa—and the traitor, Alita."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_024\".m_mContent: "...Cidhall and Dalcarlo? Don't tell me—Cain's here too?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_026\".m_mContent: "Follow the wind and grant them salvation!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_027\".m_mContent: "Oh? So the castle rats followed us after all."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_028\".m_mContent: "No wonder I sense someone tailing us..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_031\".m_mContent: "Tch... what difference do two mice make? Cidhall and Dalcarlo surely have won by now."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_032\".m_mContent: "You know you can't beat Noah on your own. That's why you’re counting on them to harm his allies."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_033\".m_mContent: "You impudent Aegis whelp! How dare you speak to me that way!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_034\".m_mContent: "Hah. And to think—this was the monster I once feared. You're nothing now but a broken relic, rusting in disgrace."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_035\".m_mContent: "Because you really have grown stronger lately, Loudmouth."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_037\".m_mContent: "And you—only here because Lord Agares revived you with his flames."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_038\".m_mContent: "What?! How do you know of that!?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_039\".m_mContent: "Oh dear. Seems your little secret got out."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_040\".m_mContent: "Told you we should've charged for silence!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_041\".m_mContent: "So you have been learning things while I was gone."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_042\".m_mContent: "You're not the only one who's changed. We all have our paths. And we've been walking them, with or without you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_043\".m_mContent: "Indeed. A flickering demon and a wavering puppet—more than manageable for the two of us."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_044\".m_mContent: "How could I possibly leave you behind..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_045\".m_mContent: "We knew you'd say that. This part of you hasn't changed at all."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_046\".m_mContent: "Listen, Noah! We've uncovered something terrifying about Empousa!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip09_047\".m_mContent: "Cain and the others plan to sacrifice her to awaken the Scourge—the Long Night herself: Limine Bathory!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_001\".m_mContent: "Children of Dracula's blood—do you hear it? Two tolls, ringing for you."
