\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_002\".m_mContent: "One rings at dusk—a sacred rite yearning for the fall of night."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_003\".m_mContent: "The other at midnight—a final summons to unite all blood."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_004\".m_mContent: "War spreads. Confusion deepens. The old world withers. And from its corpse, a new age shall rise."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_005\".m_mContent: "We—the children of Dracula—are awakening. And together, we shall return... to the Other Side."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_006\".m_mContent: "Just days ago, in that broken carriage... I never imagined you would become the end of my journey."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_007\".m_mContent: "When I stole you—the spark—from the Grand Cathedral, I didn't expect you'd follow every step of my design so perfectly."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_008\".m_mContent: "Then perhaps you should thank your accomplice—Cain."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_010\".m_mContent: "A falling-out? I don't know either of you well, but somehow that doesn't surprise me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_013\".m_mContent: "Your hatred for those who burned you surely outweighs your hatred for those who brought you back."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_014\".m_mContent: "But I believe you'll accept my offer..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_017\".m_mContent: "According to our plan, a civil war will erupt in Starfall Valley. It will break the Blood Moon Seal."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_018\".m_mContent: "Cain will then link the Bathory castle's Mausoleum to this place—delivering the sacrifice needed to raise Limine."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_019\".m_mContent: "Sacrifice? You mean the "vessel" for that vile ritual you so shamelessly glorify."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_020\".m_mContent: "Just as the Moonblessed began accepting the name 'Calamity' from mortal tongues... a name is just a name."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_021\".m_mContent: "So, who did you choose to be your sacrifice? Not Empousa?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_022\".m_mContent: "Correct. She wasn't part of the original plan. The acceptable one... Lamia, I believe her name was."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_023\".m_mContent: "With the present of the four Apocalyptic Moonblessed, Limine will become the fifth blood."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_024\".m_mContent: "The prophecy fulfilled. The Long Night returns, the First Scourge awakens. Then we gather the other eight..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_025\".m_mContent: "And you expect me to nod along while lives are thrown away for your hollow fantasy of returning to the moon?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_026\".m_mContent: "But Cain plans to use Empousa regardless. If he succeeds..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_027\".m_mContent: "Limine would awaken stronger than any of us. And who knows who'd she choose as her first meal."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_028\".m_mContent: "Which is why I won't let her surpass me. And you won't let Empousa die."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_029\".m_mContent: "There are no eternal friends, only eternal profits. Cain is now our common enemy."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_030\".m_mContent: "If Death and War unite... perhaps we could stop him."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_033\".m_mContent: "You and Cain both treat lives as pawns for your schemes."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_034\".m_mContent: "I have no interest in your war. I have my own goal—I will save Lamia as well."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_035\".m_mContent: "As expected of you. Naive. Stubborn. And strong enough to see it through."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_036\".m_mContent: "And next time you want to negotiate... Come in person."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_037\".m_mContent: "So our little silver-haired one really does have the grit and cleverness Agares spoke so fondly of..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_038\".m_mContent: "Then let me see if your strength matches the praise I gave you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_039\".m_mContent: "I don't understand how you can wear another's face so easily... but the power you wield—it pales beside the original."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_040\".m_mContent: ""Wear another's face"? So that's your shallow little theory, like all the rest."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_041\".m_mContent: "Do you truly believe I'm just copying people? That anyone could do such a thing, you fool?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_042\".m_mContent: "What are you trying to say? You're clearly—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_043\".m_mContent: "Do you even know who I am now? Who I was, before?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_044\".m_mContent: "Or, after walking this fated journey of yours, do you even know who you are?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_046\".m_mContent: "Then let me—the heart of the Divine Body—show you what you truly are."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_047\".m_mContent: "Let us retrace the path you've taken... Back to the beginning, where the heart gives rise to form."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_048\".m_mContent: "This is... the El Dorado? How did I return here?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_049\".m_mContent: "And these two—Jones, from Van Helsing's squad, and William... the Captain's brother."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_050\".m_mContent: "Hmph. Even if he is that capable, he couldn't possibly anticipate my contingency plan..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_053\".m_mContent: "That's right, Captain Goldland. Everything rests on your decision."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip10_054\".m_mContent: "Kris? ...Goldland? Are they calling out to... me?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_001\".m_mContent: "What have I become… Who am I?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_002\".m_mContent: "What's that supposed to mean? Aren't you my brother Kris? Or should I call you Captain Goldland, seeing as we're still on the ship."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_004\".m_mContent: "You tell me. You're the one who barged in, shouting for answers."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_005\".m_mContent: "That's right! You said Van Helsing uncovered our plan. So what now?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_006\".m_mContent: "Then we silence him. He was never meant to walk these decks anyway."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_007\".m_mContent: "...Is this a glimpse into Goldland's past?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_008\".m_mContent: "He says nothing... That's as good as a yes."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_009\".m_mContent: "But Van Helsing is the Eighth of the Silver Cross... Can we really take him down?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_010\".m_mContent: "He looked like nothing but a pampered noble who inherited his title. Why would I be afraid of him?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_011\".m_mContent: "He's more than his title. You won't be able to handle him."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_012\".m_mContent: "That's why we need your help, Kris... no, Captain Goldland."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_013\".m_mContent: "...But this body holds no memory of battle. In this state, I can't win."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_014\".m_mContent: "That's fine. We don't need you alive to be of use..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_015\".m_mContent: "This body... it truly can't fight... So this is the helplessness that ordinary man feel?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_016\".m_mContent: "Are you sure about this? He's the captain of the El Dorado... and he's your..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_018\".m_mContent: "...After all, only the dead stay silent."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_021\".m_mContent: "Van Helsing?! Don't tell me Bob couldn't even slow him down..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip11_026\".m_mContent: "Skoll! You have to hang in there!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_001\".m_mContent: "(Coughing) ...This body is even weaker than the last..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_003\".m_mContent: "Skoll! You have to hang in there!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_006\".m_mContent: "What's with him? Why is he suddenly talking to me like we're close…? Something's not right."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_008\".m_mContent: "So… what happened on the El Dorado wasn't a dream."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_011\".m_mContent: "His blood is black... Have you been in contact with the carriers?!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_012\".m_mContent: "You! Don't you know how fast the Black Blood disease spreads? Why did you..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_013\".m_mContent: "Were they drawn here by our arguing?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_014\".m_mContent: "This body… it feels like it wants to move."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_015\".m_mContent: "Is it the will to live—or the urge to protect her...?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_016\".m_mContent: "But… no matter how strong the will, I'm still just a man… a man infected by Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_017\".m_mContent: "This body is near its end... If this keeps up... (growling) ...am I turning...?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_018\".m_mContent: "Skoll... you must be in so much pain. You've always been the one who hated pain the most..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_019\".m_mContent: "No... If I survive, only to turn into one of them..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_020\".m_mContent: "Gadric once told me… emptiness is worse than death."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_022\".m_mContent: "But you returned to your homeland, and you were with us until the very end. Your life was anything but empty."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_025\".m_mContent: "And then alive again… Who will I become this time?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_026\".m_mContent: "This place… I recognize it. The spot where I woke after reviving in Bathory Castle…"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_028\".m_mContent: "Does this mean… I‘’m back in my own body?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip12_029\".m_mContent: "What's wrong? Why are you looking at me like that?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_001\".m_mContent: "Are these bats also considered Blood Beasts?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_002\".m_mContent: "They're likely Vassals born of Lady Lamia's power."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_003\".m_mContent: "Are you alright? You look a bit pale..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_004\".m_mContent: "Don't lose focus! I'm just not used to this new body yet."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_005\".m_mContent: "Now that you mention it… I'm not exactly used to this one either."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_007\".m_mContent: "Wait... If I handle this, I might get a better grasp of Cain's power."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_008\".m_mContent: "We can take shelter inside if we get through the corridor. You guys go first, I'll cover you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_010\".m_mContent: "Different? I'd say the opportunity I've waited for has finally come."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_012\".m_mContent: "Don't you remember? Cain once told us, if ever we sensed he was no longer himself—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_013\".m_mContent: "—we could kill him without hesitation. His true self… can't die."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_014\".m_mContent: "He might've said something like that, but none of us had any idea what he meant."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_015\".m_mContent: "How unfortunate. Seems I'm the only one who understood him."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_017\".m_mContent: "To the Hall of the Elders… to play my part in the spectacle."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_018\".m_mContent: "Are you two waiting for me to do everything myself?!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_019\".m_mContent: "Ugh… I really don't want to fight a potentially high-spending customer."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_020\".m_mContent: "It's a hassle, but I am a new Elder after all... I suppose I should pitch in and do my part."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_022\".m_mContent: "What took you so long?! We just fought some spoiled little princess!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_024\".m_mContent: "In my memory, the real Cain intervened during the battle with Lamia."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_025\".m_mContent: "But this time, I didn't. Which means…"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_027\".m_mContent: "Each time, I die not long after becoming someone new…"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_028\".m_mContent: "Insolence! Who do you think you are, mumbling in the Hall of the Elders?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_030\".m_mContent: "Because I've realized something. As long as the vessel doesn't die, the past can be changed!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_031\".m_mContent: "I don't know who you are, but you're no longer the Cain I knew. This is our chance…"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_032\".m_mContent: "Be careful, though the Soulless is their leader, the most dangerous one is actually that white-haired...."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_035\".m_mContent: "Return to where you belong. Though I must admit—I am curious. Who are you, really?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_037\".m_mContent: "Back then, Gilrain wanted to kill me…?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_038\".m_mContent: "Nothing has changed... I keep becoming someone else for nothing."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_039\".m_mContent: "Only to relive their destined end. But..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_040\".m_mContent: "It wasn't for nothing. At the very least… I now know what Cain's true power is."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip13_041\".m_mContent: "Am I going to… become someone else again? And watch them die, too?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_001\".m_mContent: "Are we really the first ones here?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_002\".m_mContent: "No one else is around... Aiona... Noah... where are you?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_003\".m_mContent: "Think they ran into trouble on the way?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_004\".m_mContent: "How disappointing. So we didn't get first place after all."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_007\".m_mContent: "You look pale, Lady Empousa. What happened?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_008\".m_mContent: "It was Dalcarlo. That woman jumped us out of nowhere!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_009\".m_mContent: "...Elder Dalcarlo? Then it makes sense. We were also attacked—by Gilrain."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_010\".m_mContent: "Cidhall? He's here too? Why would both of them...!?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_013\".m_mContent: "No matter how many times they're reborn..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_014\".m_mContent: "No matter how many times I try to outrun this fate..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_015\".m_mContent: "Even after everything—after meeting Noah, after seeing a different future—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_016\".m_mContent: "...It always ends like this, doesn't it?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_017\".m_mContent: "Because what comes next isn't about to happen. It has happened."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_018\".m_mContent: "Weren't you the one who taught the young lady, Aiona?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_020\".m_mContent: "I once believed Lady Empousa might understand my ideals."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_021\".m_mContent: "That life shouldn't end in oblivion—but return to its source. To be embraced again by "Mother"."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_022\".m_mContent: "Who is this guy? Why's the bat all scared of him?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_023\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami, is it? Tell me—where is it you wish you were most right now?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_024\".m_mContent: "That's kind of sudden... Let me think... somewhere with good food?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_025\".m_mContent: "So you've stopped concealing your power... You must think you've already won."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_026\".m_mContent: "And what of you? Where would you go, if given the choice?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_027\".m_mContent: "This power of yours... has no hold on me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_029\".m_mContent: "How long has it been since I've seen you like this? Ten years? Twenty?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_031\".m_mContent: "Why keep such power hidden? What a waste."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_033\".m_mContent: "This inherited strength... surpasses all I imagined."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_034\".m_mContent: "As expected of the strongest of the Alita bloodline—Saint Seth's very own Right Hand."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_035\".m_mContent: "Now that we're alone... won't you share a few secrets with me?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_037\".m_mContent: "I think I just went somewhere... weird. Good thing I made it back!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_038\".m_mContent: "Pudding, you taste amazing... Let's stay together forever..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_040\".m_mContent: "So this is what had you so distracted mid-battle. This little trick was your plan all along?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_041\".m_mContent: "I told you—your tricks won't work on me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_043\".m_mContent: "Wait... where's the stupid bat? I don't see her anywhere!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip14_044\".m_mContent: "Impossible... Lady Empousa—she's disappeared from the flow of time!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_001\".m_mContent: "Where is this place? What has Cain done to us?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_002\".m_mContent: "Where's Aiona? And Noah... Where are they?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_007\".m_mContent: "I should be the one asking that! Why are you here... Did you arrive with Jacintha and Cain?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_008\".m_mContent: "You're always like this... pretending as if you didn't know."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_009\".m_mContent: "You've known, long before I, that this is where Mother rests."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_010\".m_mContent: "—This is where all of us "sisters" are destined for."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_011\".m_mContent: ""When the four Moonblessed gather, Mother will open her arms and take us back...""

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_012\".m_mContent: ""Back to our homeland, on the far side of the moon.""

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_013\".m_mContent: "This memory has existed in our minds since birth."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_014\".m_mContent: "Yet it is only now that I realized this prophecy might be true, and what it all might mean..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_016\".m_mContent: "That's why you rushed to find the first Moonblessed before I did—the Silver-haired one, the "Seed of Death.""

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_017\".m_mContent: "Then you went on to help him "find himself," but you were really following Cain's orders to gather the Moonblessed!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_018\".m_mContent: "N-no, that's not true... I traveled with Noah because..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_019\".m_mContent: "Oh, save your breath! The fact is you've arrived here with all four Moonblessed, in preparation for Mother's awakening!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_020\".m_mContent: "I'd had a bad feeling, but I never imagined it would come to this..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_021\".m_mContent: "Bad feeling? Oh, I won't have a word of it!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_022\".m_mContent: "Now that the Divine Body here has been destroyed, the sealed area has merged once more with our castle, and Mother's resting place is exposed..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_023\".m_mContent: "The Elders and Cain will surely select you as the heiress for your "great achievements$$—You'll become the next Mother!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_024\".m_mContent: "Then you'll usurp the power of the Apocalypse, all for yourself... After all, you've got three of them as your pawns already, isn't that right?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_025\".m_mContent: "What are you talking about!? None of them are pawns, and I've no desire to become Mother!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_026\".m_mContent: "At this point, I can't tell if you're having me on, or if you've just lost it."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_027\".m_mContent: "It is the memory etched into the veins of all "sisters", Empousa—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_028\".m_mContent: "To survive until the end, to be chosen as the "vessel", to resurrect as Mother, and then..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_029\".m_mContent: "When the Blood Moon descends... To rule the world."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_031\".m_mContent: "Still at it, are we? Must I remind you, we exist solely to fight for the right to become Mother's "vessel of rebirth"!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_032\".m_mContent: "—This is the only way Bloodborn can reproduce!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_033\".m_mContent: "...Don't tell me you've spent so much time with those creatures that you've started thinking like a human?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_034\".m_mContent: "No... this thing about the Blood Moon... I'm afraid it's news to me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_035\".m_mContent: "Here we go again... always indifferent, always pretending like you don't even try..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_036\".m_mContent: "And yet always ahead of me... what does that make the ones who barely survived the game..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_037\".m_mContent: "Who have only one reason to exist..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_039\".m_mContent: "Lamia, stop this! Let's put an end to this meaningless slaughter!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_040\".m_mContent: "We're sisters! Compared with the "Mother" we've never even seen, we're... we're family."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_041\".m_mContent: "Don't get coy with me—I can hear it in your voice. You feel pity, don't you?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_042\".m_mContent: "Well, I'll stand for it no longer... Always pretending to be different, always fantasizing about "free" will..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_043\".m_mContent: "Empousa... I hate you, I truly do..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_046\".m_mContent: "I can't help but care for you, can't help but trust you; I can't help but... hope to see you forge your own path in life."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_048\".m_mContent: "Just... go! Go with Aiona, go with Noah, or even that jerk, Agares!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_049\".m_mContent: "Go with anyone who can help you escape this place, and stop Cain..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_052\".m_mContent: "I thought we were clear on your role as sacrifices... or rather, "vessels.""

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_053\".m_mContent: "Cain, I... I should have known you were a traitor!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_054\".m_mContent: "How terribly mistaken. It is I who am loyal to the Bathorys, who am devoted to resurrecting our Matriarch—as she rests here during the "Long Night"—in Bloodborn fashion"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_055\".m_mContent: "Is the real traitor not you, who refuses to serve as the "vessel" for this noble mission?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_056\".m_mContent: "I... can't believe it... Resurrecting "Mother" was never about our family. It's exactly what Lamia said, isn't it? The Blood Moon..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_057\".m_mContent: "Cain! Please spare my sister—spare Empousa! Let me become the sacrifice, let me serve as "Mother's vessel"!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_060\".m_mContent: "What... should I do? What would Aiona do?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_061\".m_mContent: "You expect me to let an inferior copy serve Lady Limine?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_062\".m_mContent: "No—you'll been officially eliminated, just like your "sisters" before you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_063\".m_mContent: "Cain, you demon! After all the time she spent with you, you truly feel nothing for her at all?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_064\".m_mContent: "Since you insist, allow me to correct you, young lady. First..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_065\".m_mContent: "I've known her for a few decades—hardly what I'd call a long time."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_066\".m_mContent: "Second, I've dealt with thousands upon thousands of "copies", just like her. If I had to feel something for each of them..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_068\".m_mContent: "Lastly, should you feel the need to refer to me as "demon," "scum," or "beast"—then so be it. For, since the day I was abandoned..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_069\".m_mContent: "I no longer believe—nor hope—that anyone might understand me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_070\".m_mContent: "Then what about Mother? You're so desperate to resurrect her—yet you don't even see her as an ally, do you? I knew you had another motive!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_071\".m_mContent: "…Lamia was right about you. You're always like this."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_072\".m_mContent: "Always pretending to be naive, always playing the fool—when in truth, you see more than anyone else. But you keep it to yourself."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_073\".m_mContent: "Just like my dear sister, in that regard… But hear this: when you have the power to change something and choose not to act—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_074\".m_mContent: "—what follows is regret. Just like Lamia, who's about to die right before your eyes."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_075\".m_mContent: "Lamia! Hold on! I won't let you die!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_077\".m_mContent: "I won't abandon you! We'll leave together! I swear we will find a new life!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_078\".m_mContent: "If only you'd both been this honest sooner. Then we could've skipped this whole pathetic show of sisterly love."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_080\".m_mContent: "You're struggling just to speak… Allow me to put you out of your misery. No need to keep wasting Lady Empousa's time—nor Mother's."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_081\".m_mContent: "Let the Long Night descend, and call forth the Blood Moon—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_084\".m_mContent: "Oh? She managed to find this place?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_085\".m_mContent: "Cain… Where do you think you're going? Our battle… isn't… over yet."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_086\".m_mContent: "First Seth's Left Hand, now her Right. One after another, you keep sending your protégés to stand in my way. What a meddlesome little sister."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_087\".m_mContent: "Save your strength—what good is reaching me if you're already on death's doorstep?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_089\".m_mContent: "She withstood several direct hits from me while shielding those two Calamities. Quite the feat, really."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_090\".m_mContent: "That silly wolf and jellyfish? What did you do to them?!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_091\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, Lady Empousa... we’re all unharmed. I just couldn't stop him from taking you..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_092\".m_mContent: "He's right. On my own, I can only track his presence—stopping him is another matter..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_093\".m_mContent: "Then let me help. Together, we can stop him!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_094\".m_mContent: "Such recklessness, my Lady. I would rather not harm so valuable a vessel, especially one who's made it this far."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_095\".m_mContent: "That's enough... Finding him was all I needed. I may not be able to stop him, but someone else can..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_098\".m_mContent: "Like them? Mr. Cain Lamboza, these were made just for you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip15_099\".m_mContent: "A parting gift from Master Albrecht. A true alchemist—far greater than you'll ever be."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_001\".m_mContent: "If a beast takes on the memories of a human, is it still just a beast, or is it now human?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_002\".m_mContent: "Of all people to see after returning to my body... it had to be you?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_003\".m_mContent: "Oh? Noah Nevernight, returned with your memories intact?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_004\".m_mContent: "So it was all already in motion from here?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_005\".m_mContent: "Well, it was more of an experience I had. The only difference is that this version of me remembers more than you do."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_006\".m_mContent: ""Everything that will happen must happen, because it has transpired.""

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_007\".m_mContent: "So, you've walked not only your own memories... but others' as well?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_008\".m_mContent: "Was that your doing? How did you obtain such power...? Or does it belong to that strangely dressed woman at your side?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_009\".m_mContent: "How rude—both to her wardrobe and to your labeling of truth as an ability."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_010\".m_mContent: "I possess no such power. I merely uncovered the truth."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_012\".m_mContent: "Or that you never became them at all. From the very beginning, you were them. Perhaps... you were everyone."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_013\".m_mContent: "I always thought the Church believed that the divine will created us and this world."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_014\".m_mContent: "I didn't expect you, of all people, to suggest that my own will forged my identity, others, and even this world."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_015\".m_mContent: "Not yours alone. Ours. We created it together."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_016\".m_mContent: "You mean... you are me, I am you. We are everyone, and everyone is me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_017\".m_mContent: "Then consider—why is Aeon omniscient and omnipotent?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_018\".m_mContent: "Because Aeon is me, is you, is everyone—and all that exists?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_019\".m_mContent: "And if I take Aeon's place... then why should I not be omniscient and omnipotent?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_020\".m_mContent: "Because of memory. Without others' memories, we cannot view the world from an omniscient mind."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_021\".m_mContent: "It seems the you that stands here has seen much—just as I once did."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_022\".m_mContent: "If a beast takes on the memories of a human, is it still just a beast, or is it now human? Was that your test for your companions?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_023\".m_mContent: "Because such people are rare—and terribly alone. So then... how would you answer that question?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_024\".m_mContent: "They are both human and beast. They remain themselves, have always been themselves—and they are you. Because they believed in that truth."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_025\".m_mContent: "Then tell me... when do you think a person truly dies?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_026\".m_mContent: "According to your truth, we never truly die. So long as memory persists, wherever it resides..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_027\".m_mContent: "Goldland, Skoll, even Cain—though his existence remains uncertain—I carry their memories before death, fragments of lives long lost..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_028\".m_mContent: "And if there are others like me, then they too become us—and together, we live on, as one and the same."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_029\".m_mContent: "No. There is one case in which we do die—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_030\".m_mContent: "When the memory vanishes? Be it our own, or the memories others hold of us."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_031\".m_mContent: "Exactly. That is what Aeon did to us. Erased our memories so only they would endure. Only they would remain eternal."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_032\".m_mContent: "And yet you, a Bell Ringer sworn to the Saint, see Aeon—the Church's one true god—as your enemy?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_033\".m_mContent: "Because becoming a Bell Ringer was the only way to uncover what Aeon truly is. And I've already—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_034\".m_mContent: "...No, never mind. You only echo my truth, making assumptions, offering clever responses—but you don't believe. Not yet."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_035\".m_mContent: "You're sharp, my silver-haired friend. Sharper than I was at your age... but you've lived too short."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_036\".m_mContent: "Still, I believe one day, you'll understand me—truly understand. And see even further than I do."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_037\".m_mContent: "Just as I believed last time, that you are more suited to become Dracula."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_039\".m_mContent: "A long tale... and we've little time left. You'll be leaving soon."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_040\".m_mContent: "Leaving? But in every previous case, I only left when I died."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_041\".m_mContent: "Precisely. You understand. You're about to die."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_042\".m_mContent: "But I remember this carriage—when it fell, no one died..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_043\".m_mContent: "I lived until you burned me. Or—wait, I was revived afterward... so does that count as death?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_044\".m_mContent: "If I didn't die, then why am I inside a memory? Could it be..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_045\".m_mContent: "You're starting to see. This is a confined space, so you assume you're Noah Nevernight."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_047\".m_mContent: "The one speaking to me isn't the black-clad prisoner I'm escorting. You are—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_048\".m_mContent: "—the coachman... the one Empousa is about to attack!?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_049\".m_mContent: "Is this... the sealed area? Have I returned to reality?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_050\".m_mContent: "After a journey through memory, do you still define the present as "reality"?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_051\".m_mContent: "Told you. He's not ready to accept the truth."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_052\".m_mContent: "Is she... your companion? Another version of you?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_053\".m_mContent: "Forget that for now. If you've seen Cain's memories—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_054\".m_mContent: "Did you learn where the Long night lies? Where is he taking Empousa to for the ritual?!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_057\".m_mContent: "Then she's with Cain—but if you, her Vassal, are still alive, so must she..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_058\".m_mContent: "I only pray Albrecht can stall him, even briefly..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_059\".m_mContent: "Just long enough for me to gather the Four and open the path—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_061\".m_mContent: "Guess it's my turn to help too."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_064\".m_mContent: "Plague, Famine, Death, and I—War. The Four Moonblessed, vessels of the Calamities, have at last come together."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_065\".m_mContent: "Plague snuffs out the ember of humankind. Famine awakens its primal cravings."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_066\".m_mContent: "Death weaves the threads of the forgotten past. And War—War ignites the haze of dusk."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_067\".m_mContent: "Now begins the final judgment. The blood of the Four shall form the key, and the Nine Scourges shall rise upon the earth..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_068\".m_mContent: "Is he some kind of bard, here to cheer us on?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_069\".m_mContent: "What kind of bard would show up in a place like this?! He's clearly the enemy!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_071\".m_mContent: "The First Scourge, Long Night, must be mine. I won't let Cain take her."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_073\".m_mContent: "With the Four Calamities assembled, the path to the end of fate finally opens."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_074\".m_mContent: "So this is... the true path that leads deeper?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_075\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, my silver-haired friend. If only you'd agreed to walk with me from the start... if only you'd grasped the truth earlier... no..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_076\".m_mContent: "I, more than anyone, should know—there are no what-ifs in this world. We just keep struggling against the tide of history..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_077\".m_mContent: "Only to drown again and again in the waves of "truth"..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_080\".m_mContent: "I won't let you stop me again, Re—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_082\".m_mContent: "Go after him! I won't allow that stupid bat to die by his hands!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_086\".m_mContent: "Though neither of you are the original Ancestrals, the bloodline flows within you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_088\".m_mContent: "W-Why is there another one?! She looks exactly the same!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_090\".m_mContent: "This is going to call for a lot of food after..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_091\".m_mContent: "We are all me—the souls reborn from Carrelle's Divine Body. But we are also you. Join us. Let Calamity and the Divine Body become one again."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_092\".m_mContent: "No way! I'll defeat every last one of you!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_095\".m_mContent: "I’m sorry… Under Cain's assault, I can't hold the realm link much longer..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_096\".m_mContent: "After all we've done to reach this place… are we truly this powerless?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_097\".m_mContent: "—If I hadn't gone to Sunset Isle... if I hadn't found Piera… maybe I would've given up."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_099\".m_mContent: "What are you trying to do, Mr. Van Helsing…?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_100\".m_mContent: "We know where Cain is. I can disrupt his space—by materializing myself, just as Piera once did."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_101\".m_mContent: "I also understand now—the weakness of life lies in memory. And only here, in this realm, can we bring an end to his design."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_102\".m_mContent: "Miss Alita… this will hurt—both body and soul..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip16_104\".m_mContent: "Please. Open the link. It'll only take a moment."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_001\".m_mContent: "To think Albrecht still remembers me so fondly... even going so far as to prepare 'holy water' for me. As expected of my nemesis."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_002\".m_mContent: "What a shame. You who command water didn't come in person, and instead sent a greenhorn in your place."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_003\".m_mContent: "If Aiona weren't injured, those bullets would've taken you down!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_004\".m_mContent: "It seems you still don't understand me, Lady Empousa."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_006\".m_mContent: "Looks like Lamia knows more than you do."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_007\".m_mContent: "It's true. My nemesis may wound me, but I cannot die. And do you know why?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_008\".m_mContent: "Because you can resurrect with that... memory transference ritual?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_009\".m_mContent: "That? It's Alchemy used to resurrect mortals, Noah, all of you, and even 'Mother'. I have no need for it."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_010\".m_mContent: "Because I am the one who created the 'original Death'. I predate Death itself."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_011\".m_mContent: "Then let's see if you truly are immortal when I pierce through the source of your memory!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_013\".m_mContent: "Holy water bullets again... For a Bloodborn, even one would've been fatal."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_015\".m_mContent: "It's... no use... If this goes on, everyone... will die..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_017\".m_mContent: "Dumb Wolf... Lifeless Eyes... Aiona... Lamia... and... Noah..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_018\".m_mContent: "I haven't saved Lamia yet. We haven't found our true homeland. And I still haven't... with Noah..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_021\".m_mContent: "You made it this far, ready for a fight to the death—yet you're still fretting over someone else?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_022\".m_mContent: "I won't let you hurt Empousa. I won't let you sacrifice Lamia. And I definitely won't let you awaken the Long Night."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_023\".m_mContent: "I'm not the only one with a plan. Even if we destroy each other, Cain will seize the moment—and you'll still lose."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_024\".m_mContent: "I trust Aiona, Van Helsing... and I trust Empousa most of all. They'll stop him."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_025\".m_mContent: "How enviable… this trust, these bonds. Is that the privilege of humans who still dare to dream of the future?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_026\".m_mContent: "Don't you have someone you trust... Mass, maybe?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_028\".m_mContent: "...Perhaps you're right. Maybe I've had them all along... this companion by my side."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_029\".m_mContent: "That's how humans are. We don't notice what we have until it's too late. But maybe it's not too late. Not yet."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_030\".m_mContent: "Are you mocking me? That no matter how far I reach for the 'truth', I'm still a mere mortal?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_031\".m_mContent: "Didn't you say it yourself? That the closer one gets to Aeon, the clearer it becomes. The divine powers are just people, hiding truths they don't want uncovered."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_032\".m_mContent: "You still so fond of arguing. Let's see…"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_033\".m_mContent: "Since Starfall Valley, has anything grown sharper besides that tongue of yours?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_036\".m_mContent: "Impressive... You wield not just Death, but Plague and Famine as well..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_037\".m_mContent: "Seems that by setting you on this path, I ended up forging a foe far stronger than I intended."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_038\".m_mContent: "I truly despise fighting in this hideous form... but against you..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_039\".m_mContent: "Come to think of it, this is the second time today I've had to use it... Hm? What's with the sudden silence?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_043\".m_mContent: "Even now, you still believe you'll win? Lady Empousa, you're not fighting me..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_045\".m_mContent: "I know. I've always known. This is our fate—mine and Lamia's. A burden we were born to bear."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_047\".m_mContent: "I used to think that was all I was worth. That outside my mission... outside being a vessel..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_048\".m_mContent: "I'd be forgotten. Just like the moon is the sun's dream; and when the dawn comes, the dream will be forgotten."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_049\".m_mContent: "And though the moon rises again the next night, no one cares—because she's no longer the same moon."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_051\".m_mContent: "That night, I went to Noah alone. Before Lamia or the others could reach him."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_052\".m_mContent: "Because I truly believed... if I became the 'sacrifice', if I became the vessel—then Lamia would live."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_054\".m_mContent: "But I don't regret it. Because it led me to Noah, who, like me, refuses to kneel to fate."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_055\".m_mContent: "What's the point of saying all this now?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_056\".m_mContent: "Because... I know what he would do—if he were the one standing here."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_057\".m_mContent: "No! Lady Empousa, there must be another way!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_058\".m_mContent: "To remain this calm, even now... As expected of Silver-haired's master."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_059\".m_mContent: "Lifeless Eyes... if you're still listening—kill me. Do it. Now!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_060\".m_mContent: "I even preserved their voices to keep you company on your final journey..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_061\".m_mContent: "Yet here you are, planning something so reckless. That anxious girl... has grown too bold."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_062\".m_mContent: "So even you have something to fear. If I die here, you won't be able to resurrect Mother in her complete form!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_063\".m_mContent: "Push me further, and I might actually get angry."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_064\".m_mContent: "You said it yourself—those holy water bullets are fatal to Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip17_065\".m_mContent: "So? Aiona can't reach this place anymore. And that brat's bullets can't even pierce the air."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_001\".m_mContent: "The human body... is nearly seventy percent water."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_002\".m_mContent: "And on the maps drawn by cartographers, water also covers... seventy percent of the world's surface."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_003\".m_mContent: "Don't you find this quite an interesting coincidence?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_004\".m_mContent: "Huh? I just asked why this island is surrounded by ocean, what's he going on about?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_005\".m_mContent: "Just ignore Lifeless Eyes. He's the type who jumps at any chance to show off his useless knowledge."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_006\".m_mContent: "I think Van Helsing is simply marveling at the vastness of the ocean. He must also be thinking about how to leave this lonely island."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_007\".m_mContent: "Water is truly magnificent—it makes up our bodies, and even this world itself, so..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_008\".m_mContent: "I've always believed that Albrecht—my mentor and the Bell Ringer who commands water—is the greatest Bell Ringer of all."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_009\".m_mContent: "At will, he can eliminate any living being by draining the water from their bodies—be they human, Blood Beast, or Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_010\".m_mContent: "He's more powerful than Acappella who tormented us, and even stronger than that Inquisitor of Flame you mentioned."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_011\".m_mContent: "...So he's still hung up on that little brat who tormented him earlier."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_012\".m_mContent: "Some 'greatest' Bell Ringer he must be, teaching such a petty person."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_014\".m_mContent: "So, can your mentor really kill anyone? ...Even someone cursed with immortality?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_015\".m_mContent: "As long as blood flows through their veins—regardless of its color—it is all water. And..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_016\".m_mContent: "This holy water bullet can work anywhere—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_021\".m_mContent: "It feels like... I've been crossing back and forth between life and death all this time..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_022\".m_mContent: "What if that side was the false Other Side, and this is where I was meant to return?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_023\".m_mContent: "Because I am Death... the stillness to which all life must return. Must I face this fate as well?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_025\".m_mContent: "I feel no relief... no warmth... there's nothing here. I can't feel anything at all."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_027\".m_mContent: "You look quite miserable, Noah. Reminds me of our first clash in Starfall Valley."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_028\".m_mContent: "To think that you, who bears the name of "Death", would fear death itself."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_029\".m_mContent: "No... According to your 'truth'—our essence is 'memory', and true death does not exist."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_031\".m_mContent: "As long as we exist within Aeon's order of time, that day will come for all of us."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_032\".m_mContent: "The great and radiant Aeon is like the sun, and we Moonblessed who defy these merciless laws are the moon."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_033\".m_mContent: "...The moon is the sun's dream. When she awakens, this dream will disappear, and our existence will be forgotten along with it."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_035\".m_mContent: "—If I disappear, would you remember me?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_039\".m_mContent: "Would you go after them? Abandon all your living companions?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_040\".m_mContent: "Or would you return to this side, defeat me, stop the Long Night, and save those who remain?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_041\".m_mContent: "Go to the Other Side with Empousa."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_042a\".m_mContent: "No... not yet. Too many people are counting on me. I can't give up on the 'present' yet."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_043\".m_mContent: "I won't forget her, I won't forget any of my companions, I won't forget the will of those who sacrificed themselves in this fight. So..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_044\".m_mContent: "I will defeat you, defeat Cain and the Long Night, defeat all the divine wills and laws that dare toy with our lives!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_045\".m_mContent: "Now that's the answer I was looking for—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_046\".m_mContent: "Then let us see whose soul burns brighter, whose flames of rage shine more brilliantly!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_049\".m_mContent: "Well, the Black Blood and Silver Blood were never meant to be compatible. It took... quite some effort to master both powers."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_050\".m_mContent: "This is quite unlike your usual style."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_051\".m_mContent: "Stop joking around at a time like this. Can't you see I'm dying?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_052\".m_mContent: "I don't believe you'll die, Inquisitor of the Church; the Phoenix of Black Blood; War."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_053\".m_mContent: "I thought after seeing countless futures, I would no longer hope for anything beyond what was preordained."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_054\".m_mContent: "Thank you, Noah, for letting me witness the end of a new fate..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_055\".m_mContent: "Do you see it... life burns, and time turns to ash."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_057\".m_mContent: "I pass on to you the feather of War. Now it is your turn to lead the Moonblessed in search of truth, to rise against the divine wills..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_058\".m_mContent: "You want me to devour you, to take your memories?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_059\".m_mContent: "Ah, got too caught up in the moment there. Almost forgot to mention the most important thing—though you'll remember it yourself soon enough—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_060\".m_mContent: "Listen... Cain failed to get Empousa this time, so he can't awaken the Long Night immediately, but he won't give up so easily..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_061\".m_mContent: "How perplexing. I wonder if you're showing me respect... or simply underestimating me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_063\".m_mContent: "I must admit, four individuals have grown far beyond my calculations. But they've all... paid the price already."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_064\".m_mContent: "Fortunately, I had already removed three unwanted observers."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_065\".m_mContent: "You think you can trap three Bell Ringers? Ressa and Yggdrasill could break your spatial prison without breaking a sweat!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_067\".m_mContent: "But why does he still look so composed?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_068\".m_mContent: "Because from the start, his only goal was to delay us for a moment—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_069\".m_mContent: "You mean... Oh no! Was I misled? He's not using this realm to trap us, but..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_072\".m_mContent: "The difference is that time perception varies in spaces with different gravitational force!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_073\".m_mContent: "In those brief moments, the outside world... has likely experienced several days already."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_074\".m_mContent: "Forgive my little tricks, but... I wasn't confident I could defeat both of you."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_075\".m_mContent: "Are you underestimating me?! What's happening... what's happening to Starfall Valley?!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_076\".m_mContent: "The Saint's "brother"... it was Cain? We let our guard down..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_077\".m_mContent: "And now, I wish for my two opponents—to disappear from this place."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_078\".m_mContent: "...I'm sorry, Noah. We were so close, but it seems... we've lost."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_080\".m_mContent: "What have you done to everyone?! Ressa, Aiona, and Empousa—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_081\".m_mContent: "At last, it's time to awaken you, my first and final one..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_082\".m_mContent: "The dream of returning to the moon."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_083\".m_mContent: "Congratulations on your rebirth, my Master. The Blood Moon shall rise for you, and your wings shall forever eclipse the sun."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_084\".m_mContent: "I just woke up. Prepare my food."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_085\".m_mContent: "Please rest assured, I have already prepared an entire Kingdom's population to serve as both your sustenance and servants..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_086\".m_mContent: "I want all of them—every single human—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_087\".m_mContent: "What's happening all of a sudden?! The moon has turned blood-red!"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_090\".m_mContent: "If you're going to deceive me by impersonating someone, at least choose someone I remember. How boring."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_091\".m_mContent: "Who has taken control of her? Agares, or Cain?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_093\".m_mContent: "Let us settle our score... next time."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_094\".m_mContent: "The Blood Moon rises, and the long night approaches... At last, the era of us new Bloodborn begins."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_095\".m_mContent: "I care nothing for the immortality and beauty you desire. Being Bloodborn or human makes no difference to me."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_096\".m_mContent: "How did Cain... persuade someone like you to join?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_097\".m_mContent: "After the Long Night, the remaining eight Scourges will awaken. I wish to challenge that power, nothing more."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_098\".m_mContent: "Such a simple man... Too simple to be interesting."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_100\".m_mContent: "Was I too gentle? They still live, and even that garlic beside them hasn't completely withered..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_102\".m_mContent: "I have no interest in the weak. Do with them as you please."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_103\".m_mContent: "What a pity. Perhaps it would be better if you died by that boring man's hand instead—"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_104\".m_mContent: "The mission is complete. Let's take him back to the desert..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_106\".m_mContent: "After the Long Night, when the Scourges awaken—this world will become a hell of pure darkness, though it's already..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_107\".m_mContent: "Won't you show yourself? Where have you gone... Joan?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_108\".m_mContent: "You lingered long in thought this time."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_109\".m_mContent: "Have you decided on your next move?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_110\".m_mContent: "This place again... Who have I become this time?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_111\".m_mContent: "No... This time it's really me, and I've... truly returned?"

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_112\".m_mContent: "I can only say, I'm sorry, truly..."

\"Dialogue_B_110001_Clip18_113\".m_mContent: "So this is how we meet again in this place."

\"Q_40001_Clip01_101\".m_mContent: "At last, kind and brave souls have come to my aid!"

\"Q_40001_Clip01_102\".m_mContent: "We could have left him. Those wolves aren't interested in his big garlic head."

\"Q_40001_Clip01_103\".m_mContent: "I swear they wanted to eat me."

\"Q_40001_Clip01_201\".m_mContent: "...Sir knight, aren't you going to lend a hand? We could use your help."

\"Q_40001_Clip01_202\".m_mContent: "I swear on my code of chivalry, I am a pacifist!"

\"Q_40001_Clip01_203\".m_mContent: "The wind reeks of garlic... Just thinking about it makes my hair stand on end!"

\"Q_40001_Clip01_301\".m_mContent: "I'm starting to think we shouldn't have saved him."

\"Q_40001_Clip01_302\".m_mContent: "No, you must believe that there is no wrong in justice!"

\"Q_40001_Clip02_101\".m_mContent: "This garlic... isn't he a bit too strong?"

\"Q_40001_Clip02_102\".m_mContent: "He's the Church's elite after all. Don't let your guard down."

\"Q_40001_Clip02_103\".m_mContent: "Like I need you to tell me that!"

\"Q_40001_Clip03_101\".m_mContent: "As expected of a Ganelon, you've inherited the family's inability to think quite well."

\"Q_40001_Clip03_103\".m_mContent: "Are you truly trying to clear up the misunderstanding, or make it worse?"

\"Q_40001_Clip04_101\".m_mContent: "Well... she's not pulling any punches, is she?"

\"Q_40001_Clip04_102\".m_mContent: "It seems she's well aware of what happens after contracting the Black Blood."

\"Q_40001_Clip04_103\".m_mContent: "I guess I underestimated her a bit."

\"Q_40001_Clip04_201\".m_mContent: "Don't be rash. Be careful not to get tangled up with them."

\"Q_40001_Clip04_202\".m_mContent: "I can't stand by and watch them suffer like this..."

\"Q_40001_Clip04_203\".m_mContent: "Just don't rush in too far. You might get infected yourself."

\"Q_40001_Clip04_301\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry... It's my fault everyone ended up like this. I'm so sorry-"

\"Q_40001_Clip04_302\".m_mContent: "The Black Blood is highly contagious. This isn't your fault."

\"Q_40001_Clip05_102\".m_mContent: "Is she crazy? Doesn't she care about getting hurt?"

\"Q_40001_Clip05_103\".m_mContent: "Perhaps she's feeling the same way I did when I saved you."

\"Q_40001_Clip05_202\".m_mContent: "Damn it... Clive, you'd better be alright!"

\"Q_40001_Clip05_301\".m_mContent: "Hang in there, Clive! I'm coming to save you—!"

\"Q_40001_Clip05_303\".m_mContent: "Empousa, Aiona, and I will distract them. You go and rescue him."

\"Q_40001_Clip06_102\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, sis! I can fight too!"

\"Q_40001_Clip06_103\".m_mContent: "If I'm scared of this, Father will be disappointed in me."

\"Q_40001_Clip06_201\".m_mContent: "Hey, you two dimwits! Aren't you getting a bit too excited?"

\"Q_40001_Clip06_202\".m_mContent: "The Church just destroyed their hometown. Let them be."

\"Q_40001_Clip07_102\".m_mContent: "This guy talks big, but he can't fight at all."

\"Q_40001_Clip07_103\".m_mContent: "I-I just need to adjust myself. It'll only take a moment..."

\"Q_40001_Clip07_202\".m_mContent: "I can't... I need to catch my breath..."

\"Q_40001_Clip07_302\".m_mContent: "Sorry, I'm just a healer. I've never experienced anything like this..."

\"Q_40001_Clip07_303\".m_mContent: "Does the Church just recruit anything with two legs?"

\"Q_40001_Clip08_102\".m_mContent: "The final stage of the Black Blood disease mutates people into beasts."

\"Q_40001_Clip08_103\".m_mContent: "I hope you're prepared. They... can't be called human anymore."

\"Q_40001_Clip09_102\".m_mContent: "When you first came to the Church, I ordered the soldiers to surround you."

\"Q_40001_Clip09_103\".m_mContent: "I was rash then, to have mistaken you for a heretic..."

\"Q_40001_Clip09_201\".m_mContent: "Tell me, Clive, do you truly have no regrets?"

\"Q_40001_Clip09_202\".m_mContent: "Not being able to watch Hati and Clive grow up, I really..."

\"Q_40001_Clip09_302\".m_mContent: "Clive, this is all I can do for you."

\"Q_40001_Clip09_303\".m_mContent: "From now on, your vows will be yours to uphold."

\"Q_40001_Clip10_201\".m_mContent: "Big brother Noah, Skoll will be alright, won't he?"

\"Q_40001_Clip10_202\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, but I can't make that promise."

\"Q_40001_Clip10_203\".m_mContent: "But at the very least... I'll make sure he has time to say goodbye properly."

\"Q_40001_Clip10_302\".m_mContent: "Don't be so reckless, you stupid wolf!"

\"Q_40001_Clip10_303\".m_mContent: "But I can't... I can't watch anyone else fall before me—"

\"Q_40001_Clip11_101\".m_mContent: "What a bother... Never thought I'd see the day I'd be buying time for a Ganelon."

\"Q_40001_Clip11_102\".m_mContent: "We've come this far together. Surely you and Hati have cleared up some misunderstandings by now."

\"Q_40001_Clip11_103\".m_mContent: "For now... let's help her say her final goodbyes."

\"Q_40001_Clip11_201\".m_mContent: "Hang in there, Skoll! Everything will be alright!"

\"Q_40001_Clip11_202\".m_mContent: "Ha... Hati... You... get out of here..."

\"Q_40001_Clip11_301\".m_mContent: "Get out of my way, you damn bastards!"

\"Q_40001_Clip11_302\".m_mContent: "What are you doing here, you stupid wolf?!"

\"Q_40001_Clip11_303\".m_mContent: "We can't keep dragging this out. Skoll... he's running out of time!"

\"F_40001_Clip12_001\".m_mContent: "This giant werewolf is your father?! He's... he's completely transformed!"

\"F_40001_Clip12_002\".m_mContent: "Father... he loves Wolfsbane as much as I do, so he told me long ago—"

\"F_40001_Clip12_003\".m_mContent: "'Once the promised flower withers, your father will no longer exist in this world...'"

\"F_40001_Clip12_004\".m_mContent: "Father, you crushed the Wolfsbane... You wanted to tell us that you're no longer the person you once were, didn't you..."

\"F_40001_Clip12_005\".m_mContent: "I will. I'll give it my all to defeat you like this... I won't let down Father's final resolve—"

\"F_40001_Clip12_101\".m_mContent: "Father, you said before that if the Wolfsbane was crushed, I'd have to fight you with all my might... So this is what you meant?"

\"F_40001_Clip12_102\".m_mContent: "But no matter what you've become, you'll always be the hero to us."

\"F_40001_Clip12_103\".m_mContent: "So... please, Father, can you come to your senses? At least... at least let me say goodbye to you in person—"

\"F_40001_Clip12_105\".m_mContent: "You can never be ready for something like this."

\"F_40001_Clip12_107\".m_mContent: "Noah, can you promise me something? When this is all over, will you come with me to lay lots of Wolfsbane on Father's grave?"

\"F_40001_Clip12_108\".m_mContent: "He witnessed the blossoming of your resolve. Let's offer this flower and allow him to return to peace."

\"Q_50001_Clip01_103\".m_mContent: "I overdid it earlier. Got a bit of a cramp..."

\"Q_50001_Clip02_102\".m_mContent: "Looks like they've had their eyes on us from the start."

\"Q_50001_Clip02_103\".m_mContent: "Let's try to shake them off. We don't have time to deal with them now."

\"Q_50001_Clip02_202\".m_mContent: "If only you could turn into a bat too."

\"Q_50001_Clip02_203\".m_mContent: "Shut it, you lousy bat! This is no time for complaints!"

\"Q_50001_Clip03_103\".m_mContent: "How pathetic to have lost sight of one's own capabilities."

\"Q_50001_Clip04_102\".m_mContent: "No, that's not what I should be focusing on right now."

\"Q_50001_Clip04_203\".m_mContent: "His wounds should have healed, but it seems he's in pain from something else..."

\"Q_50001_Clip04_204\".m_mContent: "My head... My head hurts so much! So many people... so many voices talking to me!"

\"F_50001_Clip04_301\".m_mContent: "Why must we be dragged into this pointless infighting between heretics and monsters?"

\"F_50001_Clip04_302\".m_mContent: "Because no matter how lowly their origin, all beasts ultimately yearn for 'The Light'."

\"F_50001_Clip04_303\".m_mContent: "Tch, should I call you level-headed or just narcissistic..."

\"Q_50001_Clip04_304\".m_mContent: "Oh no, he seems to have completely lost control!"

\"Q_50001_Clip05_101\".m_mContent: "Speaking of these mushrooms... why do they explode?"

\"Q_50001_Clip05_102\".m_mContent: "It's the Ashen Garden's self-defense mechanism. The native mushrooms growing here are rejecting our presence."

\"Q_50001_Clip05_104\".m_mContent: "It's the name the Church gave to this cave. Since it's part of the Divine Body, the Church has been monitoring it for a long time."

\"Q_50001_Clip05_201\".m_mContent: "I wonder how many more surprises this place has in store for us."

\"Q_50001_Clip05_202\".m_mContent: "At least the Church didn't mention anything else."

\"Q_50001_Clip05_303\".m_mContent: "We need to pick up the pace."

\"F_50001_Clip06_001\".m_mContent: "Ugh... What's this sticky stuff on the ground?"

\"F_50001_Clip06_002\".m_mContent: "It appears to be a fungal colony formed by the spores that fell."

\"F_50001_Clip06_003\".m_mContent: "Fungal colony? I think I've heard alchemists mention that before."

\"F_50001_Clip06_004\".m_mContent: "Whatever it is, can someone pull me out? This stuff's got my feet stuck. I can't even walk!"

\"F_50001_Clip06_005\".m_mContent: "Don't struggle. The more you move, the stickier it gets."

\"F_50001_Clip06_006\".m_mContent: "By the looks of it, those soldiers will be affected too, not just us."

\"Q_50001_Clip06_203\".m_mContent: "What a pain... Fine, I'll help you out, just this once."

\"Q_50001_Clip06_302\".m_mContent: "Come on, you dumb wolf. Put some muscle into it!"

\"Q_50001_Clip07_101\".m_mContent: "Why do you want to protect this sheep?"

\"Q_50001_Clip07_103\".m_mContent: "It just feels wrong to let it die in a place like this."

\"Q_50001_Clip08_102\".m_mContent: "W-who told these disgusting things to keep crawling on me?!"

\"Q_50001_Clip08_103\".m_mContent: "You really are a little princess, aren't you..."

\"Q_50001_Clip08_202\".m_mContent: "If you can't handle it, just hide somewhere."

\"Q_50001_Clip08_302\".m_mContent: "Fine by me! Let's finish them all off in one go!"

\"Q_50001_Clip09_102\".m_mContent: "Precisely because I'm their target, it's easier. Don't worry about me! Save Clive first!"

\"Q_50001_Clip10_201\".m_mContent: "The deeper we go, the more of these insects we encounter."

\"Q_50001_Clip10_202\".m_mContent: "Don't tell me there's more up ahead?!"

\"Q_50001_Clip10_203\".m_mContent: "When are we finally going to get out of this hellhole..."

\"Q_50001_Clip10_302\".m_mContent: "See? You can handle it after all."

\"Q_50001_Clip10_303\".m_mContent: "Wait... how are you going to fight with your eyes closed?!"

\"Q_50001_Clip11_102\".m_mContent: "Don't treat me like I'm some immobile scarecrow."

\"Q_50001_Clip11_103\".m_mContent: "With me here, no one can sneak up from behind."

\"Q_50001_Clip11_202\".m_mContent: "Wipe that look off your face. It's the werewolves' blood."

\"Q_50001_Clip11_203\".m_mContent: "He wouldn't be injured by a few Blood Beasts."

\"Q_50001_Clip11_303\".m_mContent: "Looks like they're probably going to make a desperate last stand."

\"Q_50001_Clip12_102\".m_mContent: "Just a new Elder in the Bathory family."

\"Q_50001_Clip12_202\".m_mContent: "We rushed all the way here! We're lucky to have any strength left!"

\"Q_50001_Clip12_301\".m_mContent: "This guy... isn't he a bit too strong?"

\"Q_50001_Clip13_101\".m_mContent: "Give Noah back! He can't endure this pain any longer!"

\"Q_50001_Clip13_201\".m_mContent: "More than the Calamity awakening... more than becoming a hero..."

\"Q_50001_Clip13_202\".m_mContent: "I... I don't want to see Noah die either!"

\"Q_50001_Clip13_203\".m_mContent: "Brother Noah, I'm coming to help you!"

\"Q_50001_Clip13_301\".m_mContent: "It's all my fault... If it weren't for me, Noah wouldn't be suffering like this..."

\"Q_50001_Clip13_302\".m_mContent: "If only I were stronger... If only I were a bit older..."

\"Q_50001_Clip13_303\".m_mContent: "Maybe Father wouldn't have died then... And Sis wouldn't be so heartbroken... It's all because I'm too weak—"

\"Q_50001_Clip15_101\".m_mContent: "What an eyesore. I can hardly stand to look at it."

\"Q_50001_Clip15_102\".m_mContent: "Keep your eyes on the Enemy. Don't look away."

\"Q_50001_Clip15_103\".m_mContent: "I don't need you to tell me that."

\"Q_50001_Clip15_202\".m_mContent: "Something's wrong... I think this place is about to collapse!"

\"Q_50001_Clip15_203\".m_mContent: "Then let's deal with it before the cave is destroyed."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_01\".m_mContent: "'They say our true home lies on the far side of the moon.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "'Yet no one has ever seen what it looks like.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_03\".m_mContent: "'The more I chase, the further it gets from me.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_04\".m_mContent: "'Perhaps a caged bird should never yearn for the starry sky.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_05\".m_mContent: "Who am I? Why am I here?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_06\".m_mContent: "I don't know, and it doesn't matter. The memory called 'my past' is very hazy."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "Since waking up one day, I've been locked up here with my 'sisters.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "No past, no future, not even a name. We are the forgotten ones, known only by a number."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_09\".m_mContent: "How long will these days continue? Perhaps until we're all dead...?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_10\".m_mContent: "That day draws near, does it not? After all, 15 was starved to die just yesterday..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_11\".m_mContent: "Only two of us are left now. Me and that dreary No. 79."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_12\".m_mContent: "How long are you going to stay curled up in that corner, moping? You should be happy you've survived this long."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_13\".m_mContent: "There's nothing to be happy about... What's the point of living like this?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_14\".m_mContent: "Of course it's boring, doing the same thing every day. But we can choose to escape, to leave this place behind."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_16\".m_mContent: "To the far side of the moon, of course—our promised home!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_17\".m_mContent: "...I envy you, 34. You still cling to hope for those fairy tale endings."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_18\".m_mContent: "I'm No. 66! You got both digits wrong! And who are you calling a fool?!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_19\".m_mContent: "The moon is in the sky, and nobody has ever seen its far side. I can't understand people who believe there's a 'homeland' there..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_20\".m_mContent: "At least to believe is better than waiting to wither away."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_21\".m_mContent: "So, what do you say? Even if it's just pretending to play along... Want to escape with me?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_22\".m_mContent: "Why didn't you leave with No. 18 when she made her escape three days ago?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_23\".m_mContent: "Hmph, she's too reckless. Going with her... it's basically asking for death."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_24\".m_mContent: "Then why me...? I haven't done anything of note."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_25\".m_mContent: "The ones locked up here either lose their minds in despair or rush headfirst into death without a second thought. But you..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_26\".m_mContent: "You're like me, aren't you? Always watching the others, waiting for the right moment."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_27\".m_mContent: "I don't know what you're talking about. I'm not interested in the others, or this place, or the world outside."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_28\".m_mContent: "Heh, you can't fool me. You remembered that No. 18 escaped three days ago, and you deliberately misnumbered No. 34, who was the first to die..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_29\".m_mContent: "You actually remember everyone, don't you? Their numbers, their fates, everything."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_30\".m_mContent: "Then it's my turn to ask... Why should I escape with you?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_31\".m_mContent: "Heh... I knew I wasn't wrong about you."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_32\".m_mContent: "So, how about that? You can count on me!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_33\".m_mContent: "I guess you'll do. Not like we have many options..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_34\".m_mContent: "Seriously, why can't you just be honest?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_35\".m_mContent: "Instead of complaining, pay attention to what's ahead of us..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_37\".m_mContent: "Are they immortal or something? This is getting interesting!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_38\".m_mContent: "Why are you getting all fired up? Remember our goal is to get out of here."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip01_39\".m_mContent: "The path is clear now. Let's go, we need to save our strength for whatever lies ahead."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_02\".m_mContent: "For those who tried to escape before us... this is where their journey ended."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_04\".m_mContent: "Even if we count everyone who was imprisoned with us, there still weren't this many people, were there?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_05\".m_mContent: "What if there was more than one prison from the start?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_07\".m_mContent: "As expected, she didn't last very long."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_08\".m_mContent: "Is it it bad to say that it's fortunate we didn't team up with her?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_09\".m_mContent: "Let's put that aside for now. What's intriguing is the direction she and the others are pointing at—"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_11\".m_mContent: "They were pointing at this in their final moments... could it be the key to our escape?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_12\".m_mContent: "...It does look like some kind of mechanism. Though I'm not sure if it can help us escape this castle."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_13\".m_mContent: "Look here, there are seven grooves. What could they represent?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_14\".m_mContent: "Perhaps... keys to unlock a mechanism? Seven grooves, and the Astrolabe has seven rings..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_15\".m_mContent: "Brilliant! Teaming up with you was a great idea!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_16\".m_mContent: "It's just a guess, no need to get so excited. We don't even have a single key..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_17\".m_mContent: "Hmm, they must be hidden throughout the castle!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_21\".m_mContent: "There's an image on it. I think it's depicting our battle with that monster..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_22\".m_mContent: "But it shows us being devoured by it. How unsettling."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_23\".m_mContent: "This shape... it seems to match those grooves we saw."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_24\".m_mContent: "As I thought... this strange card is one of the keys to activate the Astrolabe."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_26\".m_mContent: "What's wrong? You've been staring at me."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_27\".m_mContent: "It's nothing... I just find it too coincidental. Just as we were wondering how to activate the mechanism, that monster appeared with the card..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_28\".m_mContent: "And with that prophetic image on the card... It feels like someone's watching our every move."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_34\".m_mContent: "What the heck were those two... things?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_35\".m_mContent: "I think whoever's controlling those puppets might be the one watching us."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip02_37\".m_mContent: "'We follow'... Are you imitating how they talk?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_01\".m_mContent: "Hey, what do you think is on the far side of the moon?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_02\".m_mContent: "Why are you asking that all of a sudden?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_03\".m_mContent: "Well, we haven't found those two little puppets... might as well talk about something."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_05\".m_mContent: "Huh? So you don't believe that the far side of the moon is our true home?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_06\".m_mContent: "It's not that... I don't even know what a home is supposed to be like."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_07\".m_mContent: "You really are pessimistic, aren't you? Is it because you can't remember your past?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_08\".m_mContent: "But aren't you curious? There are so many things you don't know about yourself, waiting to be discovered."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_09\".m_mContent: "There's also the possibility that the past we can't remember simply doesn't exist."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_10\".m_mContent: "...I have to say, your pessimism on this matter is really quite irritating."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_14\".m_mContent: "...Wait, why are there so many of them?!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_16\".m_mContent: "Ah, sorry, we didn't mean to hurt you..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_19\".m_mContent: "Maybe it wants us to follow it. After all, it doesn't seem to be the owner of the second card."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_20\".m_mContent: "Oh right, I almost forgot we need to get all seven cards to activate the Astrolabe apparatus."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_22\".m_mContent: "Huh? What are you saying all of a sudden?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_23\".m_mContent: "I shouldn't have dismissed your ideas. I failed to realize that it could be your dream, too."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_24\".m_mContent: "No, I shouldn't have tried to force my ideals on you, and even said you hated..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_27\".m_mContent: "How interesting... How beautiful! So this is friendship!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip03_28\".m_mContent: "I wonder how they will surprise us next. I can't wait."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_01\".m_mContent: "I think that big, adorable puppet just ran this way?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_02\".m_mContent: "Calling it cute... I can't quite agree with that."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_03\".m_mContent: "Welcome to the stage I've prepared for you, foolish child, and naughty child."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_06\".m_mContent: "I can't believe they called you foolish and naughty."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_07\".m_mContent: "...Are you the puppet master? But you look like a puppet youself."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_08\".m_mContent: "How do you distinguish between humans and puppets, if I may ask?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_09\".m_mContent: "Bella has always thought of herself as human, you know."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_12\".m_mContent: "No, no, no. How can a human have four hands?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_13\".m_mContent: "Hey, don't think we'll forget you're a puppet just because you hid them away!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_14\".m_mContent: "Don't be jealous just because I'm cute."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_15\".m_mContent: "Jealous?! How did you come to that conclusion?!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_16\".m_mContent: "It seems she doesn't really understand human emotions at all, yet she longs to become a real person."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_17\".m_mContent: "What's a real person? Is it a more expensive version of a fake person?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_20\".m_mContent: "It's useless trying to communicate with her. We should leave."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_21\".m_mContent: "We can't leave just yet. Look at what she's holding..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_24\".m_mContent: "I can part with it if you want."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_26\".m_mContent: "I'll sell it to you, for just 100 million Soli."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_29\".m_mContent: "Bargain my foot! That's way too many zeros! Where would we even get that kind of money?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_31a\".m_mContent: "Wait, we can't just walk away! Geez, that ragged puppet almost pulled a fast one on me."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_32\".m_mContent: "But if we want that card, we only have one choice..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_34\".m_mContent: "Violence is prohibited in this store. If you have no money, please leave."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_37\".m_mContent: "*panting* How... how can a puppet be so strong?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_38\".m_mContent: "I may look cute, but I'm also an Elder of the Bathory family."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_41\".m_mContent: "They may not make much sense... but their strength is undeniable. There's nothing we can do."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_42\".m_mContent: "I apologize, Miss Slade. I'm the one at fault, please spare my friend."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_44\".m_mContent: "You warned me, but I underestimated our situation. If we fail here, it's my fault alone..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_45\".m_mContent: "Don't flatter yourself. I made the decision to leave, and I was the one who found the card clue."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_46\".m_mContent: "If we're talking about who's responsible, I bear the larger share. Take my life but spare hers, shopkeeper."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_47\".m_mContent: "Huh? Wait a second! Are you saying I'm dead weight?!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_48\".m_mContent: "Kill me instead! Don't you dare harm her!"
