\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_49\".m_mContent: "Are you two arguing or bonding? Is this what they call 'friendship'? Or 'love'?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_51\".m_mContent: "I don't quite understand... but it seems fun. I would also like to have... friends."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_52\".m_mContent: "You're a merchant, right? Let's make a deal. We'll be your friends in exchange for..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_53\".m_mContent: "...that card, and a way out... as friends."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_55\".m_mContent: "Darn, she's pretty sharp when it comes to making deals..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_56\".m_mContent: "But you see, what we're offering you is two friends."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_58\".m_mContent: "You have a point. Okay, two friends... I will count that as 10 million Soli. Take this card and be on your way."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_59\".m_mContent: "Great! Friendship really is the most precious treasure, huh?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_60\".m_mContent: "As for the remaining 90 million, you can repay it slowly as my friends and valued customers."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_61\".m_mContent: "Huh? So... I miscalculated? Does that mean the two of us are only worth one-tenth of that card?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_62\".m_mContent: "Friendship shouldn't be measured by money. Isn't that what you taught me, my friends?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_64\".m_mContent: "We've got the second card too. Let's get out of here before she changes her mind."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_65\".m_mContent: "Bella's quite happy to have made two new friends."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip04_68\".m_mContent: "Shame... In the end, only one can remain. Or perhaps, none at all."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_02\".m_mContent: "Sorry, I... I think it's better if I go back to my cage after all."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_03\".m_mContent: "What are you talking about? We just found the second card!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_05\".m_mContent: "We got lucky once, but how can we ensure we'll be fortunate enough to survive a second or third time?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_06\".m_mContent: "That puppet was right. So many have died along the way. How much hope do we really have of becoming survivors?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_07\".m_mContent: "Why do you always jump to the worst-case scenario?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_08\".m_mContent: "You're right. So I've been thinking, even if we manage to escape, will it really change anything?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_09\".m_mContent: "The far side of the moon could just be a lie they told us. Even if we somehow escaped, we might just end up in an even bigger cage."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_10\".m_mContent: "From beginning to end, you and I might just have been someone's pawns to toy with..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_14\".m_mContent: "You can feel me, can't you? My body's warmth, my scent—they're real."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_17\".m_mContent: "Maybe we'll end up like those cold bodies on the ground, but at least... we'll be together."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_18\".m_mContent: "I... I don't want to face the unknown alone. Even if it's a lie... even if it's for just a moment... could you... could you continue to walk with me?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_19\".m_mContent: "Are these... stone statues from the castle?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_22\".m_mContent: "Since you've said all that... I don't know how far we can go, but I'll accompany you."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_23\".m_mContent: "I can't shake the feeling that these statues are being manipulated by someone using the shadows."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_24\".m_mContent: "Like those puppets we encountered before, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_25\".m_mContent: "If I'm right, then the person controlling these statues might... possess the third card."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_26\".m_mContent: "You're trembling. What are you afraid of? Worried we'll be defeated like before?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_28\".m_mContent: "If... if I die, you must live on, for both of us..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_32\".m_mContent: "Stop worrying so much. I won't let anything happen to you, and you won't let anything happen to me."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip05_33\".m_mContent: "C'mon, let's go! I'm curious to see what we'll face next."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_01\".m_mContent: "Is anyone really here in this darkness?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_02\".m_mContent: "Stay alert. If they can control statues with shadows, they can surely conceal themselves too."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_03\".m_mContent: "But we still have to push forward, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_04\".m_mContent: "Lesson one: respect the darkness and the unknown lurking within."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_06\".m_mContent: "The louder the voice, the more it fails to mask the fear underneath. That's lesson two."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_07\".m_mContent: "However, I didn't expect that two would come at the same time."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_08\".m_mContent: "Are you one of that puppet's companions?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_09\".m_mContent: "Companion? What a nostalgic yet unpleasant word."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_10\".m_mContent: "I've never had companions, nor will I ever."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_12\".m_mContent: "Such a lack of vigilance. I'm amazed you've made it this far."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_14\".m_mContent: "This guy... Could he be some kind of monster?!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_15\".m_mContent: "I'm surprised you still have the strength to speak."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_16\".m_mContent: "But it's still within expectations. In the end, you're just another batch of failed experiments."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_18\".m_mContent: "Are you willing to die in her place?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_19\".m_mContent: "79, get out of the way! Didn't we agree not to do this?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_20\".m_mContent: "I... I'm sorry. I'll hold him off here. You go first!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_22\".m_mContent: "You've always dreamed of the outside world more than I have, so... at least you should make it out!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_23\".m_mContent: "Forget it! We're escaping together. I'm not leaving you behind!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_24\".m_mContent: "Are you done playing this game of friendship?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_26\".m_mContent: "It's Cidhall, the Elder here... sort of. I'm new."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_28\".m_mContent: "My name. Didn't you ask for my name?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_30\".m_mContent: "Oh, don't bother. I won't remember some useless numbers."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_32\".m_mContent: "Judging by where you came from, you must've passed that strange puppet, though I'm not sure how you managed that..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_33\".m_mContent: "But I lack her overzealous curiosity for these trials. I'm just doing my job here."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_34\".m_mContent: "'Die here in despair,' or 'Struggle to survive and chase that unreachable goal.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_35\".m_mContent: "The path ahead is yours to choose."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_40\".m_mContent: "So... does this mean we've passed through here?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_41\".m_mContent: "If you're not afraid of the path leading to a darker abyss, then press on—candidate vessels."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip06_42\".m_mContent: "After all, the vessel we ultimately seek is one that fears not death, and can bear all sins and suffering."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_01\".m_mContent: "Whoa, it's so dark here... Is this what Cidhall was talking about?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_02\".m_mContent: "And it seems the path ends here, with only a bottomless void below..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_03\".m_mContent: "So this must be the abyss he mentioned?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_04\".m_mContent: "So it's literally an abyss? That's rather... disappointing."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_06\".m_mContent: "No, this feeling... The ground beneath us is sinking!?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_07\".m_mContent: "Whoa! This place is way too high!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_08\".m_mContent: "And there are some unsettling figures here—first puppets, then statues, and now armored suits?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_09\".m_mContent: "Vessels without masters, welcome to your trial."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_10\".m_mContent: "That voice, where is it coming from... Ah!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_12\".m_mContent: "Even vessels need to be tempered, lest they become naught but discarded refuse."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_13\".m_mContent: "This time, perhaps some souls will persevere to the depths below, and grant this old warrior an unexpected delight."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_15\".m_mContent: "We'll have to use our tried-and-true method—knock them out! But be careful not to fall off—Aaah!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_17\".m_mContent: "As expected of vessels capable of passing the three trials—and two at once, no less."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_18\".m_mContent: "The gate stands open. I await you here."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_20\".m_mContent: "We can't go back now, unless... we can restart this massive platform?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_21\".m_mContent: "...If it starts up again, we'd have to ride it all the way back up, right? That might be worse than dying..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_23\".m_mContent: "You used to always hide away, quiet and emotionless. But now..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_24\".m_mContent: "Is it... weird? Do you not like it?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_25\".m_mContent: "No, on the contrary, I think it's wonderful!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_26\".m_mContent: "You've always been different from the others, always immersed in your own world, enjoying your own secrets."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_27\".m_mContent: "Perhaps it's this side of you that keeps drawing me closer."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_28\".m_mContent: "I was just thinking how wonderful it is to be on this journey with you!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_29\".m_mContent: "Why are you so happy about it?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_30\".m_mContent: "Because you're exactly the person I imagined you to be. And now that you're growing, I know I've had an influence on you, which is... truly wonderful."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip07_31\".m_mContent: "66... Let's go meet whoever is waiting for us."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_01\".m_mContent: "Good, you didn't keep this old soul waiting for too long. But my weapon... is thirsting for blood..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_02\".m_mContent: "It's been ages since a vessel last graced my presence."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_04\".m_mContent: "My mortal flesh has long since withered. This form is all that remains."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_05\".m_mContent: "Fear not. What stands before you is but one of my avatars, its power still within mortal bounds to challenge."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_07\".m_mContent: "Maybe this old guy's different from those two weirdos. Could he actually be... nice?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_09\".m_mContent: "In order to revive the Bathory family, you shall directly influence the success of the Moonfall."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_10\".m_mContent: "Hold on, did you just say... Moonfall?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_11\".m_mContent: "Ever since we woke up, there's been this voice in our heads telling us to go to the far side of the moon..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_13\".m_mContent: "While I bear you no ill will, I am not here to answer your questions."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_14\".m_mContent: "So, you don't intend to deal us another card?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_15\".m_mContent: "It seems your encounters with those outsiders Bella and Cidhall have taught you the rules of this 'game.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_16\".m_mContent: "Outsiders? Aren't they elders of the family like you?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_17\".m_mContent: "The thirst for power, for life, for knowledge... Those who cling to such things are merely driven by their own desires."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_18\".m_mContent: "Only I remain absolutely loyal to the Bathory family!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_19\".m_mContent: "You don't look like someone without ambition. In fact, from where I'm standing, they look like they're about to burst into flames."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_20\".m_mContent: "'Tis because you're here... My ambition to see the Bathorys rise to greatness once more has been ignited!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_22\".m_mContent: "I, Baphomet, in the name of the Bathory family, shall execute the trial upon these two vessel candidates before me!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_23\".m_mContent: "Watch out! Those suits of armor are coming for us."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_24\".m_mContent: "And here I thought we'd met a nice old man. Looks like we'll have to fight after all!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_26\".m_mContent: "You can still talk in that state?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_27\".m_mContent: "My true form is not here. As long as my soul exists, I can never truly die."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_29\".m_mContent: "It's yours by right. This key was always meant for worthy vessels. Consider it a reward for pleasantly surprising this old man."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_30\".m_mContent: "...What exactly do you mean by vessels?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_31\".m_mContent: "It is your destiny; your one and only future."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_32\".m_mContent: "When the Blood Moon descends and the final moment arrives, you will understand..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_36\".m_mContent: "Are you alright? You're muttering to yourself."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_37\".m_mContent: "Maybe I'm overthinking it, but I can't shake the feeling that the future depicted by these cards is not what we're striving for..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_38\".m_mContent: "The promised home on the far side of the moon, or the descent of the Blood Moon? Which dream is the real one?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip08_39\".m_mContent: "You're definitely overthinking it, but that's what sets you apart from the rest of us."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_02\".m_mContent: "I never thought they'd keep cats in such a gloomy castle."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_03\".m_mContent: "What's wrong, 79? Don't tell me you're thinking about going back again."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_04\".m_mContent: "We've already obtained four cards. We're more than halfway through this journey. Let's stay positive."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_05\".m_mContent: "No matter what lies ahead, I'll be by your side. But..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_06\".m_mContent: "It's because we'll continue this journey together, leave this place together, and go to our home on the far side of the moon that I feel..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_07\".m_mContent: "I don't want to call you 66 anymore, and I don't want you to call me 79. I hope... we can have our own names."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_08\".m_mContent: "Oh, I actually have a name. When I first awoke, I gave myself a beautiful name..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_09\".m_mContent: "Can you tell me? I want to call you by your name."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_11\".m_mContent: "'The Lovers' - connection, trust, believing in each other, moving forward together. This card depicts your present."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_14\".m_mContent: "I'm afraid none of these are the fifth card you're looking for, darlings."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_15\".m_mContent: "Then we have nothing more to say to you."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_16\".m_mContent: "My, my... It seems you two have had quite a rough time with the other elders. You've grown much more cautious."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_17\".m_mContent: "Are you implying that you're one of the elders too? But you don't have a card."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_18\".m_mContent: "I merely said these cards aren't what you're looking for. I never said it wasn't in my possession, did I?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_19\".m_mContent: "In fact, quite the opposite. The Astrolabe apparatus and the 'Prophecy Cards' are all of my creation."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_20\".m_mContent: "The other three elders were annoying enough, but this one is really getting on my nerves!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_21\".m_mContent: "Now hold on. Don't you want to know more from me? Like which one is the fifth card you need, how to leave this place, or that place you're trying to reach—"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_22\".m_mContent: "Forget it! We'll just defeat you and take the card from your deck!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_23\".m_mContent: "Ah, what a clever choice. As a reward, I'll do a Tarot reading for you—"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_24\".m_mContent: "My, my, this card... Is it what you expected? 'The Moon' in reverse—"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_25\".m_mContent: "What does that mean?! ...Is it the far side of the moor? Or a bleeding moon? I've seen both in my dreams..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_26\".m_mContent: "It seems... you're a bit lost. Are you about to break free from your cage?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_28\".m_mContent: "The reversed 'Moon'... unease and deception. As if you're flying towards the dream you seek—the far side of the moon. Beautiful, but is it truly real?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_29\".m_mContent: "The reversed 'Lovers' implies you'll soon face new choices. The moment to choose between your emotions and your dreams may not be far off."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_30\".m_mContent: "And when these two cards depicting your future are combined, that is what you desire—"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_32\".m_mContent: "The fifth card... Did you intend to give it to us from the start?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_33\".m_mContent: "I just saw in you the image of a past friend. I remember she also gave herself a name..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_34\".m_mContent: "Consider this card a gift and a word of advice from me. After all, the path ahead will undoubtedly be difficult."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_37\".m_mContent: "That reminds me, she just mentioned a name. We didn't finish our conversation. You were about to tell me your name..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_38\".m_mContent: "I've thought it through. Now is not the time."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_40\".m_mContent: "Because I want us to tell each other our names after we've escaped together."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_41\".m_mContent: "To symbolize breaking free from our past lives, bound by numbers, and embracing a new future."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_42\".m_mContent: "...So, I should come up with a name too?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_43\".m_mContent: "Of course! Think about it. If we really made it to the far side of the moon, what would you say when the people there ask for your name?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_44\".m_mContent: "You're right, but... I have no idea. What name should I give myself?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_45\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, we'll think about it on the way. Before we find the last two cards and escape..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_46\".m_mContent: "My, I almost said too much, and spoiled the second half of the cruel prophecy..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip09_47\".m_mContent: "Better leave it to 'Death.' That man always handles these things with such finesse."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_01\".m_mContent: "Is it me or does this place feel... familiar?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_04\".m_mContent: "Why... since entering this room, I've been getting déjà vu."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_05\".m_mContent: "Me too. This isn't my first time here either."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_06\".m_mContent: "But we've been in that cage since we woke up... Unless..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_07\".m_mContent: "It's a memory from even before then? So we've been here before."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_09\".m_mContent: "Who are you?! And what do you mean?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_10\".m_mContent: "You have indeed been here before. More so, this place is..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_12\".m_mContent: "Ah! 66... Look closely. Those sleeping in the tanks are..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_15\".m_mContent: "As expected of two who've already obtained five cards. You saved me the trouble of having to explain."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_16\".m_mContent: "Indeed, these vessels who've yet to awaken are you. Or more precisely..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_17\".m_mContent: "They will eventually become you—if you two fail to become the 'perfect vessel' in the end."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_19\".m_mContent: "Someone once said this of me: 'He always has something concealed, but he never lies.'—I've always taken pride in that, even made it my life's motto."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_20\".m_mContent: "Are you saying our lives... have been... been..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_23\".m_mContent: "Why make such a fuss? In this world, aren't we all being manipulated one way or another?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_24\".m_mContent: "The only difference is who's pulling the strings—Parents? Lovers? Or have you ever considered..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_25\".m_mContent: "Perhaps everyone is being manipulated by some higher power—though you might prefer to call it 'fate.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_26\".m_mContent: "Shut up! We won't believe anything you people say anymore!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_27\".m_mContent: "We're going to defeat you and take the sixth card!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_28\".m_mContent: "It's on you, isn't it? You, the fifth elder of this rotten family!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_29\".m_mContent: "Unfortunately, I'm not an elder. I'm just an ordinary alchemist, and I suppose also the steward of this family."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_30\".m_mContent: "Fortunately, the sixth card is indeed on me."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_31\".m_mContent: "...That's all I needed to hear! I don't care who you are!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_32\".m_mContent: "66... Be extremely careful. I have a very bad feeling about this man, a feeling I didn't get from the elders..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_33\".m_mContent: "The bad news is, while I'm not skilled in combat, you seem even less so."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_34\".m_mContent: "The good news is, it seems you haven't truly defeated any of the elders, yet you've made it this far."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_35\".m_mContent: "Perhaps I should graciously hand over the card I've been safekeeping to you, without wounding your pride too much. That would be for the best, wouldn't it?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_36\".m_mContent: "This bastard... How dare he mock us like this!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_37\".m_mContent: "...66, don't act rashly. I have a very bad feeling about this..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_38\".m_mContent: "The one lying on the ground must be No. 79, who hasn't thought of a name yet, correct?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_39\".m_mContent: "And this hot-tempered lady must be No. 66, who has a name but hasn't revealed it yet?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_40\".m_mContent: "I won't let you talk about 79 like that! I won't let you... tarnish our promise and dreams!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_41\".m_mContent: "Then tell me, why do you think you have a name? What makes you different from the others?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_42\".m_mContent: "Shut up! It's because I came up with... Wait... I..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_43\".m_mContent: "Noticed something amiss? You have no memory of naming yourself, yet you remember having a name."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_44\".m_mContent: "No, it's not like that. This can't be... but... how..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_45\".m_mContent: "66... Don't do this to yourself. These memories... We don't even know what's real and what's fake."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_46\".m_mContent: "It's too late now, No. 66. Or should I call you La-"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_47\".m_mContent: "I won’t allow it! I will never, ever let someone like you ridicule our dreams..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_48\".m_mContent: "Why... It can't be... This can't be happening..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_49\".m_mContent: "Since you're so insistent, I'll give you the chance to reveal your own name, No. 66."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_50\".m_mContent: "I've placed the sixth card on you. Now, go and unlock the seven seals..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_51\".m_mContent: "The first is the cage that imprisons you, the second is the fear that devours you, and the third blocks your path forward..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_52\".m_mContent: "The fourth seals your hearts, the fifth steals your memories, and the sixth reopens your lives up to this point..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_54\".m_mContent: "And the final one... it firmly locks away your intertwined 'futures.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip10_55\".m_mContent: "In the end, I suspect you'll be the ones least willing to open it."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_01\".m_mContent: "Just a bit further! We're almost at the lobby!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_04\".m_mContent: "Now isn't the time to second guess ourselves."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_05\".m_mContent: "Look, our destination is just ahead. We're almost there!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_08\".m_mContent: "It's those monsters we encountered earlier. They weren't destroyed after all..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_09\".m_mContent: "Damn it—66, don't just stand there, run!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_12\".m_mContent: "79... do you remember how we got those cards?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_16\".m_mContent: "But the first card was inside that slimy monster."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_17\".m_mContent: "Why did we just happen to find the first card at the Astrolabe?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_18\".m_mContent: "Why... did so many of our sisters die along the way?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_21\".m_mContent: "From the very beginning, I've held a card in my hand."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_22\".m_mContent: "These girls failed here because they were never able to get the final card."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_23\".m_mContent: "The reason the first card was inside the monster is that those girls... could only get this far before being devoured by that creature."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_24\".m_mContent: "The final card they needed has been in my possession all along."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_26\".m_mContent: "It seems I no longer need to explain any further."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_27\".m_mContent: "It's time to put an end to all of this... No. 79!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_37\".m_mContent: "Don't tell me... you deliberately provoked me to attack you?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_39\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, 79, for deceiving you all this time..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_42\".m_mContent: "Sadly, you'll have to face the Blood Moon alone..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_43\".m_mContent: "No... you can't die. Please, I'm begging you, don't die!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip11_48\".m_mContent: "Take that card and come to the Astrolabe. Perhaps you'll find the answers you seek."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_01\".m_mContent: "Allow me to congratulate you on making it this far."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_03\".m_mContent: "You can call me Cain. Before we activate the Astrolabe, I suspect you have many questions."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_05\".m_mContent: "What was the point of all this?!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_07\".m_mContent: "To reach our home on the far side of the moon, we need a vessel capable of carrying the 'Blood.'"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_08\".m_mContent: "The moon is not so gentle. The blood that it sheds is not something that anyone can bear."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_09\".m_mContent: "I don't understand a word you're saying..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_10\".m_mContent: "That's fine. I'm sure you will soon enough."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_12\".m_mContent: "Oh? Are you refusing to return home?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_14\".m_mContent: "Just kill me—that should be easy for you, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_15\".m_mContent: "This is quite troublesome. If you die, it'll take an enormous amount of time to screen for another suitable vessel."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_16\".m_mContent: "Don't you want to know why No. 66 chose death?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_18\".m_mContent: "I told you, the Astrolabe can give you the answers you seek."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_19\".m_mContent: "Since you're already here, why not give it a try?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_20\".m_mContent: "And if it still doesn't change your mind, I can grant you death then. What do you say?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_21\".m_mContent: "...You better not be lying to me."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_24\".m_mContent: "These cards... they're moving on their own..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_25\".m_mContent: "So those things outside came from here..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_26\".m_mContent: "Complete your final trial, Vessel—for the answers you seek."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_28\".m_mContent: "It's time for you to remember who you truly are."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_30\".m_mContent: "Even as a vessel, you were not without a past."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_31\".m_mContent: "Time has imprisoned your memories, but now, you should be able to recall everything."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_33\".m_mContent: "It's time to complete the final step."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_36\".m_mContent: "It's just an endless cycle, chasing after an unattainable goal."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_37\".m_mContent: "Even knowing the scene before you is but an illusion, you still refuse to give up."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_42\".m_mContent: "You are me, and I am you."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_43\".m_mContent: "From beginning to end, we have always been... the same person."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_45\".m_mContent: "Why do you have her face?! Give it back! Die!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_47\".m_mContent: "I... should have known. Why did it take me so long to realize..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_51\".m_mContent: "That voice in my head just gave me two choices—"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_52\".m_mContent: "Move forward, or... return to where it all began."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_53\".m_mContent: "If I can go back, I'll be able to meet No. 66 again."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_54\".m_mContent: "Even though I'll lose my memories, there might still be a chance to save everything..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_57\".m_mContent: "She entrusted everything to me, through countless cycles, through countless deaths..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_58\".m_mContent: "But it's all in vain. As long as you exist, this farce will never end."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_59\".m_mContent: "As expected of the perfect vessel, No. 79."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_62\".m_mContent: "This is her final gift to me... and her last hope."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_65\".m_mContent: "A passage only wide enough for one. This is why she chose death."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_66\".m_mContent: "You all have such a twisted sense of humor."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_69\".m_mContent: "Let's go, Lamia. Let's return to our homeland together—carrying this hope and promise."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_70\".m_mContent: "At last... I've ... We've finally made it."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_71\".m_mContent: "Beyond this door lies our long-awaited home, and the freedom we've always sought!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_73\".m_mContent: "Looks like the last one finally showed up. You've kept us waiting far too long."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_75\".m_mContent: "Did you hear, No. 1357? She's an old relic with a two-digit number."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_76\".m_mContent: "Wow! To actually get to meet one of these antiques, what an honor for us!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_77\".m_mContent: "Who... are you? What are you talking about? Is this the far side of the moon?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_78\".m_mContent: "The moon? Guess we have another lost fool."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_79\".m_mContent: "D-don't say that... Didn't we... agree to escape together once all seven of us got here? We need to get along..."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_80\".m_mContent: "Shut up, idiot. Take your peace and love routine somewhere else. I don't care who's in my way, I'll be the last one standing."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_81\".m_mContent: "Hey, newbie, do you have a name?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_83\".m_mContent: "Oh! As expected of a senior, I really want a name too!"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_84\".m_mContent: "Why did you ask that, Empousa? Are you hoping she's as much of a fool as you?"

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_85\".m_mContent: "I don't understand what you mean by that. Everyone here has their own hopes and dreams, and that's why we're sisters."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_86\".m_mContent: "Congratulations, everyone. The fated seven has finally gathered."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_87\".m_mContent: "Well then, let us waste no time and start this blissful slaughter. After all, only one will make it to the far side of the moon."

\"Dialogue_E_10001_Clip12_88\".m_mContent: "Welcome to the second round of the 'Moonfall Games'—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_01\".m_mContent: "How much longer do we have to stay here, mother?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_05\".m_mContent: "When the rainy season ends and the sun comes out, my twinkling star, we'll wander to the next place."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "What a downpour! Even the fish are coming up to the surface, let's go catch some!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "Aunt Julia says you can do divination, is that true?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_09\".m_mContent: "Yes, divination is how Mother saved me."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_10\".m_mContent: "Oh, was it something exciting? Were you being chased? Or ran into the wrong crowd?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_11\".m_mContent: "It was when I was just born. I was abandoned by the water. Mother found me through divination and adopted me."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_12\".m_mContent: "No wonder you're so afraid of water! Well, not what I was expecting... Do you have any other interesting stories with divination?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_13\".m_mContent: "Umm... We once found our stolen luggage through divination. It turned out the thief had hidden it in a windmill."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_14\".m_mContent: "Oh, did you see the windmill during the divination? Or was there a voice telling you which way to go?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_15\".m_mContent: "Divination is like... looking at reflections in the rainwater. Vague fragments will appear in your mind."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_16\".m_mContent: "That's hard to imagine... I know! How 'bout doing a divination for me? See my fate and stuff."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_17\".m_mContent: "I... I can't perform divination for others..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_18\".m_mContent: "But you said you were able to find your luggage through divination. Is it because I didn't give you treats?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_19\".m_mContent: "I can't do divination for others because of... something that happened..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_22\".m_mContent: "It's okay if you don't want to talk about it. Can't we try it just for fun? I want to see what it's all about."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_26\".m_mContent: "As the veil of destiny unfurls, each card whispers in secret: "Death" slowly reveals itself, not as a finality, but as the shadow of endless torment and anguish."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_27\".m_mContent: "'The Tower' stands at the center of the storm, its once solid foundation crumbling in tragedy;"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_28\".m_mContent: "The final 'Judgment' descends, where past sins are settled, undisputable, and no one is spared."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_30\".m_mContent: "That's amazing! Do these mysterious phrases just come to you? What do they sound like when they appear? Is it a male cat or a female cat?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_31\".m_mContent: "Don't... don't put too much faith in my divination. This... might not be accurate..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_33\".m_mContent: "I'm sure nothing bad will happen. That stuff about 'past sins' and 'endless pain' just sound scary."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_34\".m_mContent: "This is just a normal little town, after all—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_37\".m_mContent: "What appeared? Of course it was those beasts—slimy, vicious creatures that bring nothing but pain and Black Blood!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_38\".m_mContent: "Hurry and defeat them! After all—these are your memories, not some blissful dreamland."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_39\".m_mContent: "The departed will eventually return to dust..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_40\".m_mContent: "There are more and more Blood Beasts. This isn't working... We need to get out of here."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_41\".m_mContent: "How can we leave? The Pontos was sunk in the storm. We're lucky to have drifted to this island."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_42\".m_mContent: "Problems with the cargo, running into a storm, being stranded on a deserted island, and now Blood Beasts appearing out of nowhere... This journey has been nothing but bad luck."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_45\".m_mContent: "Jacintha, aren't you Esmeralda's chosen successor? Can you use the Tarot cards to see what we should do?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_46\".m_mContent: "Quiet you—Have you forgotten what happened the last time? She hasn't performed divination since..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_47\".m_mContent: "...The Tarot is not a power to be used lightly. We explore the limits of being 'human,' and only after that do we seek the blessing of the Tarot."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip01_51\".m_mContent: "Before we entrust our fate to divination, don't forget that our hands can create miracles too!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_01\".m_mContent: "Let's get rid of all the Blood Beasts on the island!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_02\".m_mContent: "...Is what I want to say, but..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_04\".m_mContent: "What else can we do? The wreckage of the Pontos has already drifted who knows where. Although I said I'll rely on myself, right now we're... completely clueless."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_05\".m_mContent: "Esmeralda always says I'm a wild cat... If I were really a cat, would I still have all these worries?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_06\".m_mContent: "Can you be infected with Black Blood, kitty? If you can, would you turn into..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_07\".m_mContent: "A giant, super fluffy version of yourself? Hehe, I can just imagine how cute you'd—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_10\".m_mContent: "Is this... cypress? Hmm, it's a fine material for building ships. Wait, you mean..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_11\".m_mContent: "Why didn't I think of that! Surely we can build something to get off this island! Thank you, kitty!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_12\".m_mContent: "But... how are the two of us going to cut down this big old thing and bring it back to camp?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_13\".m_mContent: "We're likely to run into those beasts along the way back to camp. If you're still carrying the log..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_16\".m_mContent: "I knew it... When I didn't see you in the camp, I knew you must have snuck out."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_18\".m_mContent: "Let's save that poor little thing first."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_19\".m_mContent: "Men, are you going to let a girl and cat be in peril? Take up your weapons!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip02_22\".m_mContent: "You mischievous little guy, are you hurt?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_01\".m_mContent: "Why were all the Blood Beasts going for Jacintha during the battle..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_01a\".m_mContent: "I saw them licking the blood from Dalcarlo's wounds... Could they be attracted to blood?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_02\".m_mContent: "It seems the Blood Beasts have set their eyes on the talented mystic of the Pontos."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_03\".m_mContent: "Let's get out of here before more show up."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_04\".m_mContent: "Wait, Captain. The cat led me here to show us a way out."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_07\".m_mContent: "You mean this tree? ...Ah, to build a new boat?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_08\".m_mContent: "Hmm... that's indeed an option. Men, let's chop down this tree!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_10\".m_mContent: "Strong and sturdy... an excellent base for a dugout canoe!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_12\".m_mContent: "Alright, now let's haul this back to the camp!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_14\".m_mContent: "The sea's waves may toss us, but WE DON'T CARE! Everyone get in tempo and... LIFT!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip03_15\".m_mContent: "A landlubber's life may be peaceful, but WE DON'T CARE!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_01\".m_mContent: "...Thanks to everyone's combined effort, the great Pontos II has been completed!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_02\".m_mContent: "Now let's get the Pontos II into the water!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_07\".m_mContent: "Captain... while we were distracted those beasts ripped a hole in the ship..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_09\".m_mContent: "Don't lose heart. Let me find something to patch up the hole."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_10\".m_mContent: "The great Pontos II will set sail another day!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_11\".m_mContent: "...Thanks to everyone's perseverance, the great Pontos II is ready for sail!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_12\".m_mContent: "Everyone, muster your strength and paddle hard!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_16\".m_mContent: "Blood Beasts were lying in ambush in the sea!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_17\".m_mContent: "Captain... the mast was broken during the battle..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_18\".m_mContent: "It's alright, I've thought of a sturdier way to secure the mast."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_19\".m_mContent: "Men, clean up the battlefield. The great Pontos II will set sail again tomorrow!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_20\".m_mContent: "Tomorrow? You still think there's going to be a tomorrow?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_21\".m_mContent: "Just give up! There is no tomorrow, there is no hope! Failure and death are all that await, again and again."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_22\".m_mContent: "Everyone's already seen the end of the story, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_24\".m_mContent: "A plague broke out in town... My cousin was infected."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_26\".m_mContent: "Yes... the infected are unable to eat at all. It's pure suffering, day in and day out."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_27\".m_mContent: "The doctor gave her some medicine and said... if she could hold on until tomorrow, there's still hope for recovery..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_28\".m_mContent: "She'll be fine, she will definitely be fine..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_30\".m_mContent: "Shoot, Mother is looking for me. She won't let me come out to play with you. She says I'll get infected... I have to go now!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_31\".m_mContent: "Where have you been? Something's happened to your cousin, come with me!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_32\".m_mContent: "How could this be?! Didn't they say... didn't they say she could hold on until tomorrow?!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_33\".m_mContent: "Sigh... That was just the doctor's empty words to comfort her..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip04_34\".m_mContent: "It's the plague. Even if she did last until tomorrow, what then?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_02\".m_mContent: "Today is the day we board the great Pontos II!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_04\".m_mContent: "The Captain was inspecting until late last night, and said we'll definitely set sail today!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_05\".m_mContent: "Let's hope Captain Patchen's skill at steering a canoe is as good as commanding a big ship... Surely... we won't capsize, right? I can't swim..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_06\".m_mContent: "Kitty, can you swim? You'll be fine, right? You're a cat who can do anything, after all."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_08\".m_mContent: "If only I were a cat too—If we were all cats, we could swim away from here, couldn't we?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_11\".m_mContent: "The Captain got infected with the Black Blood Disease, killed Stanley in the middle of the night, and Ernest..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_14\".m_mContent: "The Captain is gone, the ship is damaged, we have no hope of leaving this place..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_15\".m_mContent: "Esmeralda's divination was right—these beasts will destroy the Pontos. Better to be eaten by the Captain than die in the jaws of those beasts."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_16\".m_mContent: "Stop! Our fate will not end here."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_17\".m_mContent: "I don't believe in the fate you speak of! Are you the one Esmeralda said would bring hope? You're not!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_18\".m_mContent: "She adopted you to inherit her role as the next mystic of the Pontos, to break that prophecy, but you can't even pick up the Tarot cards!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_19\".m_mContent: "The fate and future you speak of are all lies!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_21\".m_mContent: "I will pick up the Tarot cards."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_22\".m_mContent: "I will perform the final divination and lead everyone off this island."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_23\".m_mContent: "Who's going to believe you at this point?!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_24\".m_mContent: "Cheer up, lad! Now is not the time to be disheartened!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_26\".m_mContent: "You are my handpicked sailors, of course you can weather the storm and set sail on the Pontos II!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_27\".m_mContent: "It's the Captain! The Captain is speaking!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_28\".m_mContent: "I see the spirit of the deceased has descended once again... He must have given you final guidance."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_29\".m_mContent: "I... I want to believe the Captain's words."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_31\".m_mContent: "But before that, we must stop the 'Captain' from harming his former men..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_32\".m_mContent: "He... he is still the Captain, do we really... really have to..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_33\".m_mContent: "If you can't do it... then get back."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_36\".m_mContent: "If you could hear the voice of destiny... why didn't you tell everyone what to do earlier..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_37\".m_mContent: "Why did you wait... wait until the Captain..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_38\".m_mContent: "The gifts of fate come at a price. It was my cowardice and hesitation that delayed its revelation..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_39\".m_mContent: "You... you're the one Esmeralda mentioned, aren't you?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_40\".m_mContent: "...Yes, I am the one Esmeralda spoke of. I will perform the final divination."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_40a\".m_mContent: "Just don't... give up on hope at a time like this."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_42\".m_mContent: "The sea's waves may toss us... but we don't care..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_43\".m_mContent: "A landlubber's life may be peaceful... but we don't care..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_44\".m_mContent: "The brave Captain... buried by the raging waves..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip05_46\".m_mContent: "The fearless Captain...buried by the sailor's shanties..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_03\".m_mContent: "Esmeralda said that the fate of the Pontos... the fate of everyone on board, was revealed in this incomplete Tarot spread."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_04\".m_mContent: "But she never drew the final card, not even when she left us during that accident..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_07\".m_mContent: "The cards reveal that the Pontos will ultimately fall to Death, and this calamity will continue to spread until it brings misfortune to the entire continent."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_07a\".m_mContent: "I always thought her divination was too bizarre, but now it seems everything is coming true."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_08\".m_mContent: "The future shown in the reading is sealed... unless I can draw the final card."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_10\".m_mContent: "Esmeralda said that only a mystic who truly masters the power of the Tarot can draw the final card, bringing new hope to the incomplete spread..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_11\".m_mContent: "Kitty, do you think I can draw the final card?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_13\".m_mContent: "Even if I drew a card, what then? Am I even a real mystic? I can't see the connections between those images, I'm just..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_14\".m_mContent: "I'm just a fraud pretending to be something I'm not..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_15\".m_mContent: "Kitty, what should I do... If Esmeralda were here... What would she do..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_16\".m_mContent: "If the almighty Esmeralda were here, she'd raise her steel fork and swing her iron fists, beating those Black Blood beasts to a pulp! They wouldn't know what hit them!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_17\".m_mContent: "She'd keep fighting all the way to the Blood Beasts' lair! She'd find the mastermind behind it all—the evil windmill that wants to devour the entire world!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_18\".m_mContent: "Her righteous light would blind the windmill, her inspiring words would make it ashamed to see the light of day!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_19\".m_mContent: "...'Strength' is right there, but the one who possesses it turns a blind eye."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_20\".m_mContent: "That cowardly 'Fool' has forgotten everything she taught her!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_22\".m_mContent: "Stay here and wait for me to come back. Don't wander off, don't interact with other cats. Remember that, my mischievous little 'Star.'"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_24\".m_mContent: "I've heard of an herb that can treat the plague. Perhaps I can find it in the mountains."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_25\".m_mContent: "Bernice said there are wolves in the mountains. It's not safe."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_26\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, my dear, I'll use divination to avoid them."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_28\".m_mContent: "Shh—Spoken words have the power to become reality."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_29\".m_mContent: "As long as we hold onto hope, there's still a chance to turn things around."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_31\".m_mContent: "Kitty, I know what to do now."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_32\".m_mContent: "I will draw the last card. I promised Ernest... I can do it."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_34\".m_mContent: "On the ancient, lost island—sailors find treasure—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_35\".m_mContent: "The golden chest opens—pearls and coral shining brightly—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_36\".m_mContent: "On the mysterious ghost ship—sailors break the curse—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_37\".m_mContent: "The sealed door opens—ancient tales come to light—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_38\".m_mContent: "In the distant new land—milk and honey flow everywhere—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_40\".m_mContent: "Are you here looking for treasure as well?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_41\".m_mContent: "Too bad I found this place first. According to sailors' rules..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_43\".m_mContent: "Sailors always stick together in times of crisis."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_44\".m_mContent: "How did you... uh... get guided here by fate?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_45\".m_mContent: "You're not at the camp, so you must have snuck out."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_46\".m_mContent: "...That's what the Captain used to say."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_48\".m_mContent: "There's nothing to apologize for. We all abandoned our stable lives to follow the Captain we admired, drifting around at sea."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_49\".m_mContent: "So... if you really brought a message from the Captain, I would believe it."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_51\".m_mContent: "...That was indeed a voice from the deceased. We will eventually leave this lonely island and return to the embrace of the sea."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_52\".m_mContent: "The voice also told me that the paint needed to create the sacred Tarot cards are just ahead."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_53\".m_mContent: "Then let's set off towards the prophesied treasure."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_54\".m_mContent: "The paint you need is from these insects?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_55\".m_mContent: "They can be ground into the most vibrant red, used to create the Tarot beloved by the Goddess of Fate, allowing us to glimpse into a new future."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_56\".m_mContent: "Help me take these insects back and soak them in dew."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_57\".m_mContent: "What about you? Aren't you going back?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip06_58\".m_mContent: "I'm going to listen to fate's final advice."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_04\".m_mContent: "At a time like this, why are there still troublemakers showing up!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_10\".m_mContent: "The journey... is always lonely—Fate... always leaves you behind—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_11\".m_mContent: "Trembling body, fearful eyes, helpless sighs... Oh no, is the past about to repeat itself?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_13\".m_mContent: "Take the herbs to town... Let everyone eat them..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_14\".m_mContent: "So much blood... Did you encounter wolves? I'll go find a doctor!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_15\".m_mContent: "It's okay, I'll be fine after some rest. Quickly go to town..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_16\".m_mContent: "Your friend is waiting for you, beloved 'Star'..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_18B\".m_mContent: "Congratulations, you finally learned of my existence... So, what of it? You want to order me around? Or get rid of me?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_19\".m_mContent: "I'm not afraid... What happened in the past won't happen again..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_20\".m_mContent: "Are you not? If not, why is this scene appearing before your eyes?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_22\".m_mContent: "My trick? I'm just a poor ghost without even a form, how could I have such power?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_23\".m_mContent: "Everything you see is your deepest fear, what you're afraid of but can't forget, what you hate but keep recalling. You can't break free, and finally, like sinking into a swamp, the more you struggle, the deeper you fall, until you plunge into the silent Abyss—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_24\".m_mContent: "Becoming a ghost like me, with no home and no one who cares!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_26\".m_mContent: "Otherwise, what do you think I am? A wandering spirit in this world? A fairy born out of thin air?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_30\".m_mContent: "Silly cat, don't be sad. It's time to save everyone."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip07_31\".m_mContent: "Ouch... Good thing my head is tough..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_01\".m_mContent: "All things have been and arose from one by the mediation of one: so all things have their birth from this one thing by adaptation."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_02\".m_mContent: "...She's been in that position for so long... I hope nothing went wrong..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_03\".m_mContent: "The Sun is its father, the moon its mother, the wind hath carried it in its belly, the earth is its nurse."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_04\".m_mContent: "Could she be so heartbroken that she just..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_05\".m_mContent: "Separate thou the earth from the fire, the subtle from the gross sweetly with great industry."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_07\".m_mContent: "It ascends from the earth to the heaven and again it descends to the earth and receives the force of things superior and inferior. By this means you shall have—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_08\".m_mContent: "The glory of the whole world and thereby all obscurity shall fly from you."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_11\".m_mContent: "As the deceased foretold, the incomplete Tarot spread has found itself. The future is revealed within a small space, and what awaits us will be..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_14\".m_mContent: "Suffering will end, and tomorrow will be as bright and grand as the sun—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_16\".m_mContent: "More beasts than ever before! They've breached the camp!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_17\".m_mContent: "There were so many beasts this time, yet they were surprisingly weak."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_18\".m_mContent: "Could this be the power of 'The Sun'?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_18a\".m_mContent: "How could tarot cards weaken those beasts? Unless..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_18b\".m_mContent: "Could it be that Dalcarlo is no mere fortune-teller… but a wielder of curses?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_18c\".m_mContent: "Dalcarlo must possess extraordinary power as Eliana does!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_19\".m_mContent: "The divination guided us to find the red of blood, the gold of the sun, and the black of night. The Tarot cards drawn from these contain spiritual power."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_20\".m_mContent: "She's right, I saw with my own eyes how the Tarot guided us to find the cochineal."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_22\".m_mContent: "Tonight's 'Moon' has lost its radiance. When tomorrow's 'Sun' is at its peak, accompanied by three bell tolls, we shall set sail from the east, moving towards the rising sun."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip08_23\".m_mContent: "That was the glorious path ahead for the Pontos."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_01\".m_mContent: "Once, we were abandoned by fate, endured raging storms, were stranded on a desolate island, and confronted beasts afflicted with a contagious disease."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_02\".m_mContent: "But we are brave sailors! Sailors who never give up in the face of nature's trickery! If Death is our destined end, we shall die at sea, not on this mediocre island!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_03\".m_mContent: "Today, the goddess of fortune smiles upon us once again."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_04\".m_mContent: "Today... the Pontos II sets sail anew!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_07\".m_mContent: "Pack them separately, be prepared to discard them to lighten the load at any time."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_09\".m_mContent: "No good! The beasts are catching up to us!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_10\".m_mContent: "They seem to have caught the scent of food and are in hot pursuit!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_11\".m_mContent: "Don't panic. Jacintha left a box and said when we encounter difficulties, we'll find the Tarot's revelations within."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_12\".m_mContent: "'Death's curse falls into the black bag.'"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_13\".m_mContent: "Black bag... Do we have a black bag among our supplies?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_14\".m_mContent: "Yes! Jacintha said it's something needed for divination."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_15\".m_mContent: "Open it! The tarot's curse on the monsters must be inside!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_16\".m_mContent: "We'll go to the back to support!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_17\".m_mContent: "The tarot was right! We defeated so many beasts! Now we can finally set out!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_19\".m_mContent: "'Tonight's 'Moon' has lost its radiance. When tomorrow's 'Sun' is at its peak, accompanied by three bell tolls, we shall set sail from the east, moving towards the rising sun.'"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_20\".m_mContent: "I see! We need to wait for the bell!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_25\".m_mContent: "Wait, where's Jacintha and her cat? Why aren't they here?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_26\".m_mContent: "Come to think of it, she left her black cat near the ship this morning and then disappeared."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_27\".m_mContent: "What about the Tarot card she gave us? Does it say where to find her?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_32\".m_mContent: "Inside is the divination for the Pontos II. When you encounter difficulties, open it and take a look."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_33\".m_mContent: "Why are you giving this to me?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_34\".m_mContent: "You have Captain Patchen's courage and decisiveness. You will be the new navigator for the Pontos II."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_35\".m_mContent: "Me? I can't... I can't compare to the Captain..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_36\".m_mContent: "You can do it, I believe in you, and so did Captain Patchen."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip09_37\".m_mContent: "Remember, life returns to dust, but death can have its own value."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip10_02\".m_mContent: "They must have left by now, right? The herbs in the bag should temporarily suppress the Blood Beast... Now, it's my turn to deal with you."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip10_03\".m_mContent: "As expected, you really like the taste of blood in this body."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip10_07\".m_mContent: "Finally... I can rest for a while..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip10_08\".m_mContent: "Kitty... why are you here? Didn't I put you on the ship?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip10_11\".m_mContent: "After I die... will I go to heaven..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip10_13\".m_mContent: "Are there annoying Blood Beasts in heaven too?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip10_14\".m_mContent: "Oh no... Seems I'm not dead yet..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip10_15\".m_mContent: "Since I'm not dead... there's no reason... to let the cat face danger alone..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_02\".m_mContent: "Quickly bring the herbs... to save everyone..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_03\".m_mContent: "Aunty Julia caught a big fish and is calling everyone to eat!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_04\".m_mContent: "I hope there's still some meat on the belly when we get there..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_05\".m_mContent: "Why is the street so empty... Where did everyone go?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_06\".m_mContent: "Here to play with Bernice again? Slow down, she's in the backyard..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_07\".m_mContent: "There's still time... there must still be time..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_09\".m_mContent: "Are you alright?... Where... where are you?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_11\".m_mContent: "'The divination was true, everyone is dead, and I'm next.'"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_12\".m_mContent: "'I don't want to die vomiting all my blood, hideous and in pain... Goodbye, everyone.'"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_15\".m_mContent: "You've messed everything up again—Oh, you curse, you disaster, you despised vagabond—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_16\".m_mContent: "It was the same in Levin, don't you remember? Of course you do, isn't that the nightmare you relive every night?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_17\".m_mContent: "'Great Mystic, will my beloved's illness get better?'"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_18\".m_mContent: "'Oh, I'm so sorry, her future is tragic and full of pain—'"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_20\".m_mContent: "'Have you heard? That guy committed suicide with his wife after the divination...' 'That's awful... what a pity. I wonder what the mystic said to him?'"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_21\".m_mContent: "You don't like hearing this? But that's how it is. Fate is cruel, cold, and unpleasant, just like—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_23\".m_mContent: "You're right... it's all my fault... I shouldn't have done the divination. Mother warned me long ago..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_26\".m_mContent: "So much blood... Mom, wake up, please! Will you eat some medicine? I'll... I'll feed you..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_27\".m_mContent: "My dear lost 'Star,' why are you crying?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_29\".m_mContent: "They... they're all dead... Everyone in town is dead..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_30\".m_mContent: "It's all my fault... I shouldn't have secretly done a divination for Bernice... She believed what I said... I messed things up again..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_31\".m_mContent: "This isn't your fault. Fate allows you to see the prophecies behind the Tarot... It's both a blessing and a test for you..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_32\".m_mContent: "But I always mess things up... I can't pass fate's test..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_33\".m_mContent: "There's only one way to pass the test..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_34\".m_mContent: "Don't rely on the Tarot. Love this world, feel this world, that's a power greater than it..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_36\".m_mContent: "One day you will understand... You are the 'Star' beloved by the Tarot, your future is bright. This is my final divination for you..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_40\".m_mContent: "Don't rely on... the power of the Tarot..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_41\".m_mContent: "Not relying on the power of the Tarot? Were you able to do it?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_43\".m_mContent: "No, it's not that you're not relying on the power of the Tarot. You're too afraid... afraid that your divination will come true."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_44\".m_mContent: "Afraid that you're the so-called harbinger of disaster, afraid that your fate is controlled by some mysterious force, afraid that you can't actually change anything."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_45\".m_mContent: "Afraid to face the reality that you are—too weak and feeble!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_46\".m_mContent: "No... I'm not afraid, I can control my own destiny."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_47\".m_mContent: "Who are you? Where is this? It's not your place to judge my choices."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_49\".m_mContent: "I am you, and you are me."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_50\".m_mContent: "Look at your wounds. What can you control? What have you changed?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_51\".m_mContent: "You've been tainted by the Black Blood, made a part of me—even your feeble mind is now mine to command."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_52\".m_mContent: "Like all my captured prey, you'll become a puppet of the Black Blood—the true threat your companions will have to face."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_55\".m_mContent: "That black thing over there... is it a sail?! A ship is passing by! We're saved!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_57\".m_mContent: "What should we do? What do the Tarot cards say?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_58\".m_mContent: "There are no cards left in the box."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_60\".m_mContent: "So what? Haven't we relied on our own strength every time we've overcome storms, white whales, undercurrents, and thick fog?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_61\".m_mContent: "Are we going to give up resisting just because we don't have the Tarot?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_62\".m_mContent: "Y-yes... We've defeated Blood Beasts before, this time we'll also..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_63\".m_mContent: "Half of the sailors row at full speed towards the sails! The other half grab weapons and prepare for battle!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_65\".m_mContent: "The sea's waves may toss us, but WE DON'T CARE!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_66\".m_mContent: "A landlubber's life may be peaceful, but WE DON'T CARE!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_68\".m_mContent: "You can't defeat us... We are everywhere... We are endless... We are you—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_71\".m_mContent: "What else are you trying to do? You can't do anything!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_72\".m_mContent: "You forced your way into my mind through the Black Blood—but within the Hive Mind, I glimpsed your secrets as well."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip11_73\".m_mContent: "Your weakness lies at the ocean's end..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_01\".m_mContent: "Even if you know my weakness, so what? You can't dive that deep."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_02\".m_mContent: "What's the diving limit for humans? 100 meters? 200 meters?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_03\".m_mContent: "How many disoriented wanderers have I caught in the deep sea, their lungs filled with water, unable to utter even their last words?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_04\".m_mContent: "If you think I can't do it, then just watch me fail. Why waste words?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_13\".m_mContent: "Stop you? I don't need to do anything."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_14\".m_mContent: "Your limbs have gone limp. You think you're talking to me? This is just your last hallucination before death."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_22\".m_mContent: "Was it you who woke me? I told you to run, didn't I, silly cat..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_23\".m_mContent: "I'm useless... Kitty... I couldn't save you, nor anyone else..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_25\".m_mContent: "Why didn't you run away? Do you want... to help me... end this battle?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_27\".m_mContent: "If that's how it is... then let us walk this final path together."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_34\".m_mContent: "You want to be a hero? You're a cat! You couldn't even save your fellow cats, and now you want to save humans?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_35\".m_mContent: "They were kind to me. They are my friends too."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_37\".m_mContent: "The human who adopted you couldn't do it, what chance do you have? Look at your legs, trembling with fear in the seawater!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_38\".m_mContent: "You can't defy fate, you can't escape destiny. Esmeralda's divination—the curse, has never been broken. You, Jacintha Dalcarlo, are not the one who drew the Tarot that brings hope!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_40\".m_mContent: "We are the last Tarot card—'The Hanged Man'."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_41\".m_mContent: "Sacrifice brings a turn of fate. That's why we will bring hope."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_44\".m_mContent: "The hero has saved the world! The warrior has slain the dragon! Now, there's just one tiny, itsy-bitsy problem—how will someone so terrified of water make it back to land?"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_45\".m_mContent: "There's... no need to go back anymore..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_46\".m_mContent: "You're right, you're just an illusion created by my former self to escape reality."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_47\".m_mContent: "Now I understand everything. I know how to love this world and feel it. My will and my life are the Tarot spread that can change fate. This is the true power of the Tarot."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_48\".m_mContent: "I've done what I needed to do. Death is nothing to fear. You don't need to accompany me anymore for the final journey..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_49\".m_mContent: "But still, thank you for staying with me all this time..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_51\".m_mContent: "I should leave, I should disappear! Into the deathly abyss! How terrifying—"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_52\".m_mContent: "Before I leave, I can grant you one last wish!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_54\".m_mContent: "You only have one chance, seize it, kitty!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_56\".m_mContent: "I want to... return to her side..."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_58\".m_mContent: "We pray here for Dracula's blessing, to bring rebirth and eternity to the world."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_59\".m_mContent: "The souls of the departed return to nothingness, while their shells continue to walk in the world of the living."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_60\".m_mContent: "The memories of the living endure, and thus the past lives on in reminiscence."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_61\".m_mContent: "The living and the departed converge here, welcoming new kin in a baptism of blood."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_64\".m_mContent: "Someone's swimming toward us... is that Jacintha? It really is her!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_65\".m_mContent: "That's our companion! Please lower a lifeboat, we'll go pick her up!"

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_66\".m_mContent: "Your script has come to a perfect end, Eliana."

\"Dialogue_E_20001_Clip12_67\".m_mContent: "This child's rebirth is... the most brilliant divination you've ever performed."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "I can still drink... for the grand prize!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_03\".m_mContent: "At this pace, you're still far from winning the grand prize."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_04\".m_mContent: "Are you really stopping now? Don’t you want to keep going? How about another barrel?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "Five more barrels of wine, a basket of bread, thirty grilled mussels, twenty grilled oysters, twenty grilled scallops—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "It's such a shame Empousa and Hati aren't here..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_10\".m_mContent: "Selena, grill faster! We have more orders to fill!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_11\".m_mContent: "And what about you, good sir? Care to try my award-winning blend—Sapphire Isle Iced Tea? It won the Association's Innovation Prize!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_13\".m_mContent: "Weren't we… here to investigate someone in the area who resembles Goldland…?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_15\".m_mContent: "Was it the scorching summer sun that left the Bloodborn lightheaded? Or the heady warmth of the breeze that left them utterly intoxicated?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_16\".m_mContent: "Was it the lamb doll prize that kept Miss Aiona from leaving? I can still drink..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_17\".m_mContent: "Was it the all-you-can-eat snacks that kept Miss Ami lingering about? Five more grilled squid—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_18\".m_mContent: "That anticipation of finding family, that thirst for truth, somehow—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_20\".m_mContent: "Set your worries aside! Coming to Sapphire Isle means—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_21\".m_mContent: "Enjoying a dream-like summer on the beach!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_22\".m_mContent: "A basket of bread, thirty grilled mussels, twenty grilled oysters, and twenty grilled scallops coming right up! Ugh, this smells so good, I want a taste too..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_29\".m_mContent: "Do you have any idea how much these clothes cost?! My father had them shipped all the way from the Far East!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_30\".m_mContent: "Do you understand? My father led the creation of the Maritime Spice Route—and I am his son, Michel Savich!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_31\".m_mContent: "Alright, I get it. Loud and clear."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_32\".m_mContent: "You want me to pay for the clothes… right? Sorry, but ever since I got here, I've been drowning in debt—I don't even have a single Soli to spare…"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_33\".m_mContent: "But if... if I could find Master Van Helsing, then maybe..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_34\".m_mContent: "Van Helsing? Which family is that? Are they wealthy?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_36\".m_mContent: "Ah, well, when it comes to money, he might be just as broke as I am… but if my master were here, he'd surely find a way."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_38\".m_mContent: "How dare you…! You're mocking me, aren't you?! Guards, teach her a lesson!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_39\".m_mContent: "Hey, she hasn't finished grilling the mussels and scallops yet."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_40\".m_mContent: "Another meddlesome pest… Guards, deal with her too!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_41\".m_mContent: "Mr. Savich… W-We definitely struck that woman, but she looks completely unharmed!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_42\".m_mContent: "Is that all you've got? Even this squid put up more of a fight."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_43\".m_mContent: "You…! You're nothing but lowborn rabble, yet you dare defy me! I—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_44\".m_mContent: "I must apologize that your visit to Sapphire Isle has been... 'unpleasant'. That is my failing."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_46\".m_mContent: "Mr. Savich, while your shirt is indeed one of a kind, the auction house recently acquired a batch of gold-threaded brocade. Perhaps you'd consider having a new one tailored from it?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_48\".m_mContent: "Since it's your request, I suppose I can take a look."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_49\".m_mContent: "D-Does this mean we don't have to pay anymore?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_50\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei asks for your patience. She will return shortly."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_52\".m_mContent: "If you are not pressed for time."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_53\".m_mContent: "We're in no hurry... Let's order twenty more skewers of squid while we wait."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_57\".m_mContent: "You're not from around here, are you?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_58\".m_mContent: "I won't reveal my identity to a <style=Highlight>Bloodborn</style>, even if you just helped me..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_61\".m_mContent: "I saw your wounds heal by themselves. Consider yourself lucky I didn't report you to the Church—that's me returning the favor. Don't expect to learn anything more from me."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_62\".m_mContent: "Don't be so guarded. I know your master Van Helsing—we've been through a lot together."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_63\".m_mContent: "I don't believe you! My master would never work with a heretic. Unless... you can tell me one of his secrets!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_66\".m_mContent: "...He never told me about this! I must verify this with Master Van Helsing myself..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_67\".m_mContent: "Why are you looking for Isaac? Did you get separated?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_68\".m_mContent: "It's a long story... but I can't tell you right now!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_69\".m_mContent: "I just want to look after my old friend's apprentice, make sure she's well-fed and has a place to stay..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_70\".m_mContent: "But I... still owe the owner here a lot of money..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_71\".m_mContent: "Little Selena can go with him, you know—I just thought of a new way to pay off the debt—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_72\".m_mContent: "You can wear our store's promotional outfit during your stay at the Isle!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_75\".m_mContent: "This will reduce the debt by a lot, right? Maybe it's not so..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_79\".m_mContent: "Hey silver hair, I'll be joining you from now on."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip01_80\".m_mContent: "But not for food or shelter... I'm here to keep an eye on you for my master!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_01\".m_mContent: "To get into the summer spirit at Sapphire Isle, the first thing we need is—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_03\".m_mContent: "Since you're Miss Lorelei's guests, please feel free to choose any outfit you like."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_04\".m_mContent: "Trust in the expertise of the 'Association's Fashion Contest' champion! This fit will definitely suit you."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_05\".m_mContent: "Maybe... possibly... it's a bit... different from her usual style."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_06\".m_mContent: "Hmm... why the hesitation? I'm quite skilled at seeing beyond appearances—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_08\".m_mContent: "I love it… It's perfect! I feel... younger than ever!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_09\".m_mContent: "Right? Now for this beautiful little cat... this set will definitely suit you!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_12\".m_mContent: "Something that would suit this young lady..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_13\".m_mContent: "Please don't trouble yourself. I've already prepared my vacation attire."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_14\".m_mContent: "Hmm... it would be perfect if we trimmed the fabric a bit here and there!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_16\".m_mContent: "Lady Ami's prepared 'attire' is truly a masterpiece."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_17\".m_mContent: "Indeed, I can't even see any seams. How was this made?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_18\".m_mContent: "This is—a gift from family. I'm not sure about its craftsmanship either."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_19\".m_mContent: "Give me a month... no, a week! I'll definitely be able to recreate this craftsmanship..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_20\".m_mContent: "Let's put the research aside for now. There's still a customer waiting."
