\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_21\".m_mContent: "Ah! This handsome gentleman... this fit would be perfect for you!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_22\".m_mContent: "This... can this even be considered clothing? Do I really have to wear something this revealing?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_23\".m_mContent: "Of course! At Sapphire Isle, people might splash you with blessed seawater at any moment—such attire is absolutely necessary!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_25\".m_mContent: "So cold... Noah, let's go play in the water!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_26\".m_mContent: "The sun is quite intense here at the isle. Before heading into the water, be sure to apply the isle's exclusive sunscreen."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_28\".m_mContent: "Show this custom Isle coin, then you'll have free access to all facilities and stalls here."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_29\".m_mContent: "Thank you so much—Miss Lorelei, lady of the Sapphire Isle Auction House, representative of the isle, a woman of unimaginable wealth... and the owner of the most enchanting voice in all of Sapphire Isle!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_31\".m_mContent: "Did she pay you to say that? You rattled off that string of extravagant titles in the blink of an eye."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_32\".m_mContent: "The servant just mentioned her name. Couldn't you figure out who she was?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_33\".m_mContent: "Not only that, she's also one of the Seven Sages who reformed the institutions of Sapphire Isle with an iron will."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_34\".m_mContent: "The Sapphire Isle Seven Sages...? What’s that supposed to be?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_35\".m_mContent: "Eleven years ago, Sapphire Isle was just a poor fishing village—until a tsunami turned it into a dead land, haunted only by crows and wild wolves."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_36\".m_mContent: "Seven nobles decided to rebuild it, investing their wealth and effort to restore the isle to its former glory, making it what it is today. The isle's residents came to call them the Sapphire Isle Seven Sages."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_37\".m_mContent: "That grandiose title is too much praise. We simply wanted to build our ideal city-state."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_38\".m_mContent: "However, even the seemingly perfect Sapphire Isle has its dark rumors..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_40\".m_mContent: "Every night, a mysterious fog envelops this place. They say... man-eating sirens lurk in the mist—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_41\".m_mContent: "Sirens... surely they can't be Blood Beasts?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_43\".m_mContent: "Would you like to try fighting the sirens?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_46\".m_mContent: "Well... um... this is a device developed for the Seven Sages Association's city promotion efforts... would you like to give it a try?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_47\".m_mContent: "Did the Seven Sage Association have the stall owners make these?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_48\".m_mContent: "The mysterious legends are one of Sapphire Isle's selling points, you know. The isle has many places with little touches like this."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_49\".m_mContent: "If you can beat my invention, you'll get the 'Grand Prize'... that's how we're supposed to attract customers, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_50\".m_mContent: "How do we play this—what's it called?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_51\".m_mContent: "It needs a name? How about 'Whack-a-Siren,' would that work?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_52\".m_mContent: "What was it you wanted to ask just now?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_54\".m_mContent: "Ah... I understand now, this part needs some improvement..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_55\".m_mContent: "I almost forgot... Please accept this reward, the 'Siren Slayer's Sword of Honor.' You've earned it."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_57\".m_mContent: "Don't underestimate this 'Sword of Honor for Slaying Sirens', it was made using a rare future Artifact that the Association rewarded me with."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_58\".m_mContent: "It incorporates 'proximity-based vibration feedback', 'surface groove information storage,' and—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_59\".m_mContent: "Thank you for the explanation, it sounds absolutely extraordinary and not ordinary at all."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_60\".m_mContent: "Yes... using all these principles, the sword produces an inspiring sound when 'slaying sirens.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_61\".m_mContent: "Congratulations on slaying the siren! Congratulations on slaying the siren!!!"
\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_61\".m_RoleName: "斩杀海妖而获得的荣誉之剑"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_64\".m_mContent: "I... How did I end up here fighting a siren?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_66\".m_mContent: "Finally sobered up? Congratulations, we've reached the Return to the Moon final challenge—facing the siren."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_67\".m_mContent: "Return to the... I remember we were supposed to help Miss Ami find something at the auction—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_68\".m_mContent: "We were having so much fun, I completely forgot to ask about the auction... Come to think of it, what is this 'auction' anyway?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_69\".m_mContent: "Rather than explain, why don't you see for yourselves? Though today's auction is almost over."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_70\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry... Did my drunkenness waste everyone's time..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_71\".m_mContent: "If we go now, we should still be able to see the last few auction items."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_73\".m_mContent: "From Francis Justinian's unfinished painting 'No. 198.4' to the legendary wine glass used by the Bell Ringer of Light, the Sapphire Isle Auction House offers an impressive array of extraordinary items."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_74\".m_mContent: "Miss Selena is fascinated by mysterious poisons concocted by Alchemists, Miss Aiona seems interested in the pearl-encrusted lamb figurine but remains silent, and as for Miss Ami..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_75\".m_mContent: "Isn't that... the statue from the Captain's room?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_76\".m_mContent: "This statue was salvaged by fishermen from the bay not long ago. Though it appears expensive, it's merely gold-plated. The appraiser named it 'Those Whom the Gods Would Destroy.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_78\".m_mContent: "Um, well, the figure on the statue looks pretty impressive."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_82\".m_mContent: "O-one million! That's... that would take me 572 years to earn!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_83\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, I'll take care of the payment."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_84\".m_mContent: "You are guests who have 'come from afar,' and we've become such fast friends. Please allow me to extend my hospitality."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_85\".m_mContent: "One million! Do I hear any higher bids?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_87\".m_mContent: "Sold for one million! Now fill Joyce's body with lots and lots of shiny coins!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_88\".m_mContent: "So this is how an 'auction' works as a way of trading..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_89\".m_mContent: "One million... gone with a single strike of the gavel... that's terrifying..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_90\".m_mContent: "One million?! Who would spend one million on something so tasteless?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_92\".m_mContent: "Just one million? Who's so poor that they'd make such a fuss over someone spending one million?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_94\".m_mContent: "M-M-Me what? I know, your father led the creation of the Maritime Spice Route, and you're his precious son."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_96\".m_mContent: "You won't get away this time! Stop them!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_98\".m_mContent: "I think there might be some misunderstanding between you two."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_99\".m_mContent: "I just helped Miss Ami register for the auction. Her wealth, I dare say, is quite comparable to that of your father..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_101\".m_mContent: "Your father might prefer if you got along well with this 'potential business partner'..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_103\".m_mContent: "No need to dwell on such trivial matters."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_104\".m_mContent: "This voice... Why does it sound so familiar?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_105\".m_mContent: "Tch... I'll let it slide this time, but don't let me catch you again!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_106\".m_mContent: "Good thing little Michel isn't as shrewd as his father."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_107\".m_mContent: "Even though we've just met, you remind me of my 'family' who always took care of me."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_108\".m_mContent: "It would be my greatest honor if Miss Ami considers me family."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_109\".m_mContent: "So... there's one more thing, could I ask you a favor?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_110\".m_mContent: "There's no need for such formal words like 'favor' between family."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_111\".m_mContent: "Could you let me know if you find any other items or clues that were salvaged along with this gilded statue?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_112\".m_mContent: "We have no way to determine if the salvaged items came from the same shipwreck."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_113\".m_mContent: "However, I'll have our appraisers keep an eye out."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_115\".m_mContent: "When you leave, give this claim ticket to Joyce—the doll on the stage."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_116\".m_mContent: "A normal human shouldn't be able to fit inside that doll, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_117\".m_mContent: "Perhaps it really is just a doll?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_118\".m_mContent: "By the way, where are you headed, Miss Lorelei?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_119\".m_mContent: "I'm helping arrange your lodging for tonight. Why do you ask?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_120\".m_mContent: "Your arm was cut by a shell. Let me help you treat that wound."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_121\".m_mContent: "You're always busy taking care of various matters on the Isle, yet you seem to neglect your own condition."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_122\".m_mContent: "...Thank you for your concern, Mr. Nevernight."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_123\".m_mContent: "But you needn't worry, it'll heal soon enough."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_124\".m_mContent: "The velvet carpet, embroidered with gold thread depicting the Saint's Genesis, and the conch shells burning with incense from the Far East—such repose after a day of pleasure is truly nothing short of paradise."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_126\".m_mContent: "Oh, and Sapphire Isle is often shrouded in fog at night. No matter what sounds you hear, please do not go outside."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_130\".m_mContent: "Good night, honored guests of Sapphire Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_131\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei, is there anything else you need?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_133\".m_mContent: "...It's too late. The plan must proceed."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_135\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami who just checked in is from a branch of the wealthy Roland family. Please take extra care when attending to them."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip02_136\".m_mContent: "However, Miss Ami wishes to keep her identity concealed. Do not mention this in their presence."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_04\".m_mContent: "After such a busy day, aren't you tired?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_05\".m_mContent: "Close your eyes, and I'll tell you a bedtime story."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_08\".m_mContent: "It's nothing... it's just that you've never told me bedtime stories before..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_10\".m_mContent: "From now on, whenever you want to hear a bedtime story, you can come to me."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_12\".m_mContent: "On a distant hillside lived a happy flock of little lambs..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_13\".m_mContent: "I'm so hungry... While everyone's asleep, I'll sneak some food prepared for tomorrow's guests."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_15\".m_mContent: "The Captain wants to see you. You should head to his study right away."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_16\".m_mContent: "What could be so important at this hour... Let me just stabilize my vital signs first, then I'll go."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_17\".m_mContent: "Vital signs... what is she talking about?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_18\".m_mContent: "Hey Ami, that's the kitchen, not the Captain's study."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_19\".m_mContent: "Thanks for enlightening someone who's worked on this ship for twenty years."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_20\".m_mContent: "So you're looking for something to eat?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_21\".m_mContent: "Whatever you do, do not cook! If you're that hungry, just wake Viktor up."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_22\".m_mContent: "None of us want to deal with another kitchen fire in the middle of the night..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_24\".m_mContent: "Grab something to eat, then go see the Captain."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip03_28\".m_mContent: "The incense burned out... Where did Aiona and Ami go?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_01\".m_mContent: "I can't believe 'that thing' is actually here... I need to tell No—the silver-haired one, we need to figure something out..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_02\".m_mContent: "What if Master Van Helsing is also... Huh? Where did that Noah go?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_03\".m_mContent: "Why isn't he here?! W-What's going on, did he find me too troublesome and leave me behind?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_04\".m_mContent: "Welcome, esteemed guest. How may I be of assistance?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_05\".m_mContent: "Where's the silver-haired man who stayed here yesterday?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_06\".m_mContent: "Silver-haired man? Ah, you must mean... the one with Miss Ami—Uhh... Oh, Mr. Nevernight!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_07\".m_mContent: "I haven't seen them today... I heard someone went missing this morning. I hope they weren't caught up in it."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_12\".m_mContent: "Calm down. Sapphire Isle would never permit something as vile as a “disappearance” to happen."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_14\".m_mContent: "Please enjoy the inn's breakfast while you wait for news."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_15\".m_mContent: "Rest assured, Mr. Thoreau's security team will see to the safety of every guest."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_16\".m_mContent: "The crispy Stargazer's Delight mingles with the ocean's freshness, while aged cheese stretches into beautiful, viscous arcs. The fish head soup with flatbread and canned shark are equally delightful, making it impossible to choose. I'll have another serving of both—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_18\".m_mContent: "As a matter of fact, it was Michel Savich who went missing yesterday after some several minor conflicts with you."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_20\".m_mContent: "As for why Noah left without notice, he was 'invited' by Michel's father—Mr. Savich Sr."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_21\".m_mContent: "Just 'iniviting' people as they please... the rich really think they can do whatever the want."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_22\".m_mContent: "Don’t worry. I’ll gather the other members of the Seven Sages for a meeting to discuss our response."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_23\".m_mContent: "Noah might have been beaten to a pulp by then! Where is that Mr. Savich anyway?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_24\".m_mContent: "They're at the Shark Hunter Tavern, but let me handle this—Mr. Savich is so wealthy, he looks down on everyone except the Church."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_25\".m_mContent: "That Noah... He got involved with such dangerous people..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_26\".m_mContent: "All because he was trying to help me..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_27\".m_mContent: "I only 'borrowed' this token from Master Albrecht to help Master Van Helsing, but to think I might have to use it now..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_28\".m_mContent: "Food loses its flavor and spoils if not eaten, clothes fade and lose their luster if not worn, and money, if not spent—though I suppose I don't have much money to begin with..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_29\".m_mContent: "With such conviction, even someone so small can make unthinkable choices and show incredible power in the face of despair."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_31\".m_mContent: "Master Albrecht left them in my care, so don't you dare hurt my... my friends!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_32\".m_mContent: "Why would a Bell Ringer come to a place like this?! Do you think we're stupid?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_34\".m_mContent: "You must be Mr. Savich! You've come at the perfect time!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_35\".m_mContent: "This is the sacred token of Master Albrecht!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_36\".m_mContent: "See? Now give us back our boss!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_38\".m_mContent: "Why trouble a Bell Ringer over such a trivial matter?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_39\".m_mContent: "Let them go, or Master Albrecht won't let you off so easily!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_40\".m_mContent: "If the lovely lady wishes to take them away, by all means."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_42\".m_mContent: "So this is the 'business partner' the Seven Sages wanted to introduce to me?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_44\".m_mContent: "I would love to see these Roland family runts 'soften' bit by bit... Wouldn't you agree?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_46\".m_mContent: "This is getting more and more interesting."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_48\".m_mContent: "I told Master I'd keep an eye on you... Are you both alright?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_48a\".m_mContent: "I had a strange dream last night, and the moment I awoke, Savich's man suddenly invited us here."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_49\".m_mContent: "After he took us away, he only said some strange things... I'm not sure what he's planning."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_50\".m_mContent: "That man can't be trusted. You'd better be careful around him."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_51\".m_mContent: "These wealthy types are nothing but terrible. Well, except the ones who treat me to a free breakfast..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_52\".m_mContent: "Oh right! Last night at the bar... I heard something interesting."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_54\".m_mContent: "At night, when the mist rolls into Sapphire Isle... a merciless killer called the 'Mistbound Terror' will appear."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_55\".m_mContent: "That sounds similar to the siren Miss Lorelei mentioned..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_56\".m_mContent: "Indeed... this Mistbound Terror appears at night as well, hunting travelers on the island. It drains their blood and dismembers them. Several lone visitors have already disappeared mysteriously."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_57\".m_mContent: "Perhaps the legend of the Siren was created to cover up this Mistbound Terror's existence."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_58\".m_mContent: "And... this Mistbound Terror sounds like the figure I saw in my dream last night..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_60\".m_mContent: "Yeah, I felt oddly drowsy last night, so I went to sleep."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_61\".m_mContent: "In my haze, I noticed a figure and followed them out of the inn and into the fog, where I saw..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_62\".m_mContent: "...Someone who had been brutally murdered. And then I was chased by a siren-like monster. The whole thing was a blur."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_64\".m_mContent: "Or perhaps it was because of playing with that device..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_65\".m_mContent: "I also had a... strange dream last night."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_67\".m_mContent: "Just some old memories. They have nothing to do with this Mistbound Terror."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_68\".m_mContent: "It's just... it's been a long time since I've recalled those memories."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_69\".m_mContent: "What about you, Miss Ami? Did you have any strange dreams?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_72\".m_mContent: "Everyone's been having strange dreams, but what's more suspicious is that I saw similar scenes in my dream before you even told me about this Mistbound Terror..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_74\".m_mContent: "Could it be... that this Mistbound Terror uses dreams to mark their next target?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_76\".m_mContent: "But it's not entirely out of the question."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_78\".m_mContent: "There are rumors that the latest victim was investigating something on the Isle, and going around asking strange questions..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_79\".m_mContent: "This mysterious investigator... could it have been your master, Van Helsing?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_80\".m_mContent: "What? Of course not! No, no... I need to ask Miss Lorelei about this!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_81\".m_mContent: "I think... it's best not to trust her right now."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_82\".m_mContent: "Why not? She's beautiful, kind, passionate, and wealthy."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_83\".m_mContent: "I can't help but feel her friendliness toward us is excessive. It's hard not to suspect she has other motives... though I hope I'm just overthinking it."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_85\".m_mContent: "The wealthy... are there really no good ones among them...?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_86\".m_mContent: "<color=#c6ae80>Soli... Soli and even more Soli... being rich is such a bore.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_87\".m_mContent: "<color=#c6ae80>Besides Soli, there's nothing left in my life anymore.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_90\".m_mContent: "<color=#8f9abf>Fate weaves its threads! Let us exalt this grand death!</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip04_92\".m_mContent: "<color=#a7675c>I care not for such trivialities. The votes from this meeting are in.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_03\".m_mContent: "To silently endure the poisoned arrows of fate, or to rise against the endless suffering of this world?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_04\".m_mContent: "Where does this suffering come from? And where will it end? If we are to endure, if we are to resist, how can we turn a blind eye to such questions?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_05\".m_mContent: "When did fate begin weaving its entanglements? What tragedy do these weaving hands desire?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_08\".m_mContent: "How can I escape from this place?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_09\".m_mContent: "Speaking of which, we should visit this place during the holiday."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_10\".m_mContent: "Sapphire Isle... Should we invite Friedrich to join us?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_11\".m_mContent: "Are you trying to set some record for getting rejected by him?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_12\".m_mContent: "He's a Bell Ringer now. The distance between us keeps growing."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_13\".m_mContent: "The Isle, the beach, and this mysterious 'auction house'—what a perfect summer vacation spot. I'll take care of the expenses like before."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_15\".m_mContent: "You mean the one that got hit by a tsunami?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_16\".m_mContent: "Yeah, hard to believe how prosperous it's become, isn't it?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_17\".m_mContent: "I remember Albrecht had a task there. Come to think of it, wasn't that when he saved you?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_18\".m_mContent: "Why don't you join us on vacation? We could revisit some old memories."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_19\".m_mContent: "...Sorry, I have other matters to investigate."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_20\".m_mContent: "Investigation? Master Van Helsing, please allow me join you."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_22\".m_mContent: "Also, as a member of the Church, we value transparency in the light. Stop following me in secret."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_23\".m_mContent: "I just want to be of use... Master's affairs are my affairs too. Please let me join you!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_24\".m_mContent: "No. Focus on practicing your archery. I'll check your progress when I return."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_25\".m_mContent: "After Father's death... I should have 'inherited' ownership of Sapphire Isle. But I've been running away for all these years, and now..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_26\".m_mContent: "That place... who's in charge of it now?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_28\".m_mContent: "Is this a test from Master Van Helsing?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_29\".m_mContent: "I will meet you at the destination, Master!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_30\".m_mContent: "What is the destination? Where does it lie?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_31\".m_mContent: "Countless sleepless nights, these questions haunt a restless soul. For Isaac Van Helsing—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_32\".m_mContent: "At least after he concealed his tracks, disguised himself as a traveler, and returned to his homeland only to be drugged by a drink—his destination was this—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_34\".m_mContent: "Where am I? Why am I locked in here?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_35\".m_mContent: "Who did this... Was it the one who runs the Isle?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_36\".m_mContent: "But everyone who knew I was the lord's son should be dead by now..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_41\".m_mContent: "Why are you not answering... Are you deaf, or mute?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_48\".m_mContent: "Something's wrong... I... have no strength at all... I can't feel my legs..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_51\".m_mContent: "Monsters that sound like this... can be found hiding in the sea mist!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_52\".m_mContent: "They grab people who are alone on the beach, and wait for the tide to slowly drown their prey..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_54\".m_mContent: "It's true! My mother told me so too!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_55\".m_mContent: "They use their singing to mesmerize people, making them walk into the sea..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_56\".m_mContent: "The victims remember the happiest moments of their lives before they drown, and with a blissful smile, they become stuck forever in the past..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_61\".m_mContent: "I won't let you harm my companions..."
\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip05_61\".m_RoleName: "艾萨克·范海辛/年幼的艾萨克"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_01\".m_mContent: "Come to pay what you owe, little Selena?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_02\".m_mContent: "...Sell me one more piece of information. I'll pay back what I owe you someday."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_03\".m_mContent: "You were never this dull when you were still active in the 'Assassin's world.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_04\".m_mContent: "Still content with this life of groveling before the Church for a few measly coins?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_05\".m_mContent: "Master Van Helsing has taught me many things that money cannot buy."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_06\".m_mContent: "So that fanatic has really got you completely brainwashed..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_07\".m_mContent: "Well, what information do you want this time?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_08\".m_mContent: "I want to know about the travelers who disappeared in the isle, and the 'Mistbound Terror.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_09\".m_mContent: "I can look into the missing travelers, but as for the Mistbound Terror..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_12\".m_mContent: "It's not about money. But there is a place where you might find the clues you're looking for."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_18\".m_mContent: "You... you stepped on me! I never should have brought you along..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_19\".m_mContent: "Look, I can't just let a child break into an auction house at night."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_21\".m_mContent: "Besides, Van Helsing is an 'old friend.' There's no way I wouldn’t get involved if it means gathering information to save him."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_23\".m_mContent: "'Summer Concerto Sheet Music,' '137th Meeting Summary,' 'Comparative Analysis of Acorellia Highlands Cashmere and Long-haired Cashmere'... None of these are..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_24\".m_mContent: "'Crime Scene and Autopsy Report'... this is it! There's even a sketch of the scene in here..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_24a\".m_mContent: "Come on, let's watch from somewhere safe."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_24b\".m_mContent: "Silver-haired! Prepare to witness the full force of my deductive brilliance! <style=Highlight>Tap on suspicious areas</style> to investigate. Should you get stuck, you may tap the <style=Highlight>Notice</style> in the top right corner."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_24c\".m_mContent: "This place... doesn't seem to hold anything worth noting."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_24d\".m_mContent: "Huh? We already worked that out, didn't we? Don't tell me you're losing your memory, Silver-haired."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_25\".m_mContent: "This tattoo... it belongs to a pirate crew that operates near Sapphire Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_26\".m_mContent: "Many of the Sapphire Isle Auction House’s goods are shipped by sea—and those pirates are notorious for raiding their vessels."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_27\".m_mContent: "You seem to know a lot about the Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_28\".m_mContent: "Of course, I conducted a thorough investigation. I'm not here on vacation."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_29\".m_mContent: "There was an olive wreath around his neck, and an olive was forced into his mouth."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_30\".m_mContent: "Hmm... olive branches are usually seen as a symbol of peace, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_31\".m_mContent: "Is it saying this pirate disrupted the bay's 'peace'?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_32\".m_mContent: "Wait, are those... bite marks under the olive branch?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_34\".m_mContent: "The dove, a symbol of peace, was mutilated."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_35\".m_mContent: "There appears to be a bird in the victim's tattoo as well."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_37\".m_mContent: "But... why would a pirate have a tattoo of a dove?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_38\".m_mContent: "This victim has bite marks on their neck too..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_39\".m_mContent: "Two fish... They must have been deliberately placed by the killer, but what could it mean?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_40\".m_mContent: "Two fish and a staff... I feel like I've seen these somewhere before..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_42\".m_mContent: "That's it! Master Van Helsing's family crest has two fish and a staff! I heard his family originally made their fortune from fishing."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_43\".m_mContent: "Master's two guns are also named Aphrodite and Eros."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_44\".m_mContent: "Could the victim be from the same family as Van Helsing?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_45\".m_mContent: "If that's the case, Master Van Helsing must be in grave danger..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_46\".m_mContent: "All the important stuff has been burned... only some useless scraps of paper left."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_48\".m_mContent: "It can't be anything important. Silver-haired, you read it."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_51\".m_mContent: "There are many skills more important than reading like assassination tracking eavesdropping and Master Van Helsing even said..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_52\".m_mContent: "Anyway that's not important just read it Silver-haired!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_53\".m_mContent: "...offering prices 10% lower than the Seven Sage Association... please consider our proposal..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_54\".m_mContent: "So the victim was a competitor of the Seven Sage Association—or planning to work with their competitors."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_55\".m_mContent: "This sword... it looks like yours, silver-haired? And also kind of like that 'Siren Slayer's Sword of Honor.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_56\".m_mContent: "Perhaps all 'swords' just look similar by nature."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_58\".m_mContent: "I've uncovered your secret—all seven of you—about those slaves imprisoned in dark, damp places where no light reaches. If you don't want me to tell everyone, leave the money in the basket outside the Black Ram Tavern."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_59\".m_mContent: "Could she be that rumored investigator? Looks like she was blackmailing seven people—could it be the Seven Sages?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_60\".m_mContent: "Even for the Sapphire Isle Seven Sages, keeping slaves wouldn't be grounds for blackmail, given their status as Lords and Ladies."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_63\".m_mContent: "The goddess with scales and blindfold—these are symbols of 'justice' and 'fairness.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_64\".m_mContent: "Could it mean that 'blackmail' goes against justice?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_65\".m_mContent: "The first victim was a pirate who robbed the Trading Company's ships, the second was their business competitor, and the third was blackmailing the Sapphire Isle Seven Sages—assuming that's true."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_66\".m_mContent: "The 'Mistbound Terror' only targets people who threaten the Seven Sages... Could they be working for them?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_67\".m_mContent: "It's possible that... he's one of the Seven Sages!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_68\".m_mContent: "That's possible. But the way the 'Mistbound Terror' went to such lengths to leave those marks at the scene... I feel there must be more to it..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_69\".m_mContent: "Never mind that now, Silver-haired, don't you feel... it's suddenly gotten very cold?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_74\".m_mContent: "You won't suddenly try to kill me, will you?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_76\".m_mContent: "This is bad, really bad! I just defeated many monsters—they might be people infected with Black Blood! We need to report this—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_77\".m_mContent: "Strange, where are their bodies? They're gone?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_78\".m_mContent: "In my dream last night... I also saw monsters with unique appearances that vanished after being defeated."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_79\".m_mContent: "Perhaps us standing here is no longer 'reality,' but rather a 'dream.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_80\".m_mContent: "If this is a dream... why are we in the same one? And how do we wake up?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_81\".m_mContent: "After seeing the victim's body last night, I left the dream."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_82\".m_mContent: "Ah! Could it be... those monsters were the 'Mistbound Terror'? But I didn't see who they killed this time..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_83\".m_mContent: "If we can't find the victim's body... will we be trapped in this dream forever?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_84\".m_mContent: "This should be the time for sweet dreams."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_86\".m_mContent: "Sapphire Isle is quite dangerous at night. What brings you wandering to the auction house?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_87\".m_mContent: "I apologize, my sleeping schedule differs from most people's. I thought I'd pass the time with a walk, and found myself here before I knew it."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_89\".m_mContent: "And who might this little one be?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_91\".m_mContent: "Walking at night... can be quite dangerous, especially in Sapphire Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_92\".m_mContent: "Understood. Next time I want to take a walk, I'll invite Miss Lorelei to join me."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_93\".m_mContent: "The fog is getting thicker. Let me escort you back."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip06_94\".m_mContent: "The night is still young. There's time for pleasant dreams."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_01\".m_mContent: "No, no, that's not right. The drawing we saw yesterday definitely didn't look like this."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_02\".m_mContent: "I was following the trending style of Leonardo Ptolemy, who's famous across the continent."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_03\".m_mContent: "Completely unconvincing... Didn't the victim have curly hair?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_04\".m_mContent: "What brings you here? Is there something I can help you with?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_06\".m_mContent: "I can call them for you. Who are you looking for?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_11\".m_mContent: "Uh, as far as I know, I don't associate with strange people who wear full armor in summer."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_12\".m_mContent: "You make a fair point, Miss Ami. I should dress more appropriately to meet my 'guest.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_14\".m_mContent: "Hold on, when was the last time you took a bath?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_15\".m_mContent: "Oh, so you've already met Mr. Thoreau?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_17\".m_mContent: "Thoreau... You mean Viktor Thoreau, one of the Seven Sages? The keeper of order who was called the 'Peace Bearer from the Olive Leaf' after suppressing the uprising in the Olive Leaf slums?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_18a\".m_mContent: "Don't tell me Goldland's a set of triplets..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_19\".m_mContent: "But... olive leaf and the Peace Bearer... Could there be a connection to the sketch we saw last night, Noah?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_20\".m_mContent: "Perhaps there's another way to interpret the murder scene that the Mistbound Terror set up..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_21\".m_mContent: "It's a pleasure to meet you, Miss Ami."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_22\".m_mContent: "Is this some kind of prank? Did you hire all these people to play along?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_23\".m_mContent: "Did you already know Viktor Thoreau? No wonder Lorelei treated you all so well..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_25\".m_mContent: "Though I have never seen his face before, no one would dare impersonate one of Sapphire Isle's renowned Seven Sages."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_26\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami, do we share such an instant connection?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_27\".m_mContent: "If that's the case, our 'negotiation' will surely be a pleasant one."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_28\".m_mContent: "Oh, and since what we need to discuss is rather private, I suggest everyone else take their leave."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_31\".m_mContent: "Noah, these people seem to have ill intentions."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_33\".m_mContent: "One moment, I am Miss Ami's advisor."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_34\".m_mContent: "That's right, he must be present for any discussion with me."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_37\".m_mContent: "I heard that you spent a fortune at yesterday's auction on a gilded statue."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_38\".m_mContent: "I thought that sculpture... had artistic value."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_39\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami is as defiant as they say."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_40\".m_mContent: "I also heard from my business partners that you had a minor conflict with Mr. Michel Savich. In the end, it was a 'person of importance' from the Church who took you away."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_44\".m_mContent: "While I have already know a lot about Miss Ami and your attendant..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_45\".m_mContent: "I am unsure whether Miss Ami knows enough about the Sapphire Isle Seven Sages."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_46\".m_mContent: "I've only heard about them, oh, a dozen times or so a day since I got here."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_47\".m_mContent: "Excellent. Then you must also know what we have accomplished."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_48\".m_mContent: "You rebuilt a ruined Isle, bringing prosperity and wealth to this place. A truly remarkable achievement."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_50\".m_mContent: "For the rest... perhaps it's not my place to say..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_52\".m_mContent: "And some less noble acts, like your suppression of the slum uprising..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_53\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami has uncovered even this? How very admirable."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_54\".m_mContent: "What do you think of my methods?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_57\".m_mContent: "No need to hold back. Please speak your mind."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_58\".m_mContent: "Those people... you got rid of all of them?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_59\".m_mContent: "To rebuild a new city upon ruins, one must first clear away the rubble, don't you think?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_60\".m_mContent: "...Indeed, all the 'rubble' should be cleared away."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_61\".m_mContent: "See, I knew we would be of the same mind."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_62\".m_mContent: "I, on behalf of the Sapphire Isle Seven Sages, would like to invite you to become the next star to illuminate our isle."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_65\".m_mContent: "You're from the Roland family—wealthy, bold, and well-connected with the Church."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_66\".m_mContent: "We have money, land, and slaves. We could achieve great things together."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_69\".m_mContent: "Your advisor is quite the curious one, Miss Ami. You seem very tolerant of your servants."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_70\".m_mContent: "I'm curious about your slaves as well. Why do you call them ugly monsters?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_71\".m_mContent: "Things tainted by Black Blood are always ugly."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_72\".m_mContent: "Of course, if Miss Ami finds them repulsive, we have dedicated staff to manage the slaves."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_73\".m_mContent: "You won't have to lay your eyes on a single beast."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_75\".m_mContent: "As you said, my master is wealthy and well-connected with the Church, so why should we cooperate with you?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_76\".m_mContent: "Greed knows no bounds, especially for the wealthy."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_77\".m_mContent: "I believe we can build a new utopia together."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_78\".m_mContent: "Not just in Sapphire Isle, but across all of Minexus."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_82\".m_mContent: "It is a tear. A dream. A whisper. A song."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_83\".m_mContent: "Listen to the voice in the deepest depths of your heart—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_84\".m_mContent: "I should never have trusted you... and Master Van Helsing shouldn't have trusted you either!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_85\".m_mContent: "Eavesdropping is quite unbecoming behavior, young lady."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_87\".m_mContent: "I knew it! You're in league with those rich people!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_88\".m_mContent: "No! From the very beginning, it was Noah who claimed to be Master Van Helsing's friend. Perhaps he had already seen through you... I'm the only one who fell for your lies!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_89\".m_mContent: "That's right, you've been lying to us from the very beginning..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_90\".m_mContent: "What are you plotting with him? To enslave those monsters? Noah, don't forget—you were once a Black Blood 'monster' yourself."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_91\".m_mContent: "Lady Empousa saved you. She never would have wanted to see you become like this."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_91a\".m_mContent: "Ami, you were never one to betray others."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_92\".m_mContent: "Master Van Helsing taught me that there is only one way to deal with heretics..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_94\".m_mContent: "Stop, I don't want to hurt you..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_97\".m_mContent: "What did you see in the Siren's Tear?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_98\".m_mContent: "The Siren's Tear? Where did they go?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_99\".m_mContent: "Did Miss Ami see what she most desired? Or perhaps... what she feared most?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_101\".m_mContent: "With this in our possession, the future we have planned will inevitably become reality."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_102\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami, would you like to be part of this 'plan' for the future?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_105\".m_mContent: "'Dreams' are defined by humans, and is 'reality' any different?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_106\".m_mContent: "Are you saying that if I disagree, you'll continue to shape my 'reality'?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_107\".m_mContent: "I never said anything of the sort."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_108\".m_mContent: "In two days, we will hold a ceremony to select the Eighth Sage at the auction house. This is your invitation, Miss Ami."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_109\".m_mContent: "Offer up your most precious possession, win the respect of all residents, win the eighth Siren's Tear, and take your place as the Eighth Sage."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_111\".m_mContent: "Will the selection be open to the public?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_112\".m_mContent: "Of course. After all, the Eighth Sage will join us as a symbol of Sapphire Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_113\".m_mContent: "Please prepare yourself, Miss Ami. I look forward to sharing the slaves with you, sharing the 'Siren's Tears,' sharing our future."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_114\".m_mContent: "May your days in Sapphire Isle be like a beautiful dream."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_116\".m_mContent: "<color=#c6ae80>Execute him! Expose him! Tear him apart!</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_117\".m_mContent: "<color=#be79a6>The Mistbound Terror left those traces, and deliberately leaked them to the common folk.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_118\".m_mContent: "<color=#be79a6>He can no longer be trusted. We must find out who among us is the Mistbound Terror.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_119\".m_mContent: "<color=#8f9abf>He has cleaned up many 'remnants' for us, and in exchange, we don't pry into his secrets.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_121\".m_mContent: "<color=#c6ae80>Why are you so reluctant... could it be that you're the Mistbound Terror?</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_122\".m_mContent: "<color=#8f9abf>Rather than suspecting me, you should suspect the one who hasn't shown up.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_123\".m_mContent: "<color=#a7675c>Do not turn suspicion against one another without evidence.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_124\".m_mContent: "<color=#a7675c>The most pressing matter is selecting the Eighth Sage.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_127\".m_mContent: "<color=#a7675c>At least I wouldn't nominate a mere poet as my candidate.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip07_128\".m_mContent: "<color=#be79a6>Thanks to Miss Lorelei, I too have found a suitable candidate—</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_02\".m_mContent: "More wounds... Did the jailer pay me a visit while I was unconscious?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_04\".m_mContent: "That sound again... it sounds so miserable... Is this the 'language' of pain for the deaf and mute?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_06\".m_mContent: "I can't just sit here and wait for death... I need to find a way out. If only I had something sharp..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_10\".m_mContent: "Get out of the way, or do you want a beating?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_12\".m_mContent: "Wretched mute... Get out of my sight!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_13\".m_mContent: "A disability is no reason for such treatment."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_15\".m_mContent: "Heh, is that all the strength you can muster with that whip?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_18\".m_mContent: "Don't forget 'that person' was the one who put him here. It won't look good if he dies on us."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_20\".m_mContent: "Then surely that person must have told you not to let me starve, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_22\".m_mContent: "Forgetting something? Didn't 'that person' tell you that one needs utensils to eat?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_23\".m_mContent: "For a slave? Eat with your filthy hands."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_24\".m_mContent: "Just get him some. You can take your frustrations out on the other wretches."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_26\".m_mContent: "What sets humans apart from animals is our use of 'tools,' but even animals know how to work together..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_27\".m_mContent: "If I could get the prisoners by the door to warn me about guard movements, it would make things much easier."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_28\".m_mContent: "But how should I communicate with them..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_32\".m_mContent: "Seems the prisoners make that 'momu' sound right before a guard enters... Could it mean 'someone's coming'?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_35\".m_mContent: "Stop making that disgusting noise! Behave or else!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_37\".m_mContent: "They seem to be trying to communicate with me too. This sound... probably means the guards are not here?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_40\".m_mContent: "In death, all comes to an end. In sleep, there may still be dreams."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_41\".m_mContent: "But to live, to be awake, is to wear oneself down with endless labor, seeking torment in one's thoughts."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_42\".m_mContent: "Learning another language through guesses, trials, and repetition—God destroyed the Tower, yet humans will rebuild it with their own hands, brick by brick."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_43\".m_mContent: "I think... I understand the meaning of these sounds."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_44\".m_mContent: "Then, for my next move—Ugh, my head..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_46\".m_mContent: "If the sirens take us away, we won't have to endure any more pain."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_47\".m_mContent: "Are you afraid... Isaac, do you yearn for it?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_48\".m_mContent: "Come, join us beneath the waves. Let the sea be our burial ground..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_49\".m_mContent: "Why did you run... why are you the only one who survived? Why!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_57\".m_mContent: "You take us for fools?! What is it?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_58\".m_mContent: "A hole... What's inside? You're trying to escape?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip08_60\".m_mContent: "We confiscated everything when you were locked up. What 'personal belongings' could you possibly have?!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_01\".m_mContent: "All eyes on us! All hearts await! All voices rise! The flawless Sapphire Isle Eighth Sage Selection—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_02\".m_mContent: "To think Joyce gets to be the host! Joyce’s heart is racing, and cheeks are feeling so warm!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_03\".m_mContent: "Ah—something strange is happening to Joyce's body!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_04\".m_mContent: "No, no! Now’s not the time to worry about Joyce! Let’s turn our attention to the candidates and see how they’ll prove their worth to claim the symbol of the Eighth Sage—the Siren’s Tear!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_06\".m_mContent: "Would you like us to safeguard your 'token of proof' for the selection?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_07\".m_mContent: "No need. My subordinates will bring the token over later."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_08\".m_mContent: "Really now… We all agreed to come here for a vacation, yet somehow, it still turned into a mission…"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_09\".m_mContent: "A mission from Lord Albrecht the Bell Ringer… There was never a choice to refuse."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_10\".m_mContent: "But why would Albrecht entrust us this task to us in secret?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_11\".m_mContent: "Could this Isle be hiding an unspeakable past? A tale of love? Conspiracy? Or perhaps… a noble family feud?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_12\".m_mContent: "Come get your own luggage! Stop dumping everything on me!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_13\".m_mContent: "Move it! The selection has already begun!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_16\".m_mContent: "It can only be father, it will only ever be father."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_18\".m_mContent: "<color=#be79a6>Everyone has seen the evidence of that woman's betrayal.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_19\".m_mContent: "<color=#a7675c>Our great plan was nearly undone by a single person.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_22\".m_mContent: "<color=#8f9abf>The more beautifully a flower blooms, the more poignant its withering.</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_23\".m_mContent: "<color=#b39cb7>Such beauty must be worth 'recording,' don't you think?</color>"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_24\".m_mContent: "Mr. Savich, don’t you have important matters to attend to today? How do you still have time for tea with me?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_25\".m_mContent: "I've left that matter to my son."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_26\".m_mContent: "You should have let him take over your business sooner."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_27\".m_mContent: "Let’s hope this time, I won’t have to clean up after him."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_29\".m_mContent: "I want to introduce you to someone."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_30\".m_mContent: "No problem. The Roland family will certainly honor Mr. Savich’s request."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_31\".m_mContent: "Silver-haired, when do we start the plan?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_32\".m_mContent: "First, position yourself with the Church soldiers outside the auction house."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_33\".m_mContent: "Once we reveal the truth, that’s your cue to enter."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_34\".m_mContent: "Heh, then we’ll strike while the iron’s hot! We’re getting Master Van Helsing out of there!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_36\".m_mContent: "Master’s judgment was right about you. You really are a good person."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_38\".m_mContent: "Keep an eye out for 'dark, damp places where no light reaches.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_39\".m_mContent: "Now... it's time for my 'walk' as well."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_40\".m_mContent: "Mr. Noah, you requested a meeting with me. What is it about?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_41\".m_mContent: "About the Mistbound Terror in Sapphire Isle—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_44\".m_mContent: "If Mr. Savich is elected, every resident of the Isle will receive a bag of gold to fund their shops. The remaining gold will be used to expand roads and maintain shipping routes."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_45\".m_mContent: "Ooh—if Joyce had a bag of gold, then… then I could replace my head with pure gold!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_47\".m_mContent: "Alright, alright… let’s see what our final candidate has in store for us!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_48\".m_mContent: "The beautiful, kind, and lovely Miss Ami—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_50\".m_mContent: "My token of proof hasn’t arrived yet. Please wait a little longer."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_51\".m_mContent: "'Hasn’t arrived'? More like it doesn’t exist!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_52\".m_mContent: "You see? Money should be invested in developing places like Sapphire Isle, not wasted on tasteless statues!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_53\".m_mContent: "Did I just make such a cool speech?! Father will definitely praise me!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_55\".m_mContent: "Th-th-the last candidate’s token of proof hasn’t arrived yet, so what if… what if…"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_56\".m_mContent: "What if I treat the audience to a special Joyce dance performance?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_59\".m_mContent: "(Looks like Noah and the others have nearly completed their plan.)"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_60\".m_mContent: "(Let's make this selection a little more... interesting.)"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_61\".m_mContent: "Since we’re selecting the Eighth Sage, moral character is naturally more important than wealth."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_62\".m_mContent: "A waste of space who only knows how to spend his father’s money should try for titles like Wandering Sea Louse, Netted Crab, or Whale Barnacle instead."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_63\".m_mContent: "Monocle? Why are you calling me a monocle?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_64\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! The Young Master doesn't even know what a barnacle is!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_65\".m_mContent: "What a ridiculous title… but honestly, it suits him quite well."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_67\".m_mContent: "'You' what? Turing to your father again?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_69\".m_mContent: "Stop fighting, stop fighting! The auction house decorations are far too expensive to ruin!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_70\".m_mContent: "The selection ceremony is in complete chaos… Joyce can't handle this anymore! Lady Lorelei! Lord Thoreau! Please send more people to help!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip09_72\".m_mContent: "But above all, stop the Church’s soldiers."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_01\".m_mContent: "There's a passage inside the auction house that leads to the sewers…"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_02\".m_mContent: "If Noah's plan is right, then this must be the most suspicious spot…"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_04\".m_mContent: "That settles tomorrow's plan! I'll head to the tavern and gather more information."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_05\".m_mContent: "Noah, you seem to be... hiding something from Selena."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_07\".m_mContent: "The strange armored visitor today seemed to have misunderstood Ami's identity. They invited her to run for the position of Eighth Sage of Sapphire Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_08\".m_mContent: "The Eighth Sage… would they really use an 'election' to determine such a position?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_09\".m_mContent: "Be it 'auctions' or 'elections', Sapphire Isle seems to be undergoing many institutional reforms."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_10\".m_mContent: "However, during our investigation, Selena and I discovered that Mr. Thoreau is likely putting up a front—he has done many questionable things in secret."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_11\".m_mContent: "So we gained his trust by speaking ill of the Black Blood—but please believe me, those words were not my true feelings."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_12\".m_mContent: "It was precisely because I had complete faith in you that I worked with Lady Empousa to save you back then."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_14\".m_mContent: "...Sorry. Since coming here, these recurring dreams have been clouding my thoughts."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_15\".m_mContent: "Thoreau showed us the 'Siren's Tear'—a substance that can create illusions, and possibly even control them."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_16\".m_mContent: "Seven Sages are using a large number of 'special' slaves to produce this 'Siren's Tear' in order to control more and more people."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_17\".m_mContent: "The strange dreams we’ve had since arriving at the Isle—they must be the effects of 'Siren's Tear.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_18\".m_mContent: "The statue of Goldland and many items at the auction were salvaged from the deep sea by fishermen… I'm worried…"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_19\".m_mContent: "Could those slaves have come from the sea as well?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_20\".m_mContent: "—They might even be connected to the people of Landis..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_21\".m_mContent: "I must find a way to save them!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_22\".m_mContent: "I was thinking the same thing. Thoreau hinted that whoever becomes the Eighth Sage the day after tomorrow will gain access to those slaves."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_23\".m_mContent: "I believe they'll definitely move the slaves near the auction house by then."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_24\".m_mContent: "That's why I asked Selena to have the Church's soldiers create a distraction for the auction house guards on that day."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_25\".m_mContent: "Would the Church's soldiers really go to the auction house without a proper reason?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_26\".m_mContent: "Of course, a reason they won't be able to refuse."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_28\".m_mContent: "A token proving your candidacy for the election."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_29\".m_mContent: "Me?! Am I really going to be a candidate?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_30\".m_mContent: "If it was an eating contest, I'd be more confident."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_31\".m_mContent: "I'll prepare an indisputable token of proof for you."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_32\".m_mContent: "What preparations are needed to make this 'token'? Please, let me help."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_33\".m_mContent: "No, there are more important matters that need your attention, Aiona."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_34\".m_mContent: "What do you need me to do?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_36\".m_mContent: "I'm worried that if the Church's soldiers find the Black Blood slaves, they'll either purge them or report it to the Church. Either way, things will spiral out of control."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_37\".m_mContent: "That's why you need to help them escape before the soldiers get to them, Aiona."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_38\".m_mContent: "I told Selena a little lie—her route will avoid your operation."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_40\".m_mContent: "Once everything is done, I'll find a way to regroup with you all."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_41\".m_mContent: "Deceiving Selena like this... she will be quite upset."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_42\".m_mContent: "We'll leave that for Isaac to deal with."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_43\".m_mContent: "Right... after all, he's the one who failed to look after his own disciple."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_44\".m_mContent: "There are too many guards right now. Rushing in carelessly would only draw more attention…"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_46\".m_mContent: "There are many Church members at the auction venue. Lord Thoreau has ordered you to find a way to delay them. Now, move."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_49\".m_mContent: "Where are those wretched slaves? Release them all!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_52\".m_mContent: "These slaves have already transformed… and these aquatic features… could it be…"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip10_55\".m_mContent: "I'm afraid there are more slaves imprisoned in the sewers…"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_01\".m_mContent: "Why is it that those aiding me... are the very creatures born of myth?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_02\".m_mContent: "Their words? Whose words? I can't recall..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_03\".m_mContent: "Why can't I remember... anything from my past? My head hurts..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_05\".m_mContent: "They are monsters mutated by the Black Blood. It is my duty to kill them..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_14\".m_mContent: "As expected... I knew I'd find my answer here. So, it was you..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_15\".m_mContent: "...who stole my father's land and doing all these 'good deeds'. Can you even sleep peacefully?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_16\".m_mContent: "Oh Isaac, please don't say that. You're breaking my heart."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_17\".m_mContent: "After that disaster, everyone was gone... and you vanished without a trace. You have no idea how it broke me."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_18\".m_mContent: "So you became a thief? What an interesting way to grieve."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_19\".m_mContent: "I couldn't revive the dead, could I?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_20\".m_mContent: "All I could do was return to the ruined Sapphire Isle, take up your father's legacy, and rebuild it into the thriving place you see today."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_23\".m_mContent: "I suppose you haven't had a proper look around, right? Come—let me show you. Think of it as a little vacation."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_24\".m_mContent: "And you can go back to the Church and continue with your dream of becoming a Bell Ringer after this."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_25\".m_mContent: "Your father would be so proud to see you becoming a Bell Ringer."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_26\".m_mContent: "You seem quite eager to send me away... Don't tell me you plan to continue those experiments from back then."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_28\".m_mContent: "You're still... too young after all, Isaac."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_29\".m_mContent: "Just as stubborn as your father. The world has changed, Isaac. Integrity and courage alone can't protect everyone."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_30\".m_mContent: "What your father went through... could very well be your fate."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_31\".m_mContent: "But I don’t have the heart to do it. After all, you’re family..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_34\".m_mContent: "Well... I can't quite remember what happened to your father."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_39\".m_mContent: "This is the treasure of Sapphire Isle, the Siren's Tear."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_41\".m_mContent: "I... I've never fainted like this before..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_42\".m_mContent: "What's happening? What's with all the commotion?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_44\".m_mContent: "The Church is searching the auction house... they say... it's by order of the Bell Ringer!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_46\".m_mContent: "Lord Thoreau ordered us to evacuate the slaves at once!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip11_48\".m_mContent: "The chart room? I'm on... a ship?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_03\".m_mContent: "It’s Lord Thoreau! He's overseeing the selection himself!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_04\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami, regarding your 'proof,' how much longer—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_07\".m_mContent: "Could the proof be Miss Lorelei's word?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_08\".m_mContent: "The 'proof' is the Mistbound Terror! The very nightmare that haunted Sapphire Isle and left both tourists and residents in fear—captured by Miss Ami herself!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_10\".m_mContent: "I knew it—the guests staying at our inn must have gone missing..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_11\".m_mContent: "We need to know who's behind these brutal acts! Where are they?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_13\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei knows where the Mistbound Terror is? Please, you have to tell us!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_16\".m_mContent: "Though it may be unsettling, she used the myths of the Mistbound Terror and the Siren to eliminate those who posed a threat to her."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_18\".m_mContent: "How could she have done such a thing?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_19\".m_mContent: "Surely none here doubt Miss Ami—she has no cause to deceive us."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_21\".m_mContent: "How can you take her side too!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_22\".m_mContent: "That's enough, Michel. Ours is not a house that boasts through borrowed honor."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_23\".m_mContent: "Relying on me is convenient, isn’t it? But Miss Ami also needs someone in her corner."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_25\".m_mContent: "You sought my backing, Michel. And now that I brought a Roland elder to stand with Miss Ami, will you still act so bold?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_26a\".m_mContent: "Michel, you should head back. I'll take care of things from here."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_27\".m_mContent: "Mr. Bertram Roland, do come and meet this prodigious young heir of yours—so gifted, so generous with her wealth."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_28\".m_mContent: "Mr. Savich... I've never seen this Miss Ami before. She isn't from our family."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_29\".m_mContent: "Or rather, I should say, there has never been a ‘Miss Ami’ in either the main line or any branch of our family."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_30\".m_mContent: "Oh? This is quite unexpected. Could it be that... Miss Ami is a fraud?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_31\".m_mContent: "Sounds to me like you're the real fraud. You don't even know Miss Ami. And this 'Bertram Roland'... he's just another accomplice, isn't he?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_32\".m_mContent: "Are you saying that Mr. Roland, and all the guards of House Roland behind him, are frauds I conjured up as well?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_34\".m_mContent: "The final candidate... is actually a fraud?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_35\".m_mContent: "Told you! Miss Lorelei will never be a ruthless killer!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_36\".m_mContent: "I must admit, when I nominated Miss Ami, I had not verified her identity."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_37\".m_mContent: "I never imagined such brazen deceit would thrive under the Church’s vigilant eye."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_38a\".m_mContent: "Look what was uncovered in Lorelei's office—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_38c\".m_mContent: "But the logic here makes sense, could it mean..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_39\".m_mContent: "Annoying... when you're nothing but food to me."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_41\".m_mContent: "Mr. Savich, when you asked me to testify, you never said things would turn out like this!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_43\".m_mContent: "Guards! Escort Mr. Roland and me out of here."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_44\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei is actually the 'Mistbound Terror'? And... and she's a monster!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_45\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami was right! She caught the Mistbound Terror!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_46\".m_mContent: "But... Ami did fake her identity. What if this is also part of her deception?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_47\".m_mContent: "You have one last thing to do now, little Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_49\".m_RoleName: "斩杀海妖而获得的荣誉之剑"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_50\".m_RoleName: "斩杀海妖而获得的荣誉之剑"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_51\".m_mContent: "Attendants of Miss Ami slew the siren!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_52\".m_mContent: "Attendants of Miss Ami slew the siren! Slew the Mistbound Terror!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_53\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami should become the Eighth Sage!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_54\".m_mContent: "That's right! Miss Ami should be our Eighth Sage!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_55\".m_mContent: "You! Why? This isn't what we agreed on—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_56\".m_mContent: "All evidence shows you are the Mistbound Terror, Miss Lorelei."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_58\".m_mContent: "So what do you plan to do with this Mistbound Terror, Mr. Noah?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_59\".m_mContent: "I have one last question for you, Mistbound Terror."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_60\".m_mContent: "The olive branch at the crime scene suggests Viktor Thoreau cloaking violence beneath the guise of peace; the scepter and Pisces imply that one of the Seven Sages usurped Van Helsing's rightful lands; and the scales with the blindfold... a symbol of you enforcing order through bloodshed."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_61\".m_mContent: "If you're the Mistbound Terror, then why stage the crime scenes to mock yourself?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_62\".m_mContent: "You could call it... a peculiar interest of mine."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_63\".m_mContent: "And besides, if you were the one who did the killing, why investigate the so-called culprit? And why leave those sketches behind in your office?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_64\".m_mContent: "If the Seven Sages could use the Siren's Tears to induce hallucinations, how was I able to witness the murders of the Mistbound Terror at night?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_65\".m_mContent: "Noah, that's more than just one question."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_66\".m_mContent: "I already know the answers to these questions—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_67\".m_mContent: "Everything I saw, everything I experienced, was part of your plan."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_69\".m_mContent: "From the very beginning, you fabricated Ami's image as wealthy and influential, lured Thoreau into drawing her in, and steered Selena and me toward the trail of the Mistbound Terror."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_71\".m_mContent: "When I was forced to set this plan in motion, I spent the most effort choosing my final piece."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_72\".m_mContent: "Those too foolish wouldn't survive to see the plan's end, while those too clever—like you, would never stop asking questions..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_73\".m_mContent: "I can help you with your plan, but I need to know the answer."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_76\".m_mContent: "We already have a plan to rescue those slaves."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_77\".m_mContent: "Letting them out of their cage won't guarantee freedom."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_78\".m_mContent: "As long as there are those who seek to exploit the Siren's Tears, running will be in vain. The Master hiding among the six remaining Sages has yet to be revealed."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_79\".m_mContent: "These Sages certainly have quite a lot of secrets to hide."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_80\".m_mContent: "Then let us lay it all bare beneath the summer sun."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_82\".m_mContent: "Only by becoming the Eighth Sage... can I bring this to an end."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_82a\".m_mContent: "Little Bloodborn... the duel with the Master is only just beginning."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_83a\".m_mContent: "If even Lorelei has a secret identity as the Midnight Blood Shadow, can the Sages truly be trusted?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_84\".m_mContent: "The Eighth Sage of Sapphire Isle... may you lead this isle toward a brighter future."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_85\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami, step forward and claim the honor that is rightfully yours."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_86\".m_mContent: "(Noah, is all of this... part of your plan?)"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_87\".m_mContent: "The title of Sapphire Isle's Eighth Sage shall be bestowed upon one of unparalleled valor and wisdom—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_89\".m_mContent: "(That familiar presence about her... am I just imagining it?)"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_91\".m_mContent: "Will the waves carry you back… to your homeland?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_93\".m_mContent: "'Don't be afraid, Averdin said he would protect us.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_94\".m_mContent: "'Sapphire Isle will become our second home. Let's rebuild it together with everyone.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_96\".m_mContent: "'It's those monsters from the sea! They brought the Plague!'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_97\".m_mContent: "'Kill them! For the peace of Sapphire Isle!'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_99\".m_mContent: "'Sapphire Isle has become a dead land. Only I can bring it back to life.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_100\".m_mContent: "'Averdin, I will finish what you failed to do.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_102\".m_mContent: "'Seems these monsters can speak... Any translators?'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_103\".m_mContent: "'No volunteers? Then we continue the fight!'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_106\".m_mContent: "'Mother, did I make the wrong choice?'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_107\".m_mContent: "'I can't protect them all. All I can do is watch as they fall, one by one...'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_109\".m_mContent: "'I was wrong. Neither creatures mutated by Black Blood nor sirens will truly love humans.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_113\".m_mContent: "'You're always caught up with matters on the Isle, yet you never make time for yourself.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_114\".m_mContent: "'I want to... tend to your wounds.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip12_120\".m_mContent: "You want me to open the box?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_01\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei, are you here to inspect again today?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_02\".m_mContent: "Something extraordinary is set to take place on the Isle today..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_04\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei, be sure to examine every suspicious spot with care!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_05\".m_mContent: "Since you've noticed something unusual, little one, could you give me some clues?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_06\".m_mContent: "I... I'm not little! But since you asked, Miss Lorelei, here's your first hint: while I was mending clothes this morning, <style=Highlight>something was dropped on the ground</style>."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_07\".m_mContent: "More rewards for regular customers? That's a clever idea, but be sure to remind them to prioritize safety."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_08\".m_mContent: "I'll make sure of it, Miss Lorelei!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_09\".m_mContent: "The count of customers we had to direct to the physician has dramatically fallen from one hundred and twenty last month to only thirty-six this month!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_10\".m_mContent: "Still thirty-six? Well... don't forget to pay the fine to the Association for not meeting safety qualification standards."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_12\".m_mContent: "Oh right, right! I forgot to report something to you—"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_13\".m_mContent: "This morning, I saw someone suspicious hiding something <style=Highlight>near the barrels</style>."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_15\".m_mContent: "Happy birthday, Miss Lorelei! To the Isle's most graceful, brilliant, and sweet-voiced lady!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_16\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei, thank you for assisting me in securing a stall on the Isle, gathering materials for my inventions, and promoting my business..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_17\".m_mContent: "If not for you, I would never have been able to choose such an exciting job and would have been forced to return home to inherit the land..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_18\".m_mContent: "To show our gratitude to Miss Lorelei, we all pitched in to prepare this birthday gift for you!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_19\".m_mContent: "While this pearl may not be a rare gem, it carries our blessing—'To Lorelei, the Greatest Sage of Sapphire Isle'!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_21\".m_mContent: "What's wrong, Miss Lorelei? You look... a bit sad..."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_22\".m_mContent: "I'm fine. Thank you for remembering my birthday."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_23\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei... I have an important decision to make, and I'd like your help."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_25\".m_mContent: "In support of the Seven Sage Association's effort to promote the Isle, I've designed two new attractions."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_26\".m_mContent: "They are the 'Clothes Dryer and Seafood Grill Duo' and the 'Pretty Siren DIY Grill Food Cart.'"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_27\".m_mContent: "Which one do you think would draw more customers?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_31\".m_mContent: "Wouldn't drying clothes alongside grilling seafood make the clothes smell like seafood?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_34\".m_mContent: "I see... thank you for the advice, Miss Lorelei."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_35\".m_mContent: "Well, if it isn't Miss Lorelei! Are you in search of anything particular to purchase?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_36\".m_mContent: "No, I'm just here to make sure you're behaving yourself."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_37\".m_mContent: "Please don't say that, Miss Lorelei. I'm a reputable merchant on the Isle, always paying my stall fees on time!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_38\".m_mContent: "Speaking of which... has anything interesting turned up at the Association's secret auctions lately?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_39\".m_mContent: "Now the assassins have their sights set on Sapphire Isle too?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_40\".m_mContent: "No, no! I was just asking for myself."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_42\".m_mContent: "Oh? Where do you think you're going, little one?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_44\".m_mContent: "In that case, would you like to see our latest performance?"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_45\".m_mContent: "If I remember correctly, your troupe doesn't have a permit for outdoor performances yet."

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_46\".m_mContent: "That's why we're performing with parasols now!"

\"Dialogue_E_30001_Clip99_48\".m_mContent: "I-I'm sorry, Miss Lorelei—I'll never break the Isle's rules again—just please, don't give me that look—"

\"QE_30001_Clip99_01\".m_mContent: "It seems that careless little one dropped something under the carpet."

\"QE_30001_Clip99_02\".m_mContent: "Hmm? There's a note under the carpet."

\"QE_30001_Clip99_03\".m_mContent: "'<style=Highlight>The archery stall owner</style> has new prizes in stock.'"
