\"QE_30001_Clip99_04\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei! We have new prizes at our stall. Would you like to try your luck?"

\"QE_30001_Clip99_05\".m_mContent: "Hmm, should I start with the 'Sapphire Isle Auction House' and its rare treasures? Or head straight to the legendary 'Sails of Glory'?"

\"QE_30001_Clip99_06\".m_mContent: "And the 'Sapphire Secret Fashion Show' sounds so intriguing too... How will I ever decide?"

\"QE_30001_Clip99_07\".m_mContent: "Joyce seems to be preparing for tonight's auction. Better not to interrupt."

\"QE_30001_Clip99_08\".m_mContent: "Street vendors reported something suspicious near the barrels..."

\"QE_30001_Clip99_09\".m_mContent: "Who left a hammer lying around? That's hardly up to safety code for the isle."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "It's not your turn to shine yet, Jacintha."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_06\".m_mContent: "What are you saying? The day's barely begun—no time for long faces!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "A new Sage has risen, the Mistbound Terror has been caught, and Lord Thoreau's ordered extra patrols. Tonight's festivities are cleared to last 'til dawn!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "It's the perfect moment for the Yakov Troupe to shine—spirited acts, clever lines, and a script that bends with the wind!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_10\".m_mContent: "Of course! Catherine's makeup is flawless—you're the perfect Ginokio!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_11\".m_mContent: "I've never heard of Catherine, Yakov, or the Adventures of Ginokio. From the way you speak to the way you dress... you're suspicious in every possible way."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_12\".m_mContent: "So cold! We have a contract, my little Bella!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_14\".m_mContent: "I told you—we have a contract! You promised, clear as day, to play the role of Ginokio!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_15\".m_mContent: "No time to explain, little Bella—the whole troupe's waiting, come on!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_16\".m_mContent: "Let's make you the finest actor in all of Sapphire Isle! Isn't that the dream you've always had?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_18\".m_mContent: "Ladies and gentlemen, gather round! The grandest interactive performance of the century—the Adventures of Ginokio—is about to begin!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_20\".m_mContent: "In interactive theater, improvisation is everything, Bella. Just follow my narration and act along!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_21\".m_mContent: "There, in the gentle breeze of Sapphire Isle, under the masterful hands of the great artisan Peppetto, our protagonist—Ginokio—was born."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_22\".m_mContent: "My heart brims with newfound hope... though my head remains as stubborn as wood."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_23\".m_mContent: "W-what is happening? Why is someone dressed like that suddenly shouting in the middle of the street...?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_26\".m_mContent: "The pinnacle of fashion... is to abandon the very idea of clothing itself. Looks like everything I've designed for my customers has been far too conservative..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_27\".m_mContent: "That settles it! I'll craft a new line that truly embodies the spirit of Sapphire Isle!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_28\".m_mContent: "Welcome to the Yakov Troupe's interactive performance! The Adventures of Ginokio—a spectacle you won't want to miss!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_30\".m_mContent: "It means the course of the tale is shaped by every member of the audience!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_31\".m_mContent: "To dream up something so revolutionary... I must truly be a genius!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_32\".m_mContent: "And how exactly do we steer the story?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_33\".m_mContent: "Let's see... you there—what do you think Ginokio wished for most, after coming to life?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_34\".m_mContent: "Could it be... he wished to find Sir Robin von Quinn?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_35\".m_mContent: "Ah, Sir Rowan—the pale-skinned gentleman of the Seven Sages who shuns the sun? He passed through just moments ago, heading that way. But surely, that's not what our dear puppet longs for most!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_36\".m_mContent: "Then maybe... Ginokio's deepest desire is to defeat Robin von Quinn and claim his most precious treasure!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_37\".m_mContent: "And what, pray tell, is Robin von Quinn's most treasured possession?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_38\".m_mContent: "You mean his business escorting and trading in Siren—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_39\".m_mContent: "Shut it! That's not something we're supposed to say out loud! Please, everyone—just ask for directions and go home!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_40\".m_mContent: "If we're talking about a puppet, surely what she wants most... is to become a real person!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_41\".m_mContent: "Obeying that proud instinct born to mankind... I suppose I, too, must long to become human."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_42\".m_mContent: "I've heard that even beasts can become human through the power of love. Surely the same must hold true for a puppet?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_44\".m_mContent: "But tell me—who can teach one such a wondrous thing as love?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_45\".m_mContent: "Young Master, your father is waiting for us. If you wish, we can return to watch the play another time."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_46\".m_mContent: "Hmph. A foolish tale of love—how could I possibly enjoy such drivel?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_47\".m_mContent: "Only commoners waste time on such nonsense! We’re leaving. Now!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_49\".m_mContent: "I may have a way to help you get what you desire. I'll speak with the elder of the Roland family—about a marriage alliance with Lady Ami, in your name."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_50\".m_mContent: "W-what utter nonsense are you spouting?! How dare you suggest I’d entertain such thoughts! Teach him a lesson!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_55\".m_mContent: "Return for now. I have matters to attend to."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_57\".m_mContent: "Surely, one can grasp that most mysterious thing called love... by slaying wicked dragons, conquering uncivilized barbarians, and unmasking the schemes of evil wizards!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_58\".m_mContent: "That makes absolutely no sense, little Bella!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_60\".m_mContent: "How did that get approved?! I didn't write that!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_61\".m_mContent: "First, I'll need the right weapon. A blade that draws blood on the slightest cut..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_65\".m_mContent: "The blazing sun scorches flesh and bone."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_66\".m_mContent: "Waves crash upon jagged stone, the waters dark with menace."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_67\".m_mContent: "To think... I would face my nemesis here and now."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_68\".m_mContent: "Prove your worth—claim the treasure I hold most dear."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_69\".m_mContent: "What nonsense... Dispose of him before Lord Albrecht is disturbed."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_70\".m_mContent: "Take this book... You've earned it—by strength alone..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_71\".m_mContent: "The stench of blood... that pale skin... This one reeks of the Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_72\".m_mContent: "So that's why Lord Albrecht used that technique..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_74a\".m_mContent: "Oh? That gleaming stone fell from him... quite a pretty thing."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_75\".m_mContent: "Forget about the stone! Hurry up and clean this place!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_76\".m_mContent: "Don't clean me up! I'll leave on my own!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_81\".m_mContent: "We didn't do that to him, but... Bella, run!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_83\".m_mContent: "I still haven't secured the permit for outdoor performances on the Isle—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_84\".m_mContent: "What a shame. Since the show didn't finish, little Bella's only entitled to one-tenth of the promised payment..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_86\".m_mContent: "Yes, yes, but that's what the contract says. Little Bella, do remember to read the fine print next time, hmm?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_87\".m_mContent: "Let this be your very first lesson about this cruel, cruel world!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_89\".m_mContent: "Fine... I'll grudgingly toss in another ten Soli. Happy now?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_90\".m_mContent: "Something just flew out of the pocket..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_90b\".m_mContent: "Wow, it fell and transformed into a flower petal."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip01_92\".m_mContent: "I came back to Sapphire Isle.. to fulfill a <style=Highlight>promise</style>..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_01\".m_mContent: "B-But where were... w-where were we meant to meet?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_02\".m_mContent: "E-Everything about that... promise is... is missing from my mind."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_04\".m_mContent: "This sounds like a job for the kind and almighty me!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_05\".m_mContent: "Since you remember the promise involves flower petals, why not start the investigation there?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_07\".m_mContent: "Curious about these flowers? For just thirty Soli, you can hire Yakov—Sapphire Isle's most knowledgeable guide—to dig up the truth!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_08\".m_mContent: "Thirty Soli is exactly what you owe me."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_09\".m_mContent: "That also happens to be everything I have on me right now..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_10\".m_mContent: "Little Bella, money is the least important thing in life. A promise between friends? Far more valuable."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_13\".m_mContent: "To uncover the mystery of these petals, first stop—let's ask the flower vendor."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_15\".m_mContent: "These look like Tidewisp petals, don't they?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_16a\".m_mContent: "More impressive in sound than sight. It's just an ordinary flower petal!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_16b\".m_mContent: "You don't understand—the Tidewisp is a flower of friendship and love. Legend says it glows like fireflies for those with the most sincere hearts."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_16c\".m_mContent: "They say a Tidewisp bloomed when Lord Hallon mourned his late wife."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_17\".m_mContent: "They're fairly common flowers by the coast. When in bloom, they float across the water in clusters. Truly a beautiful sight."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_18\".m_mContent: "Where can we find them in Sapphire Isle?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_19\".m_mContent: "As far as I know... you can't. Though lovely, their bloom was short, and the petals were a nightmare to clean once they withered. The Seven Sage Association had them completely uprooted from the bay years ago."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_20\".m_mContent: "Before they were removed—where did the flowers used to bloom?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_21\".m_mContent: "All over, really... But I remember the beach up ahead—every summer, it would be blanketed by Tidewisps."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_28\".m_mContent: "This place... it's nothing like the Sapphire Isle I remember."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_29\".m_mContent: "I was only bedridden for a while—so why does no one recognize me anymore?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_30\".m_mContent: "I can't recall anything after I fell ill... not even signing a contract with you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_31\".m_mContent: "Did I really make a promise with someone? Do I even belong here... in Sapphire Isle?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_33\".m_mContent: "Listen closely—debts must be repaid, and promises must be kept. That's the first rule of being a proper actor!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_34\".m_mContent: "If you remember making that promise, then no excuses. You follow it through to the end."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_36\".m_mContent: "I never expected to hear such words from you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_40\".m_mContent: "See, Little Bella? Someone on the Isle does remember you!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_41\".m_mContent: "Wait—wait a second! Isn't that Alexa of the Seven Sages?!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_42\".m_mContent: "A doll with a master... must return to the Master."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_46\".m_mContent: "Now that you have power—your duty is clear! Protect the weak... like me!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_48\".m_mContent: "If I just mimic her movements, I should be able to pull it off..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_50\".m_mContent: "Yeah! Why did Alexa suddenly come after us? What earth-shattering thing did Little Bella do in the past?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_51\".m_mContent: "I don't even know her—so how does she know my name?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_52\".m_mContent: "And what’s that strange thread on her head?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_57\".m_mContent: "Wait—isn't this the Siren's Tear? The mark of a Sage's status and rank? If I could sell it on the black market, I could clear all my debts!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_59\".m_mContent: "If I don't reach the promised place tonight... it'll be too late."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_61a\".m_mContent: "You were right, silver-haired! To think that well-off Miss Lorelei would turn out to be such a dangerous person..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_61b\".m_mContent: "The Church soldiers uncovered many suspicious items in her office!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_61c\".m_mContent: "Let's meet at the inn after we search the auction house."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_63\".m_mContent: "Everyone held at the auction house has been rescued."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_65\".m_mContent: "If possible, I'd rather not call them that. From their anxious gestures, it seems more of their people are still imprisoned elsewhere—but they could only point out rough directions."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_66\".m_mContent: "They no longer understand human speech... Their transformation has already progressed this far..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_68\".m_mContent: "They're showing signs of bestial mutation—fish-like tails and other traits. Miss Ami was right—their bloodline is indeed linked to the Landis family."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_69\".m_mContent: "That explains Ami's urgency before the Seven Sage Association. She said she'd find a way to locate the others still in captivity..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_70\".m_mContent: "We forced the other Sages to acknowledge her status through public pressure at the election. They’re unlikely to fully trust her now."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_72\".m_mContent: "Lorelei used the legend of the Mistbound Terror to discreetly eliminate several of her guild partners. That had already drawn suspicion from the other Sages—which is why she rushed to set her plan in motion."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_73\".m_mContent: "As long as Ami insists her actions at the election were an attempt to seize Lorelei’s position, she can still pass as a ruthless opportunist."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_74\".m_mContent: "But we need to act quickly. The longer we delay, the clearer our trail becomes."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_75\".m_mContent: "Then I'll search the direction her people pointed out—see if I can find anything."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_76\".m_mContent: "Let’s regroup with Ami and discuss our next move. I arranged to meet her at the inn."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_77\".m_mContent: "She hasn't returned yet? Or... did she leave again?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_78\".m_mContent: "Something's wrong. There are half-eaten grilled oysters here. If it were Ami, she wouldn't have left a single bite. Something must've happened."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_79\".m_mContent: "Aiona—can you see what took place here?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_80\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami collapsed after touching the Siren's Tear... then Mr. Thoreau forced his way in and took her."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_82\".m_mContent: "Also... maybe I was mistaken, but just before she lost consciousness, she seemed to hide something beneath the table."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_86\".m_mContent: "No, Aiona. Her people still need someone to get them out."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip02_87\".m_mContent: "With this seal, we can forge a letter requesting an audience with Thoreau—along with orders to transfer the remaining captives."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_01\".m_mContent: "We must end this before tomorrow's Eighth Sage Inauguration Ceremony."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_02\".m_mContent: "Mr. Van Helsing, is this mission issued under your personal authority—or in the name of the Seven Sages?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_04\".m_mContent: "That Ami, still can't be fully trusted."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_05\".m_mContent: "Lorelei may have betrayed us, but only we hold the right to judge and execute her. An outsider has no place in such matters."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_06\".m_mContent: "How can Miss Ami be an outsider, when she's already been chosen as the next Sage?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_07\".m_mContent: "If anyone's an outsider... I suppose that would be me."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_08\".m_mContent: "You know I've always believed you should be the one to take that seat."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_09\".m_mContent: "If you uncover anything that implicates Ami before tomorrow's ceremony... Nothing is set in stone."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_10\".m_mContent: "Mr. Van Helsing's offer is... most compelling."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_11\".m_mContent: "The Church's people are still waiting at the auction house. I'll leave the investigation entirely in your hands."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_12\".m_mContent: "With such trust placed in me, how could I possibly refuse?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_13\".m_mContent: "I've poured years into Sapphire Isle... I won't allow anyone to tear it apart."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_16\".m_mContent: "A gentleman in rather... unusual attire just delivered a letter."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_19\".m_mContent: "We only just saw each other at the Seven Sage Association—what reason could there be for a private audience?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_20\".m_mContent: "Oh my. I thought Miss Ami had urgent business with me. But it's just her servant."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_21\".m_mContent: "And a rather uncouth one, at that."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_22\".m_mContent: "Is this Mr. Thoreau's definition of etiquette—kidnapping the very partner you handpicked yourself?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_23\".m_mContent: "I beg your pardon... what did you say?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_24\".m_mContent: "Was that a servant... attempting to lecture me—on etiquette?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_25\".m_mContent: "Your questions, your conduct—entirely inappropriate. Still, for Miss Ami’s sake, I shall overlook your insolence."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_26\".m_mContent: "Now, I have far more important matters to address. You may take your leave, Miss Ami's... servant."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_28\".m_mContent: "What did you do to the Siren's Tear? Why did she collapse after touching it?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_30\".m_mContent: "These two are terrifying. I told you, Little Bella—we should've left sooner."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_31\".m_mContent: "Now it's going to be hard to slip away..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_32\".m_mContent: "That gleaming stone brought us here for a reason... And that person... there's something unsettling about them."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_33\".m_mContent: "Anyone who acts without saying a word is just plain strange, Little Bella. Let's steer clear of people like that."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_35\".m_mContent: "He has that thread on his head too."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_36\".m_mContent: "You're that puppet merchant from the castle... why are you here?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_38\".m_mContent: "Hey! You still haven't told me what happened to Ami!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_40\".m_mContent: "If you still had Goldland's memories... You'd never have let Ami fall into danger like this."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_41\".m_mContent: "You mean the memories of this body's original "owner"...?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_42\".m_mContent: "You're using Goldland's body? Where is Ami? What have you done with her?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_43\".m_mContent: "I saw it... she resonated with the Siren's Tear..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_44\".m_mContent: "Why did I take her? Why did I harm her..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_45\".m_mContent: "Take this Siren's Tear. Only all the Siren's Tears together... can awaken..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_46\".m_mContent: "Strange... There's no blood in his body. How is he still alive?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_47\".m_mContent: "Could Little Bella be a reaper?! She keeps cutting people's "threads of life"!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_48\".m_mContent: "Could that thread I can't see... be what's sustaining him?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_50\".m_mContent: "When I cut the thread... It felt like all my strength drained out of me."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_51\".m_mContent: "Next time, don't touch anything that creepy again..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_53\".m_mContent: "The demeanor and appearance... they're subtly different. Could she be the same..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_54\".m_mContent: "I must've been mistaken. But what did Miss Bella do... that stirred memories from his original body?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_55\".m_mContent: "You can't see it—and even if I told you, you wouldn't believe me."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_56\".m_mContent: "Regardless... thanks to you, I know now. To save Ami, I'll need to gather every Siren's Tear."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_57\".m_mContent: "He was one of the Sages—he must've had one on him..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_57a\".m_mContent: "Wait... something on me is resonating with it..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip03_57b\".m_mContent: "It's another Siren's Tear... the one Lorelei slipped into my hand back then."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_03\".m_mContent: "Ah! So that's what stirred Little Bella's memory—the fragment of her promise with a friend?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_04\".m_mContent: "No wonder it's a symbol of the Sapphire Isle Seven Sages. Such a mysterious and powerful thing!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_05\".m_mContent: "This means a great deal to me. Please... just let me borrow it."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_06\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, but I need it urgently. I can't..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_07\".m_mContent: "Hey! Listen here! A proper actor never refuses a lady's request—that's day-one etiquette for any respectable performer!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_08\".m_mContent: "I'm not an actor. Nor have I ever aspired to be one."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_09\".m_mContent: "Then I'll just have to use a bit of righteous valor to convince you!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_11\".m_mContent: "She's getting better and better at handling that strange power—surely thanks to my impeccable guidance!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_12\".m_mContent: "So people with thick skin really do live..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_13a\".m_mContent: "I need to leave the bay for some time."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_14\".m_mContent: "Father's definitely throwing some boring banquet for my birthday..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_15\".m_mContent: "Then sneak out afterward, and I'll celebrate with you properly."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_16\".m_mContent: "Have you heard the rumor? There's a mysterious merchant in town."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_17\".m_mContent: "They say you can get anything from him—if you're willing to pay his price."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_18\".m_mContent: "The merchants in town sound way more interesting than the ones at Sapphire Isle... What would you buy?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_19\".m_mContent: "I want to buy you a birthday gift."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_20\".m_mContent: "I don't need anything expensive. Actually, I already know what I want."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_22\".m_mContent: "Can I have a pearl? We'll engrave our names on it—then we'll be best friends forever. No splitting up."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_23\".m_mContent: "Then on your birthday, I'll bring you a "pearl"—bigger than the one you wanted, and one you'll love even more."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_23a\".m_mContent: "You promise to return on my birthday… don't you?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_23b\".m_mContent: "Yes, when the sea moonflowers bloom at our promised place… we shall meet again."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_26\".m_mContent: "It's vow, not vial. That's how you say it."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_27\".m_mContent: "Lady Selena! We searched the auction house but found no one by the name Van Helsing."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_28\".m_mContent: "However, we did uncover substantial evidence in Lorelei's office—documents tied to the Mistbound Terror."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_29\".m_mContent: "L-Lady...? I-It's the first time anyone's called me that..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_30\".m_mContent: "You bear the Bell Ringer's token. To see the token is to stand before the Bell Ringer."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_32\".m_mContent: "If only I could become a Bell Ringer one day..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_33\".m_mContent: "Ah! But Master Van Helsing is so much stronger than I am. If I ever did become one, then he would surely..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_36\".m_mContent: "Did you just give us new orders, my Lady? We're not sure we understood..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_38\".m_mContent: "Regarding the Mistbound Terror—report it to the Church and ensure a full investigation."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_39\".m_mContent: "Understood, Lady Selena! Will you not return with us?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_40\".m_mContent: "I... I need to meet with a friend."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_41\".m_mContent: "Silver-Haired! I've successfully completed the plan—what about you?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_43\".m_mContent: "Owner, where's the silver-haired guest who was staying here?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_46\".m_mContent: "Said he’d be busy tonight—told me to let anyone looking for him or Miss Ami know to return tomorrow."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_47\".m_mContent: "What important business could he possibly have without me? Wait... am I not his companion?!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_48\".m_mContent: "...Did they leave me behind again? No, no—Silver-Haired would never do that..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip04_49\".m_mContent: "W-wait... is that an undercurrent over there?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_02\".m_mContent: "I'll pass. I have no use for anything that dulls the mind or weakens the will, and this place isn't entirely safe either."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_03\".m_mContent: "As expected of Lord Isaac—the true heir of Sapphire Isle!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_04\".m_mContent: "Such resilient will, such unshakable spirit, such a flawless physique—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_05\".m_mContent: "Quick! Someone get Lord Isaac another coconut juice!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_07\".m_mContent: "Me? I'm Joyce—the famous and beloved mascot of Sapphire Isle!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_08\".m_mContent: "How tragic... Poor Joyce works twenty-three hours a day, bringing joy and impeccable service to our dear visitors, and yet Lord Isaac doesn't even know my name..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_09\".m_mContent: "Why did you help me just now?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_10\".m_mContent: "Well... you see, Sapphire Isle hides a tremendous secret..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_12\".m_mContent: "Hey! This is the part where you ask what is this secret about!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_13\".m_mContent: "Actually... there's a rumor whispered among the Seven Sages. That a mysterious... Master is pulling the strings behind everything on the Isle!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_14\".m_mContent: "I didn't ask, and yet here you are, telling me anyway."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_15\".m_mContent: "How does the Master control everyone? Who is the Master? Would you care to take a guess?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_16\".m_mContent: "The answer is simple. Sapphire Isle, as it stands, is ruled by the Seven Sages—wealthy beyond measure. If your story holds any truth, this Master must possess a kind of commodity that wealth alone cannot buy."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_17\".m_mContent: "Wow! There are actually things in this world that money can't buy? What are they? What are they?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_18\".m_mContent: "Things like time. Love. Or perhaps... eternal life."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_19\".m_mContent: "Eternal life?! That's absurd! You must be joking!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_20\".m_mContent: "...And yet, if such a thing did exist—I might buy it too."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_22\".m_mContent: "You must think it's one of the Seven Sages too, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_23\".m_mContent: "Possibly. But if they truly exist... What are they after? What's worth orchestrating all this—here, on the Isle?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_24\".m_mContent: "Joyce doesn't know what the Master wants. But Joyce? Joyce wants freedom! Joyce wants fairness!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_25\".m_mContent: "Joyce heard it—Lord Isaac is the true heir of Sapphire Isle! The most righteous member of the Silver Cross!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_26\".m_mContent: "If you overthrow the Master and claim your rightful place—Then maybe..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_28\".m_mContent: "...only need to work eight hours a day!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_30\".m_mContent: "First—I have no interest in becoming the heir to any territory."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_31\".m_mContent: "Second—I have no interest in guaranteeing basic welfare for dolls, nor do I see any reason to be dragged into the spotlight for such things."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_32\".m_mContent: "But... Lord Hallon gave you a potion refined from the Siren's Tear! If you don't become the ruler of the Isle and gather the Tears to break the illusion..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_33\".m_mContent: "Your mind and will shall be paralyzed forever! Isn't that enough for you to get moving?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_34\".m_mContent: "That would be... troublesome. Answer one question for me and I might consider working with you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_35\".m_mContent: "Ask away, Lord Isaac! Uncover every thread of Joyce, down to the last bit of cotton stuffing!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_36\".m_mContent: "Where did you overhear that I'm the heir to Sapphire Isle?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_37\".m_mContent: "Outside Lord Hallon's office! That person said he was one of only two survivors of the tsunami eleven years ago. That he would keep Lord Hallon constantly on guard!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_39\".m_mContent: "Lord Constantine—the last of the Seven Sages!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_40\".m_mContent: "But... Lord Constantine has been awfully busy with something lately. Joyce hasn't seen him in quite some time..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_41\".m_mContent: "Lady Alexis, this is where we found that strange device!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_42\".m_mContent: "We haven't identified who placed it or what it does. No one's dared to move it without orders."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_43\".m_mContent: "This isn't... I understand. Return to your posts—I'll handle it from here."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_44\".m_mContent: "Shall we search the area for suspicious individuals, Lady Alexis?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_47\".m_mContent: "This is clearly our device—one that uses Siren's Tears to produce crimson mist. Anyone caught in the hallucinations shouldn't even be able to see it..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_48\".m_mContent: "Someone tampered with them? But only the Seven Sages knew these existed..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_49\".m_mContent: "Aside from Lorelei... There are rats... hiding in our midst."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_50\".m_mContent: "I have to tell Alexa about this!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_51\".m_mContent: "Has Constantine's Siren's Tear been replaced? Which of the other six tampered with it?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_52\".m_mContent: "A sweet essence slithers like a sea serpent in hiding, coiling through every nerve, severing each signal from brain to limb. From this moment on, you need not trouble yourself with life's burdens, love's failures, or the work left unfinished after twenty-three relentless hours."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_53\".m_mContent: "What more is there for your mind to ponder?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_58\".m_mContent: "Yes... Loyalty to the great and omnipotent Master—that is the only, and final, thought in your mind."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_60\".m_mContent: "It's stronger... more aggressive than anything from Constantine's experiments. Is someone trying to turn every human on the Isle into their puppet?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_61\".m_mContent: "No. That’s not what matters now. We must destroy the Master."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_62\".m_mContent: "I can't save everyone. Only my dearest kin... And you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_65\".m_mContent: "Little Bella, what are you doing?! That's our precious treasure—we earned it together after defeating all those opponents!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_66\".m_mContent: "We didn't actually defeat Noah. He held back."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_67\".m_mContent: "And this stone... it's already helped me recall fragments of the promise. It's time to return it. He needs it far more than I do."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_68\".m_mContent: "But Little Bella... I need to sell it on the black market for money!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_69\".m_mContent: "You always waste money you didn't earn on things that don't matter."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_70\".m_mContent: "Little Bella... you really shouldn't be so brutally honest with people you've only just met..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_71\".m_mContent: "Ah... so you haven't known each other long..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_72\".m_mContent: "You mentioned earlier that you need to collect all the Siren's Tears, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_73\".m_mContent: "I have another one. You should take it too."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_74\".m_mContent: "What?! You're giving that one to him as well?!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_75\".m_mContent: "Thank you... May I ask—where did this Siren's Tear come from?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_76\".m_mContent: "Earlier, someone attacked me for no reason—so I acted in self-defense."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_77\".m_mContent: "By the way, that peculiar someone happened to be Sage Alexa—The same Sage who fined my stall thirteen times."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_78\".m_mContent: "If I understand correctly... each Siren's Tear helps you recall part of the promise, right?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_79\".m_mContent: "So you're suggesting I'll need to collect all the Siren's Tears to recover my memories about the promise—including where it was made?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_80\".m_mContent: "Come to think of it, I did faint by the roadside when I woke up... And what you described sounds exactly like what I experienced."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_82\".m_mContent: "Little Bella! If that's the case—I know where the next one is!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_85\".m_mContent: "Isn't that Sage Alexis, heading this way? The same one who rejected my open-air performance permit fifty-three times!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_86\".m_mContent: "There are no guards with her—quick, let's teach her a less—No, I mean... let's liberate the Siren's Tear she's holding!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_89\".m_mContent: "There's something important... I have to tell Alexa... Wait..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_92\".m_mContent: "That instrument we heard in the city—the one at the church."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_93\".m_mContent: "Oh, you mean that large, elegant one?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_95\".m_mContent: "We rarely get to see instruments like that, don't we?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_96\".m_mContent: "That's alright. I memorized how the musician played it."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_97\".m_mContent: "With this motion, it makes an "ahh" sound."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_98\".m_mContent: "One day, when you sing, I'll play beside you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_99\".m_mContent: "You remembered it after hearing it once? As expected of Sapphire Isle's greatest genius."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_101\".m_mContent: "When we practice, let's do it in that old ship by the shore."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_102\".m_mContent: "That ship's too old. It might be dangerous."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_103\".m_mContent: "I found a safe path. Just follow the <style=Highlight>Tidewisp markers</style> and avoid the damaged areas."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_104\".m_mContent: "Very well. From now on, we'll meet there."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_105\".m_mContent: "When we grow up, you'll be the most famous singer on the continent—and I'll be a renowned clavichord player."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_107\".m_mContent: "My brother once said his dream was to become the most righteous tailor on the continent."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_108\".m_mContent: "That curly-headed boy had dreams like that...?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip05_113\".m_mContent: "We'll present this evidence to Mr. Van Helsing."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_02\".m_mContent: "Have you made progress in your investigation?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_03\".m_mContent: "Any shift in the Isle has already fallen within your expectations."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_04\".m_mContent: "The newly appointed Sage of Sapphire Isle—the one they all looked up to—has just ordered..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_07\".m_mContent: "Mr. Viktor Thoreau, Miss Alexa, and Miss Alexis. All fell by her hand... or rather, by the blade of Mr. Nevernight."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_08\".m_mContent: "Constantine and Robin von Quinn, still missing, were likely his victims as well. And then... Lorelei, killed in broad daylight. Among the Seven Sages..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_10\".m_mContent: "T-This can't be... I'm the only one left?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_11\".m_mContent: "To think, after more than a decade—Sapphire Isle faces another wave of chaos..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_12\".m_mContent: "This man, Noah, must not be underestimated. He poses a grave threat."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_13\".m_mContent: "If we allow him to continue moving freely through the Isle, everything you've built... could collapse in an instant."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_15\".m_mContent: "Why not issue a warrant across the Isle? Let every resident aid us in rooting out this danger."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_16\".m_mContent: "No! If word spreads that so many of the Seven Sages have been struck down, it will cause panic!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_17\".m_mContent: "Then we won't write it that way."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_18\".m_mContent: "According to the results of an urgent overnight investigation by the Association, Miss Ami, the newly elected Sage, was found to be secretly colluding with the Mistbound Terror. Their alliance fractured during the election."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_19\".m_mContent: "Strip her of her Sage title. Then issue a warrant across the Isle—for the arrest of Ami, and her subordinate, Noah. What do you think, Mr. Van Helsing?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_21\".m_mContent: "Lord Hallon, you are the head of Sapphire Isle Seven Sages. Who would dare question your word?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_22\".m_mContent: "Since the Isle's reconstruction, the Sage Council has always stood for fairness—justice!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_23\".m_mContent: "This is a moment that decides the Isle's fate, Lord Hallon. Where is the resolve and clarity you once showed?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_24\".m_mContent: "Are you... planning to turn your back?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_29\".m_mContent: "If tonight... things spiral beyond control... Go to the Church. Contact an old friend of mine. Bell Ringer Albrecht."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_30\".m_mContent: "The Bell Ringer...? Truly, Mr. Van Helsing—your connections are enviable. I understand."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_31\".m_mContent: "Very good. You've carried out the Master's command."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_32\".m_mContent: "You—! Weren't you supposed to be dead?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_33\".m_mContent: "So it's true... The Master really does possess the means to grant eternal life. Then he'll keep his promise as well, won't he?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_34\".m_mContent: "Let me reclaim my youth with my son's body."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_35\".m_mContent: "The faithful who keep their vows shall receive their answer."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_36\".m_mContent: "This path of transformation... Far more tempting than becoming one of the Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_37\".m_mContent: "Disgraceful. If anyone deserves a fate worse than a demon's in hell—it's you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_38\".m_mContent: "You're one to talk. Didn't you rise again in that freshly dredged corpse?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_39\".m_mContent: "Then... Would you be so kind as to take me to the Master?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_40\".m_mContent: "The promised place... it's just over there."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_41\".m_mContent: "And somehow... I can see the next Siren's Tear is there too."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_42\".m_mContent: "Then let us set forth—toward our objective!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_43\".m_mContent: "Before we go... I have one more question."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_45\".m_mContent: "When we defeated Alexis just now—did you see those threads you mentioned earlier? On her head?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_47\".m_mContent: "If I'm not mistaken, there must be a connection between those invisible "threads"... and the Siren's Tear."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_48\".m_mContent: "Attention, Isle residents! By order of the Seven Sage Association, a warrant has been issued. If you see the suspects shown, report immediately."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_49\".m_mContent: "Attention! All citizens, be advised—Wanted criminals Ami and Noah have been sighted... Wait!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_50\".m_mContent: "That man over there... isn't that the one from the poster?!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_52\".m_mContent: "The person in the wanted poster... really does look like you. It says Ami and Noah are accomplices of the Mistbound Terror."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_54\".m_mContent: "You've never heard about the Mistbound Terror? It's today's biggest headline!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_55\".m_mContent: "During the Sage Selection Assembly, a candidate named Ami exposed the true identity of a bloodthirsty fiend. A killer who roamed the Isle under the cover of night and mist, draining victims dry!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_56\".m_mContent: "And for her heroism, Miss Ami was unanimously chosen as the new Sage! Such a thrilling tale... it will be the plot of my next play!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_57\".m_mContent: "Then why is Miss Ami on the wanted poster?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_58\".m_mContent: "Oh right—what does the poster say again...?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_59\".m_mContent: "Ami, Noah, and the Mistbound Terror were secretly in league... but now they've turned on each other?! Wait... you're one of the Mistbound Terror's accomplices? No wonder you fought so fiercely. Little Bella, we must apprehend him immediately!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_61\".m_mContent: "He's more skilled than I am—easily strong enough to defeat other Sages—and yet, he lent me the Siren's Tear and listened to everything I had to say. He's not the monster that poster makes him out to be."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_63\".m_mContent: "Little Bella! You shouldn't trust strangers so easily!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_64\".m_mContent: "If we're talking about who looks suspicious... It's definitely you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_66\".m_mContent: "The one I need to awaken with the seven Siren's Tears... is Ami. She's the other person on that wanted poster. Whoever issued that warrant is trying to stop me from doing so."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_67\".m_mContent: "Then this is part of your promise too, isn't it?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_68\".m_mContent: "We don't have time to worry about the warrant. Let's head to the promised place. For your promise... and for the Siren's Tears."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_70\".m_mContent: "The road ahead... you'll have to walk it alone, Little Bella. This is as far as I go."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_72\".m_mContent: "No, no—my back gave out in the last battle! For the sake of your grand mission, you must... leave me behind!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_73\".m_mContent: "I won't hold it against you—Little Bella, Silver-Haired Boy."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_74\".m_mContent: "I see... Then why did you hide the wanted poster?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_75\".m_mContent: "Surely you wouldn't stoop to snitching like some shameless adult?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_76\".m_mContent: "No, no, you've got it all wrong! How could I ever do such a thing? We've been through so much—we're friends now, aren't we? I mean, it’s not every day you get to befriend someone worth five million Soli..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_77\".m_mContent: "That's fine. If you do decide to snitch, I'll be sure to tell them all about your heroic exploits. How you helped us thoroughly defeat the Sages."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_78\".m_mContent: "H-Hey! That was your doing! I didn't lift a finger—!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_80\".m_mContent: "Fine, Little Bella—I promise. No snitching. But I really can't take another step right now."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_82\".m_mContent: "I swear on my honor as a troupe owner!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_83\".m_mContent: "This is where we part, Little Bella... It's been a real pleasure working with you today."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_85\".m_mContent: "You still owe me twenty Soli for that investigation fee..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_86\".m_mContent: "I enjoyed working with you too. And I'll remember everything you've said."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_87\".m_mContent: "Debts must be paid, and promises must be kept—no matter what."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_88\".m_mContent: "Thank goodness I managed to shake them off. A troupe owner has no business running around with wanted criminals..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_89\".m_mContent: "Hey, back off! What if someone sees us?!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_92\".m_mContent: "The script is on track—just as planned. Time for us to move backstage."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip06_93\".m_mContent: "Come, Jacintha. Most beautiful... and most graceful of all."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_01\".m_mContent: "Up ahead... that should be the meeting place in my memories."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_02\".m_mContent: "To think a place like this hides an old, broken ship..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_03\".m_mContent: "And it was your chosen meeting spot. If you hadn't brought me here, no one would've ever noticed it."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_04\".m_mContent: "My friend was shipwrecked here last year. She and many others ended up stranded—and eventually settled here."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_05\".m_mContent: "A shipwreck... here, a year ago? Strange. I haven't heard anyone else mention it."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_06\".m_mContent: "Looks like she redecorated while I was sick."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_07\".m_mContent: "Polished railings... tasteless flooring... and—torture devices? Either her taste has taken a strange turn... or my memories of her are still incomplete."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_08\".m_mContent: "So much has changed in the isle in just a single month..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_09\".m_mContent: "Sapphire Isle truly has no shortage of surprises—auction houses, Association-hosted fashion contests, promotional tournaments..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_10\".m_mContent: "Even by continental standards, these are remarkably novel ideas. No wonder the place is flooded with tourists."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_11\".m_mContent: "Tourists...? But isn't Sapphire Isle... just a dull, forgotten place?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_12\".m_mContent: "Strange, isn't it? I was recently told that Sapphire Isle used to be impoverished..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_13\".m_mContent: "But that was eleven years ago. After a tsunami struck, the Seven Sages funded its reconstruction... And turned the Isle into a coastal paradise."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_14\".m_mContent: "Paradise? Why would Sapphire Isle become a paradise? And what tsunami? What Seven Sages? Isn't Uncle Averdin still the lord of this place?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_15\".m_mContent: "The isle is currently governed by an association—formed by the Sapphire Isle Seven Sages."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_16\".m_mContent: "I've never heard of any 'Seven Sages.' And I don't remember a tsunami..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_17\".m_mContent: "As for the tsunami... There's a memorial garden dedicated to the victims of the 1342 disaster. It's in the southwest corner of the isle."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_18\".m_mContent: "1342...? But that's... wait, what year is it now?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_20\".m_mContent: "1353...? Eleven years later? Then I haven't been asleep for just a month... It's been eleven years...?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_23\".m_mContent: "What about Father? Uncle? Those who took care of me? And..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_24\".m_mContent: "And most of all... Do I still have a chance to fulfill that promise...?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_25\".m_mContent: "She can't still be waiting for me... Wait—Is there... is there a renowned singer named Lorelei anywhere on the continent?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_26\".m_mContent: "Lorelei... I don't recall any singer by that name. But, today—that name..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_27\".m_mContent: "Hey! Isn't that Noah from the wanted poster? He's walked right into our hands—seize him!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_29\".m_mContent: "Take the dilapidated door on the left."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_29a\".m_mContent: "Much of this ship is falling apart. But if we follow the markers Lorelei and I agreed upon, we can avoid the traps."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_30\".m_mContent: "Take the middle door marked with the Tidewisp marker."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_30a\".m_mContent: "Even after eleven years... the promised markers still guide the way."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_31\".m_mContent: "Take the yellow door on the right."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_32\".m_mContent: "Take the door on the left marked with the Tidewisp marker."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_33\".m_mContent: "Take the green door in the middle."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_33a\".m_mContent: "I told you the markers were important. Clearly you weren't paying attention."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_34\".m_mContent: "Take the worn door on the right."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_35\".m_mContent: "As expected from the one who killed Lorelei... We can't stop him—report to Lord Hallon!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_37\".m_mContent: "I know what you want to ask, Miss Bella. But not everything is as it seems."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_39\".m_mContent: "Please, come in, Lord Isaac. Lord Constantine hasn't returned for awhile, so the place is currently unguarded."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_40\".m_mContent: "Why would you go to such lengths to find him?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_41\".m_mContent: "A truth I thought was lost forever... With his appearance, new threads have begun to surface."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_42\".m_mContent: "Oh—Joyce doesn't understand a word of that!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_44\".m_mContent: "Then I shall stand guard at the door—to protect Lord Isaac!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_45\".m_mContent: "How does Hallon tolerate this thing working beside him twenty-three hours a day..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_47a\".m_mContent: "Now, let's carefully examine this area. <style=Highlight>Tap on anything unusual</style> to uncover clues. Tap the <style=Highlight>Notice</style> in the top-right corner whenever you need guidance."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_47c\".m_mContent: "I've already seen it, no need to waste more time."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_48\".m_mContent: "Constantine's work involved experiments and dissections on sirens. Through extensive research on their blood, he extracted a hallucinogenic compound known as Siren's Tears. That must be what Hallon used on me."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_49\".m_mContent: "Even now, my mind still reels with bouts of disorientation."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_50\".m_mContent: "Constantine spent nearly half of every month inside the prison, devoting himself to siren experimentation."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_51\".m_mContent: "Three weeks ago, he began frequently rotating the number of sirens held across various facilities."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_52\".m_mContent: "Officially, it was to 'reduce the risk of organized resistance among the slaves.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_53\".m_mContent: "Last week's experiment log was completed by his assistant. Only routine data is recorded."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_54\".m_mContent: "'I received no notice that you've completed the experiment, nor do I know when you left. I submitted this report of my own accord in hopes it would help track your experiment's progress.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_55\".m_mContent: "An unsent letter: 'Lord Albrecht, my research has reached a critical juncture, but my situation is now extremely perilous. Perhaps you could help me escape from the bay—I plan to...'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_56\".m_mContent: "The text ends abruptly—likely an abandoned cry for help. Its author may not have survived."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_58\".m_mContent: "Constantine must have realized he was in danger. He found a way to vanish—evading the Sages, slipping out of sight within the isle."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_59\".m_mContent: "According to the report, his final experiment took place three days ago. That day's log was written by his assistant. He likely disappeared shortly after."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_60\".m_mContent: "No one saw Constantine leave the prison. If he's still there... then why hasn't he been found?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_61\".m_mContent: "He spent years studying sirens. He would know their anatomy, their behavior—everything. Could it be..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_62\".m_mContent: "The most dangerous place is often the safest. If he's still alive, then he's hiding among the sirens, in the prison."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_63\".m_mContent: "Lord Isaac, did you find anything? Do you know where Lord Constantine is?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_65\".m_mContent: "Hmm... no matter! Joyce will go search for more clues right away. Please wait here a moment, Lord Isaac!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_66\".m_mContent: "...It seems someone else has been sneaking around the ship."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_67\".m_mContent: "If it weren't for you lot, that damn prisoner would never have escaped!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_68\".m_mContent: "Since you're so concerned about my departure... I've returned."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_69\".m_mContent: "This smell... They were tortured—more savagely than before."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_73\".m_mContent: "They're Black Blood creatures. Twisted beyond recognition. They could barely string a coherent sentence. Why do I care what they think?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_74\".m_mContent: "It feels as if... as if we were once 'friends'. No... something deeper—'family'."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_75\".m_mContent: "This scent of blood... That same scent again..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_76\".m_mContent: "Father… what's happening to you? Why… why do you have a fish tail too? Please wake up, Father!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_78\".m_mContent: "That's just a monster wearing his face! Don't look back… just run!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_80\".m_mContent: "He devoured Mother… he devoured everyone… He's a monster..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_81\".m_mContent: "I… I have to protect them. I have to defeat the monster."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_82\".m_mContent: "This memory… I remember now. I was the one who killed..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_83\".m_mContent: "You finally remember. But… the truth may not be so simple."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip07_88\".m_mContent: "Lord Isaac is keeping secrets from Joyce!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_01\".m_mContent: "You're Constantine. The other survivor of the catastrophe from eleven years ago... aren't you?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_03\".m_mContent: "Then again, it's been eleven years. We're not who we were back then."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_04\".m_mContent: "So you do know me. You were there—when my father died."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_05\".m_mContent: "Is that what you've been chasing all this time? The truth behind your father's death?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_06\".m_mContent: "I lost not just my father that day. I lost my past too."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_07\".m_mContent: "You've forgotten what happened? No wonder. That tragedy... it was too much for a child to shoulder."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_08\".m_mContent: "Which is why I must face it now—as the man I've become."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_09\".m_mContent: "You're just like him. But I'm afraid the isle is now ruled by your uncle, Hallon."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_10\".m_mContent: "In this new order, sentiment means nothing. What matters now is leverage. Transaction."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_11\".m_mContent: "Then tell me—What must I give to learn the truth?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_15\".m_mContent: "Don't think this means you've won. The Master already knows you're here."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_16\".m_mContent: "He's long since mastered the art of resurrection. And he wants you to know, that girl from eleven years ago… she's still alive."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_17\".m_mContent: "She's alive...? That's impossible! Where is she?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_18\".m_mContent: "If you want her location, then tell us the formula for Siren's Tear."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_19\".m_mContent: "What really happened that day, Constantine? It looks to me like a part of you died in that disaster, too."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_20\".m_mContent: "Has it only been eleven years...? It feels like a lifetime ago..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_21\".m_mContent: "But to understand how it all began... we must go back twenty years."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_22\".m_mContent: "To the day we all lost the ones we loved most..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_23\".m_mContent: "What ails my wife?! How could she have... faded so quickly?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_24\".m_mContent: "We don't know... none of us do. My grandmother, my aunt… they all succumbed to the same affliction."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_26\".m_mContent: "So it is hereditary after all... My daughter..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_28\".m_mContent: "I can't save my sister... But I can still save her child!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_29\".m_mContent: "But fate offered me a glimmer of hope—Thirteen years ago, a shipwreck struck near the isle. I suppose you've forgotten that too?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_30\".m_mContent: "As luck would have it... Those two years are precisely what I've lost from memory."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_31\".m_mContent: "That disaster brought with it the sirens. They're now imprisoned. They agreed to help the fishermen—catching fish, gathering pearls—in exchange for supplies."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_32\".m_mContent: "Your father, then lord of the isle, allowed them to settle in the coastal waters, since they could no longer return to their homeland."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_33\".m_mContent: "And not long after… he married one of them. Do you remember? You have a siren sister. Her name is Lorelei."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_34\".m_mContent: "Before I arrived, I looked into the Seven Sages—one of them bears that name. But I don't remember ever having a sister called Lorelei."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_35\".m_mContent: "It seems you've forgotten all about them."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_36\".m_mContent: "I stumbled upon a discovery. Siren blood could ease the pain caused by the disease. After that, Hallon began helping me imprison them..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_38\".m_mContent: "You call that saving people? You used those inhumane methods..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_39\".m_mContent: "You're right to loathe us. Maybe it was retribution. Just as the research showed promise, my sister's daughter… her condition suddenly took a turn for the worse."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_40\".m_mContent: "Hallon brought her to the lab, demanded I try the incomplete treatment. I had no choice. It was our only hope."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_41\".m_mContent: "The procedure lasted through the night. Before I could examine her, Hallon forced me to flee the basement."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_42\".m_mContent: "And what I saw... was a living hell."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_44\".m_mContent: "We argued, and… I dropped your reagent vial. He was exposed to it."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_45\".m_mContent: "What?! That vial contained Black Blood extracted from the Sirens!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_46\".m_mContent: "What do we do now? If this continues, what will become of the isle?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_47\".m_mContent: "It's over... everything's ruined. And it's all Averdin's fault!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_48\".m_mContent: "If he hadn't followed me—If he hadn't stopped me—She was his niece too! Why couldn't he sacrifice those damn Sirens?!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_49\".m_mContent: "My daughter... We have to get her out of here!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_50\".m_mContent: "So this... is the truth of what happened back then."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_51\".m_mContent: "Not all of it. Fate is cruel... For what awaited us when we returned to the basement... were torn garments and severed limbs, left behind by the Blood Beast."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_52\".m_mContent: "All those years of experiments—meant to save her... Yet in the end, it was my experiments that killed her."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_53\".m_mContent: "My mind was numb. Hallon pulled me away and we left the isle. Not long after, the Church dispatched the Bell Ringer. And a tidal wave came—'cleansing' the isle completely."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_54\".m_mContent: "No wonder Master Albrecht said I was barely alive when he found me."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_56\".m_mContent: "Master Albrecht saved me. He gave me back my 'life.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_57\".m_mContent: "So you walk beside the Bell Ringer now... Good. Like your father, you carry grand ideals—and boundless potential."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_58\".m_mContent: "Unlike me. I'm nothing but a corpse, shuffling forward on borrowed time, driven by regret."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_59\".m_mContent: "If this were an Inquisition, I'd have shot you already."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_60\".m_mContent: "Your hatred is deserved. That's why I'm telling you everything. To lighten the weight on my conscience… and to let you know..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_61\".m_mContent: "Whatever it was you did back then, you did it only to ease your father's torment. He was consumed by the Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_63\".m_mContent: "I'm not like you. I don't need comfort. Only the truth."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_64\".m_mContent: "Then allow me… to change the terms of our deal."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_66\".m_mContent: "So this... is a Siren's song. Beautiful..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_67\".m_mContent: "Damn it—what did you just bite into?!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_68\".m_mContent: "I created the first Siren's Tear. It's what the Master desires above all else. And I'll never let hand it over..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_69\".m_mContent: "I still carry a Sage version of the Siren's Tear... Take it. Keep it far from the Master's reach."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip08_72\".m_mContent: "See her again—only when you can do so as a human."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_01\".m_mContent: "The guards said you killed Lorelei. Is that true?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_02\".m_mContent: "Miss Bella, there's more to this story..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_03\".m_mContent: "Miss Lorelei asked me to aid her with a plan—to free her imprisoned kin."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_04\".m_mContent: "Her kin... I know, they were the sirens."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_05\".m_mContent: "But I never anticipated she had already planned her own death to give us a chance to reach and eliminate the Master behind the Seven Sages."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_06\".m_mContent: "Or perhaps… it was to give herself the chance to do it."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_08\".m_mContent: "It may be hard to believe, but when we met, I carried another Siren's Tear—given to me by Miss Lorelei, once a Sage herself."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_09\".m_mContent: "The Siren's Tear that belonged to Lorelei..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_10\".m_mContent: "Strange fragments of memory... began to surface in my mind…"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_13\".m_mContent: "I believe in Lorelei's plan, in the allies she chose, and in her strength... she won't die so easily."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_14\".m_mContent: "She will wait for me at the promised place, and we will meet again."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_15\".m_mContent: "After all, she is the genius of Sapphire Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_16\".m_mContent: "You're going to find the Master behind it all, aren't you? Then I shall head to the meeting place."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_18\".m_mContent: "Debts must be paid, and promises must be kept—no matter what. Noah, you will fulfill your promise to Lorelei, won't you?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_20\".m_mContent: "My eyes... they're getting wet... something is falling…"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_21\".m_mContent: "Lorelei must be alive, and I must... find our promised meeting place..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_22\".m_mContent: "In my memory... this isn't the place. Could it be this room?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_24\".m_mContent: "Lorelei, our 'ship' has changed, and so has Sapphire Isle..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_25\".m_mContent: "What has become of the Isle, that you were left with no choice but to become the 'Mistbound Terror'?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_26\".m_mContent: "Do you still sing those soothing songs? Or perhaps your life has been hollowed of music and forgotten dreams..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_27\".m_mContent: "Is she... Ami from the wanted poster?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_28\".m_mContent: "So she must be the companion Noah's been looking for, the one kidnapped by the Master..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_29\".m_mContent: "I must get her out of here… I must do something to fulfill what Lorelei sought to achieve."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_31\".m_mContent: "It's not even dawn yet, why is everyone being woken up so suddenly?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_33\".m_mContent: "Seems like there's been a lot of terrible lately..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_34\".m_mContent: "Haven't you heard? Isaac, the man Lord Hallon was after, escaped prison yesterday… then he was caught again!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_36\".m_mContent: "But he just attacked a prison guard and escaped one more time!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_38\".m_mContent: "I also heard that before he escaped, he killed Lord Constantine!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_40\".m_mContent: "Stop lazing around, we need to go catch him right now!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_42\".m_mContent: "Isaac… could he be Van Helsing? Selena said she couldn't find him anywhere—so he’s been here all along."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_43\".m_mContent: "And he even killed Constantine, one of the Seven Sages?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_44\".m_mContent: "Miss Bella mentioned there are more torture devices on the ship now, and with all these guards... Could the meeting place have been turned into the prison where the Sages keep their criminals and slaves?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_46\".m_mContent: "The remaining three Siren's Tears, the meeting place, and the Master behind it all... It seems all answers converge here."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_47\".m_mContent: "From what they're saying, it seems they've found Van Helsing. Let's follow them and see."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_48\".m_mContent: "We found him! Quick, take him to Lord Hallon for our reward—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_50\".m_mContent: "*sigh* I think I'll just go back to sleep..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_51\".m_mContent: "Should I pretend I didn't see you in such a pitiable state?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_52\".m_mContent: "Silver-haired...? Are you... another dream of mine?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_53\".m_mContent: "I'm deeply honored to be part of your dreams."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_54\".m_mContent: "It really is you... What brought you here?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_57\".m_mContent: "Ami has fallen into slumber due to the Master's schemes. I must gather all the Siren's Tears to awaken her."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_58\".m_mContent: "Ami... was she that maid on the ship?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_60\".m_mContent: "Thanks. So you really did kill Constantine."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_62\".m_mContent: "Three. As for the others—one lies with Ami, one's whereabouts remain unknown, and one is held by Hallon, leader of the Seven Sages."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_63\".m_mContent: "It seems we'll be working together again… for now."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_64\".m_mContent: "You're after Hallon too? I wonder… does it have anything to do with him being a Van Helsing as well?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_65\".m_mContent: "He stole this Isle from my father."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_67\".m_mContent: "If you wish to serve under me… I might consider it."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_68\".m_mContent: "Speaking of which, Selena, who serves under you, seemed to follow you here and has been searching for you ever since."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_69\".m_mContent: "If only she'd break that habit of stalking…"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_70\".m_mContent: "Lord Isaac, Joyce wasn't stalking you at all!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_71\".m_mContent: "Joyce rushed over after hearing about the commotion at the prison—Joyce thought Lord Isaac might be in danger!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_72\".m_mContent: "Aren't you the puppet from the auction?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_73\".m_mContent: "I'm Joyce! Joyce got a name! And this handsome silver-haired man... he must work for that extravagant lady, Ami!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_74\".m_mContent: "Miss Ami is wanted by Lord Hallon... so Miss Ami is Lord Hallon's enemy... And Lord Hallon is Lord Isaac's enemy... which means Miss Ami is the enemy's enemy..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_75\".m_mContent: "I'm impressed you're capable of such complex reasoning."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_76\".m_mContent: "Joyce understands now! You must be the enemy of Lord Isaac's enemy... which means lo—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_78\".m_mContent: "Stop thinking—you're not built for it. Just take us to Hallon already."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_79\".m_mContent: "Lord Isaac must have uncovered the truth! Could Lord Hallon… be the Master behind it all?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_80\".m_mContent: "Perhaps. Once we defeat him, we'll know."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_82\".m_mContent: "Isn't it too risky to confront Lord Hallon directly? Are you sure you don't need more preparation, Lord Isaac?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_84\".m_mContent: "Constantine must have told you about what happened back then."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_85\".m_mContent: "And now, fate has brought you here—and him to his destined end."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_86\".m_mContent: "It is time for you to face the long awaited judgment for your past deeds."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_88\".m_mContent: "Why must you be like your father, haunting me like a nightmare with your cursed sense of justice?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_89\".m_mContent: "It isn't us who haunt you, but your last shred of conscience."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_90\".m_mContent: "At first, I never meant to do evil. Everything I did was for her... I just wanted to keep her by my side..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_91\".m_mContent: "I understand… but I will never forgive you, Uncle."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_92\".m_mContent: "Since it has come to this, Isaac... will you grant me one final request, for the sake of our blood?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_93\".m_mContent: "I still have one deal to complete. I'm waiting—for the result, for 'him' to grant me one last glimpse of my daughter."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_94\".m_mContent: "Let me see her once, then I'll submit to whatever fate you choose for me."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip09_95\".m_mContent: "The one you've been dealing with is the 'Master,' isn't it?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_01\".m_mContent: "Come with me. We're going after the fugitives, Noah and Ami."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_02\".m_mContent: "No, they are now under Lord Hallon's command. He orders your immediate return to the ship."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_03\".m_mContent: "Impossible! Lord Hallon explicitly ordered us to erase all traces at the auction house!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_04\".m_mContent: "I have a wanted notice here, signed by Lord Hallon himself."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_05\".m_mContent: "I have a notice here, signed by Lord Hallon himself."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_06\".m_mContent: "I have a confidential letter here, signed by Lord Hallon himself."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_08\".m_mContent: "It's not me... It must be you two."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_09\".m_mContent: "Seems the disguise failed... in that case—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_12\".m_mContent: "You're free now. Quickly, get out of here!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_17\".m_mContent: "The Master has installed devices throughout the Isle that will turn everyone into puppets."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_18\".m_mContent: "Before the devices activate, get the one who saved you off the Isle.."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_19\".m_mContent: "No, we can't just leave like this."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_20\".m_mContent: "...You want to help the humans by dismantling those devices?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_21\".m_mContent: "Eleven years ago, humans helped us. Now, it is our turn to return the favor.."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_22\".m_mContent: "Hatred will become waves, devouring the future."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_23\".m_mContent: "Let us do what we believe is right, Lorelei."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_24\".m_mContent: "Who ordered you to bring Ami here?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_26\".m_mContent: "I don't believe you. Speak the truth, or this will be the end of you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_27\".m_mContent: "I'm Ginokio, and I never tell lies."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_28\".m_mContent: "You like the Adventures of Ginokio too?! Wait—I still can't let my guard down around you!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_29\".m_mContent: "I am indeed here to rescue Ami. And from your question, I'd say you are too, aren't you?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_30\".m_mContent: "Hey. That look... Are you judging me for my height?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_31\".m_mContent: "I've never implied anything. And your outfit... are you performing in a play?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_32\".m_mContent: "I'm only dressed like this because I owe a huge debt to some wine vendor... But this is not the point!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_33\".m_mContent: "You don't seem like someone with a trace of hostility or killing intent… So you couldn't possibly be the one who took Miss Ami from the silver-haired."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_35\".m_mContent: "What do you mean? You're with that silver-haired one as well?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_37\".m_mContent: "Here I thought the silver-haired one was like me—someone I could trust. How did he end up so popular and sociable?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_38\".m_mContent: "He doesn't seem particularly sociable, yet there's something captivating about him."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_39\".m_mContent: "Since you're with the silver-haired one, he must have already spoken of me. I am his most capable assistant and the foremost disciple of the Church's Silver Cross Van Helsing—Selena, the Deadly Arrow."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_40\".m_mContent: "That's quite a mouthful. Never heard of you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_43\".m_mContent: "Fine! The priority now is to follow my lead and rescue Miss Ami—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_46\".m_mContent: "Today, we shall make Sapphire Isle into an elysium."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_47\".m_mContent: "No matter what, we will always be Master's first and most cherished children."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_48\".m_mContent: "Damn, we couldn't get Miss Ami out before they arrived."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_49\".m_mContent: "Strange... they've been resurrected... and their strings have been restored as well..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_51\".m_mContent: "Noah and I defeated them before. Back then, I saw a string above their heads—one no one else could see. When we severed those strings, they collapsed, defeated."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_52\".m_mContent: "But somehow they've been resurrected, and the strings above them restored too."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_53\".m_mContent: "It's unsettling... You make it sound like we're surrounded by undying puppets..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_54\".m_mContent: "If they truly cannot die, what hope do we have of winning?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_55\".m_mContent: "Hmm... If we sever their strings at the same time, we might gain a brief window to escape with Ami as they fall."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_56\".m_mContent: "But to strike at two targets at once..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_57\".m_mContent: "Ahem! Don't forget that I am the silver-haired one's most capable assistant and the foremost disciple of the Church's Silver Cross Van Helsing—Selena, the Deadly Arrow."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_63\".m_mContent: "Follow the wind's breath, as shadows trace the mark."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_64\".m_mContent: "Run as you will, and my arrows follow like fate."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_65\".m_mContent: "Finally! Did you see it? Did you hear it?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_67\".m_mContent: "I've always wanted to say something cool like Master Albrecht—and today, I did!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_68\".m_mContent: "What are you waiting for? Help me get Miss Ami out of here!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_70\".m_mContent: "One day, we'll repair this ship and sail beyond the Isle, to explore the world."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_71\".m_mContent: "Yes. We'll journey to new places, travel far, and you can play the music you cherish."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_72\".m_mContent: "And more people will hear your beautiful songs!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_73\".m_mContent: "And then, you'll be the most famous singer on the continent—and I'll be a renowned clavichord player."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_75\".m_mContent: "Isaac once said his dream was to become the most righteous tailor on the continent."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_77\".m_mContent: "And as we sail, we'll help you and your kin find your home beneath the waves."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_78\".m_mContent: "I can welcome you to my home too."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_80\".m_mContent: "If we can't fulfill this promise this year, there's always the coming year, or the one after that..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip10_81\".m_mContent: "Be it the year we grow up or the year we rise to fame—this promise will one day come true."
