\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_02\".m_mContent: "Take whatever you want. These things are nothing but false visions of my daughter."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_03\".m_mContent: "After dawn, when the Master tells me my daughter's whereabouts, I won't need them anymore."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_04\".m_mContent: "Eleven years... I thought she was dead all this time. Let me see her once, then I'll submit to whatever fate you choose for me."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_05\".m_mContent: "I'm not the one who will decide your fate. When the sun rises, I will take you to meet your judgment."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_07\".m_mContent: "Joyce knows where Lord Hallon's daughter is."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_08\".m_mContent: "Joyce? What are you doing here? Shouldn't you be at the auction house?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_10\".m_mContent: "Lord Hallon's little Bella... has been with Joyce all along. Joyce took her from that laboratory the day you killed Lord Averdin."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_14\".m_mContent: "So Lord Hallon can rest easy and become a 'boring' father."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_16\".m_mContent: "I should never let my guard down. I suspected they might be the Master behind it all, but how could an ordinary 'human' move so fast?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_17\".m_mContent: "Ta-da! Joyce and Joyce's puppets are no ordinary humans!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_18\".m_mContent: "Joyce loves it when Lord Isaac praises Joyce like that! Please, give Joyce more praise!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_19\".m_mContent: "So, this is the Master Lorelei has been seeking all this time?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_20\".m_mContent: "Lorelei? Don't even mention that wretched woman! How dare she free all those little slaves behind Joyce's back!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_21\".m_mContent: "Without their blood, Joyce could barely control everyone and create Puppet Elysium on Sapphire Isle!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_22\".m_mContent: "Good thing the silver-haired one helped Joyce kill her. Thank you, detective!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_23\".m_mContent: "Those behind you, I suppose they're your puppets?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_24\".m_mContent: "Correct! Joyce has already replaced all the Sages with puppets, except for Lord Constantine, who's still in hiding, and the ever-troublesome Lord Hallon..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_25\".m_mContent: "It's such a relief that Lord Isaac made it to the Isle! He assisted Joyce in resolving the final issue."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_27\".m_mContent: "Thanks to the silver-haired one, Joyce's servant! A simple trap was all it took, and you fell for it, helping Joyce collect every last one of the Siren's Tears!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_28\".m_mContent: "Help you? Why would he hand over those Siren's Tears?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_29\".m_mContent: "Did Joyce ever mention that the Siren's Tears needed to be handed over to Joyce?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_30\".m_mContent: "Joyce has transformed all of Lord Hallon's cheerful touring devices on the Sapphire Isle into Joyce's Elysium devices."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_31\".m_mContent: "These devices are spread throughout the Isle, and their control center is this very ship! Once all the Siren's Tears gather here..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_33\".m_mContent: "Oh no, from now on Lord Isaac will call Joyce—Master!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_34\".m_mContent: "This smoke... has turned the crew and guards into string puppets."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_35\".m_mContent: "The desire to control life, hmph, no less insane than the Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_36\".m_mContent: "Don't look at me when you say that."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_38\".m_mContent: "They haven't adapted to their new bodies yet... Joyce's precious puppets are suffering so much... *sob*"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_39\".m_mContent: "Fighting is bad! Why don't we make a deal with Joyce instead?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_40\".m_mContent: "Ser-, I mean, Sir Silver-haired! Surely you haven't forgotten that Joyce still has your master, Miss Ami?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_41\".m_mContent: "Betray Lord Isaac, and Joyce will ensure Miss Ami is returned to you. That's a promise!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_42\".m_mContent: "Lord Isaac or Miss Ami... who will it be, Lord Silver-haired?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_43\".m_mContent: "You expect me to trust you for mere words?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_44\".m_mContent: "Puppets, bring Miss Ami here at once!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_46\".m_mContent: "Sir Isaac, I've finally found you! I'm coming to save you!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_47\".m_mContent: "I don't need saving. I'm not in any danger."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_48\".m_mContent: "Sir Isaac, rest assured. I'm coming down for you now!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_49\".m_mContent: "Wait! Bella No. 7, you're back! Joyce thought you were gone forever!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_51\".m_mContent: "Joyce remembers every single puppet perfectly! Joyce gave each of them a unique name—that's how special bonds between friends are made!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_52\".m_mContent: "But how did Bella No. 7 wake up? Ugh! It must be that wicked woman Lorelei's doing! No wonder she was asking Joyce all those strange questions..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_53\".m_mContent: "Noah, is this the person you need to defeat to fulfill your promise to Lorelei?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_55\".m_mContent: "Stop copying Joyce! You're ruining Joyce's cute mannerisms!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_56\".m_mContent: "I remember now... The promise I wanted to keep was to set sail on a great ship with Lorelei, to help her people find their homeland."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_57\".m_mContent: "So this's an enemy to both Lorelei and myself. Noah, I'll fight alongside you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_58\".m_mContent: "What I failed to achieve eleven years ago, I will finish today, no matter the cost."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_59\".m_mContent: "Bella No. 7, don't look at Joyce as your enemy... it makes Joyce so sad..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_60\".m_mContent: "Since Ami is already here, it seems your deal has failed."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_61\".m_mContent: "Where did it all go wrong? How did Joyce's perfect plan end up like this?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_62\".m_mContent: "It's okay... Even though there were some mishaps, everything is still under control! Now that all the Siren's Tears are gathered here, Joyce can transform even more puppets—you stand no chance of victory!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_63\".m_mContent: "Everyone in Sapphire Isle shall become Joyce's puppets!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_65\".m_mContent: "The next device... is it up ahead?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_66\".m_mContent: "The devices which the sirens asked me to dismantle—were they tools of their suffering, or the fetters that held them captive within the Isle?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_67\".m_mContent: "I cannot comprehend their language, nor can I fathom their thoughts. But their eyes speak volumes—these devices must be destroyed."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_68\".m_mContent: "In keeping with my promise to Lorelei and Miss Ami, I shall dismantle every last one."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_69\".m_mContent: "Now that all the Siren's Tears are gathered here, Joyce can transform even more puppets!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_72\".m_mContent: "Everyone in Sapphire Isle shall become Joyce's puppets!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_73\".m_mContent: "Go to the Isle! Get some fri——"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_76\".m_mContent: "They're no longer heading to another location. I suppose all the devices have been dismantled."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_77\".m_mContent: "The situation with the siren appears to be resolved. It is time I joined Noah."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip11_79\".m_mContent: "Fries aren't important—Prioritize Master Joyce... Protect Master Joyce!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_01\".m_mContent: "Boom! Boom! The thunderous march of the puppet army, surging forth from the Isle to shield Joyce!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_02\".m_mContent: "Clash! Clash! The fearless din of their weapons, striking with unyielding resolve!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_03\".m_mContent: "Clap! Clap! The resounding applause of the puppet army, celebrating their glorious victory!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_04\".m_mContent: "In truth, none of these sounds ever echo… Sapphire Isle remains lost in its sweet delusion, awaiting the break of dawn."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_05\".m_mContent: "Huh? Why is no one here to protect poor Joyce?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_06\".m_mContent: "Could someone have sabotaged Joyce's Elysium devices?! And the only one who knew about all the devices was that wretched Lorelei..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_07\".m_mContent: "Wasn't that vile woman supposed to be dead?! Curses! Joyce has been deceived! She must have faked her death!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_08\".m_mContent: "Things are bad, what Joyce must do is—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_09\".m_mContent: "Hmph, where you think you can run now?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_10\".m_mContent: "Well... Joyce will have to show everyone Joyce's masterpiece—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_11\".m_mContent: "That thing... it looks exactly like you..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_15\".m_mContent: "Why isn't it working?! Could the power of the Siren's Tear not be strong enough?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_16\".m_mContent: "Indeed, we're still missing one Siren's Tear."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_18\".m_mContent: "No, Ami, the new Sage, holds one. So there should be eight in total."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_19\".m_mContent: "Ugh... that silver-haired servant is utterly useless! Why can't he work as tirelessly as Joyce does?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_20\".m_mContent: "But that's fine. Do you know why Bella No. 13 is Joyce's masterpiece? Even with just one arm and a head remaining, she would fight on, for Joyce!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_22\".m_mContent: "Let's play! Joyce can keep this game going forever!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_23\".m_mContent: "This one is undying... Could this be the perfect life form that the Master has been seeking?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_24\".m_mContent: "Looks formidable... Could it have any weaknesses?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_26\".m_mContent: "Bella, what's happening? Why are you glowing?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_27\".m_mContent: "I'm fine, Selena. Please lend me your hand one more time."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_28\".m_mContent: "I see, you must have seen that 'string' again!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_29\".m_mContent: "Wait, why are you getting even colder?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_30\".m_mContent: "Stay focused... I'll lend you my strength too, aim here—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_32\".m_mContent: "Little Bella, how could you turn Joyce's own power against Joyce? That's so cruel!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_33\".m_mContent: "Bella No. 13, you are useless! You can't be down already—Rise again!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_34\".m_mContent: "Oh! Oh! Bella No. 13! You're burning up! You must be getting stronger! Quick, use your fire punch on them—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_36\".m_mContent: "As expected... Joyce should have used Bella No. 14 instead..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_37\".m_mContent: "Bella, you win! That's amazing! Please teach me how—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_39\".m_mContent: "Her life is draining... Such is the sorrowful fate of artificial life."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_41\".m_mContent: "She is merely the No. 7 puppet, a vessel of implanted memory fragments, endlessly repeating the behavioral patterns her Master left behind."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_42\".m_mContent: "Without her master, she returns to her original state—still, void of life."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_43\".m_mContent: "No, Bella chose her own fate. She was never merely a hollow puppet, tethered by strings."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_46\".m_mContent: "Aiona, you've arrived. The devices Joyce tried to activate just failed—was that your doing?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_47\".m_mContent: "Yes, I dismantled many devices alongside the sirens, but... I always believed they did it to reclaim their freedom."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_48\".m_mContent: "All this time, they were helping humans..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_49\".m_mContent: "Aiona, there's one more thing. If the puppet holds Bella's memory fragments from her life, could we bring her back?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_50\".m_mContent: "Resurrecting humans as Bloodborn depends on memories stored in blood. But her memories reside in an entirely different vessel..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_52\".m_mContent: "I knew it. You're no better than the Master. One day, I'll face you with my blade."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_53\".m_mContent: "Look... these glows are lifting... just like Tidewisps unfurling..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_57\".m_mContent: "You said when the promised place filled with blooming Tidewisps—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_60\".m_mContent: "No, it's I who's eleven years late. Please forgive me, Lorelei."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_61\".m_mContent: "Had I made it to our meeting place eleven years ago, to warn you of the imprisoned sirens and urge you to flee the Isle... perhaps all the pain you suffered could have been avoided."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_62\".m_mContent: "I'm the one who broke our promises... I promised to cure your illness, to let you play your cherished harp again, to sail with you under the sun, far beyond the Isle..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_63\".m_mContent: "I remember being killed by a Blood Beast, and you saved me, didn't you?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_64\".m_mContent: "I made a deal with the Master, hoping to save you, but I never imagined that would mean turning you into a puppet. I was told you were being treated..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_65\".m_mContent: "We couldn't keep our promises back then, but now, eleven years later, you've defeated the Master and saved my people."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_66\".m_mContent: "You've done your part, so now it's my turn. To save you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_67\".m_mContent: "You already did, Lorelei. That's why, after eleven years, destiny has guided us back to each other."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_68\".m_mContent: "The harp, the sunlight on the waves, the dream of being the continent's greatest musician—none of it was my dream. What I ever wanted was to live it all with you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_69\".m_mContent: "I feel the same way... So please, stay. I'll find the way—"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_70\".m_mContent: "As long as I live on in your memories, I'll never truly be gone."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_71\".m_mContent: "Return to the sea with your people, Lorelei. My longing will linger, as fireflies and stars, lighting your way home."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_72\".m_mContent: "Sing for me one last time, and I'll play along with you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_74\".m_mContent: "Oh no! Did we make it in time?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_75\".m_mContent: "Van Helsing?! What are you doing here? Didn't you say you were too busy for a vacation? Why did you come here alone in secret?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_76\".m_mContent: "So you just didn't want to do it with us?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_78\".m_mContent: "You haven't been honest with me either, have you? Or was coming to this ship part of your vacation plans all along?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_79\".m_mContent: "Oh, right! I almost forgot to give this to you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_80\".m_mContent: "We got this from someone who speaks in a way we couldn't understand. They wanted us to deliver it to you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_82\".m_mContent: "No wonder Joyce's secret weapon failed to activate."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_83\".m_mContent: "Now we have all of the Siren's Tears."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_84\".m_mContent: "Constantine's office houses all his research records. Hidden within them, there must be a way to purge the influence of Siren's Tear from Ami."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip12_85\".m_mContent: "Huh? Are we just leaving like this?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_01\".m_mContent: "What happened while I was unconscious? The Isle seems to have lost the unusual excitement it had when we first arrived."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_02\".m_mContent: "The Seven Sage Association has placed devices throughout the Isle that release small amounts of the Siren's Tear."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_03\".m_mContent: "Those who come here are overwhelmed by uncontrollable joy in their hallucinations."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_04\".m_mContent: "No wonder this place has risen to fame as a popular resort, despite lacking the support of any major families."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_05\".m_mContent: "Dawn is near. When the others wake, they'll likely notice these subtle changes as well."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_07\".m_mContent: "Congratulations to Sage Ami, graced with valor! Congratulations to Sage Ami, endowed with wisdom!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_08\".m_mContent: "Is this man out of his mind?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_09\".m_mContent: "Someone has already booked the ultra-grand celebration package for the new Sage's appointment."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_11\".m_mContent: "Well... it was one of the former Sages."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_13\".m_mContent: "She paid ahead of time, so of course, I provided the service."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_15\".m_mContent: "I have no need for such lavish ceremonies. You may leave."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_16\".m_mContent: "Ah, the person who made the reservation insisted that this gift be given to you, even if everything else was skipped."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_17\".m_mContent: "She said, 'It was salvaged along with some gaudy statue.’"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_19\".m_mContent: "A grotesquely carved wooden monster, its back marked with the words 'Captain is Family'—but family is not a title to be taken; it is a bond that must be acknowledged by all."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_22\".m_mContent: "He must have read my diary again."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_23\".m_mContent: "I drew him like this in my diary and wrote, 'Captain is evil.' He changed 'evil' to 'family.' Ugh, that man is so difficult..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_25\".m_mContent: "I heard from the wine merchant... You must be Miss Ami, the new Sage?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_26\".m_mContent: "I just went to see Lord Hallon, but the guards said... all the Sages were killed last night... Is that even possible?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_27\".m_mContent: "Wasn't the Mistbound Terror already dead? Is the Isle still safe? What happened last night?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_28\".m_mContent: "It's quite a long story... Miss Ami will tell you all about it."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_31\".m_mContent: "It's great to see Miss Ami back to her usual self."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_32\".m_mContent: "The other person affected by the Siren's Tear has probably recovered as well."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_33\".m_mContent: "That daze has faded away at last."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_34\".m_mContent: "Earlier, you called that glimmering object a Siren's Tear. But what are sirens? Are they truly here?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_35\".m_mContent: "If creatures like sirens do exist, shouldn't we report this to the Church right away, Van Helsing?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_36\".m_mContent: "Please, Sir, don't do this! We may not know everything, but it wasn't the sirens who caused the disaster—it was the humans who experimented on them."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_37\".m_mContent: "Besides... the sirens probably won't return to land again."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_38\".m_mContent: "Hesitation in the face of the Black Blood will only bring tragedy in the future."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_39\".m_mContent: "I know that if it were your friend—the silver-haired one—he would definitely grant freedom to the sirens."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_40\".m_mContent: "Besides, haven't you still chosen to be his friend, even though he's a Bloodborn?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_41\".m_mContent: "How did you end up getting involved with that person?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_42\".m_mContent: "He taught me many useful things. No wonder he can be your friend, Sir!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_43\".m_mContent: "Also, he told me about your [BEEP] has [BEEP][BEEP]. Is that true?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_44\".m_mContent: "Sir, why aren't you saying anything? Ah, this is bad, Sir! I forgot something very important!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_45\".m_mContent: "Is that about the only outfit that's... normal?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_46\".m_mContent: "It's just that... I accidentally got myself into a lot of debt here."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_48\".m_mContent: "I might owe about ten times that much... Sir..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_49\".m_mContent: "I'll go talk to the owner, maybe... there's another way!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_51\".m_mContent: "I don't know, but I feel like this no longer concerns us."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_52\".m_mContent: "Wait! I think we've lost something too..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_54\".m_mContent: "The appointed time has come and gone, yet the Master hasn't brought Michel, nor provided any updates on the Puppet Elysium..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_56\".m_mContent: "It seems I'll have to contact the Bell Ringer, Albrecht."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_57\".m_mContent: "No need to search for me, I'm already here."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_58\".m_mContent: "In any deal, trust is everything—you should know that. Working both sides comes with a price."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_59\".m_mContent: "And I have no patience for people who lack a sense of timing."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_60\".m_mContent: "It's real! The deal the puppet mentioned is real!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_61\".m_mContent: "Ami saved me! She even concerns about my head!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_62\".m_mContent: "She... she really does care about me!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_63\".m_mContent: "But Ami has become a Sage now... am I even worthy of her anymore?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_64\".m_mContent: "I need to talk to Father right away and have him prepare a token of gratitude!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_65\".m_mContent: "I... I suppose I could muster the courage to visit the Roland family and get to know her better..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_66\".m_mContent: "Where's Ami? Why isn't she with you?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_67\".m_mContent: "She's become quite popular with the locals—they've all gathered around to hear her stories."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_68\".m_mContent: "That sharp-tongued girl? Adored by the residents? Has the sun here scrambled my senses?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_69\".m_mContent: "Oh—right! Since when did none of you fear the sunlight anymore?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_70\".m_mContent: "One of the former stewards left us something called a sunscreen potion. When applied, it shields us from the sun's searing heat temporarily."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_71\".m_mContent: "A miracle like that actually exists? Where is this steward? We ought to buy out their entire stock and hoard it at the castle!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_73\".m_mContent: "What?! And I was already picturing us in swimsuits, basking in sunlight and swimming by the shore."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_75\".m_mContent: "What's the matter, Aiona? You look a bit pale."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_76\".m_mContent: "It's nothing, Lady Empousa. You must be mistaken."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_77\".m_mContent: "If you're after swimsuits, try that stall over there."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_79\".m_mContent: "The costumes from that interactive performance were utterly profound! They've sparked my latest vision: a fabric-free summer collection."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_80\".m_mContent: "What I sell isn't mere clothing—it's a philosophy. Clothing is the shackle of existence. Wealth, the chain of freedom. True liberation is the only design worthy of Sapphire Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_81\".m_mContent: "Now then… who shall debut my newest masterpiece?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_85\".m_mContent: "But in Sapphire Isle, dousing each other with blessed seawater is how we welcome guests. The more soaked you are, the more blessings you receive!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_86\".m_mContent: "That tradition… you just made it up, didn't you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_87\".m_mContent: "Well… not entirely! The owner is actually a really good person!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_88\".m_mContent: "I came to talk about the money I owe…"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_89\".m_mContent: "No need for that, Selena. Someone's already paid off all your debts."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_90\".m_mContent: "What?! There's actually one decent soul among ten thousand rich folk?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_91\".m_mContent: "It was someone dressed like a puppet. Helped me rake in a fortune in just one night... Must be thanks to you wearing that promotional outfit all day!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_94\".m_mContent: "Completely bald. Not wearing a single stitch of clothing. She didn't seem... particularly respectable."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_95\".m_mContent: "Selena, you need to be more careful about the company you keep. You're always getting tangled up with the questionable sorts."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_96\".m_mContent: "No clothes…? To think there's another soul out there who shares my ideals!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_97\".m_mContent: "Strange... Yakov, can you catch a cold too?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_98\".m_mContent: "You must've had too much fun playing with Dalcarlo and caught one."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_100\".m_mContent: "Such a precious item... What did Little Bella No. 1 trade Dalcarlo to get this?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_101\".m_mContent: "I told her about the most extraordinary creatures. The ones you can only find in Sapphire Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_102\".m_mContent: "To Dalcarlo, helping me search for treasures was probably just a passing whim."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_103\".m_mContent: "Such sad memory fragments... I can't bear to look... I don't like this..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_105\".m_mContent: "Did Bella catch a cold too? Why is there liquid running down her face?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_106\".m_mContent: "...It's been eleven years since you left. In your diary, you wrote that I was a dull father who did not care about your interests, your life, your growth."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_107\".m_mContent: "You said Sapphire Isle was nothing but a dreary fishing village, lacking music, invention, or the fashion you longed for."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_108\".m_mContent: "Now that Sapphire Isle has grown so vibrant... would you like it better, Bella?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_109\".m_mContent: "Just a little more... and it would've been a flawless work of art."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_110\".m_mContent: "Unfortunately, its most vital memory has been stolen."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_111\".m_mContent: "To think I could be outwitted... What a brilliant little cat burglar."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_115\".m_mContent: "At last, the wicked Joyce has fallen."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_116\".m_mContent: "And so... that's how everything came to pass."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_121\".m_mContent: "It's a familiar song... I feel like I've forgotten something important..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_122\".m_mContent: "Farewell... But to whom do I offer these words?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_123\".m_mContent: "They'll find a new home in time."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_125\".m_mContent: "But what will Sapphire Isle do now without the Seven Sage Association?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_127\".m_mContent: "It's not like we ever relied on them to make a living."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_128\".m_mContent: "I've invested everything I have into this place. And I'll keep building it up—no matter what."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_129\".m_mContent: "Um... I've just finished a prototype of a new 'Siren' device... would anyone like to try it?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_130\".m_mContent: "I doubt any of you want to see the Isle fall into ruin."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_131\".m_mContent: "I'm repaying the favor for everything you've done for Sapphire Isle."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip13_132\".m_mContent: "No one gets left behind this time! Headcount now before we report to Lord Albrecht!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_01\".m_mContent: "'Are you the Mysterious Merchant I heard about?'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_02\".m_mContent: "Lorelei stepped into the dark room—empty, at first glance. From behind the curtain, a low voice drifted forth, warning her that every piece of merchandise came with a price."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_03\".m_mContent: "As the finest merchant, the price I demand will always far exceed the value of these goods."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_04\".m_mContent: "Lorelei nodded without a flicker of doubt. She was eight years old then, clutching three luminous pearls and seventy-five Soli saved from her stepfather. She was ready to give everything she had—no, more than that—for something others called impossible:"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_05\".m_mContent: "'I want my friend to stop being sick.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_06\".m_mContent: "'So that one day… she might become the greatest musician who ever lived.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_07\".m_mContent: "Constantine gripped the ice-chilled blade and approached the sink."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_08\".m_mContent: "In the flickering candlelight, the unconscious siren no longer seemed monstrous. This was his final living specimen. Tomorrow, he would have Hallon fetch new materials."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_09\".m_mContent: "The obsidian knife parted the scales, cutting through the hide-like fishtail. The sinewy gray-blue muscles twitched, causing the grotesque fins to strike the blade with a high-pitched, mournful ring."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_10\".m_mContent: "Like a fish flailing on a market stall."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_11\".m_mContent: "Constantine's cuts were precise, measured—blood was never his pursuit. And yet, today, a strange unease festered within him."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_12\".m_mContent: "That unease deepened the moment the basement door burst open."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_13\".m_mContent: "'Quick! Help Bella! She collapsed during her birthday banquet!'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_14\".m_mContent: "Averdin had never known this basement existed beneath his brother's residence."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_15\".m_mContent: "Labeled vials lined the shelves. Inside jars, dark gray tissue floated. As Averdin stepped closer, he saw slender fingers webbed with translucent skin."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_17\".m_mContent: "'What have you done?! We promised to give the sirens a home—and you did all this behind my back?'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_18\".m_mContent: "An argument erupted at once, escalating from plea to fury to despair, until someone knocked over the reagent shelf. Glass vials shattered like wine glasses from Bella's celebration."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_19\".m_mContent: "A shard sliced across Averdin's hand. It burned."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_20\".m_mContent: "The moon had risen quietly above the treetops."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_21\".m_mContent: "Myrtle heard beastly cries in the forest. She tried to flee the banquet with Isaac—only to find Averdin emerging from the layered shadows."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_22\".m_mContent: "His teeth were sharper, claws sprouting from his fingers, and blood staining the corners of his lips. What had happened? Myrtle was gripped by terror."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_24\".m_mContent: "She should have fought. She should have struck him down."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_25\".m_mContent: "But how could she tear out the throat of the man who had once saved her? The man who had built a home for her people?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_26\".m_mContent: "Tonight, the moon looms vast, round, and brilliant."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_27\".m_mContent: "Tonight, it bleeds with a deep, blood-red hue."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_28\".m_mContent: "Constantine's research was incomplete. Unproven. But there was no time left."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_29\".m_mContent: "He stared at Bella on the operating table, one leg already lost. This was the best he could do."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_30\".m_mContent: "Before they could clean the blood from her body, Hallon returned to the basement."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_31\".m_mContent: "'Come on. We’re getting out of here.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_32\".m_mContent: "After five long years, Constantine had finally returned to Sapphire Isle—only to find it reduced to a living hell."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_33\".m_mContent: "'What are those reagents in your lab? Why has the Isle turned into this? What are we supposed to do?!'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_34\".m_mContent: "Constantine crumpled to the floor. It was over. His homeland would soon become a breeding ground for the Black Blood."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_35\".m_mContent: "Bella awoke from unconsciousness, pain stabbing through every inch of her body."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_36\".m_mContent: "She remembered her illness flaring again, being carried to bed by servants, and then..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_38\".m_mContent: "She looked around. Her left leg was missing, but the bandages were clean and tight. In the water tank beside her floated siren corpses, their bodies mutilated beyond recognition."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_39\".m_mContent: "'Was I kidnapped? Them too? Who would do this…?'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_40\".m_mContent: "Grabbing a stick for balance, Bella limped toward the exit, hopping on one leg. She knew where to find allies who would help her uncover the truth."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_41\".m_mContent: "'I have to reach the meeting point. I must warn Lorelei—someone is hunting the sirens!'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_43\".m_mContent: "'Joyce has received payment. And Joyce always upholds a deal!'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_45\".m_mContent: "Joyce stood over Bella's mangled body, hands on her hips in dismay."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_46\".m_mContent: "'Oh dear, oh dear. Half the body’s been eaten. Tragic… And the other half? Tainted with Black Blood... Such a pity…'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_47\".m_mContent: "'But now Joyce has the answer! If we turn little Bella into a puppet, she'll never be sick again!'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_48\".m_mContent: "'A win-win deal! Joyce really is a genius!'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_49\".m_mContent: "'Before leaving… there's still time to wrap up one last transaction through Hallon!'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_50\".m_mContent: "Clovis had never seen waves that high..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_51\".m_mContent: "In a single night, once-familiar elders had grown siren traits and begun tearing into their own kin."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_52\".m_mContent: "'The Church will come. When they do, things will return to normal.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_53\".m_mContent: "That's what Clovis told Isaac. The moon hung cold and pale overhead. Would morning ever come?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_54\".m_mContent: "Far across the ink-black sea, a silhouette rose with the sun."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_55\".m_mContent: "The Church's Bell Ringer had arrived. The Isle could be saved!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_56\".m_mContent: "But with a snap of their fingers, the Bell Ringer summoned a flood from the heavens, drowning homes and fleeing villagers alike."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_57\".m_mContent: "'No… The Church… they've come to purge us…'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_60\".m_mContent: "'Pay the price, and they'll be yours.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_61\".m_mContent: "Hallon believed the words in that mysterious letter. He could no longer save the Isle or its people. All he could trade for was the safety of a precious few."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_62\".m_mContent: "The rest—infected or not—would be nothing more than drops in the ocean. That was the Bell Ringer's flawless form of purification."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_63\".m_mContent: "'One last request... If you find my nephew, Isaac... If there's any hope left for him...'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_64\".m_mContent: "Albrecht neither nodded nor shook his head. Hallon couldn't read his expression."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_65\".m_mContent: "It had taken all his courage to make a deal with the Bell Ringer—under the guise of establishing liquid metal currency. He fled with Constantine in tow."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_66\".m_mContent: "Run! Get Bella from the basement and leave now!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_67\".m_mContent: "He didn't know that what awaited him… was his daughter's lifeless body."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_69\".m_mContent: "If they had never come, the Isle would never have descended into this nightmare."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_71\".m_mContent: "If he had never entered that lab, none of this—his family, his friends, his home—would have been lost."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_73\".m_mContent: "If only he had the strength… the courage… he might've stopped it all."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_75\".m_mContent: "Albrecht's voice lingered in his mind, but Isaac remained silent, fingers clenched tight around the dagger."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_76\".m_mContent: "Even as the Blood Beast tore into him, even when his hands could no longer feel, he kept his grip on the dagger."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_77\".m_mContent: "To destroy all that is evil. To crush its seed before it spreads."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_79\".m_mContent: "Lorelei counted the stars as they faded, one by one, until golden light broke in the east."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_82\".m_mContent: "The Mysterious Merchant clapped, as if dismissing such a minor favor. 'The air here isn't good for her recovery. I'll take her northward, where it's cold. She'll write to you regularly.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_83\".m_mContent: "Lorelei nodded. Bella once said that to humans, a trade was as sacred as a siren's oath."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_84\".m_mContent: "'Keep this pact with you. When the time comes to fulfill it, you'll receive a letter.'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip14_85\".m_mContent: "'And don’t forget to check your mailbox. Our deal...'"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_01\".m_mContent: "Sapphire Isle is my birthplace! Let me show you around."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_02\".m_mContent: "But... who put all these stalls and chairs here? I've never seen them before..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_03\".m_mContent: "Can Miss Bella be a proper guide?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_05\".m_mContent: "Look, <style=Highlight>that wooden sign</style> seems rather suspicious. Let's check it out."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_06\".m_mContent: "Aha! So there really is a treasure hidden beneath!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_07\".m_mContent: "My friend and I have this little game—we hide secret scrolls behind wooden signs."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_08\".m_mContent: "If you're friends, couldn't you just tell each other directly when you meet?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_09\".m_mContent: "When we write it down and tuck it away, it means we can rediscover it one day and relive the moment."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_10\".m_mContent: "It's like leaving a little surprise for the future."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_11\".m_mContent: "By the way, when you eat a strawberry cake, do you prefer to 'eat the strawberry on top first' or 'save it for last'?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_13\".m_mContent: "I can never resist diving into the things I like right away either! Thinking about it now... my friend is so much more patient than I am."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_15\".m_mContent: "That sounds like such a mature choice. Maybe I should give it a try next time."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_17\".m_mContent: "Such a nonchalant response... but it really fits the impression you give."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_18\".m_mContent: "The Sapphire Isle guide has noticed a 'strawberry' hidden <style=Highlight>in that palm tree</style>. Would you like to check it out?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_19\".m_mContent: "There's... actually something hidden in the tree."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_20\".m_mContent: "You never hid anything in a tree before?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_22\".m_mContent: "The diaries we don't want our fathers to see, toys, and keepsakes from friends—they all deserve a good hiding spot."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_23\".m_mContent: "Noah, where do you hide your keepsakes?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_25\".m_mContent: "Me too! I like hiding my whole body under the bed—it's the perfect escape from boring daily life."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_27\".m_mContent: "That's a good idea. I'll remember that."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_29\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, all that you've lost will eventually find its way back to you."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_30\".m_mContent: "Oh, what was that that fell from the tree?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_31\".m_mContent: "It's a pearl with an inscription, but the text has faded..."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_34\".m_mContent: "The Isle has so many fancy market stalls now... it's completely different from before I fell ill."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_35\".m_mContent: "You must have been bedridden for quite some time."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_36\".m_mContent: "Yes... my father insisted my condition is serious, but I don't feel it is. I just pass out from time to time, that's all."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_37\".m_mContent: "Fainting in a wrong location can be quite dangerous."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_38\".m_mContent: "That's why my father barely let me go anywhere."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_39\".m_mContent: "I've only seen this many interesting stalls in the city during festivals."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_40\".m_mContent: "Fresh daisies, sunflowers, and balloon flowers! Would you like a bouquet? They make wonderful gifts for friends or lovers!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_41\".m_mContent: "Do you have any bouquets of Tidewisps?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_42\".m_mContent: "Tidewisps wither quickly once picked, so they're not really suitable for bouquets."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_45\".m_mContent: "Although they don't have Tidewisps, this baby’s breath might remind you of them in some way."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_46\".m_mContent: "Thank you. This is the first time anyone has given me flowers."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_48\".m_mContent: "Tidewisp may wither once plucked, but the promises it holds will endure forever."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_49\".m_mContent: "Miss Bella, I'm certain you'll be reunited with your friend someday."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_53\".m_mContent: "Next time, I'll take you to explore that hidden reef!"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_54\".m_mContent: "Father doesn't allow me to swim, but my friend secretly taught me to."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_57\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, you'll be safe with me."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_58\".m_mContent: "My friend always says I'm a great swimmer."

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_60\".m_mContent: "Have you forgotten many things from your past too?"

\"Dialogue_E_40001_Clip99_61\".m_mContent: "Yes, I can't remember anything except my name."

\"QE_40001_Clip99_01\".m_mContent: "'Down thirty drinks to win an exquisite Acorellia Highlands goat toy.' What an odd promotion."

\"QE_40001_Clip99_02\".m_mContent: "Quite an effective one—it definitely caught the eye of the lady next to me."

\"QE_40001_Clip99_03\".m_mContent: "This tree looks like an ideal spot to hide things."

\"QE_40001_Clip99_04\".m_mContent: "Want to try this cannon-like device with me?"

\"QE_40001_Clip99_06\".m_mContent: "Dangerous things aren't usually left out in the open like this."

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_04\".m_mContent: "Contested Second Male Lead; Rightful Lord of Sapphire Isle"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_05\".m_mContent: "Prodigy of Sapphire Isle; Owner of the Sapphire Auction House; Sage of Sapphire Isle; The Isle's Most Beautiful Voice"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_06\".m_mContent: "Prodigy of Sapphire Isle; Joyce's Puppet Friend; Star of 'The Adventures of Ginokio'"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_07\".m_mContent: "New Sage of Sapphire Isle; 'The Most Promising Star of the Roland Family'"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_09\".m_mContent: "Noah's Most Reliable Assistant; Head Disciple of Lord Van Helsing of the Silver Cross"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_10\".m_mContent: "Sapphire Isle's Mascot; All-Purpose Mysterious Merchant; The Master; Aspiring Fifth of the Four Knights"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_12\".m_mContent: "Owner of the Yakov Troupe; Pioneer of Interactive Theater; Loyal Puppeteer of Bella No. 1"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_13\".m_mContent: "Elder of the Bathory Family; Cat Burglar; Enthusiast of Magical Creatures"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_18\".m_mContent: "Bell Ringer No. III; Purifier of the Black Blood Outbreak in Sapphire Isle, 1342"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_19\".m_mContent: "A Descendant of the Once-Great Roland Family"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_21\".m_mContent: "Guardian of Magical Creatures in Sapphire Isle; Devoted Connoisseur of Fries"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_22\".m_mContent: "Joyce's Perfect Puppet Friend; Founder of the Puppet Association"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_25\".m_mContent: "Sage of Sapphire Isle — Creator of Paradise"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_26\".m_mContent: "Sage of Sapphire Isle — Innovator of Technology"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_27\".m_mContent: "Sage of Sapphire Isle — Keeper of Order"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_28\".m_mContent: "Sage of Sapphire Isle — Hermit of the Seas"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_29\".m_mContent: "Sage of Sapphire Isle — Pioneer of Trade"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_30\".m_mContent: "Sage of Sapphire Isle — Herald of Paradise"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_37\".m_mContent: "Sluggish Vendor; Enthusiast of Curiosities; Rightful Heir to Sapphire Isle"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_42\".m_mContent: "Wine Seller; Intelligence Broker for the Assassins"

\"Sub_E_40001_Clip15_53\".m_mContent: "Former Lord of Sapphire Isle; Father of Isaac Van Helsing"

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_01\".m_mContent: "I must say, I didn't expect you would actually accept the invitation."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "It seems no one could resist the wealth and treasures of the sea. Wouldn't you agree, Lady Dalcarlo?"

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_03\".m_mContent: "Or perhaps you prefer to be called Jacintha Dalcarlo these days?"

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_04\".m_mContent: "Mr. Goldland has arranged such a magnificent party—one would surely face judgment for missing it."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_05\".m_mContent: "But rest assured, the demon has yet to appear. I won't disturb your party... for now."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_06\".m_mContent: "What interests me are those Artifacts in the distance."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "Artifacts? Ah... you mean the future Artifacts that the Church has been so eagerly searching and salvaging?"

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "The Wheel of Fate truly loves to toy with mortals. We barely speak of future Artifacts, and here comes the Sanctus sailing toward us."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_10\".m_mContent: "Don't think you're hiding it well—I've long seen through your multiple motives for boarding the El Dorado."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_11\".m_mContent: "However, considering you've traveled all this way from that remote castle to attend the party, I'll let you have this small treasure—consider it compensation for your journey."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_12\".m_mContent: "Or rather, those who see through a Magician's tricks must always pay a small price."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip01_13\".m_mContent: "Please excuse me, I'll take my leave."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip02_01\".m_mContent: "Patch, go scout the interior layout of the ship first and find out where they've hidden the treasure chest."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip02_02\".m_mContent: "I'll join you once I've stabilized the ship."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip03_01\".m_mContent: "Reporting, Captain! We found the chest, but... the key situation is tricky!"

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip03_02\".m_mContent: "It seems in this voyage, we are not just the Hermit, but also the Death."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip03_04\".m_mContent: "To get the key successfully, we must first infiltrate silently, then assassinate when the guards are unaware."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip03_05\".m_mContent: "Patch, just stand by at the treasure chest."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip03_07\".m_mContent: "Now, with the cards in my hand, let me show you the true power of magic."

\"Dialogue_C_10001_Clip05_01\".m_mContent: "Have we been discovered? Retreat for now and wait for another opportunity."

\"Dialogue_C_20001_Clip01_01\".m_mContent: "Baphomet the Soulless... Clive Ganelon the Gravekeeper..."

\"Dialogue_C_20001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "In just these two days, I've faced two tragic souls."

\"Dialogue_C_20001_Clip01_03\".m_mContent: "The warmth of their blood still clings to my hands..."

\"Dialogue_C_20001_Clip01_04\".m_mContent: "If this truly is a rebirth, then everything is unfolding at a dizzying pace."

\"Dialogue_C_20001_Clip01_05\".m_mContent: "They are both scars etched in my memory and proof of how far I've come..."

\"Dialogue_C_20001_Clip01_06\".m_mContent: "Humans erect gravestones to commemorate those they lost..."

\"Dialogue_C_20001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "And these swords, with which we clashed, shall be my monuments to your memory."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_01a\".m_mContent: "I never expected to find such beautiful flowers in this haunted, gloomy place..."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_01b\".m_mContent: "'Blooming toward the moon'—these mysterious flowers seem to be guiding us to the Moonblessed... Cain's riddles always come up at the right time."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_01c\".m_mContent: "Cain... Come to think of it, before meeting up with you all, he did mention—"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_01d\".m_mContent: "Not long ago, within the castle walls."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_01\".m_mContent: "My memories? But where must I go..."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_02\".m_mContent: "There are still four more Moonblessed mentioned in the Prophecy of the Apocalypse. Go and seek them out... piece together your complete self."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_03\".m_mContent: "Why should I search for these Moonblessed when I don't even know where they are?"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_04\".m_mContent: "What connection do they have to the memories I'm trying to recover?"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_05\".m_mContent: "To be precise, they are connected to restoring the power of the Bathorys and the Bloodborn."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_06\".m_mContent: "What do you think is the real reason you lost your memories after resurrection?"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_07\".m_mContent: "...Could it be because after my death by fire, only the small amount of blood Empousa returned remains?"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_08\".m_mContent: "Heh, that's just the surface of it. As the creator of the forbidden resurrection ritual, let me tell you the real reason..."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_09\".m_mContent: "On this continent now under the Church's dominion, the Bloodborn, under the Bathorys, are steadily declining."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_10\".m_mContent: "—The true reason for your incompleteness is that neither you nor Lady Empousa possess enough power."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_11\".m_mContent: "So you want me to take part in restoring the Bathory family, and the key to this restoration lies in finding all the Moonblessed?"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_12\".m_mContent: "Such a pleasure to converse with someone intelligent."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_13\".m_mContent: "The Moonblessed possess the primordial power of the Black Blood, and moreover, they are the key to 'returning to the moon.'"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_14\".m_mContent: "Finding the Moonblessed would serve multiple purposes: advancing the family's revival, fulfilling Lady Empousa's aspirations, and..."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_15\".m_mContent: "Help me reclaim my memories, so I may discover who I truly am."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_16\".m_mContent: "A rather compelling proposition, wouldn't you agree?"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_17\".m_mContent: "You've overlooked something crucial—why should I trust someone who has been deceiving me by feigning death?"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_18\".m_mContent: "I am one who values his privacy. But rest assured, I am also one who rewards generously in return."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_19\".m_mContent: "Mortals embrace faith out of their fear of death, then present offerings to curry favor within their beliefs."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_20\".m_mContent: "While the Church controls the mortals through faith, we Bloodborn can show them how they can defy 'death'—even attain 'immortality.'"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip01_21\".m_mContent: "As you seek out the Moonblessed and grow the family's strength, I shall transform your influence into a following that ensures your path remains untroubled."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip02_01\".m_mContent: "Begin your Odyssey without concern. I shall attend to the castle's affairs—after all, I am quite the capable 'steward.'"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip02_02\".m_mContent: "I look forward to witnessing you in your complete form."

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip02_03\".m_mContent: "What's all this? Cain's always so mysterious, yet here he is getting all chummy with you and talking up a storm!"

\"Dialogue_C_30001_Clip02_04\".m_mContent: "What are you two doing? Are we going or not!"

\"QE_10001_Clip01_103\".m_mContent: "But one thing's for sure, we have to get rid of them if we want to get out of this place."

\"QE_10001_Clip01_302\".m_mContent: "I thought this would be quick, but they're tougher than expected."

\"QE_10001_Clip01_303\".m_mContent: "Let's focus on the ones in front of us for now."

\"QE_10001_Clip02_102\".m_mContent: "It's a different color than the others..."

\"QE_10001_Clip02_202\".m_mContent: "It dripped slime all over the floor too."

\"QE_10001_Clip02_302\".m_mContent: "Whoa! I-I almost slipped... Why are you so far away?"

\"QE_10001_Clip02_303\".m_mContent: "Clean yourself up first, then I'll tell you."

\"QE_10001_Clip03_201\".m_mContent: "Why are those things from before inside these creatures?"

\"QE_10001_Clip03_203\".m_mContent: "We need to figure out how to deal with this."

\"QE_10001_Clip03_301\".m_mContent: "A big one appeared. Is it the leader?"

\"QE_10001_Clip03_305\".m_mContent: "She seems to enjoy talking to the puppet."

\"QE_10001_Clip04_101\".m_mContent: "Would anyone really pay money for that kind of thing?"

\"QE_10001_Clip04_203\".m_mContent: "I'm fine, but it seems we're no match for her."

\"QE_10001_Clip04_302\".m_mContent: "Not unless you give us the card."

\"QE_10001_Clip05_101\".m_mContent: "These guys look really heavy. How can they fly?"

\"QE_10001_Clip05_102\".m_mContent: "Why do you always notice the weird things..."

\"QE_10001_Clip05_202\".m_mContent: "Their wings are made of stone. There must be something else keeping them in the air."

\"QE_10001_Clip05_203\".m_mContent: "If you're done observing, could you come here and help me?"

\"QE_10001_Clip05_301\".m_mContent: "The shadow... That's it, there's something wrong with the shadow."

\"QE_10001_Clip06_103\".m_mContent: "They're... a lot tougher than what we encountered earlier!"

\"QE_10001_Clip06_201\".m_mContent: "79, do you still have strength left?"

\"QE_10001_Clip06_202\".m_mContent: "Don't worry about me. They're tough, but I can still manage."

\"QE_10001_Clip06_203\".m_mContent: "Then I'm counting on you to watch my back."

\"QE_10001_Clip06_302\".m_mContent: "Finally decided to get your hands dirty?"

\"QE_10001_Clip06_303\".m_mContent: "I just want to get this pointless farce over with."

\"QE_10001_Clip07_103\".m_mContent: "Hold on... let me... let me catch my breath..."

\"QE_10001_Clip07_201\".m_mContent: "These suits of armor are on fire, but they're cold to the touch..."

\"QE_10001_Clip07_301\".m_mContent: "Just a little more... Can you manage?"

\"QE_10001_Clip07_303\".m_mContent: "I'm not scared anymore... Ugh, it's still so high..."

\"QE_10001_Clip08_101\".m_mContent: "I take that back, this hunk of metal is impossible to talk to!"

\"QE_10001_Clip08_102\".m_mContent: "Maybe this is his way of showing goodwill?"

\"QE_10001_Clip08_103\".m_mContent: "...How are you more optimistic than me at a time like this?"

\"QE_10001_Clip08_201\".m_mContent: "Well done, you did not disappoint me."

\"QE_10001_Clip08_202\".m_mContent: "I hope you can complete the next trial just as well."

\"QE_10001_Clip08_301\".m_mContent: "And now, let me see what you're made of."

\"QE_10001_Clip09_101\".m_mContent: "Are you still thinking about what she said?"

\"QE_10001_Clip09_103\".m_mContent: "Like that cat from earlier, it seems to have disappeared."

\"QE_10001_Clip09_202\".m_mContent: "Yeah... These monsters and that Tarot woman..."

\"QE_10001_Clip09_203\".m_mContent: "Appearing together is too much of a coincidence—it's like they're just there to fill space."

\"QE_10001_Clip09_301\".m_mContent: "I didn't expect you to be so capable."

\"QE_10001_Clip09_303\".m_mContent: "It's fine to be confident, but you need to consider your own strength as well."

\"QE_10001_Clip10_201\".m_mContent: "Do you think there might be some connection between them?"

\"QE_10001_Clip10_202\".m_mContent: "Well, they're both from the Bathory family."

\"QE_10001_Clip10_301\".m_mContent: "Ladies, this game has gone on long enough."

\"QE_10001_Clip10_302\".m_mContent: "See! They even talk the same way!"

\"QE_10001_Clip10_303\".m_mContent: "...Why are you always so perceptive about the strangest things?"

\"FE_10001_Clip11_001\".m_mContent: "Who... am I? Why am I here...?"

\"FE_10001_Clip11_002\".m_mContent: "Why is she starting to think about that at a time like this?"

\"FE_10001_Clip11_003\".m_mContent: "I need to get over there quick... 66, can you hear me?"

\"FE_10001_Clip11_005\".m_mContent: "I'll be right there. Find a place to hide first."

\"FE_10001_Clip11_203\".m_mContent: "I've come so far, I must... realize my wish..."

\"QE_10001_Clip11_204\".m_mContent: "Yes! Isn't your wish to escape with me?"

\"FE_10001_Clip11_301\".m_mContent: "It wasn't supposed to be like this..."

\"FE_10001_Clip11_303\".m_mContent: "In your hand... is the 'card' that I want."

\"FE_10001_Clip11_304\".m_mContent: "Then take it! Since the start, I never intended to leave this place."

\"FE_10001_Clip11_305\".m_mContent: "Don't talk nonsense, 79. Only one can leave this place."

\"FE_10001_Clip11_306\".m_mContent: "You don't know that! You haven't activated it before, so how can you be so sure?"

\"FE_10001_Clip12_001\".m_mContent: "Our true home lies on the far side of the moon."

\"FE_10001_Clip12_003\".m_mContent: "But because of our excessive desire, we're stuck wandering endlessly in place."

\"FE_10001_Clip12_005\".m_mContent: "Sacrificing friends to gain more, and becoming blinded in the process."

\"FE_10001_Clip12_007\".m_mContent: "Recklessly getting in the way, only as an excuse to escape reality."

\"QE_10001_Clip12_101\".m_mContent: "Our true home lies on the far side of the moon, yet none has ever seen it."

\"QE_10001_Clip12_102\".m_mContent: "Come, join us... and leave the pain behind."

\"QE_10001_Clip12_206\".m_mContent: "The more I chase, the further it gets from me, until it disappears without a trace."

\"QE_10001_Clip12_207\".m_mContent: "As expected of the Astrolabe's projection, it can recreate me so accurately."

\"QE_10001_Clip12_208\".m_mContent: "Come, join us... and leave behind your troubles."

\"QE_10001_Clip12_209\".m_mContent: "Why are you telling me all this..."

\"QE_10001_Clip12_301\".m_mContent: "A caged bird should not yearn for the sky."

\"QE_10001_Clip12_303\".m_mContent: "But even a caged bird yearns for something."

\"QE_10001_Clip12_306\".m_mContent: "Every feather of this caged bird has long been etched with the radiance of freedom!"

\"QE_20001_Clip01_101\".m_mContent: "We must eliminate them all before they break into the camp."

\"QE_20001_Clip01_103\".m_mContent: "Moonlight illuminates the ambitions hidden in the darkness... Accept your 'judgment', Blood Beasts."

\"QE_20001_Clip02_101\".m_mContent: "Dalcarlo, these frenzied beasts seem to be coming straight for you!"

\"QE_20001_Clip02_102\".m_mContent: "Then we must prioritize protecting the lady."

\"QE_20001_Clip03_101\".m_mContent: "Sailors, take up your weapons with the same fervor as you do unfurling the sails!"

\"QE_20001_Clip04_101\".m_mContent: "Since you've come with such enthusiasm, I might as well offer you as sacrifices to the sea god in place of the Pontos II, hahaha!"

\"QE_20001_Clip04_102\".m_mContent: "A true captain would not wish harm on others."

\"QE_20001_Clip04_202\".m_mContent: "Don't be so down, lad! Good things come to those who wait."

\"QE_20001_Clip05_102\".m_mContent: "A true captain would not wish harm on others."

\"QE_20001_Clip06_102\".m_mContent: "Don't underestimate the power of mysticism. I'm just as strong as you when it comes to fighting."

\"QE_20001_Clip07_101\".m_mContent: "Don't just charge in recklessly! Such a rude boar..."

\"QE_20001_Clip08_102\".m_mContent: "We can't let our guard down. Let's finish them once and for all!"

\"QE_20001_Clip09_101\".m_mContent: "The 'God of Death' is watching over us! Victory is ours!"

\"QE_20001_Clip10_101\".m_mContent: "Stupid beasts, losing their senses at the mere sight of food."

\"QE_20001_Clip10_102\".m_mContent: "Hmph... But this food can fight back."

\"FE_20001_Clip10_201\".m_mContent: "Hey! Don't run away, your opponent is over here!"

\"FE_20001_Clip10_202\".m_mContent: "What you seek... is nothing but more blood, right? Then come!"

\"FE_20001_Clip10_301\".m_mContent: "How can there be so many Blood Beasts on such a small island?"

\"QE_20001_Clip11_101\".m_mContent: "There's no need to resist, no need to think. Just surrender your body to me..."

\"QE_20001_Clip12_101\".m_mContent: "My future is bright... I am the child blessed by the Tarot..."

\"QE_20001_Clip12_102\".m_mContent: "I will save everyone... I will bring hope..."

\"QE_20001_Clip12_104\".m_mContent: "I can't fall yet... I couldn't save Mother, I couldn't save Bernice..."

\"QE_20001_Clip12_105\".m_mContent: "So many friends... I couldn't save any of them..."

\"QE_20001_Clip12_106\".m_mContent: "This time, it won't be the same... ending!"

\"QE_50001_Clip01_101\".m_mContent: "I've never seen Blood Beasts like these before. Were they formed when the 'sand' was infected by Black Blood?"

\"QE_50001_Clip01_102\".m_mContent: "...But sand is inanimate. How can it be infected by Black Blood?"

\"QE_50001_Clip02_102\".m_mContent: "My power alone might not be enough."

\"QE_50001_Clip03_101\".m_mContent: "These monsters... where did they come from?"

\"FE_50001_Clip03_101\".m_mContent: "These are the monsters I saw during the last 'crossing'... Why are they here?"

\"FE_50001_Clip03_102\".m_mContent: "No, this isn't the time for that. Where are the guards?!"

\"QE_50001_Clip03_201\".m_mContent: "Why are there so many monsters in the castle?"

\"QE_50001_Clip03_202\".m_mContent: "Is this also the work of those assassins?"

\"QE_50001_Clip03_301\".m_mContent: "Why does it talk just like Zoe..."

\"QE_50001_Clip04_101\".m_mContent: "This time... I will definitely change the ending..."

\"QE_50001_Clip05_101\".m_mContent: "This place... Could it be the assassins' camp...?"

\"QE_50001_Clip05_102\".m_mContent: "If we have the guards surround this area, we can save everyone, right?"

\"QE_50001_Clip06_101\".m_mContent: "What is this thing? And what are those creatures made of sand?"

\"QE_50001_Clip06_103\".m_mContent: "When the battle's over... I'll tell you... everything..."

\"QE_50001_Clip07_101\".m_mContent: "Something's wrong... Our powers seem to have been weakened..."

\"QE_50001_Clip07_102\".m_mContent: "Is it the effects of this desert... or the power of these monsters?"

\"QE_50001_Clip08_102\".m_mContent: "I'm not sure... It seems to be related to the Divine Body of the Alita family—my eyes."

\"QE_50001_Clip10_101\".m_mContent: "You can do it, Aiona! Aim for their heads!"

\"QE_50001_Clip10_102\".m_mContent: "When Ganelons fight, we aim for the heart!"

\"QE_50001_Clip10_103\".m_mContent: "These two aren't even fighting having a heated debate..."

\"QE_50001_Clip11_102\".m_mContent: "I've always said she wouldn't be a companion who'd stay with us till the end."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_01wave_03\".m_mContent: "My <color=#D63536>Special</color> is ready, but I must hold back. I don't wish to kill anyone."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_01wave_04\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry you ended up like this, but... I made a promise to live on and return home!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_02wave_01\".m_mContent: "So, was it you that sent the carriage over the cliff?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_02wave_03\".m_mContent: "Let's sort it out after we deal with them together."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_02wave_05\".m_mContent: "Ugh... this feeling again, the uncontrollable surge of blood rushing to my chest..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_02wave_06\".m_mContent: "That's your Bloodsoul trying to take control of your body."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_02wave_07a\".m_mContent: "I'll use these pesky fodder as a demonstration. Watch closely, I'm only showing you this once."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_03wave_01\".m_mContent: "You think the 'Black Blood' is some sort of disease, right?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_03wave_02\".m_mContent: "It's been corroding my sanity. I could turn into a monster at any moment..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_03wave_03\".m_mContent: "But what if I told you... that the Black Blood can grant you power beyond human limits?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_03wave_03b\".m_mContent: "For those who can't control it, it's a curse; but for us, it's a source of power."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_03wave_04\".m_mContent: "So... the Bloodborn are carriers capable of harnessing the power of Black Blood?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_03wave_05\".m_mContent: "It seems your higher-ups have not told you the real reason why they fear the Black Blood!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_04wave_02\".m_mContent: "Please position me behind you. My Talent is called Silver Omen. It grants a Shield to an ally in front of me at the start of the battle."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_04wave_03\".m_mContent: "This beast is more savage than anything I've ever encountered. Is the scent of my Black Blood sending it into a frenzy?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_04wave_04\".m_mContent: "Oh blessed Moonlight, let the sufferer forget their pain and rewind to their previous state."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_05wave_01\".m_mContent: "This stance... What's it trying to do?!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1001011_05wave_03\".m_mContent: "Spread out! Avoid the warning range of its Talent."

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_01\".m_mContent: "Sorry, but I can't bring myself to hurt my former comrades, even in this state..."

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_01a\".m_mContent: "Sorry, but I can't bring myself to hurt my former comrades, even in this state..."

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_02\".m_mContent: "But if you need someone to cover you, leave it to me!"

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_02a\".m_mContent: "But if you need someone to cover you, leave it to me!"

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_03\".m_mContent: "In that case, I will hold them off at the front."

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_04\".m_mContent: "Well, that's reassuring. Now I can unleash my power without any worries..."

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_05\".m_mContent: "What?! Is there an even higher level of Blood?"

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_05a\".m_mContent: "They were once Inquisition Knights, likely accompanied by priests well-versed in arcane rites. If you cross paths with them, be on guard against their ranged sorcery!"

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_06\".m_mContent: "Did you hold back during our previous battle? I don't know whether to be relieved or annoyed."

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_07\".m_mContent: "Just stay by my side and root for me."

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_08\".m_mContent: "Adorn the end of your lives with this crimson bouquet!"

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_08a\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, Mira... May the wind bring you peace!"

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_09\".m_mContent: "...It is indeed unfair. They can resurrect at will, but we cannot."

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_10\".m_mContent: "Don't rope me in when you're despairing over human frailty."

\"Tutor_1101020_01wave_11\".m_mContent: "We're running out of supplies. If this continues, sooner or later we'll..."

\"Tutorframe_enterlegacyraid\".m_mContent: "Dispatch ships from the dock to meet Dalcarlo at sea."

\"Tutorframe_receiveRewards\".m_mContent: "Tap [Claim All] to complete all Main Tasks for this stage."

\"Tutorframe_enterrole\".m_mContent: "Tip: Tap a Vassal to view Details."

\"Tutorframe_battlefailure_upgradejump1\.m_mContent: "Failure is but a chance to start anew. Trust that you will face the next challenge with better composure."

\"Tutorframe_battlefailure_upgradejump2\.m_mContent: "Turn this setback into drive by strengthening your Vassals."

\"Tutorframe_battlefailure_enterrole\".m_mContent: "Tip: Tap a Vassal to view Details."

\"Tutorframe_battlefailure_enterupgrade\.m_mContent: "Tip: Try increasing the level of your Vassals."

\"Tutorframe_10_01\".m_mContent: "These enemies just keep coming back... are they immortal?"

\"Tutorframe_10_02\".m_mContent: "I feel the blood surging in my chest... could it be the Black Blood again?"

\"Tutorframe_10_03\".m_mContent: "With this power... perhaps I can defeat them!"

\"Tutorframe_10_04\".m_mContent: "Tip: Drag the skill card to the fan-shaped indicator, <style=Highlight>align to the direction</style>, then release to cast Ultimate."

\"Tutorframe_11_01\".m_mContent: "By consuming 4 Bloodsoul points, I'll show you the true power of Black Blood."

\"Tutorframe_11_02\".m_mContent: "Consumed Bloodsoul will regenerate on its own over time."

\"Tutorframe_11_02a\".m_mContent: "Wait! Why is my Bloodsoul resonating with you, an ordinary person?"

\"Tutorframe_11_03\".m_mContent: "No time to worry about that! Since Bloodsoul is a shared resource, allocate it to me so I can unleash my Ultimate!"

\"Tutorframe_11_04\".m_mContent: "Tip: Drag the skill card to the specified <style=Highlight>circle</style>, then release to activate the skill."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_10131_01\".m_mContent: "Guide the stars of the past, bathe in the moonlight of yesteryear."

\"Tutorframe_20_01\".m_mContent: "As a back-up, I won't be fighting alongside you, but I can assist in combat!"

\"Tutorframe_20_02\".m_mContent: "That's... Mira! She's the priest I mentioned earlier!"

\"Tutorframe_20_03\".m_mContent: "I don't like this... but at this range, I'm the only one who can take her down quickly!"

\"Tutorframe_20_04\".m_mContent: "Let me use my Ultimate. I can precisely lock onto a single target."

\"Tutorframe_20_05\".m_mContent: "Tip: Drag the skill card to the specified <style=Highlight>target</style>, then release to activate the skill."

\"Tutorframe_20_06\".m_mContent: "Eva! You too... Has the entire search team been infected?"

\"Tutorframe_20_07\".m_mContent: "Her ranged magic is just as deadly. I'm sorry, but I must live on!"

\"Tutorframe_1101010_01\".m_mContent: "Pay attention. After Blood Augmentation is activated, <style=Highlight>my attacks can ricochet, dealing DMG to more enemies</style>."

\"Tutorframe_1101030_01\".m_mContent: "What... What does that vile creature plan to do?!"

\"Tutorframe_1101030_02a\".m_mContent: "Those massive bone spikes above it might come in handy."

\"Tutorframe_1101030_02b\".m_mContent: "These anchor points look solid. If only Setti were here..."

\"Tutorframe_1101030_02c\".m_mContent: "Hey! My Ultimate is way stronger than hers!"

\"Tutorframe_1101030_02e\".m_mContent: "More reinforcements from their nest! You've got this, right, Empousa?"

\"Tutorframe_1101030_02f\".m_mContent: "Of course! Who do you think I am... Wait, why am I even taking orders from you!?"

\"Tutorframe_1101030_02g\".m_mContent: "If you're injured, be sure to use my Revert ability to temporarily heal your wounds."

\"Tutor_1101030_01wave_00\".m_mContent: "What... What does that vile creature plan to do?!"

\"Tutor_1101030_01wave_01\".m_mContent: "This Blood Beast seems to be the culmination of a flesh fusion in this valley. How many lives has this giant consumed?"

\"Tutor_1101030_01wave_02\".m_mContent: "It's been drawn to the strong scent of your Black Blood; its insatiable 'appetite' has been whetted."

\"Tutor_1101030_01wave_03\".m_mContent: "Be mindful not to expose your wounds, and never let it touch your blood!"

\"Tutor_1101030_01wave_04\".m_mContent: "This thing's too tough. We can't keep this up..."

\"Tutorframe_1101030_03\".m_mContent: "My abilities allow me to heal your injuries to a certain degree."

\"Tutorframe_1101030_04\".m_mContent: "As long as you stand in front of me, the Revert ability will help block a portion of attacks."

\"Tutor_1101030_02wave_02\".m_mContent: "Just some rocks, nothing that can keep me down!"

\"Tutor_1101030_02wave_04\".m_mContent: "The situation is not getting any better, though..."

\"Tutorframe_1101030_05\".m_mContent: "A tough opponent... But don't forget we still have two Bloodsouls!"

\"Tutorframe_36_01\".m_mContent: "Enter your <style=Highlight>Name</style> here. Please note the character limit."

\"Tutorframe_36_02\".m_mContent: "If you're having trouble deciding, tap this button for some clues."

\"Tutorframe_41_02\".m_mContent: "Tap here to return to the Main Hall."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_1001011_01wave_02\".m_mContent: "But... I made a promise to return "home" alive!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_1001011_02wave_01\".m_mContent: "The cruel blood rose, truly fitting for a Bloodborn."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_1001012_01wave_01\".m_mContent: "Black Blood is still stirring within you, be careful!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_1001012_01wave_02\".m_mContent: "Allow me to join you in your future battles."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1002011_01wave_01\".m_mContent: "My attacks and Ultimate can <color=#D63536>penetrate</color> and deal DMG to all enemies, making them ideal against enemies standing in a row."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1002011_01wave_01a\".m_mContent: "Let me deal with the enemies that are lined up perpendicular to me."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1002011_02wave_02\".m_mContent: "You now have full command. Lead us to victory!"

\"Tutor_2_01\".m_mContent: "We made it out of the forest, but there's no town in this direction. Is the castle you spoke of on the other side?"

\"Tutor_2_02\".m_mContent: "Yes. From here we go northeast through <color=#D63536>Starfall Valley</color>. There's a secluded wharf where we can find a boat to <color=#D63536>cross the sea</color>."

\"Tutor_2_03\".m_mContent: "<color=#D63536>Starfall Valley</color>... Somehow we ended up going there anyway. Is it just a coincidence?"

\"Tutor_8_01\".m_mContent: "Our destination is the eastern manor just ahead. Just as a precaution, be prepared for a fight."

\"Tutor_11_02\".m_mContent: "To help us on the journey ahead, we need to use Blood Enhancement."

\"Tutor_11_03\".m_mContent: "Come with me, Noah. I'll show you how to recover your Blood Power."

\"Tutor_12_01\".m_mContent: "Blood Enhancement can significantly increase a character's Power."

\"Tutor_12_02\".m_mContent: "Noah, you seem to be adjusting well."

\"Tutor_12_03\".m_mContent: "Well then, I'll be counting on you for the rest of the journey."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1102030_01wave_01\".m_mContent: "Noah, making the best use of your team's skills will go a long way."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1102030_01wave_02\".m_mContent: "When you put me in the field, the ground will show the effects of my Talent."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1102030_01wave_03\".m_mContent: "I will deal DMG to the first enemy in front of me as soon as I enter battle."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1102030_02wave_01\".m_mContent: "This time it's all up to you, Noah."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1102050_01wave_02\".m_mContent: "Noah, give me a Blood Enhancement. My Ultimate can break the enemy's Shield. Use it at the right time to obliterate the enemy."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1102050_01wave_03\".m_mContent: "Let's go! Break through the enemy's Shield!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1102060_01wave_01\".m_mContent: "By the way, Noah, I don't know if you've noticed but everything has a "Type.""

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1102060_01wave_02\".m_mContent: "There is a counter system based on "Types." Attacking enemies with the right Type will deal more DMG while attacking enemies with the wrong Type will deal less DMG."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_1102060_01wave_03\".m_mContent: "I am an "Intellect" Type and will dominate "Agility" Type enemies. Watch me take them out in one strike!"

\"Tutor_16_01\".m_mContent: "Make a Blood Contract and follow the guidance of the main story contract. You will be blessed by blood and be shown the way."

\"Tutor_16_02\".m_mContent: "As you will, Noah, this world will be yours..."

\"Tutor_144_01\".m_mContent: "I will aid you in your journey."

\"Tutor_144_02\".m_mContent: "In the journey ahead, don't forget to perform "Blood Enhancement" on your Vassals."

\"Guide_02_06_01\".m_mContent: "Every Bloodborn clan elder has their own castle and territory. You can now collect resources from our territory."

\"Guide_02_06_02\".m_mContent: "As you gradually regain your memories and abilities, our territory will expand accordingly. And with it, the earnings you can collect."

\"Guide_02_06_03\".m_mContent: "Amidst the journey of recovering your memories and pursuing your dreams, don't forget to check the collections in the territory regularly."

\"Guide_02_09_01\".m_mContent: "We obtained new equipment from the special enemies we encountered earlier."

\"Guide_02_09_02\".m_mContent: "Equipping certain equipment can significantly enhance Blood Power. When you find more equipment in the future, remember to return to the castle to equip them."

\"Guide_02_11_01\".m_mContent: "We discovered some special elite enemies in the tower we just explored. Let's challenge them to obtain more valuable equipment."

\"Guide_02_12_01\".m_mContent: "The tower left by The Soulless now belongs to you."

\"Guide_02_12_02\".m_mContent: "However, this bottomless tower still holds many unsolved mysteries. It might be worth further exploration."

\"Guide_Tips_01_01_01\".m_mContent: "When planning your battle formation, pay attention to your Bloodsoul reserves."

\"Guide_Tips_02_03_02\".m_mContent: "Quick Deploy allows you to deploy your team with one tap."

\"Guide_Tips_02_06_01\".m_mContent: "Pay attention to your Bloodsouls and adapt your formation and tactics for each stage's victory condition."

\"Guide_Tips_02_06_02\".m_mContent: "Keep an eye on the remaining time."

\"Guide_Tips_02_06_03\".m_mContent: "Use Nexus Coins to reset a character's level and get back the level up materials spent on them."

\"Guide_Tips_02_11_01\".m_mContent: "Complete the stage before the timer ends."

\"Guide_Tips_02_11_02\".m_mContent: "Once you have 50 "Vassal Covenant Fragments," you can use them to perform "Embrace.""

\"Guide_Tips_03_07_01\".m_mContent: "Watch the battlefield, position your characters tactically, and protect the boy from harm."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_11101\".m_mContent: "Even in death, they can still move about?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_11202\".m_mContent: "To which clan do you swear loyalty?"
