\"InBattle_Dialogue_11203\".m_mContent: "I'm no sorceress. My name is Empousa."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_11301\".m_mContent: "Do you really think you can fool us?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_11302\".m_mContent: "Mortals who can't even grasp the true power of Blood are no match for me!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_12101\".m_mContent: "Is this the true power of blood?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_12102\".m_mContent: "I never thought I'd be fighting shoulder to shoulder with a Bloodborn."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_12103\".m_mContent: "Shoulder to shoulder? We're standing miles apart."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_101301\".m_mContent: "Where's the rest of the search team? Why haven't they caught up?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_101302\".m_mContent: "Someone in Priest Mira's team was injured. They said they'll catch up with us later."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_101303\".m_mContent: "But it's strange... why haven't they arrived after all this time..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_101304\".m_mContent: "You sure have a lot of pursuers."

\"Tutor_Guide21_01\".m_mContent: "Once we've crossed to the north of Starfall Valley, there's a secluded dock. We need to hasten so we can sail back to the city from there."

\"Tutor_Guide21_03\".m_mContent: "Why do you keep staring at Aiona?"

\"Tutor_Guide21_04\".m_mContent: "Forgive my belated introduction. I am Aiona Alita, currently in service to the Bathory family and Lady Empousa."

\"Tutor_Guide21_05\".m_mContent: "Why do I feel like I've seen her somewhere before, and just now she..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_13101\".m_mContent: "Be careful, Noah. I'll heal you when needed."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_13102\".m_mContent: "That's the first time I've heard Aiona address someone so warmly..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_13302\".m_mContent: "Setti must have been always been prepared to fight to the death."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_13303\".m_mContent: "But being killed by her comrades is not the glorious death she sought!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_13304\".m_mContent: "I thought I already enhanced my blood to its limit."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_13305\".m_mContent: "Why don't the attacks have any effect on him?!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_13306\".m_mContent: "I really dislike fighting. Can't we be reasonable about this?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_13307\".m_mContent: "Are you done venting, Nevernight? It's about time you calmed down a bit."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_13308\".m_mContent: "Use flames hotter than the raging anger of your own ineptitude."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200003a\".m_mContent: "Yeah, who are you? Do you remember your name at least?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200003c\".m_mContent: "Looks like there weren't enough memories in the blood. Other foreign memories also seemed to have gotten mixed in."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200000\".m_mContent: "We prepared some new clothes for you. I hope they fit."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200002\".m_mContent: "This is a secluded castle that belongs to the Bathory family, and the home of Lady Empousa and myself."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200003\".m_mContent: "I... How did I get here? Who am I? My memory..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200004\".m_mContent: "Your name is Noah Nevernight, a heretic branded by the Church, who was burned at the stake two days ago."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200005\".m_mContent: "But your survival is of the utmost importance to us... so Lady Empousa had no choice but to extract a bit of your blood."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200006\".m_mContent: "And then we recreated you through alchemy. Although it seems incomplete, I should congratulate you on your rebirth, so... 'Happy Birthday.'"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200007\".m_mContent: "Bringing people back from the dead... Is that really possible?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200008\".m_mContent: "It might be unthinkable to mortals, but we are called the Bloodborn precisely because we possess the coveted secret to immortality..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200009\".m_mContent: "Cain! Noah's memories are still a mess. Now is not the time for explanations."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200010\".m_mContent: "I agree. It's better for him to experience it himself. I'll leave the next Embrace ritual to you."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200006a\".m_mContent: "This isn't the place to talk. Follow me to the family hall."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200011a\".m_mContent: "Speaking of which, now that you've been reborn into the hereditary Bathory family, you should be given a noble title."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200011b\".m_mContent: "A noble title? I get to choose it myself..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200011c\".m_mContent: "Congratulations. You are now officially a member of the Bathory family. Sharing the secret of the Embrace with you should no longer be considered a violation of our oath—"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200012\".m_mContent: "The essence of life lies in memory, and blood is the vessel that carries memories. The Embrace is the ritual of reliving life by extracting the memories contained within the blood."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200013\".m_mContent: "This is a sample of Miss Setti's blood that we managed to bring back from Starfall Valley."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200014\".m_mContent: "Please take the memory of this deceased and use the Embrace to create a Blood Vassal that will fight for our cause."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200015\".m_mContent: "...If what you say is possible, then let me resurrect her."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200017\".m_mContent: "It appears that Miss Setti, like Noah, has only recovered a small portion of her memory and strength due to the lack of blood."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200018\".m_mContent: "*Sigh* Even though these Pure Blood Essences are from my personal stash... Here, take them."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200019\".m_mContent: "This is... Wait, you want us to drink this?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200020\".m_mContent: "The hungry want to eat and the sick want to get better. Are humans so different from the so-called 'vampires'?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200021\".m_mContent: "I understand it's hard to accept this sudden change, but this Pure Blood Essence is vital to restoring your strength so you can live on."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200022\".m_mContent: "There is... a surge of warmth... rushing through my chest... My mind feels clearer now, and my body is more agile."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200023\".m_mContent: "It seems the <style=Highlight>Pure Blood Essence</style> worked quite well for Miss Setti. What will it be for you, Noah?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200024\".m_mContent: "I understand. No matter what, I must live on. If this will help restore my strength and memories, then I'll drink it."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200025\".m_mContent: "By the way, where's Empousa? She's the one who brought me back, right?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200026\".m_mContent: "So you're the type of guy that always repays a debt? Well, now it's time to show us what you're capable of, the Moonblessed of prophecy."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200027\".m_mContent: "You also call me 'Moonblessed'... But what you just said, do you mean Empousa is in some kind of trouble?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200028\".m_mContent: "Lady Empousa is in great danger. Time is of the essence, so let's talk on the road."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200029\".m_mContent: "Let's head back to the chamber where we used the Embrace. From there, we can pass through the long corridor to reach the Hall of the Elders."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200031\".m_mContent: "Ah, the Silver-haired Heretic...! And that witch, and... Oh? Someone unfamiliar, but seemingly unreliable."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200032\".m_mContent: "That last one wouldn't happen to be me, would it? Well, that's just mean."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200033\".m_mContent: "Miss Setti, please calm down. You've just awakened and your body is quite weak. We shall be explaining the situation to you in detail, alright?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200034\".m_mContent: "I only remember Starfall Valley... What did you do to me? Was it that vampire freak? Where is she?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200035\".m_mContent: "Try giving Pure Blood Essence to other Vassals as well."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_200036\".m_mContent: "Upgrading your Vassals is crucial, as it significantly increases their Blood Power, allowing you to face further unknown dangers."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_201101\".m_mContent: "Follow the wind and grant them salvation—Stardust Cyclone!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_201102\".m_mContent: "Are these bats also considered Blood Beasts?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_201103\".m_mContent: "Blood Vassals are minions created by the Bloodborn using Black Blood, so they can indeed be considered our kind."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_201105\".m_mContent: "Are you alright? You look a bit pale..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_201106\".m_mContent: "Don't lose focus! I'm just not used to this new body yet."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_201107\".m_mContent: "I promised to help, and I will stay by your side until we rescue her!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_201101\".m_mContent: "Don't let your guard down, the bats are still swarming in!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_201102\".m_mContent: "We can take shelter inside if we get through the corridor. You three go first, I'll cover you."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202101\".m_mContent: "But I'm curious to see if the rumors about the silver-haired Noah Nevernight are true."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202102\".m_mContent: "I don't care about those pointless names. I just want to help your sister. Let us pass."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202103\".m_mContent: "First of all, she's not my sister! And secondly, don't you dare order me around!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202104\".m_mContent: "This bat... it's... here to help us?! Aren't they supposed to be on the same side?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202105\".m_mContent: "Different bat swarms are loyal to heirs of different bloodlines within the family. Their Black Blood allows them to sense their master's will."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202106\".m_mContent: "These are Lady Empousa's Blood Servants. They must have sensed we were in danger and came to assist."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_202101\".m_mContent: "She just said the Moonblessed... I remember Empousa mentioning that too..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_202102\".m_mContent: "That's a shared dream between Lady Empousa and me."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202201\".m_mContent: "How dare you harm these cute little bats! You... you're all going to die!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202202\".m_mContent: "Just like the Blood Beasts, they can't be killed..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_202201\".m_mContent: "Lady Lamia, please stop this. Lady Empousa is in danger and needs our help."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_202202\".m_mContent: "Everyone keeps going on and on about Empousa. It's getting on my nerves!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_202204\".m_mContent: "The relationships within the Bathory family are... rather complicated."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202301\".m_mContent: "Very well... I've decided. First I'll kill everyone except the silver-haired, and then..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_202302\".m_mContent: "I'll have the elders execute Empousa and make the silver-haired mine!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_202301\".m_mContent: "Even if it's the emotions talking, I'm going to get angry if you continue acting like this."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_202302\".m_mContent: "C-Cain!? You... Why are you with them?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_202303\".m_mContent: "Whether it's the first 'special type' we rescued from the Church, or Lady Empousa..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_202304\".m_mContent: "They are all of utmost importance to our family. As long as I'm here, I won't allow anyone to harm them."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_203101\".m_mContent: "I didn't expect Cidhall to be so ruthless."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_203102\".m_mContent: "I always thought you and Cain were a good match."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_203103\".m_mContent: "I don't know what you're talking about..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_203201\".m_mContent: "Leave it to me. My attacks are very effective against him!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_203202\".m_mContent: "I apologize for giving you the wrong impression."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_203301\".m_mContent: "Mere ants, and yet I must deal with them personally!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_203302\".m_mContent: "This isn't good... At the very least, I must ensure Noah's safety..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_204101\".m_mContent: "So, as I said, it's all because of this loudmouth redhead, causing us unnecessary trouble!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_204102\".m_mContent: "You're so pathetic, black-haired show-off. Are these soulless soldiers really scaring you?"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_204104\".m_mContent: "They're armor inhabited by lost souls, remnants of Baphomet's experiments. Leave them to me!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_204101\".m_mContent: "Not bad! Turns out you're not all talk!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_204103\".m_mContent: "This is my first time fighting with a warrior like Jestel. She's quite reliable."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_204104\".m_mContent: "I can't believe I was praised by the great Aiona, the one close to the renowned Moonblessed..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_204105\".m_mContent: "Excellent, with Jestel on our side, we're certain to make a smooth escape from this prison tower."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_204106\".m_mContent: "Could this be the grace of fate, allowing me to meet Miss Aiona, the 'Moonblessed', here and even earn her praise!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_204107\".m_mContent: "Let's save your enthusiasm for when we confront Baphomet."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_205101\".m_mContent: "These guys seem to be getting tougher!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_205102\".m_mContent: "Perhaps it's a sign that we're on the right path."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_205103\".m_mContent: "We're getting closer to Empousa, I can feel it."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_205201\".m_mContent: "I've been meaning to ask, why are you guys trying to save Empousa?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_205202\".m_mContent: "If something happens to her, I might end up with the same fate."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_205203\".m_mContent: "I owe her mother a great debt."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_205301\".m_mContent: "We've taken care of all the enemies on this floor!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_205302\".m_mContent: "I can sense that we're very close to Empousa now. Be prepared!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_206101\".m_mContent: "Empousa can't move, we must ensure her safety!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_206102\".m_mContent: "I won't let these wandering spirits lay a single finger on her!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_206104\".m_mContent: "Now is not the time to play the hero, Miss Bloodborn."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_206301\".m_mContent: "Don't worry, we'll definitely get you out of here. I always keep my promises!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_207101\".m_mContent: "What a blunder, I was so engrossed in talking to Lady Empousa that I didn't notice—!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_207102\".m_mContent: "Who... who would do such a thing! How could they treat them like this!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_207103\".m_mContent: "This... this is Baphomet's hunting ground where he toys with his prey!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_207104\".m_mContent: "Baphomet... 'the Soulless'? As in the Elder? He did all this?!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_207104\".m_mContent: "What... What am I supposed to do?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_207201\".m_mContent: "Perhaps I can encourage her! Her situation now..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_207202\".m_mContent: "It's like that time I couldn't bring myself to fight my own comrades in Starfall Valley."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_207203\".m_mContent: "You might want to hold your tongue for now."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_207304\".m_mContent: "Save them... Free them from their agony..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_208101\".m_mContent: "Jestel... you should leave it to us this time."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_208102\".m_mContent: "This armor was crafted by my father with the resolve to protect all of our family. It's incredibly sturdy."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_208103\".m_mContent: "Coupled with my mother's determination to protect us, I doubt its defenses can be easily breached!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_208104\".m_mContent: "This is the first time I've heard you speak so softly. Are you really..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_208105\".m_mContent: "But either way, I won't lose. I am the proof of my father and mother's existence! Let me fight!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_208101\".m_mContent: "What's wrong, Jestel? Don't you recognize your mother?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_208102\".m_mContent: "Didn't you promise to take me to the moon?"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_208104\".m_mContent: "Jestel, I leave the flank to you!"

\"InBattle_Dialogue_208201\".m_mContent: "Mother, please forgive me for having to stand against you..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_208202\".m_mContent: "Whether it's this shield that's accompanied me for all these years..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_208203\".m_mContent: "Or the resolve to protect what matters most..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_200001\".m_mContent: "That chilling silver hair and those inscrutable crimson eyes..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_200002\".m_mContent: "They remind this old man of an ancient Bloodborn."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_200003\".m_mContent: "Enough talk, don't think you still have the upper hand."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_209201\".m_mContent: "Your chilling silver hair, and those crimson eyes..."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_209202\".m_mContent: "You remind this old man of an ancient Bloodborn."

\"InBattle_Dialogue_209203\".m_mContent: "Enough talk, don't think you still have the upper hand."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_209301\".m_mContent: "The descent was too fast, I could only manage to slow it down a little..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_209302\".m_mContent: "We'll just have to defeat him quickly, then figure out the rest!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_209303\".m_mContent: "Easier said than done! We're completely exhausted, yet he's still completely fine!"

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_209304\".m_mContent: "Wait, what you just said... I think I've found a way to beat him..."

\"Tutorial_Dialogue_209305\".m_mContent: "Attack with everything you have! His soul is about to expire!"

\"Tutor_70_01\".m_mContent: "Noah, now that you've become one of the Bloodborn, you must learn to harness the power of the blood moon."

\"Tutor_70_02\".m_mContent: "Let me fight alongside you. This way, we'll have three different Moon Phases."

\"Tutor_70_03\".m_mContent: "Your moon meter is now full. It's time to summon the Blood Moon."

\"Tutor_70_04\".m_mContent: "Can you feel the power of the Blood Moon? Remember this moment."

\"Tutor_70_05\".m_mContent: "From now on, you'll be in control of your own path. Though certain to encounter many obstacles, Blood Moon may help alleviate your plight."

\"Tutor_73_01\".m_mContent: "Well done, Noah. I've prepared everything you'll need from now on. Follow me."

\"Tutor_74_01\".m_mContent: "You'll be receiving Missions and Tasks in the castle. Try to complete as many as you can."

\"Tutorframe_74_01\".m_mContent: "You may check ongoing Tasks in the Task Bar."

\"Tutorframe_74_02\".m_mContent: "Tap the arrow to jump to the Task's location."

\"Tutorframe_74_03\".m_mContent: "This is the Task Bar. When you complete Missions and Tasks, you will receive rewards."

\"Tutorframe_74_04\".m_mContent: "Daily, Weekly, as well as Story Tasks each have their own objectives. Completing milestone achievements also grants rewards."

\"Tutorframe_74_05\".m_mContent: "If you're unsure how to progress, take a moment to check the Task Bar!"

\"Tutorframe_74_06\".m_mContent: "Tap [Claim All] to receive rewards for all completed Story quests."

\"Tutorframe_74_07\".m_mContent: "After completing Missions and Tasks, don't forget to collect your well-deserved compensation!"

\"Tutorframe_74_08\".m_mContent: "You should be ready to continue on your journey."

\"Tutorframe_74_09\".m_mContent: "(Coughing) Damn it, it feels like my body and spirit are being torn apart—what is..."

\"Tutorframe_74_10\".m_mContent: "Hey, what's wrong with her? She was just all fired up, and now..."

\"Tutorframe_74_11\".m_mContent: "It appears that Miss Setti, like Noah, has only recovered a small portion of her memory and strength after resurrection due to a lack of blood."

\"Tutorframe_74_13\".m_mContent: "Wait... am I supposed to drink blood?"

\"Tutorframe_74_14\".m_mContent: "I realize it's hard to adjust to this change, but Pure Blood Essence is vital for restoring your strength, so that you may <style=Highlight>live</style>."

\"Tutorframe_74_15\".m_mContent: "Tap here to open the Task panel."

\"Tutorframe_74_16\".m_mContent: "Tap here to quickly head to Tasks."

\"Tutorframe_74_17\".m_mContent: "Daily, Weekly, as well as Story Tasks each have their own objectives. Completing milestone achievements also grants rewards."

\"Tutorframe_74_18\".m_mContent: "If you're unsure how to progress, be sure to take a moment to check your Tasks!"

\"Tutorframe_74_19\".m_mContent: "Regarding the Vassal development you mentioned earlier, I have prepared the necessary resources for you."

\"Tutorframe_treasure\".m_mContent: "Tip: Tap here to claim the lost item."

\"Tutorframe_79_01\".m_mContent: "Nothing will stop me from saving Miss Empousa!"

\"Tutorframe_79_02\".m_mContent: "Let me show you the true power of the shield of Aegis!"

\"Tutor_81_02\".m_mContent: "The battlefield is always changing, but this may help ease your decision-making, to some extent."

\"Tutor_82_01\".m_mContent: "There are so many new lives to care for, but I don't seem to have much... parenting experience."

\"Tutor_82_02\".m_mContent: "It's natural to feel uncertain as a new elder. To help you adapt to your new position more quickly, I've compiled 'Ten Essential Duties of a Bloodborn Elder.'"

\"Tutor_83_01\".m_mContent: "The 'Pure Blood Essence' within is exactly what newly turned vassals desperately need."

\"Tutor_83_02\".m_mContent: "Pure Blood Essence? Does that mean... they have to drink blood?"

\"Tutor_83_03\".m_mContent: "Pure Blood Essence is precious sustenance for the Bloodborn. I understand this transition is difficult to accept right away, but it's necessary to gain power."

\"Tutor_83_04\".m_mContent: "Eating when hungry, wanting to live when sick—setting aside our conflicts, can humans and Bloodborn be similar creatures? I understand now. To 'live,' we drink."

\"Tutor_84_01\".m_mContent: "Excuse me, but I've just remembered something that would make the perfect gift to celebrate your rebirth—"

\"Tutor_84_02\".m_mContent: "These are notes I obtained from a cartographer friend. They will guide you to discover lost items during your journey."

\"Tutor_84_03\".m_mContent: "Through its guidance, you may uncover treasures left by those who came before, or perhaps a story or two worth remembering."

\"Tutor_84_04\".m_mContent: "So, we just need to follow the clues to find the hidden location in this 'puzzle,' right?"

\"Tutor_84_05\".m_mContent: "Exactly. Try tapping on places you find suspicious. You may come across something unexpected..."

\"Tutorframe_84_02\".m_mContent: "Collect all memory fragments to receive rewards."

\"Tutorframe_84_03\".m_mContent: "These items might be treasures left by previous visitors. Please explore thoroughly."

\"Tutor_100_01\".m_mContent: "We successfully broke free from the prison and completed the first phase of the fated covenant. Let's go back and check how we've been compensated, Noah."

\"Tutor_105_01\".m_mContent: "This tower is overcomplicated! Why all the divergence? Which path should we take?"

\"Tutor_105_02\".m_mContent: "Aren't you the heir here? How come you don't even know your way around your own castle?"

\"Tutor_105_03\".m_mContent: "This castle was built long ago. It’s understandable that Lady Empousa isn't familiar with it."

\"Tutor_105_04\".m_mContent: "To leave this tower, take the left path. For the unknown, take the right, which may prove rewarding."

\"Tutorframe_105_1\".m_mContent: "Different challenges await along different paths in the Threads of Fate."

\"Tutorframe_105_2\".m_mContent: "Complete challenges with Vassals at specific levels to earn abundant Extra Rewards."

\"Tutor_115_01\".m_mContent: "These are the rewards bestowed by the Covenant. Go ahead and have a look."

\"Tutor_115_02\".m_mContent: "These rewards should be of great assistance to you."

\"Tutor_115_03\".m_mContent: "Every time you complete a trial, you will receive rewards. May you march forward and take on all challenges that face you!"

\"Tutor_120_01\".m_mContent: "Who... who would do such a thing! How could they treat them like this!"

\"Tutor_120_02\".m_mContent: "I remember now. This area is the Hunting Ground where Baphomet conducted his experiments!"

\"Tutor_120_03\".m_mContent: "Baphomet the Soulless? He did all this?"

\"Tutor_120_04\".m_mContent: "That bastard knew that <style=Highlight>my specialty is dealing with large numbers of enemies</style>, so he wanted to torment me with them."

\"Tutor_140_01\".m_mContent: "The rising platform is not stable and should not be fought on for long."

\"Tutor_140_02\".m_mContent: "Everyone, be careful and stand your ground. Don't go near the edges of the platform!"

\"Tutor_140_03\".m_mContent: "And what about you, Empousa? Will you hide behind the silver-haired to oppose me and continue living your carefree, spoiled life?"

\"Tutor_140_04\".m_mContent: "I lose sleep in agony every time I think about the future of the Bathory family resting on your shoulders, you complete failure."

\"Tutor_140_05\".m_mContent: "Amusing... since when does tattered armor need sleep? Save your barbs, traitor. I will teach you a hard lesson myself!"

\"Tutor_140_06\".m_mContent: "You call me a traitor? Interesting... I wonder what Limine would think if she heard this."

\"Tutor_140_07\".m_mContent: "Never speak Mother's name! You show no mercy for your own kin... Today, you will face the consequences of your atrocities."

\"Tutor_140_08\".m_mContent: "Very well! Survival of the fittest is the creed of the Bathory, and victory should always be bestowed upon the Lord of the family."

\"Tutor_140_09\".m_mContent: "Those spectral soldiers... they're Vassals bound by Soul Link to Baphomet!"

\"Tutor_140_10\".m_mContent: "Those spirits are both Baphomet's strength and weakness. Defeat them first to control his power!"

\"Tutor_140_11\".m_mContent: "Step aside, rusty antique! The future of the Bathory family has no place for rotten fruit like you."

\"Tutorframe_140_1\".m_mContent: "Beware of those spirits... the Soulless' power comes from them."

\"Tutorframe_140_2\".m_mContent: "Eliminate the souls first to truly suppress Baphomet's power."

\"Tutorframe_140_3\".m_mContent: "Servants of the demon, you will know true despair!"

\"Tutor_150_02\".m_mContent: "While you were away, our territory has accumulated a fair bit of resources."

\"Tutor_150_03\".m_mContent: "You now have the key to our warehouse."

\"Tutor_200_01\".m_mContent: "Thanks to you, we have finally gained a foothold."

\"Tutor_200_02\".m_mContent: "To help you adapt to the Black Blood coursing through your body, I took the liberty of making some preparations."

\"Tutorframe_201_1\".m_mContent: "The Lost Courtyard is a long-forgotten area beneath the castle. I have arranged for it to be cleaned up for your use."

\"Tutorframe_201_3\".m_mContent: "This was once where young Vassals of the family were trained to hunt."

\"Tutorframe_201_3a\".m_mContent: "Most facilities were destroyed during the Holy War, but given time, we shall surely restore them to working condition."

\"Tutorframe_201_4\".m_mContent: "As we progress through our journey in Threads of Fate, more facilities will gradually become available."

\"Tutorframe_201_4a\".m_mContent: "Here, you can undertake daily training. These challenges will not only enhance your Blood Power but also grant rich rewards."

\"Tutorframe_201_5\".m_mContent: "Truth's Odyssey has begun. I will lead the way for you."

\"Tutor_201_01\".m_mContent: "Truth's Odyssey is the main Raid for obtaining Skill enhancement materials."

\"Tutor_201_02\".m_mContent: "You shall venture into secret zones fraught with peril across the continent, enduring the trials in search of enlightenment and truth."

\"Tutor_201_03\".m_mContent: "By resolving contingencies, gathering supplies, and completing your arduous journey, you stand a chance at uncovering the true nature of things."

\"Tutorframe_202_1\".m_mContent: "Here, you may select the difficulty level for your journey."

\"Tutorframe_202_2\".m_mContent: "Here, you may select the area you wish to journey to. Difficulty will vary slightly."

\"Tutorframe_202_3\".m_mContent: "For each area, you need to complete the entire journey to obtain all rewards."

\"Tutorframe_202_4\".m_mContent: "Tonight, the moon is in a crescent shape, signaling the appearance of the Starfall Valley Odyssey Gate. Allow me to accompany you there."

\"Tutorframe_202_5\".m_mContent: "The first trial we face is Wind Element. Follow your intuition and choose one."

\"Tutorframe_202_6\".m_mContent: "For each Element, I foresee that you may encounter 1 to 3 Trials."

\"Tutorframe_202_7\".m_mContent: "Faced with the unexpected, your choices now will impact the following battles."

\"Tutorframe_204_1\".m_mContent: "After each battle, you will receive Wonders, which are Catalysts that remain active in subsequent battles."

\"Tutorframe_204_2\".m_mContent: "They will continue to be effective in subsequent Battles."

\"Tutorframe_204_3\".m_mContent: "When selecting a Catalyst, be sure to pay attention to its Aspect. I recommend selecting the same Aspect whenever possible."

\"Tutorframe_204_4\".m_mContent: "Owning more Catalysts with the same Aspect will increase their Aspect Level and grant insights, resulting in a significant improvements."

\"Tutorframe_204_5\".m_mContent: "Please note that some Catalysts may only be available to certain Vassals."

\"Tutorframe_204_6\".m_mContent: "Select the Catalyst that best suits your team."

\"Tutorframe_205_1\".m_mContent: "Your Vassals are now available for Skill Upgrade."

\"Tutorframe_205_2\".m_mContent: "Each Vassal has four skills, three of which can be enhanced."

\"Tutorframe_205_4\".m_mContent: "Enhancements will increase the attributes of the skills."

\"Tutor_205_01\".m_mContent: "Be diligent about upgrading your Vassal skills. It will greatly help in battle!"

\"Tutor_205_02\".m_mContent: "Materials for Skill Enhancements can be obtained from [Timeworn Mausoleum]. Take a look, if that sounds enticing."

\"Tutor_206_01\".m_mContent: "Before we proceed, there's something I need to give you."

\"Tutor_206_02\".m_mContent: "Lady Empousa prepared a set of Equipment for you and your Vassals while you were asleep."

\"Tutor_206_04\".m_mContent: "Those were garments to cover your body. Equipment, however, helps increase the Blood Power and gain an advantage in combat."

\"Tutorframe_206_1\".m_mContent: "Different Vassals wear different equipment types. You can use the Quick Equip feature to quickly swap a Vassal's gear."

\"Tutorframe_206_2\".m_mContent: "High-quality equipment can also be Enhanced. As we progress, try acquiring more equipment."

\"Tutor_206_05\".m_mContent: "Thanks for all the assistance, by the way... I'm still getting the hang of it all."

\"Tutor_207_01\".m_mContent: "We've been on this journey for a while now, Noah. Know that having like-minded Vassals by your side makes everything much easier."

\"Tutor_207_02\".m_mContent: "It looks like they have something to say."

\"Tutor_207_03\".m_mContent: "One way to increase a Vassal's Affinity LV. is through touching and interactions."

\"Tutor_207_04\".m_mContent: "When a Vassal reaches a certain Affinity level, they may open up their inner world to you."

\"Tutor_207_05\".m_mContent: "Here, we can learn about a Vassal's past, as well as present. We can also explore the unique memories you've created together."

\"Tutorframe_207_2\".m_mContent: "<style=Highlight>Touch</style> them in different places and see what they have to say."

\"Tutorframe_207_3\".m_mContent: "Hosting <style=Highlight>Banquets</style> is an excellent way to improve Affinity with your Vassals."

\"Tutorframe_207_4\".m_mContent: "Have a look at the Vassal Journal."

\"Tutor_208_01\".m_mContent: "Though the family remains in a state of disarray, the many facilities built during its golden era are still accessible in the castle."

\"Tutor_208_02\".m_mContent: "As you progress, you will be able to access more areas and unlock powerful features that will greatly assist both you and your Vassals."

\"Tutor_208_03\".m_mContent: "Though the family remains in a state of disarray, the many facilities built during its golden era are still accessible in the castle."

\"Tutor_208_04\".m_mContent: "As we progress forward, you will have the opportunity to enter more areas and unlock powerful features, greatly assisting us in our journey."

\"Tutor_210_01\".m_mContent: "The tower near the castle has been cleaned up. Would you like to have a look?"

\"Tutor_210_02\".m_mContent: "The entrance to the main tower has been cleared."

\"Tutor_210_03\".m_mContent: "There are still a few towers nearby that aren't ready, but the main tower should be enough for you to explore, right?"

\"Tutor_211_01\".m_mContent: "There are some monsters inside the tower. If you're interested, you can come and clear them out."

\"Tutor_211_02\".m_mContent: "Eliminate all the monsters for some useful items."

\"Tutor_212_01\".m_mContent: "It's okay, you can come back next time. The tower isn't going anywhere."

\"Tutor_212_03\".m_mContent: "Don't underestimate the things these monsters can drop!"

\"Tutor_220_01\".m_mContent: "The residual blood on this sword can serve as a catalyst for awakening memories..."

\"Tutor_220_02\".m_mContent: "My old nemeses... Let us meet once more—on a new battlefield."

\"Tutor_220_03\".m_mContent: "Here, the spirits of powerful enemies you've faced before will manifest again. Defeat them to earn rewards."

\"Tutor_220_04\".m_mContent: "More spirits will manifest the further Threads of Fate progresses."

\"Tutorframe_220_1\".m_mContent: "Zagon's spirit has arisen, it's time for the exorcism."

\"Tutorframe_220_2\".m_mContent: "Each spirit has a substantial amount of HP."

\"Tutorframe_220_3\".m_mContent: "Unleash DMG during the exorcism to achieve higher scores!"

\"Tutorframe_220_4\".m_mContent: "Now, select your Vassals and give it a try."

\"Tutorframe_220_5\".m_mContent: "Once your DMG reaches a certain threshold, you'll unlock the next fragment."

\"Tutorframe_220_6\".m_mContent: "The more fragments you unlock, the better rewards you'll receive."

\"Tutorframe_220_7\".m_mContent: "You may access Tomb of the Fallen through the Lost Courtyard."

\"Tutor_220_05\".m_mContent: "More lords will be unlocked as you progress in your exploration."

\"Tutorframe_70_2\".m_mContent: "I will target an enemy and fire at it the moment the battle starts!"

\"Tutorframe_70_3\".m_mContent: "When I'm deployed, the skill indicator will show the target I'm about to aim at."

\"Tutorframe_70_4\".m_mContent: "I have marked the three Moon Phases for you."

\"Tutorframe_70_5\".m_mContent: "From left to right, they are Full Moon, Crescent Moon and New Moon."

\"Tutorframe_70_6\".m_mContent: "Remember, each Vassal has their own Moon Phase."

\"Tutorframe_70_8\".m_mContent: "Whenever there are Vassals of 3 different Moon Phases present, the battle may become more favorable."

\"Tutorframe_70_9\".m_mContent: "Once the moon meter is full, Blood Moon can be summoned and bring enormous aid to the fight."

\"Tutorframe_70_10\".m_mContent: "For this battle, I will temporarily grant you energy to demonstrate the power of Blood Moon."

\"Tutorframe_70_11\".m_mContent: "First, please arrange your Vassals and Start Battle."

\"Tutorframe_70_12\".m_mContent: "When using Ultimates, you will activate the Moon Phase of that Vassal."

\"Tutorframe_70_13\".m_mContent: "Once an Ultimate is released, the corresponding Moon Phase will turn golden."

\"Tutorframe_70_14\".m_mContent: "Now, release the Ultimates of the other Vassals. We can summon the Blood Moon by activating each Moon Phase."

\"Tutorframe_70_15\".m_mContent: "While Blood Moon is active, all Vassals gain <style=Highlight>Ultimate Bloodsoul Cost -1</style> and deal <style=Highlight>25% more DMG</style>."

\"Tutorframe_bloodmoon\".m_mContent: "Tip: Continue to cast Ultimates to activate more Moon Phases."

\"Tutorframe_gotostory\".m_mContent: "Tip: Go to Threads of Fate to continue the story."

\"Tutorframe_gotostory_pre\".m_mContent: "Ah... the "Threads of Fate" always bring unexpected clarity."

\"Tutorframe_71_1\".m_mContent: "That enemy may be isolated, but seems like it could be tricky to deal with."

\"Tutorframe_71_2\".m_mContent: "Leave it to me. Handling solitary enemies is my specialty!"

\"Tutorframe_71_3\".m_mContent: "Observe the battlefield and enemy formations during combat."

\"Tutorframe_71_4\".m_mContent: "It will allow you to flexibly utilize our formation and skills to adapt to any situation!"

\"Tutorframe_77_1\".m_mContent: "Double Speed has been activated. We can now adjust the flow of time in battles."

\"Tutorframe_77_2\".m_mContent: "For example, right now the flow of time is twice its normal speed."

\"Tutorframe_77_3\".m_mContent: "In the future, you can adjust it here as needed."

\"Tutorframe_80_1\".m_mContent: "Seems like there are new variants we haven't encountered before."

\"Tutorframe_80_2\".m_mContent: "They are the most ferocious among the Blood Servants raised by that young lady. They will charge with reckless abandon until they are stopped."

\"Tutorframe_80_3\".m_mContent: "I'll block it and ensure it doesn't threaten any of you."

\"Tutorframe_80_4\".m_mContent: "When deploying, pay attention to their charging paths and position me at the front to protect the rear."

\"Tutorframe_80_5\".m_mContent: "Are these bats... the same ones raised by Empousa?"

\"Tutorframe_80_6\".m_mContent: "That's right. They are the most ferocious species of all the Blood Servants. They will charge mercilessly until stopped."

\"Tutorframe_80_7\".m_mContent: "When deploying, be mindful of their movement paths. Be sure to position your Vassals so they can intercept them and protect the rear. Caution is advised!"

\"Tutorframe_80_8\".m_mContent: "Our Blood Servants will also assist us to infiltrate the enemy's back line."

\"Tutorframe_80_9\".m_mContent: "Position them opposite of the enemy's ranged units to quickly attack their rear."

\"Tutorframe_85_1\".m_mContent: "The Auto-battle and Double Speed functions have been unlocked."

\"Tutorframe_85_2\".m_mContent: "Auto-battle will automatically unleash the Vassals' Ultimate."

\"Tutorframe_85_3\".m_mContent: "Double Speed will speed up the battle."

\"Tutorframe_85_4\".m_mContent: "If you feel tired of battling, you can activate the corresponding functions."

\"Tutorframe_85_5\".m_mContent: "Just give us the instructions, and we will adapt our fighting strategy for you."

\"Tutorframe_103_1\".m_mContent: "When you collect enough Vassal's Covenant, you can perform Herald at any time."

\"Tutorframe_103_2\".m_mContent: "Use your abilities to form a stronger team and overcome difficult challenges."

\"Tutorframe_106_1\".m_mContent: "Level reset function is now unlocked. Please follow me."

\"Tutorframe_106_2\".m_mContent: "Resetting the level will revert the Vassal to LV. 1."

\"Tutorframe_106_4\".m_mContent: "Please use this function when you need it."

\"Tutorframe_110_1\".m_mContent: "Empousa is weakened now, so try to prevent her from getting hurt."

\"Tutorframe_110_2\".m_mContent: "We are warriors, and we must fulfill our duty! We shall protect her!"

\"Tutorframe_111_1\".m_mContent: "I said not to treat me as a weakling... Why are there more enemies coming from the other side! Help me!"

\"Tutorframe_112_1\".m_mContent: "Surrounded on both sides? Maintain formation and keep protecting Empousa! That's our main priority."

\"Tutorframe_130_1\".m_mContent: "You're right, that large suit of armor housing the memories of Jestel's mother is their leader!"

\"Tutorframe_130_2\".m_mContent: "The Cluster Brain? It seems that defeating her is the key to winning this battle."

\"Tutorframe_130_3\".m_mContent: "Let's take the leader down and win this for Jestel and the victims!"

\"Tutorframe_130_4\".m_mContent: "Stage Objective: Defeat the Cluster Brain (Elite Shield Spirit) to achieve victory."

\"Tutorframe_150_1\".m_mContent: "Rituals have been banned for several hundred years following the decline of the families."

\"Tutorframe_150_2\".m_mContent: "During rituals, Vassals offer precious resources as a tribute of their loyalty and reverence."

\"Tutorframe_150_3\".m_mContent: "The time has come to restore this curious "game.""

\"Tutorframe_150_4\".m_mContent: "As the story in Threads of Fate progresses, Moonlight Faith will increase, leading to faster Tribute yields."

\"Tutorframe_150_5\".m_mContent: "Tributes stop once the limit has been reached. Be sure to collect them in time!"

\"Tutorframe_150_6\".m_mContent: "Prosperity enhances our ability to collect from the territory."

\"Tutorframe_150_7\".m_mContent: "The closer we draw to where Lady Empousa is imprisoned, the stronger the spectral guards become."

\"Tutorframe_150_8\".m_mContent: "Deploy Vassals from the Embrace until the Lineup is complete."

\"Tutorframe_150_9\".m_mContent: "The more Vassals deployed, the faster the Bloodsoul Recovery, which means you can use Ultimates more frequently in battles."

\"Tutorframe_150_10\".m_mContent: "When we lose Vassals in battle, Bloodsoul Recovery slows down. The survival of each Vassal is equally crucial"

\"Tutorframe_1050_0\".m_mContent: "Tap Initial Hand Edit to select Ultimates of deployed Vassals."

\"Tutorframe_1050_1\".m_mContent: "You can select up to 3 initial Ultimates."

\"Tutorframe_1050_2\".m_mContent: "Drag cards from below into the slots."

\"Tutorframe_1050_3\".m_mContent:
"These 3 cards will form your Initial Hand at the start of the battle.
<alpha=#90>They won't change!"

\"Tutorframe_1050_4\".m_mContent: "Tip: Tap [Confirm] to save your initial Ultimates after editing."

\"Tutor_230_01\".m_mContent: "Equipment can be enhanced, which increases its attributes."

\"Tutor_230_02\".m_mContent: "Be sure to come and enhance your equipment often. You can obtain equipment and enhancement items through Nightfall."

\"Tutor_240_01\".m_mContent: "Cain claims to have revived the long-forbidden technique, the Transfusion. A new door is opening before us."

\"Tutor_240_01a\".m_mContent: "All Bloodborn, no matter how young, stand to gain powerful abilities by transfusing their blood with that of the ancients."

\"Tutor_240_02\".m_mContent: "Based on this principle, you can assign some Vassals in the ritual to have their levels synchronized with those in the main Transfusion Slot."

\"Tutor_240_04\".m_mContent: "Make good use of it and it will prove to be a boon."

\"Tutor_250_01\".m_mContent: "The Blood Arena has been fully restored. Please follow me there."

\"Tutor_250_02\".m_mContent: "Like the ancient arenas, this is a place for blood, sweat, and honor. Build your lineup, train your Vassals well, and test your might against rival Lords."

\"Tutor_250_03\".m_mContent: "Besides the thrill of battles, you can also earn Mark of Bravery to redeem generous rewards."

\"Tutor_260_02\".m_mContent: "The spread of the plague is inevitable, and the fallen Blood Beasts will recover even faster."

\"Tutor_260_03\".m_mContent: "You can return to previous battles to challenge these undead creatures. And your courage will be honored with abundant rewards upon clearing the stage."

\"Tutor_2700_01\".m_mContent: "The Church's ship has reached the target waters. Time to act."

\"Tutor_2700_02\".m_mContent: "I wonder how Cain is doing with the ship preparations..."

\"Tutorframe_270_1\".m_mContent: "Dispatch ships from the dock to meet Dalcarlo at sea."

\"Tutorframe_240_1\".m_mContent: "The five Vassals with the highest levels will automatically occupy the Main Transfusion Slots."

\"Tutorframe_240_2\".m_mContent: "The Fusion Level is dependent on the lowest level Vassal of the five in the Main Transfusion Slots."

\"Tutorframe_240_3\".m_mContent: "The level of the Vassals placed in the Transfusion Slots will be set to the same as the Transfusion Level."

\"Tutor_261_01\".m_mContent: "Getting ambushed by all these werewolves and having to take care of Clive is a real handful."

\"Tutor_261_02\".m_mContent: "Chop down this giant mushroom. Maybe it can stop the swarm of werewolves."

\"Tutor_261_04\".m_mContent: "Quick, fight off the tentacle, or more will come!"

\"Tutor_261_05\".m_mContent: "Only by attacking the tentacles can you damage the Calamity!"

\"B_60001_Clip08_021a\".m_mContent: "The room on the left with bloody footprints."

\"B_60001_Clip08_021b\".m_mContent: "The room in the middle with barrels scattered about."

\"B_60001_Clip08_021c\".m_mContent: "The neatly organized room on the right."

\"B_60001_Clip09_020a\".m_mContent: "The room on the left with bloodstains on the door."

\"B_60001_Clip09_020b\".m_mContent: "艾米om on the right with junk piled up at the entrance."

\"B_60001_Clip09_020c\".m_mContent: "The room in the middle with wine bottles scattered on the floor."

\"Tutor_151_01\".m_mContent: "Baphomet has set up guards and traps around this tower. I'm afraid it will be difficult for us to break through."

\"Tutor_151_02\".m_mContent: "There are many tortured souls here, victims of Baphomet. Miss Aiona, we can revive these warriors!"

\"Tutor_151_03\".m_mContent: "Indeed, this is the residual blood we've been collecting along the way. Perhaps we can use these 'memories' to gain new Vassals."

\"Tutor_151_04\".m_mContent: "Let's all agree to welcome in more Vassals."

\"Tutor_270_01\".m_mContent: "Perhaps you've noticed that Cidhall, like you, was transformed into a Bloodborn through a forbidden ritual."

\"Tutor_270_02\".m_mContent: "The difference, however, is that he chose this path for himself..."

\"Tutor_270_03\".m_mContent: "Though the Church has explicitly banned alchemical research, for the Bloodborn, it remains an essential means of self-enhancement, regardless of the risks."

\"Tutor_270_04\".m_mContent: "The basic principle is to sacrifice the essence of Bloodborn souls as offerings, in turn allowing one to draw upon the purest Ancestral Power to increase a Vassal's strength."

\"Tutor_270_05\".m_mContent: "Other rituals can enhance the abilities of Vassals, depending on their Faction and Equipment type."

\"Tutor_270_07\".m_mContent: "Alchemy can help our Vassal Lineup's Blood Power reach greater heights."

\"Tutorframe_270_01\".m_mContent: "In the Ritual Chamber, you can enhance your Vassals' base attributes."

\"Tutorframe_270_02\".m_mContent: "Awakening can boost all Vassals' abilities with just one tap."

\"Tutor_280_01\".m_mContent: "'Failure' is never the end. For Bloodborn, 'Death' is but a new beginning."

\"Tutor_280_02\".m_mContent: "While travelling and battling about the land, we Lords can <style=Highlight>Tax</style> properties to obtain resources."

\"Tutor_280_03\".m_mContent: "Tax revenue can be used to significantly increase your Vassal's LV."

\"Tutor_280_04\".m_mContent: "Perhaps try again after leveling your Vassals. We've got plenty of opportunity to grow, and I'll always be at your side!"

\"Tutor_291_01\".m_mContent: "Due to their diverse bloodlines, different Vassals play different roles in battle."

\"Tutor_291_02\".m_mContent: "Within each faction, you can select five Vassals for the ritual."

\"Tutor_291_03\".m_mContent: "After selection, you'll have a higher chance of obtaining these Vassals during the Embrace ritual."

\"Tutor_291_04\".m_mContent: "We eagerly await the choices you will make."

\"Tutorframe_291_01\".m_mContent: "Using the Altar of Invocation allows you to obtain desired Vassals more quickly, helping us build a stronger and more comprehensive lineup."

\"Tutor_300_01\".m_mContent: "Ugh, we've been trudging forever! My legs are about ready to fall off. I'm getting jealous of those bums back at the castle, sleeping in and sipping their hot wine."

\"Tutor_300_02\".m_mContent: "Jess and Setti aren't just lounging at the castle. They're there to oversee crucial family affairs."

\"Tutor_300_03\".m_mContent: "Our family has long adhered to the First Tenet of Secrecy: Seclusion. Should we truly wish to restore our past glory, Vassals must be dispatched to expand our influence."

\"Tutor_300_04\".m_mContent: "I've heard from Setti that Cain has began assigning Missions to those stationed in the castle."

\"Tutor_300_05\".m_mContent: "Hmph, well at least someone is doing something for once."

\"Tutor_300_06\".m_mContent: "Expeditions reset daily. Remember to claim your Mission Rewards and dispatch Vassals for a new round of expeditions each day."

\"Tutorframe_300_01\".m_mContent: "Different locations offer Missions of varying Difficulty. The higher the Difficulty, the more generous the rewards."

\"Tutorframe_300_02\".m_mContent: "Upgrade the Observatory and Hall of Honor to unlock higher Difficulties."

\"Tutorframe_300_03\".m_mContent: "Different Expedition Missions have different requirements for Vassal Rarity and Faction."

\"Tutorframe_300_04\".m_mContent: "This Vassal is eligible for the Crystalline Crater."

\"Tutorframe_300_05\".m_mContent: "Tap here to Embark. After a period of time, she will return with 10 Moon Tears."

\"Boss_VictoryLine_Wolf_2\".m_mContent: "Get up, and come at me again!"

\"Boss_VictoryLine_Wolf_3\".m_mContent: "It wasn't supposed to end like this..."

\"Boss_VictoryLine_Faust_1\".m_mContent: "Does it hurt? Don't worry, your suffering is about to end."

\"Boss_VictoryLine_Faust_2\".m_mContent: "At least I got to stretch my legs."

\"Boss_VictoryLine_Faust_3\".m_mContent: "Did you not learn your lesson the first time?"

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20030_01\".m_mContent: "Is that even up for debate? It's the obvious course of action. Only a fool would think otherwise!"

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20040_01\".m_mContent: "The timing is indeed propitious. You may proceed."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20050_01\".m_mContent: "Enough hesitation. Let’s plan our next move."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20060_01\".m_mContent: "What do I think? No objections from me."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20080_01\".m_mContent: "Bella: There are risks, but the potential profits are substantial."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20080_02\".m_mContent: "Puppet: What Miss Bella means is that she's on board!"

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20100_01\".m_mContent: "Doing something worthwhile for once isn’t so bad after all."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20110_01\".m_mContent: "Is my opinion important? If you must , then do it."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20120_01\".m_mContent: "If this path leads to greater strength, then you have my support."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20130_01\".m_mContent: "I'm in! Just follow me and we can't fail!"

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20160_01\".m_mContent: "This approach seems fine, but I'll review it or any potential oversights."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20180_01\".m_mContent: "In the absence of a perfect solution, this may well serve as a viable approach."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20200_01\".m_mContent: "I believe it's worth a try, but what does everyone else think?"

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20210_01\".m_mContent: "I didn't expect you to come up with such an interesting idea."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20220_01\".m_mContent: "It must be done, in this way."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20230_01\".m_mContent: "With 'The Chariot' at our disposal, we can boldly forge ahead."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20270_01\".m_mContent: "This should be the right course of action... um... right? I'm... not sure..."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20280_01\".m_mContent: "There's no need for my input. Simply follow your convictions."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20290_01\".m_mContent: "Yes... this will certainly keep with the course of history."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20300_01\".m_mContent: "Yes... this aligns with the laws of the universe."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20310_02\".m_mContent: "All this fuss over nothing. Don't you all have better things to do?"

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20330_01\".m_mContent: "I appreciate this flexibility. It gives us strategic options."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20340_01\".m_mContent: "It aligns closely with our predetermined course."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20370_01\".m_mContent: "I feel something calling from the depths of my memories..."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20380_01\".m_mContent: "Sure, it sounds like a lucrative job."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20400_01\".m_mContent: "So even you have your moments of doubt?"

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20400_02\".m_mContent: "Let's do it. This time, I'll lead the way."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20420_01\".m_mContent: "I'd say that's a fair call, all things considered."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20450_01\".m_mContent: "As always, you have my full support in matters like this."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20470_01\".m_mContent: "To align oneself with the currents of fate is the truest path."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20480_01\".m_mContent: "Give it a shot? Well... you have my support."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20490_01\".m_mContent: "Too dense. I've said all along we should do this."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20510_01\".m_mContent: "I think it's worthwhile. You agree, right, big bro Noah?"

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20570_02\".m_mContent: "This isn't a suggestion. It's an order."

\"CouncilHall_Agree_20660_01\".m_mContent:
"Bella: Alright.
Yakov: As expected of Noah!"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20030_01\".m_mContent: "What's the hurry? Let me think for a moment."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20040_01\".m_mContent: "Perhaps we should weigh our options more carefully."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20050_01\".m_mContent: "Let's not jump to conclusions when there's still doubt."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20070_01\".m_mContent: "What if I said I didn't care? Would that bother you?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20080_01\".m_mContent: "Bella: Why don't we take a look at the new merchandise instead?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20080_02\".m_mContent: "Puppet: Eh, we don't really care about that stuff."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20090_01\".m_mContent: "It's time you learned to make your own judgments."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20100_01\".m_mContent: "Kid, don't rope me in unless it's vital. I'd rather catch some more shut-eye."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20110_01\".m_mContent: "Are we seriously holding a meeting for something this trivial?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20120_01\".m_mContent: "Haven't you got anything better to do?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20130_01\".m_mContent: "Both sides have their merits and drawbacks. It's a real dilemma."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20150_01\".m_mContent: "With countless innocents perishing in the world, the relevance of this discussion is..."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20160_01\".m_mContent: "Choosing between the two? It's giving me a real headache. What do you think?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20180_01\".m_mContent: "I wish to abstain on this matter."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20210_01\".m_mContent: "Do you fuss over this trivial stuff every day? How utterly boring."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20230_01\".m_mContent: "A tricky hand we've been dealt... Let's not play our cards too hastily."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20270_01\".m_mContent: "Must we really make a decision now...?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20280_01\".m_mContent: "There's no need for my input. Simply follow your convictions."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20290_01\".m_mContent: "Without a prior case for reference, perhaps relying on intuition is also an option."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20300_01\".m_mContent: "Life is fleeting. Shall we turn our minds to more important matters?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20310_01\".m_mContent: "I have more pressing matters that require my contemplation. Do proceed without my input, if you would."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20330_01\".m_mContent: "I'm afraid this isn't my domain of expertise."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20340_01\".m_mContent: "Pardon my indifference, but an observer should not intervene too much."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20350_01\".m_mContent: "Kid, is this the kind of stuff you usually concern yourself with?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20370_01\".m_mContent: "I'm sorry, but I can't pass judgment."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20380_01\".m_mContent: "What? ...Do I have the right to answer this question?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20400_01\".m_mContent: "Is it really necessary to obsess over such trivial matters?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20430_01\".m_mContent: "Is this supposed to be some kind of joke?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20450_01\".m_mContent: "There are more pressing matters to contemplate..."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20480_01\".m_mContent: "I apologize, I'm still quite unfamiliar with most things around here."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20490_01\".m_mContent: "You're wasting my time with such trivialities?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20510_01\".m_mContent: "Well... I don't really know much about that."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20520_01\".m_mContent: "Hahaha! I'll leave this decision to you commoners."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20570_01\".m_mContent: "You're asking me? Can't Cain handle such a trivial matter?"

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20650_01\".m_mContent: "As long as it doesn't create more expenses, I'm fine with whatever."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20660_01\".m_mContent:
"Bella: I want to go to the beach...
Yakov: zzz...zzz..."

\"CouncilHall_Neutral_20700_01\".m_mContent: "Come on, it'll be fine! Let's go do something fun."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20030_01\".m_mContent: "Absolutely not. Do I really have to spell it out for you?"

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20060_02\".m_mContent: "Of course, let's proceed with your plan."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20070_01\".m_mContent: "What to do... We haven't even started, yet I can already envision thousands of terrible outcomes..."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20080_01\".m_mContent: "Bella: The potential profits are disproportionate to the risk involved."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20080_02\".m_mContent: "Puppet: Please be sure to carefully calculate the costs and benefits."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20090_01\".m_mContent: "How would you respond if I were to raise objections as the castle steward?"

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20100_01\".m_mContent: "Man, I'm trying real hard to come up with a counterpoint."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20110_01\".m_mContent: "Don't get too cocky, you're nothing but a vassal."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20130_01\".m_mContent: "I can see quite a few red flags here. What do you think about it?"

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20140_01\".m_mContent: "My objection is crystal clear: this is nothing but a pathetic farce."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20150_01\".m_mContent: "Such naivety. Being a savior is no easy feat..."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20160_01\".m_mContent: "I'm concerned that this approach might not be entirely appropriate."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20180_01\".m_mContent: "Let not the urgency of present needs obscure your foresight."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20200_01\".m_mContent: "Might our actions have exceeded prudent bounds?"

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20200_02\".m_mContent: "Nevertheless, this is but my personal assessment. The perspectives of all present are of equal significance."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20210_01\".m_mContent: "I object. This matter far transcends mere frivolity."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20220_01\".m_mContent: "I did not offer my permission or approval."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20230_01\".m_mContent: "Everything is shrouded in the shadow of the 'Tower'..."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20270_01\".m_mContent: "Is this course of action... the right one? I'm sorry, can I retract? I'm worried about the others..."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20280_01\".m_mContent: "There's no need for my input. Simply follow your convictions."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20290_01\".m_mContent: "Based on historical cases, using this course of action may prove difficult to achieve our objective."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20290_02\".m_mContent: "But history can also be written by you..."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20300_01\".m_mContent: "Hmm... Allow me to share a story with you after the meeting concludes."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20310_02\".m_mContent: "There are no fools here. Just tell me what you're really after."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20330_01\".m_mContent: "It might not be suitable, but I could help you find more inspiration."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20340_01\".m_mContent: "I've witnessed far too many tragedies in this world and they all shared a common cause一human nature."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20350_01\".m_mContent: "Haha, I thought you might have actually learned something after all this time apart..."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20370_01\".m_mContent: "Something lurking in the shadows of my past warns me against such actions..."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20380_01\".m_mContent: "I've had my eye on this situation for a while now. The real issue is... oops, I'm saying too much..."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20430_01\".m_mContent: "Might I suggest we give this matter further consideration?"

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20450_01\".m_mContent: "Once, I would have agreed without hesitation..."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20450_02\".m_mContent: "But now... the decisions before us are far more nuanced."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20470_01\".m_mContent: "Let the river of fate carve its own path."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20480_01\".m_mContent: "I fear we may be acting with undue haste."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20510_01\".m_mContent: "Hey Noah, something doesn't feel right here. What do you think, bro?"

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20520_01\".m_mContent: "That's rather lacking in decorum, wouldn't you say?"

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20570_01\".m_mContent: "Such an idea... Well, well, your boldness has certainly grown since we last met."

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20640_01\".m_mContent: "Perhaps the little one needs some advice from a grown-up?"

\"CouncilHall_Disagree_20660_01\".m_mContent:
"Bella: I think not.
Yakov: Little Bella actually expressed disagreement!"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20020_01\".m_mContent: "A fine choice. I presume you're also one of the Moonblessed."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20030_01\".m_mContent: "I didn't know you were such a visionary."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20040_01\".m_mContent: "It would be an honor to assist you."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20050_01\".m_mContent: "You can rest assured that this matter is in good hands."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20060_01\".m_mContent: "Thanks for the recognition! Is there anything you need me to do?"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20070_01\".m_mContent: "Heh, are you trying to win my favor...?"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20080_02\".m_mContent: "Puppet: Make sure to invite Miss Bella to our next meeting as well, okay?"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20090_01\".m_mContent: "Interesting choice. Is there a matter you need me to handle?"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20100_01\".m_mContent: "Offering advice is work too. We can discuss the implementation next time."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20110_01\".m_mContent: "Haha, so you've finally accepted your role as a servant!"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20120_01\".m_mContent: "As I thought, we had the same idea."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20130_01\".m_mContent: "As expected of you! Leave the rest to me!"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20140_01\".m_mContent: "No need for thanks, I'm simply acting according to my duty."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20150_01\".m_mContent: "I'll never believe in kindness that doesn't come with a price."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20160_01\".m_mContent: "Great, I'm glad you feel the same."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20170_01\".m_mContent: "Shall I proceed with immediate execution of the task?"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20180_01\".m_mContent: "Your plan demonstrates admirable thoroughness. My discernment, as ever, proves impeccable."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20200_01\".m_mContent: "It's a relief that you thought the same. I feared it might spark discord among us."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20210_01\".m_mContent: "My, my... I didn't peg you for the obedient type. How intriguing."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20220_01\".m_mContent: "Let us, with steadfast resolve, mend the very fabric of fate."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20230_01\".m_mContent: "Have the whispers of the 'Lovers' been heard?"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20270_01\".m_mContent: "To be recognized... it's a rare gift. You have my deepest gratitude."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20290_01\".m_mContent: "One day, I hope to prove to be an indispensable ally to you."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20300_01\".m_mContent: "I do believe this is a 'eureka' moment between us."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20330_01\".m_mContent: "Is there anything else on your mind?"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20340_01\".m_mContent: "Thank you for bringing a moment of joy to this long and wearisome life."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20350_01\".m_mContent: "Haha, is this what they call the unspoken understanding between old friends?"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20380_01\".m_mContent: "Do you truly feel the same way?"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20400_01\".m_mContent: "Save your gratitude. I'm merely adhering to my principles."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20420_01\".m_mContent: "Very well. Let’s face what comes next together."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20430_01\".m_mContent: "Not bad. It seems we’re cut from the same cloth."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20470_01\".m_mContent: "Your insight is a rarity in these times."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20480_01\".m_mContent: "They heard me... So, we really do have a choice."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20510_01\".m_mContent: "Yes! At last, I understand what Noah was thinking!"

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20520_01\".m_mContent: "For a commoner, you have some lofty ideals."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20640_01\".m_mContent: "Perhaps you are more suited to be a Sage than I am."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20650_01\".m_mContent: "Heh, you have to admit my reasoning makes sense."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20660_01\".m_mContent:
"Bella: We can fulfill our promise together.
Yakov: Little Bella seems very happy now."

\"CouncilHall_Accepted_20700_01\".m_mContent: "As expected from someone who caught my eye!"

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20030_01\".m_mContent: "Hey! You're doing this deliberately, aren't you?"

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20040_01\".m_mContent: "I'm certain you have your own considerations in this matter."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20060_01\".m_mContent: "Forget it, pretend I didn't say anything."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20070_01\".m_mContent: "I'll keep you in my prayers. For everything else, you're on your own."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20080_01\".m_mContent: "Bella: Let's call this a special perk for our loyal customer."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20110_01\".m_mContent: "What's this, some cheap shot to get under my skin? Nice try, but I couldn't care less."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20130_01\".m_mContent: "I'm not angry! I still trust your judgment."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20140_01\".m_mContent: "Done? I've got other matters to attend to."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20150_01\".m_mContent: "How many more tragedies born of ignorance must we witness..."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20160_01\".m_mContent: "Hm? I wonder why Noah chose this path."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20180_01\".m_mContent: "Please reconsider. Too many tragedies have been born from momentary impulses..."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20200_01\".m_mContent: "I'm not sad... If you need any help in the future, you can always come to me."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20210_01\".m_mContent: "Sigh, I really can't understand what those colleagues of mine find so interesting about you."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20220_01\".m_mContent: "It is time for the people of this world to wake up and witness the truth."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20230_01\".m_mContent: "The 'Wheel of Fortune' has begun turning. Follow your intuition."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20270_01\".m_mContent: "Okay, I'll leave it up to you."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20290_01\".m_mContent: "I hope that one day, I can be as decisive as you..."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20300_01\".m_mContent: "Your perspective is quite intriguing. Would you care to elaborate on it for me?"

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20330_01\".m_mContent: "Making decisions is never easy. Don't be so hard on yourself."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20340_01\".m_mContent: "This is but a mere speck among countless misconceptions."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20340_02\".m_mContent: "Have no worry. All will settle into place, like dust after a storm."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20350_01\".m_mContent: "You never fail to surprise me, like that unexpected move in chess. I must say, I quite enjoy it..."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20370_01\".m_mContent: "May you find your way back from the path of Loss."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20400_01\".m_mContent: "The outcome is irrelevant to me. I act solely on my convictions."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20430_01\".m_mContent: "Humanity yearns for change, yet fears its cost."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20470_01\".m_mContent: "Don't be troubled, for it's human nature to favor those who echo their sentiments."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20570_01\".m_mContent: "Trying to provoke me, are you? Hah! You'll regret this dearly."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20650_01\".m_mContent: "Don't come crying to me when you get into trouble!"

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20660_01\".m_mContent:
"Bella: O-okay...
Yakov: Little Bella seems disappointed."

\"CouncilHall_Disapproved_20700_01\".m_mContent: "Hey, do you understand the consequences of what you're doing?"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20020_01\".m_mContent: "Alright, since they're saying you're one of the Moonblessed, I suppose I'll trust you this time!"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20030_01\".m_mContent: "Fine, I guess you have a point there."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20040_01\".m_mContent: "Upon consideration, your choice is indeed the more prudent course of action."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20050_01\".m_mContent: "I must admit, your argument has finally convinced me."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20060_01\".m_mContent: "Is it still possible to change my mind?"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20070_01\".m_mContent: "It's nothing. I just wanted to see your smile."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20080_01\".m_mContent: "Bella: Alright, I shall trust your judgment this time."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20090_01\".m_mContent: "Can you guess which words of yours made me change my mind?"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20100_01\".m_mContent: "Come to think of it, your plan does seem a bit more effortless."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20110_01\".m_mContent: "So talkative... Fine, this lady will change her vote. Happy now?"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20120_01\".m_mContent: "What's wrong with changing my mind? I’m not the type to be stuck in my ways."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20130_01\".m_mContent: "Let's go with your idea this time!"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20140_01\".m_mContent: "If changing my mind will make you talk less, I suppose it's not a bad option."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20150_01\".m_mContent: "Why are you glaring at me... Aren't you afraid?"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20160_01\".m_mContent: "Ah, I knew it. These are your real feelings."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20170_01\".m_mContent: "I'm afraid I couldn't keep up with your line of thought earlier."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20180_01\".m_mContent: "The light shall shine upon us all."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20200_01\".m_mContent: "Sometimes, choosing to trust is more important than finding the correct answer."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20210_01\".m_mContent: "What? Is changing your mind not a perfectly normal thing to do?"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20220_01\".m_mContent: "Fate has already ordained everything, including me changing my mind at this very moment."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20230_01\".m_mContent: "Hah, you can't see the changes of the 'moon' through the clouds."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20270_01\".m_mContent: "Thank you for helping me understand my true thoughts."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20280_01\".m_mContent: "If it were me back then, I'd probably have made the exact same choice..."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20290_01\".m_mContent: "I think you deserve some praise for deliberating on this matter for so long, even if our opinions differ."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20300_01\".m_mContent: "Is this sense of illuminating each other also an aspect of life's significance?"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20310_02\".m_mContent: "Don't get the wrong idea. I'm simply discussing things objectively."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20330_01\".m_mContent: "While I can't fully grasp your decision, it has inspired me. Thank you for that!"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20340_01\".m_mContent: "Well then, perhaps you really can carve out a different path..."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20350_01\".m_mContent: "I'll leave it up to you. After all, the 'future' rests in your hands..."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20370_01\".m_mContent: "I apologize, my mind wandered for a moment..."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20380_01\".m_mContent: "Okay, okay! I'll change my stance, just stop staring at me."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20400_01\".m_mContent: "I understand now. You've embraced 'a different brand of justice.'"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20420_01\".m_mContent: "I'll let you make the final decision."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20430_01\".m_mContent: "The pursuit of the right answer is, in itself, a tedious endeavor."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20470_01\".m_mContent: "If changing one's mind could grant us even a brief respite, it would be worthwhile."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20480_01\".m_mContent: "Thank you for changing my mind. I'm still learning."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20490_01\".m_mContent: "Agree with you? Preposterous. I have my own agenda to consider."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20510_01\".m_mContent: "Could you explain why we're taking this approach?"

\"CouncilHall_Change_20520_01\".m_mContent: "No need to thank me. I'm alway this understanding."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20570_01\".m_mContent: "That look of surprise is quite... intriguing."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20640_01\".m_mContent: "Hmm... You make a good point. I suppose I can't treat you like a child anymore."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20660_01\".m_mContent: "Bella: This time, I'll trust your judgment."

\"CouncilHall_Change_20700_01\".m_mContent: "You win this time. I can't stand it!"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Start_101_01\".m_mContent: "The recent wave of acid rain has severely damaged the castle's Observatory, forcing us to cancel our nightly stargazing ceremony. Do you think this will have a significant impact?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_PositiveState_101_01.m_mContent: "The Observatory holds special significance for our family. It was established to observe the Other Side of the Moon. From the changes in the stars, we can read many omens. We should repair it as soon as possible. We mustn't delay such important matters!"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_NegativeState_101_01.m_mContent: "Have you not seen the state of those old relics? They're corroded beyond recognition! Repairing them would cost a fortune! In my humble opinion, let's not waste our coin on this."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Question_101_01\".m_mContent: "What are your thoughts on 'investing significant funds to repair our long-neglected Observatory'?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Start_102_01\".m_mContent: "The Church has recently resumed salvaging 'Future Artifacts' from the sea. A vassal has suggested that we could try this as well, to enrich our collection in the Hall of Opulence. What do you think about this?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_PositiveState_102_01.m_mContent: "They say these 'Future Artifacts' don't belong to this era, but for some reason, they were misplaced on this continent. Hmm... there must be more to this story!"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_PositiveState_102_02.m_mContent: "Moreover, the Church and major families are desperately trying to collect them, apparently because these treasures can greatly enhance Blood power. We Bathory cannot miss this opportunity—we must quickly arrange a fleet to salvage them."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_NegativeState_102_01.m_mContent: "You may not know, but hundreds of years ago, the family sent vassals to retrieve these 'Future Artifacts.' They not only failed to find any trace of treasure but also wasted vast resources. This expedition will likely lead to a direct confrontation with the Church. In my opinion, we should abandon this endeavor."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Question_102_01\".m_mContent: "What are your thoughts on 'collecting Future Artifacts highly sought after by various factions, despite significant risks'?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Start_103_01\".m_mContent: "Recently, our castle has seen an increase in vassals recreated through alchemy. We need to discuss whether to grant them the same rights as our regular vassals."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_PositiveState_103_01.m_mContent: "A vassal's worthiness of our respect should not be determined by their origin, but by their actions within our castle."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_PositiveState_103_02.m_mContent: "I see these new friends all strictly following our precepts, even better than regular vassals in fact. So why should their rights be treated differently?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_NegativeState_103_01.m_mContent: "I must strongly disagree. These so-called 'vassals' are manufactured from mere drops of blood, their Bloodline diluted. How can they be compared to vassals born through the proper Embrace ritual? Granting them the most basic rights should suffice."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Question_103_01\".m_mContent: "What are your thoughts on 'granting full rights to the recreated vassals'?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Start_104_01\".m_mContent: "Cain has reported that many vassals have been secretly using the castle's alchemical facilities. I'm considering granting permission for the use of these facilities. What are your thoughts on this?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_PositiveState_104_01.m_mContent: "It's definitely worth a try! Alchemy can not only enhance our Blood power but also create various everyday items!"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_PositiveState_104_02.m_mContent: "If vassals use and research with the alchemical facilities more, it can enhance the power of our entire family in the long run. Let's encourage everyone to give it a try!"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_NegativeState_104_01.m_mContent: "Are you completely oblivious to the risks? Our family has been studying alchemy for ages, and we still haven't grasped its full nature."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_NegativeState_104_02.m_mContent: "If we allow vassals to use these facilities at will, not only might they violate our ancient family laws, they could even burn this ancient castle to the ground. In my view, it would be far more reassuring to keep the right of use firmly in our own hands."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Question_104_01\".m_mContent: "What are your thoughts on 'allowing vassals to use the alchemical facilities independently'?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Start_105_01\".m_mContent: "A vassal returning from travels has mentioned encountering a mysterious island in the Sea of Medimar. The island's characteristics bear a striking resemblance to the 'Other Side' described in our family's historical records."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_Start_105_02\".m_mContent: "Perhaps we should dispatch a fleet to investigate. What are your thoughts on this matter?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_PositiveState_105_01.m_mContent: "I remember that description of the 'Other Side'! 'Time in the Other Side flows parallel to our reality, its space intertwines with our own. The secret of 'eternal life' may be hidden within.'"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_PositiveState_105_02.m_mContent: "Unraveling the 'mystery of eternal life' has always been our family's desire. Why don't we have this vassal lead a fleet to investigate?"

\"CouncilHall_Issue_NegativeState_105_01.m_mContent: "Young one, have you not read the next page? Our family history clearly states: exploring the Other Side carries high risks. In 1235, three vassals were sent aboard the 'Virgin Lady' to explore the southwestern Sea of Medimar in search of the Other Side. They were never heard from again."

\"CouncilHall_Issue_NegativeState_105_02.m_mContent: "In 1248, four vassals skilled in navigation were sent aboard the 'Dark Soul' to explore the southwestern Sea of Medimar in search of the 'Other Side.'
